story:
Cliquez ici pour la version française

 

Checkpoints Race is the world’s first connected running competition.

It’s a team challenge from may to september which end by a grand finale.

For the first time, you have a real chance to qualify for it.

Our uniqueness: to qualify your team for the finale, you have to rely on your community. We are turning running into a team sport.

A new service: if you’re looking for teammates, the Checkpoints Race app will drive you to find other runners throughout the world.

Check out our video if you haven’t done yet : you’ll understand in 2’30'' !

We appeal to all the runners worldwide who like to push the limits and seek a challenge: if you run semi's , marathons, trail races, adventure races, triathlons... you know your family and your supporters admire your commitment and sacrifice.

Now it's time to get them out of their couch and make them run so they actually convert that admiration into energy: they are the ones who will get you to the final!

 

Contribute now to our crowdfunding campaign by booking pre-registration at discounted rates.

With 5000 registered teams, we will have the means to launch the competition: get moving and see you on 27 March.

 

 

Dear backers,
To be honest, it seems we stayed in the starting blocks at the start of the race!
Our crowdfunding campaign did not start as planned…Read more..

 

Contents

  • The Checkpoints Race Experience
  • Our app
  • The key to be part of the finale
  • The finale
  • Participate
  • Why Checkpoints Race?
  • Frequently Asked Questions

 

The Checkpoints Race Experience


 

 

 

Get a solo pass and set up your team through the application. It's been designed for that!

If you're looking for teammates, Checkpoints Race will connect you to competitors from all around the world.

 

 

Our application

 

The Checkpoints Race app is not another running app.

While tracking applications help you monitor your performance, Checkpoints Race app is the first app through which teams can qualify for a finale.

 

 

The key to being part of the finale


It's all about an athletic and collective performance.

Our uniqueness is to base the ranking on the running activity of both the 5 teammates and of the team supporters.

 

Make your team run as much as possible, gather the community and get them out of the couch, they will help you win.


 

How to score more points?

 

Have fun within your team!

 

With Checkpoints Race, we break the classic qualification rules for a world finale:

you can do it!

 

The Finale

The top 50 teams qualify for an all expenses paid finale in the French Alps.
All over the world, the supporters can follow the live performance of the teams in the finale.


50 teams on the starting line, only one finishing team : The Runner Games ! 


 

Our partners in the adventure

Our commitment

Checkpoints Race want to mobilizing a community of connected runners and give them the opportunity to support causes, around values such as team spirit, respect, self-transcendence, and sharing

That's why we've set up a charity program with our partners

Get a Charity Pass: 50% of the amount will be equally split among our 4 charities, Checkpoints Race will abound to your donation and your team will be identified as a Charity Team.


And three more to come ...

 

Contribute


 

 

 

Why Checkpoints Race?


 

 

 

 

 Click here for the English version

 

 

Checkpoints Race c’est la 1ère compétition mondiale de running connectée.

Nous proposons un défi digital mondial de 5 mois à la communauté mondiale des runners dont l’aboutissement est une finale exceptionnelle à l’Alpe d’Huez.
Un challenge par équipe de 5 à disputer de mai à septembre 2015.

Et pour la première fois, vous avez toutes vos chances d’en être, car nous avons inventé de nouvelles règles de qualification !

Notre originalité : utiliser la force de la communauté pour sélectionner les meilleures équipes. Nous voulons faire du running un sport collectif.

Le service sympa : Si vous cherchez des coéquipiers, l’application Checkpoints Race vous connectera avec d’autres coureurs du monde entier pour former vos équipes.

Prenez 2’30’’ pour regardez notre vidéo si vous ne l’avez pas encore fait et vous comprendrez ce qu’est Checkpoints Race.

Nous nous adressons à tous les runners de la planète qui aiment repousser leurs limites et recherchent le challenge : si vous êtes coureurs de semi, de marathon, de trail, de courses d’obstacles, d’adventure race, triathlètes, …
vous savez que vos proches et votre communauté admirent votre engagement et votre abnégation.

Il est temps de les sortir de leur canapé pour les faire courir et qu’ils convertissent concrètement cette admiration en énergie : ce sont eux qui vont vous envoyer en finale !

Contribuez dès maintenant à notre campagne de financement participatif en réservant des pré-inscriptions à des tarifs préférentiels.

 

Avec 5000 équipes enregistrées, nous avons les moyens de lancer la compétition : enclenchez la dynamique et RDV le 27 mars.

 

 

Chers supporters,
Pour être francs, nous sommes restés dans les starting-blocks au départ de la course !
Notre campagne de financement participatif n’a pas démarré comme prévu…En savoir plus..

 

Sommaire

  • L'expérience Checkpoints Race
  • Notre application
  • La recette pour aller en finale
  • La Finale
  • Contribuer
  • Pourquoi Checkpoints Race ?
  • Foire aux Questions

 

L'expérience Checkpoints Race


 

 

 

Prenez un Pass solo à prix réduit dès maintenant et vous pourrez constituer votre équipe dans l'application, elle est faite pour ça !

Si vous cherchez des coéquipiers, Checkpoints Race va vous connecter avec des compétiteurs inscrits dans le monde entier qui n'attendent que vous !

 

 

Notre application

 

Checkpoints Race n'est pas une application de running de plus.

Quand les applications de running vous aident à suivre vos performances, l'application Checkpoints Race est la première application de qualification.

 

 

 

La recette pour aller en finale


Checkpoints Race récompense une performance physique collective.

Notre originalité est de récompenser l'engagement physique des 5 membres de l'équipe ET celui de sa communauté de supporters.

 

Rassemblez et motivez votre communauté, ils vous permettront de gagner !

 

Comment marquer plus de points ?

 

Amusez-vous au sein de votre équipe !

 

Avec Checkpoints Race, nous changeons les règles de qualification pour une finale mondiale de running

Vous avez votre chance !

 

La Finale

Les 50 meilleures équipes sont qualifiées tous frais payés pour une grande finale à l’Alpe d’Huez.
Les supporters du monde entier pourront suivre en direct la performance des équipes finalistes.

 


50 équipes au départ, 1 seule à l'arrivée : The Runner Games !

 

 

Ils nous accompagnent

 

Notre engagement

Checkpoints Race souhaite véhiculer des valeurs essentielles, sensibiliser et mobiliser sa communauté connectée de runners, lui donner l'occasion d'exprimer et de concrétiser son soutien pour de grandes causes, autour des valeurs telles que le partage, l'esprit d'équipe, le dépassement de soi et l'engagement.

En conséquence, CHECKPOINTS a organisé un programme de soutien à des associations caritatives.

A l'inscription, vous pouvez choisir un Pass Charity : 50 % du prix sera reversé équitablement à nos quatre associations partenaires et Checkpoints Race s'associera à cet effort collectif en abondant le don effectué pour chaque Pass Charity vendu.


Et trois supplémentaires à venir ...

 

Contribuer


 

 

 

Pourquoi Checkpoints Race ?


 

 

 

FAQ


1. What running apps or watches are compatible?

As from April the 1st, we will be able to synchronise with Runkeeper, Runstastic, Strava, Mapmyrun, Garmin and Nike +. Our aim is to open the field of compatible applications as soon as possible.


1. Quelles sont les applications de running ou montres compatibles ?

Dès le 1er avril, nous serons capables de synchroniser les activités de Runkeeper, Runtastic, Strava, Mapmyrun, Garmin et Nike +. Notre objectif est d’ouvrir le champ des applications compatibles aussi vite que possible.

 

2. I have already planned my races for 2015. Do I have to change my calendar to participate?

Checkpoints will not jeopardize your participation in the races for which you are already enrolled. For all your sessions, training or racing, log your performances with the help of applications compatible with Checkpoints Race, and earn Energy Points. Participating in official races and logging your performances will help improve your ranking. Just plan to be available between 25 and 27 September 2015 and to have an up-to-date passport if you are lucky enough to be among the best teams to qualify for the final!


2. J’ai déjà planifié mes courses pour l’année 2015, dois-je envisager de modifier mon calendrier pour participer ?

Checkpoints Race ne remet pas en cause votre participation aux compétitions pour lesquelles vous êtes déjà inscrit. Enregistrez vos performances à l’aide d’une des applications compatibles avec Checkpoints Race lors de vos sessions, sorties d’entrainement ou courses, et marquez des Energy Points. En participant à des courses officielles et en enregistrant vos performances, vous progresserez au classement. Prévoyez simplement d’être disponible entre le 25 et le 27 septembre 2015 si vous avez la chance de faire partie des meilleures équipes qualifiées pour la grande finale !

 

3. How is the score calculated for my team? 50% of the score is from Energy Points earned by each of the 5 members of the team, from their performances and bonus points gained through completing the challenges set by the application. 50% of the score is from Energy Points earned by all of the supporters recruited by the team, from their performances and bonus points gained through completing the challenges set by the application.
3. Comment est calculé le score de mon équipe ?

50% du score correspond aux Energy Points marqués par chacun des 5 membres de l’équipe, grâce à leurs performances et aux bonus de points obtenus pour avoir relever les challenges lancés par l’application. 50% du score correspond aux Energy Points marqués par l'ensemble des supporters recrutés par l’équipe, grâce à leurs performances et aux bonus de points obtenus pour avoir relevés les challenges lancés par l'application.

 

4. What is the difference between a team member and a supporter in the Checkpoints Race?

A team member participates to try and help his/her team qualify for the final. There is an enrollment fee. A team supporter helps and supports his/her favourite team to qualify for the final but they cannot participate in that final. Enrollment is free.


4. Quel est la différence entre un membre d’une équipe et un supporter au sein de Checkpoints Race ?

Un membre d’équipe participe pour tenter de qualifier son équipe pour la finale. L’inscription est payante. Un supporter d’équipe supporte et aide son équipe favorite à se qualifier pour la finale mais il ne pourra pas y participer. L’inscription est gratuite.

story:
Short Summary

Ever annoyed at having to change diapers so often?   Ever have dirt on your hands and wish you did not? Ever wondered what impact on environment were diapers and other cleaning clothes having?  Ever thinking that all our modern appliances are being improved through technology but some remain very basic?  Ever thought of all the appliances you had to buy for baby: changing table, bath tub, scale, temperature taker - what if we could combine all these?

If any of these questions resonated with you, this is the new technologically improved diaper changing table, with a number of improvements on current designs, for improved baby comfort, cleanliness and security, parent convenience and speed and environment protection with major improvements:

1) Soft pistol shower and connected to toilet through a hose to get rid of dirty waters, avoid dirt on your hands and clean all quickly and efficiently.  Placed either above toilet or close to it  - simpler, faster, cleaner and more convenient for all. Also an impact on the environment through all wipes and cloths not used to clean. Impact: savings of 5K wipes/year, or ~600 euros per year (changing 8 times a baby per day * 1 wipe * 365 days =  ~3K wipes/year, or ~600 euros/year)

2) Combine small walls to combine bath tub + changing table. Have all in one with small adjustable walls to make bath tub. Impact: remove bacteria left with other means, convenience and combine with changing table for cost savings/price of bath tub ~30 euros.

3) Technology improvements - combine scale + temperature + changing table: through weight and temperature sensors, no need to buy separate products, have all in one, the baby is weighted and temperature taken automatically and sent to a connected application.  Impact: regular measurements/better health, and cost savings with all in one, scale and temperature sensor price: ~60 euros.

Overall impact/savings: 700 euros per year.  Impact on environment: good.  Faster, all combined and above no dirt on hands!

Audience: any parent + hospitals or nurseries.

Intended retail price: 299 euros


Costs, Timelines, What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Having been an entrepreneur before (Social, energy and technology/Internet), I know starting a venture requires funding.  Especially with companies that require a design, technology and patents.  
  • Hence the funds would be used to cover 1) technology research and prototype 2) team (engineer) and 3) early marketing/market research.
  • In exchange for your support, you are helping yourself right now or in the future with such tasks, contributing to the benefits of both babies and parents and having a positive impact on environment.  
  • In terms of timeline, 9 months will be needed to get a fully working prototype. The amount raised will go mostly towards this.   
  • For 100 euros, you will get a branded tee shirt 
  • For 300 euros in support you will get yourself a first product when released
  • For 1000 euros, you will get  a personalized product

Risks & Challenges

Improving current products is not easy and having been an entrepreneur before I know it takes time and effort.  Time to prototype may be as long as 9 months.  Patent registration may take time too.  Market research as well.  But if you believe like I do that there is a need, things will go well.  

How you can Help

Besides contributions, share share share to draw attention!

story:
Is it in the drawer? Under the sofa? In my handbag?

With Pump Point your asthma inhaler will always be in the same place, your wall mounted Pump Point unit.

Pump Point units mount to a wall and ensure that asthma inhalers are immediately accessible in an emergency.

  • Stores all MDI inhalers
  • Stores one or two inhalers
  • Mounted using 3M Command strips
  • Doesn't damage your wall
  • Easily removed

We have invented two units to store asthma inhalers in your home.

I worked in a primary school in North London for six years. Whilst working at the school I was in charge of ensuring all the children's medication was immediately accessible in an emergency. When I first started at the school all the asthma inhalers were kept in a plastic bag in the school office. 

One day a girl ran into the office accompanied by friends and she was desperate for air. Struggling to breath and trying as hard as she could. I ran to the plastic bag and luckily found her asthma inhaler. At this point I realised that something had to change.

That night I went home and built my first unit out of wood. It was rather large, the shelves weren't straight, it had awful white paint and it just leant against the wall, but it did the job. I printed off each asthmatic child's name and stuck them in front of each hole that stored their asthma inhaler. I asked all the children that came into the office if they liked it.  They all seemed to (although I did tell most of them that I made it first - which might of swayed their opinion slightly). 

When staff from other schools and our school nurse came in they would always comment on what a good idea it was. I had quite an entrepreneurial mind from a young age and always thought maybe I should try to manufacture the unit but inventing, manufacturing and selling a whole new product seemed a bit far-fetched. It took two years but I finally made the decision. Asthma Pump Point units were going to be manufactured and available to schools throughout the United Kingdom to ensure that asthma inhalers are immediately accessible in emergency. 

After inventing the first Pump Point unit and during the two years it took me to build the perfect unit for schools, I talked regularly with parents at my school and adults that suffered from asthma and I found out that the problems we faced in schools were the same problems they had at home. They talked about misplacing inhalers, inhalers being ‘tidied away’ and I thought that I can adapt my Pump Point unit to be used in homes as well. It seemed ridiculous that there is a place for cutlery, a place for your phone and even a place for bread but there is no where to store your asthma inhaler.

I invented two units for households. The units hold one or two inhalers. The units mount to the wall using 3M Command adhesive strips that stick to two small plastic tabs that fit seamlessly into the back of the units. The adhesive strips do not damage your walls. It sounds simple, but it took an extraordinarily long amount of time to design, create CAD files, and make the perfect prototype. It has been a long road but I am near completing this project.

I have spent two years trying to get Asthma Pump Point into schools. Along with my brother, I have managed to manufacture and sell to schools within the United Kingdom and we are now trying to make the units available in the USA as well.To pay the mould costs and the manufacturing costs I got a loan from Start-up Loans, a government-backed scheme to help small businesses in the United Kingdom. 

I cannot get another loan and I do not have the funds to pay the mould and initial manufacturing costs to meet minimum ordering quantities.That’s why I have turned to Indiegogo , I need your help to get Asthma Pump Point off the ground. We have a website, a manufacturer and a delivery company. To launch Asthma Pump Point and to make it available for households we need help with the initial mould costs and reaching minimum order quantities for manufacturing. 

You can visit the Asthma Pump Point website at:  www.asthmapumppoint.com. We have been selling to schools since November and have sold over 100 units. We recently conducted a survey and found out the following:

-100% of schools said their Pump Point unit was easy to install
-100% of schools said their Pump Point unit has improved the storage of asthma inhalers in their school
-94.44% would recommend Asthma Pump Point to other schools

and, my favourite:

-94.12% said the asthmatic children in their school liked their new Asthma Pump Point unit

Once we have the funds to cover the mould and initial minimum ordering quantities for manufacturing costs it will take eight weeks before we can send the units to those who have helped fund the project.

What’s in the packaging for a Pump Point unit?

Your Pump Point unit
2 3M Command non-damage adhesive strips
2 mounting blocks

Installation takes approximately two minutes. 

Tooling

Manufacturing of the tooling for the household units will be our first priority. The majority of the money we raise will be spent on this. 

Manufacturing

In effort to keep production costs and unit prices down, we'll need to meet minimum order quantities with our manufacturer. Exact numbers will be determined by the success of our Indiegogo campaign. Our first order from the manufacturer will include the inventory required to sustain sales for a period of approximately 2-3 months, as well as fulfil your Indiegogo pledges.

E-commerce Site

We're well into the design, and now in need of capital to move things to the next level. Your funding will help us make necessary improvements to our website, as well as implement the SEO needed to generate and maintain website traffic.

Moving Forward

Our current Pump Point units are designed for MDI inhalers only. We are hoping to design more units to help store the other types of asthma inhalers. We also have plans to manufacture a unit that stores spacers- this will be great for schools and households. 

In Summary

We have a fully developed, proven, and patented product that is ready for production. We've aligned with a highly qualified manufacturer that has the ideal facilities and capabilities for production of the Asthma Pump Point units for households. The retail packaging has been designed and sourced, and is set for production. 

We're now we're ready to hit the 'go' button on production and fulfillment. With your help, Asthma Pump Point will soon be a household brand!

We've prepared a series of reward levels. Based on the amount you contribute, you'll receive a variety of perks including our Asthma Pump Point units, you can even get one of our units named after you!

Make your pledge count! Keep in mind that you're allowed to choose just 1 reward level.


Your contribution, big or small, is vital to the success of our project. It's not going to happen without you. And regardless of whether you're able to contribute or not, if you believe in our Asthma Pump Point units, you can help us a ton by sharing our Indiegogo project with your friends and family.

Spreading the word is essential to a successful campaign. Every person that views our page brings us one step closer to our achieving our goal of ensuring asthma inhalers are immediately accessible in an emergency.

Simply visit our website by 'clicking this link', or click the share button below. We truly appreciate any help you can offer! 

Thanks!

Asthma Pump Point!

Is it in the drawer? Under the sofa? In my handbag?With Pump Point your asthma inhaler will always be in the same place, your wall mounted Pump Point unit.Pump Point units mount to a wall and ensure that asthma inhalers are immediately accessible in an emergency.
Stores all MDI inhalers
Stores one or two inhalers
Mounted using 3M Command strips
Doesn't damage your wall
Easily removed
We have invented two units to store asthma inhalers in your home.I worked in a primary school in North London for six years. Whilst working at the school I was in charge of ensuring all the children's medication was immediately accessible in an emergency. When I first started at the school all the asthma inhalers were kept in a plastic bag in the school office. One day a girl ran into the office accompanied by friends and she was desperate for air. Struggling to breath and trying as hard as she could. I ran to the plastic bag and luckily found her asthma inhaler. At this point I realised that something had to change.That night I went home and built my first unit out of wood. It was rather large, the shelves weren't straight, it had awful white paint and it just leant against the wall, but it did the job. I printed off each asthmatic child's name and stuck them in front of each hole that stored their asthma inhaler. I asked all the children that came into the office if they liked it.  They all seemed to (although I did tell most of them that I made it first - which might of swayed their opinion slightly). When staff from other schools and our school nurse came in they would always comment on what a good idea it was. I had quite an entrepreneurial mind from a young age and always thought maybe I should try to manufacture the unit but inventing, manufacturing and selling a whole new product seemed a bit far-fetched. It took two years but I finally made the decision. Asthma Pump Point units were going to be manufactured and available to schools throughout the United Kingdom to ensure that asthma inhalers are immediately accessible in emergency. After inventing the first Pump Point unit and during the two years it took me to build the perfect unit for schools, I talked regularly with parents at my school and adults that suffered from asthma and I found out that the problems we faced in schools were the same problems they had at home. To launch Asthma Pump Point and to make it available for households we need help with the initial mould costs and reaching minimum order quantities for manufacturing. You can visit the Asthma Pump Point website at:  www.asthmapumppoint.com. We have been selling to schools since November and have sold over 100 units. We recently conducted a survey and found out the following:-100% of schools said their Pump Point unit was easy to install-100% of schools said their Pump Point unit has improved the storage of asthma inhalers in their school-94.44% would recommend Asthma Pump Point to other schoolsand, my favourite:-94.12% said the asthmatic children in their school liked their new Asthma Pump Point unitOnce we have the funds to cover the mould and initial minimum ordering quantities for manufacturing costs it will take eight weeks before we can send the units to those who have helped fund the project.What’s in the packaging for a Pump Point unit?Your Pump Point unit2 3M Command non-damage adhesive strips2 mounting blocksInstallation takes approximately two minutes. ToolingManufacturing of the tooling for the household units will be our first priority. Exact numbers will be determined by the success of our Indiegogo campaign. Your funding will help us make necessary improvements to our website, as well as implement the SEO needed to generate and maintain website traffic.Moving ForwardOur current Pump Point units are designed for MDI inhalers only. We are hoping to design more units to help store the other types of asthma inhalers. We also have plans to manufacture a unit that stores spacers- this will be great for schools and households. In SummaryWe have a fully developed, proven, and patented product that is ready for production. We've aligned with a highly qualified manufacturer that has the ideal facilities and capabilities for production of the Asthma Pump Point units for households. story:
LESS PAIN WITH MORE GAIN!

 

 

 

Key Features

  • Auto-Adjusting Design: Allows for any wrist size and any situation 
  • 5 mm Neoprene: providing incredible comfort for any exercise 
  • Nylon Strapping: strong enough to withhold 1200 lbs
  • KN12 Rated Caribiners: Click into any machine or equipment with assurance of performance
  • Lightweight: weighing in at 4 oz each for a total of 8 oz for the pair, they are easy to use and take with you anywhere, even when traveling!
  • High Quality: The craftsmanship is second to none, durable and long lasting performance 
  • Super-strong: Tested over time to be bulletproof 
  • Timeless: built to last a lifetime, designed to complement any fashion statement

Specs

  • Size: One size fits all with our unique auto-adjustment design
  • Weight: 8 oz per pair
  • Materials: Durable Nylon Strapping, Nylon Industrial Thread, 5 mm Fabric Neoprene, KN12 rated caribiners 
  • Compatibility: All Cable Machines, TRX, Resistance Bands etc.
  • Accessories: Drawstring carrying bag and Pro Membership to Fearless Personal Training App loaded with hundreds of exercises and instructional videos, pre-planned workouts, and everything you need to crush it in your fitness and health lifestyle. 

 

 

Perfect for Beginners AND Experts in Fitness

 

GREATER

RANGE OF MOTION

Studies show that the more range of motion in your exercise the greater your muscle contraction will be.  You will also be able to keep the greatest amount of flexibility and your body strong in its most vulnerable places of injury.

 

 

HUNDREDS OF DIFFERENT TYPES OF EXERCISES

 

 

Over 150 different exercises and videos of them are in the Fearless Personal Training App so you are never left without knowing what to do and how to do it! We are adding new videos every week with a new custom designed workout weekly to keep you challenged and excited!

 

 

NO MORE PAIN!

Common problems that prevent people from working out are hand, wrist, and elbow issues.  Whether it is from an injury, arthritis, tendinitis, overuse, and certain exercises but that no longer has to be the case!  Our straps are intended to keep the stress out of your joints and into the targeted muscles to keep you moving forward and moving longer.  You will be able to workout with less bad pain and more gain pain.  You will find certain exercises that have been a problem because of grip, tendon, or joint pain no longer be any issue!

 

 

EVERY HAND POSITION

 

 

TARGET

THE RIGHT MUSCLES

When it comes to doing most pulling exercises the grip and forearms can be the first to go and because of that the workout is never very effective.  With the Fearless Iso straps that no longer will ever be the problem.  You can do over 50 different exercises without ever even using your grip.  Not only will your forearms last but your hands will no longer be calloused and your skin won’t hurt.

 

 

EASY AND QUICK TO USE

There are other products out there that help with grip support but are mainly for serious lifters and the products are complicated, time consuming to put on or adjust, and don’t fully take the grip out of the picture.  With the Isostraps, you have the option of taking your grip completely out of the exercise, they are very simple to use, automatically adjust to your wrist, and you can just slip in and out of them.

     

     

    EQUIPMENT THE ISOSTRAPS WORK WITH

     

     

    PROPER FORM

    It is easy to break form when there are a lot of moving parts, more muscles being activated, or when fatigue sets in.  Subconsciously we are designed to just complete the exercise at all costs and that comes at a cost of doing it right and we end up sacrificing the greatest benefits of doing the exercise.  Common issues to many exercises where the form first breaks down starts at the wrist.  Using the Fearless Isostraps, that longer will be your issue.  You will begin to do exercises like a pro because the straps force the targeted muscles to work harder and your arm positions into proper positions because you won’t have your hands and forearms to assist you.

     

     

    EQUIPMENT THE ISOSTRAPS REPLACE

     

     

    FEARLESS PERSONAL TRAINING APP
     

    Every purchase of Fearless IsoStraps comes with a complimentary Pro Membership to our Fearless Training App which is loaded with 'how-to' videos, explanations, workouts and everything you need to stay on top of your fitness game. It includes hundreds of videos with the IsoStraps so you never have to guess what to do. Download it for free today on the App Store or here: fearlesspt.com/app

     

     

     

    TIMELINE

     

     

    ABOUT FEARLESS INNOVATION CO

    Our goal is to take every step necessary for you to experience a life lived to the fullest.  Starting off with our first patent pending product, the FEARLESS Iso Straps, along with our FEARLESS branded apparel. Remember, being fearless is a lifestyle. A choice that belongs to you.  We want you to feel good, look good, and do good. 

     

     

     

    MEET THE FEARLESS INNOVATION TEAM

     

    JOSEPH CUPIT

    TRAINER/COACH & CO-FOUNDER

    FEARLESS INNOVATION CO

    "Fearless Innovation is more than just a company. Its a lifestyle. A belief in one's Self. My desire is to see people change their bodies, minds and the way they see life. To 'Be' Fearless. To 'Be' Free."

     

     

    DONIPHAN STONE

    PERSONAL TRAINER & FOUNDER/CO-OWNER

    FEARLESS PERSONAL TRAINING AND FEARLESS INNOVATION CO

    "I see Fearless as a way to help people enjoy life and my desire is that it grows large enough to fund our non-profit organization."

     

     

    ELVIS "Papi" EDWARDS

    DIRECTOR OF BRANDING/MARKETING

    FEARLESS INNOVATION CO

    "Laughter is poison to Fear."

     

     

     

    TESTIMONIALS

     

    Why Indiegogo?

    Fearless Innovation has and always will be a community driven mission. Our heart is to empower others to live a life of absolute freedom from fear and that is achieved through relationship with each other. Indiegogo is an expression of that same passion. The community is where all things begin and end. We believe in the crowdfunding platform and wish to perpetuate that good energy through a successful campaign. 

    Use of Funds

    For an entire year (2018) we have worked so hard to complete all the necessary steps to a successful product launch. Manufacturing is local and scaleable. Stock and Shipping are in line and ready. We have a team ready to support the project. All the components are in place except one, and thats you. Our Community of people who believe. 

    We ask not just for your support, but for a relationship that is long term and brings forth positive growth. Will you be a part of our family? Will you be Fearless? Will you be Free? 

    Lets do this. 

     

     

    COPYRIGHT 2018 & PATENT PENDING

    FEARLESS ISOSTRAPS

story:
TESTIMONIALS

Lernen/Schule (Greta, 5. Klasse) 

Coworking / Großraumbüro (Leonhard, Unternehmer) 

Weitere Testimonials gibt es auf:
More Testimonials you can watch on:
YOUTUBE: focuscap
& unter dem Haupt-Kampagnen-Video (kleine Thumnails darunter klicken)
& under the Main-Campaign-Video (click little thumbnails below) 
NOTE: I will add English subtitles asap during the next days. more videos to come :)


SOCIAL

FACEBOOK: focuscap.net
INSTAGRAM: focuscap
TWITTER: focuscap_net
YOUTUBE: focuscap
LINKEDIN: hannes-grebin
WEBSITE: focuscap.net

 

 

///ATTENTION: PLEASE SCROLL DOWN FOR ENGLISH. ///
⇓ ⇓ ⇓


ÜBER MICH

Hallo, ich bin Hannes, Produktdesigner aus Berlin.
Und da ich äußerst kreativ und hochsensibel bin und über Dinge immer aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln und außerhalb der Box nachdenke, hatte ich oft Schwierigkeiten damit, meine eigenen Projekte zu strukturieren und "wichtige" Dinge zu erledigen. Ja! Ich bin leicht ablenkbar.
Und diese Eigenschaft wäre als urmenschlicher Jäger sicher sehr von Vorteil gewesen, gewesen...
 

DIE FOCUSCAP STORY

PROBLEME BEIM KONZENTRIEREN
Besonders bei geistig anstrengenden Aufgaben werde ich leicht von den viel interessanteren Dingen, die beispielsweise im Raum liegen, abgelenkt, genauso von der geringsten Bewegung.
Dieses ‚komische‘ Verhalten hat sich bei der Arbeit mit anderen immer nur noch erhöht, obwohl ich die sozialen Aspekte des Zusammenseins mit Menschen durchaus mag.

Ich wusste damals nämlich noch nicht, welche Auswirkungen das periphere Sichtfeld auf einen hat, also unser internes Alarmsystem („Kampf oder Flucht“), das für unser Überleben für Jahrtausende gesorgt hat.

DAS STARTUP
Das war auch der Fall, als ich zuletzt als ‚Director of Product Design‘ bei einem der größten Möbel-Startups in Europa gearbeitet habe - mehr als 60 Personen auf meiner Etage, keine Trennwände oder ein anderer Ort, an dem man sich in dieser unkontrollierbaren, ständigen Überforderungssituation hätte verstecken können: Leute, die plaudern, Dir kurz mal ne Frage stellen, jemand auf dem Weg zur Toilette oder zum Drucker – wir nennen es: die neue Arbeitsrealität.

Klar, ich habe ein paar nette, kreative Projekte erarbeitet... aber ich hatte irgendwie immer das dumpfe Gefühl, ich würde da täglich abliefern - was Cal Newport in seinem NYT-Bestseller "DEEP WORK" "Shallow Work" nennt – also einfache, mechanische Ergebnisse fernab von meinen wirklichen Möglichkeiten, faktisch nie mein wahres kreatives Potenzial (Deep Work), dazu brauche ich einen FLOW-Zustand.
 

SICH AN DEN 'FLOW' ERINNERN
Ich kannte doch dieses erstaunliche Gefühl des totalen Eintauchens aus vielen vergangenen Situationen. Da wo man sich hyper-fokussiert wie in einem Tunnel befindet. Alle meine Fähigkeiten entfalten sich dann mühelos, fast magisch und die Dinge realisieren sich buchstäblich von selbst.

 

DER HEUREKA-MOMENT
Nun gut, ich habe mir also auf Anraten von Kollegen Kopfhörer mit Geräuschunterdrückung gekauft, die etwas geholfen haben. Aber Gott sei Dank habe ich mich plötzlich wieder an die Zeit erinnert, als ich meine Diplomarbeit schreiben musste (ich bin ja Designer und damals an der Bauhaus-Universität, haben wir viel gefeiert und coole Projekte in den Werkstatten entwickelt). Um Seminare und Vorlesungen haben wir uns meist kreativ drücken können. Als ich also diese lange, fast schon schmerzhafte Woche in der Bibliothek mit Texten zu kämpfen hatte, las ich langsam und vergas aber auch alles schon wieder. Das kam daher, weil die Studenten in der Bibliothek ständig in Bewegung waren. Es traf mich also wie ein Blitzschlag: Ich bin zum nächsten Optiker gelaufen, habe mir eine billige Brille gekauft, die Linsen herausgeploppt und daran kleine Pappkarten neben jedes Auge geklebt - und HEUREKA!!! - Diese zwei kleinen Dinger haben mein Problem im Nu gelöst: Das fühlte sich an wie "Ein Geist wie Wasser/Mind like Water" – ein Begriff, den ich beim Lesen von "Getting Things Done" / „Dinge Geregelt Bekommen“ (GTD) stark verinnerlicht hatte.

Schlussendlich war es doch der praktische Teil der Diplomarbeit "The Cozy Furniture Collection" die ein wenig Anerkennung bekam.

THE FOCUSCAP WIRD GEBOREN
Also zurück in den Großraumbüro-Alptraum unseres Startups: Ich habe mir sofort eine Schirmmütze gekauft, 2 schwarze Pappkarten links und rechts an den Schirm geheftet – et voila die FocusCap war geboren.
Ich habe daraus in den letzten 3 Jahren ein einwandfrei funktionierendes Produkt mit integrierten, zusammenklappbaren „Scheuklappen“ entwickelt und patentiert. Die Kappe ist faltbar und man kann sie so einfach und flach verstauen.

JETZT BIST DU DRAN!
Entweder kannst Du mit der FocusCap jetzt alles blitzschnell erledigen und das super konzentriert – oder Du hast die Möglichkeit von jetzt auf gleich an einer frischen, kommunikativen Zusammenarbeit teilzunehmen oder einfach mit Deinen Kollegen zu plaudern. Die Anwendungen der FocusCap sind endlos (Sie dir einfach das Kampagnen-Video oben an)
 

PRODUKTION

Ich schätzte die volle, feste Finanzierung für dieses Projekt auf 25.000 €, um mit meinem Hersteller eine professionelle Produktion zu beginnen.
Nach reiflicher Überlegung hinsichtlich der Fertigstellung des FocusCaps mit einem Produktentwickler, der Aufstellung der Produktion und der richtigen Herstellerbewertung abhängig von der Höhe der endgültigen Finanzierung, habe ich die Lieferung der Caps an die Unterstützer auf September 2019 geschätzt.

HINWEIS: Festgelegtes Funding (fixed funding) bedeutet laut den Regeln von INDIEGOGO, falls wir wider Erwarten nicht die 25.000 € Zielbetrag zusammen schaffen, erhält jeder seine Finanzierung zurück - ohne Wenn und Aber.
 
Da ich schweren ‚Fokussierungs-Problematikern‘ wie mir gerne weiter helfen will, werde ich trotzdem von Zeit zu Zeit ein paar Kappen für Euch an meiner Nähmaschine fertigen.

Wenn die Kampagne der FocusCap gut anläuft, werde ich über eine kleine Produktion in Berlin produzieren. Falls wir aber hoffentlich ordentlich Fahrt aufnehmen, kann ich mit den großen Herstellern in Europa oder Asien in Kontakt treten und mit denen zusammenarbeiten. Die großen Hersteller werden erst mit der Entwicklung eine Produktionslinie anfangen, wenn die Nachfrage hoch ist. Hierbei wird selbstverständlich der besten Lösung der Vorrang gewährt. Ich werde Euch darüber auf dem Laufenden halten.

Zuvor werde ich mit einem deutschen Produktentwickler und einem Musterdesigner entscheidende Features der FocusCap und die anschließenden Produktion zu Ende entwickeln. Die drei hier vorgestellten Versionen der FocusCap können daher später vom aktuellen Prototypzustand leicht abweichen.
Mein (und hoffentlich unser aller) Hauptziel dieser Kampagne ist es, ein solides, gut aussehendes und funktionierendes Produkt zu entwickeln und vor allem zu liefern.
Ich werde Euch ständig über alle Entwicklungsschritte in Kenntnis setzen.


WAS JEDER ERHÄLT

Ihr entscheidet einfach, ob Ihr die 'Visor'-, die' Jockey'- oder die 'Baseball'-Version der Kappe bekommen wollt - alle drei Versionen haben die gleiche Hauptfunktion – das effektive Abschirmen des Seitensichtfelds.

HINWEIS: Die 'Baseball'-Version ist aufgrund ihrer Kappenkonstruktion zwar vollständig faltbar (zur flachen Lagerung), fällt aber im zusammen gefalteteten Zustand ein bisschen länger aus! 

 

WIR STARTEN MIT DEM WARUM / START WITH WHY (Die Tragweite)

Ich nehme an, viele Leute wie auch ich (Ein Hoch auf die Millenials! ... ich bin noch einer von Euch - * 1980, tada!) hinterfragen derzeit unsere soziale Rolle in der Gesellschaft und unsere Aufgabe in Unternehmen und wie eigentlich ein sinnstiftendes Leben aussehen soll. Das mach ich auch, die ganze Zeit.

Und langsam wird uns eine höchst interessante Tatsache bewusst: dass wir in erster Linie Menschen sind, emotionale Kreaturen mit außergewöhnlichen Sinnen. Vielleicht auch deshalb kontrolliert uns Social Media heute so gut (Cal Newport).

An einem unserer langen philosophischen Abende mit Philipp, meinem persönlichen Leib-Tierarzt, sind wir auf folgende einfache Aussage gekommen:

"Menschen sind Säugetiere und werden offensichtlich in der falschen Umgebung gehalten."

Hey! - Wir werden von denselben genetischen Programmen wie vor 200.000 Jahren gesteuert und haben völlig die Verbindung zu unserem eigenen Wesen verloren – vielmehr arbeiten wir dagegen.

Sind wir nicht alle einer permanenten Gehirnwäsche unterzogen? Wir werden dafür belohnt, ständig zu denken, zu konkurrieren, unehrlich zu sein und die nächsten Zielvorgaben zu erreichen - am besten in einem sogenannten "Team". Vielmehr sollten wir doch als Menschen damit anfangen wieder zu fühlen, miteinander arbeiten und tolle Dinge kreativ erschaffen, wie damals vor 200.000 Jahren in unserem kleinen vertrauten Stamm – für eine sehr lange Zeit ging das sogar ganz ohne Sprache! (Robert Greene).

Wir, die Menschheit, betreten derzeit ein neues Zeitalter –  das Zeitalter der Digitalisierung und Konnektivität. Und laut Joshua Cooper Ramos Buch "The Seventh Sense" wird unsere neue große Seuche nicht der Krebs sein oder dergleichen, sondern: Die neue Seuche ist der Wahnsinn.

Die FocusCap als die erste von einigen weiteren einfachen Erfindungen, die ich mir in der Vergangenheit ausgedacht habe, um die kreative Arbeit zu erleichtern, soll als eine analoge Waffe verstanden werden, gegen diesen wahren „Endgegner“ ?

Ich glaube an die große Wirkung, die solche einfachen Tools wie die FocusCap haben können, um uns in dieser ‚abgelenkten‘ Zeit wirklich zu helfen.

Lasst uns unseren Verstand wieder mit unseren eigenen Sinnen verbinden, um endlich unser tatsächliches kreatives Potenzial freizusetzen.

- für eine strahlende Zukunft!

Hannes

RISIKEN & HERAUSFORDERUNGEN

Ich arbeite seit über 10 Jahren als Produktdesigner und bin mir über die Risiken bewusst, die bei der Entwicklung meines ersten eigenen Produktes auftreten können. Dennoch ist die Cap in den 3 Ausführungen ein eher unkompliziertes Produkt.  Nach erfolgreicher Kampagne werde ich das Cap noch durch einen Produktentwickler und einen Schnittmusterdesigner für die finale Produktion überarbeiten lassen.

Ich habe sowohl eine funktionierende Produktion im kleinen Rahmen in Berlin organisiert, sowie eine möglicherweise grössere Produktion wahlweise in Portugal (Europa) oder in Asien. Alles mit Fokus, die beste Produktqualität, Kontrolle und eine schnellstmögliche Auslieferung an die Backer zu garantieren.

Sollten dennoch unerwartet Komplikationen auftreten, lassen ich es Dich selbstverständlich umgehend wissen – sowohl während der Kampagne, als auch danach.

Bei weiteren Fragen melde Dich gerne bei uns, unter hello@focuscap.net

 

///HORRAY: YOU ARE ENTERING THE ENGLISH SECTOR.///

 

ABOUT ME



Hi, I'm Hannes, product designer and artist from Berlin, Germany.
And as I'm highly creative and hyper-aware, thinking about things from different angles and outside the box, I've often struggled with structuring my own projects and getting "important" things done... 
Yes! I'm easily distractable. And this probably would have been a real benefit as a cavemen hunter back in prehistoric times, haven't it?

 

THE FOCUSCAP STORY

PROBLEMS WITH FOCUSING
Especially with mentally demanding tasks I've easily procrastinate on more interesting things that lay around the room or by the slightest movement. This "strange" behavior will dramatically increase when working with others, albeit I love the social aspects of being around people. I didn't yet know about the effects of the peripheral vision, the internal alarm system ('fight or flight'), that have been saving our lives for millennials.

THE STARTUP
This was also the case when working in my last position as the 'Director of Product Design' at one of Europe's biggest furniture startups – more than 60 people on my floor, no dividers or any place to hide and myself placed like everybody else into this uncontrollable constant overflow:
People chattering, pinging you with some quick questions, someone on his way to the toilet or printer, you name it: our new working reality.

Sure, I've got some nice creative things done.. but I've always felt, I delivered – as Cal Newport in his NYT-bestseller "DEEP WORK" would called it: 'Shallow Work' - bland, standardized results for my standards but never my real creative potential (Deep Work) where I needed FLOW.

REMEMBERING 'FLOW'
And I knew this amazing feeling of total immersion from so many past experiences when being laser focused like in a tunnel, with all my capabilities effortlessly and magically falling into place
and things literally 'flowing' into existence.

HEUREKA - THE MOMENT
So I finally bought me some noise-cancelling headphones, it helped a bit. But thank god! one precious moment I've remembered my time when writing my diploma thesis (I'm an artist and back at the Bauhaus, we partied a lot and created cool stuff in the workshops) and most of the time we creatively found our way around almost any seminar and lecture.

So when I've struggled on texts for my thesis for one long painful week in the library, reading slowly and forgetting everything, because students in the library where moving, constantly,

So instantly a lightning bolt hit me: I've made my way to the next optician, bought me cheap glasses, popped out the lenses and tacked me small cardboards next to each eye - and YEW!!! - these two little fuckers solved everything: 'Mind like Water' (a term I've resonated so much when reading "Getting Things Done" (GTD). – Alas it was still my practical part of the thesis "The Cozy Furniture Collection" that got some recognition.

THE FOCUSCAP IS BORN
So back to the open office nightmare at our startup: I instantly bought me a visor, stapled 2 black cardboards to the bill, et voilà – the FocusCap was born.

I saw the potential and over the last 3 years I've developed and patented a properly working product with integrated, collapsible blinders and the cap is even foldable for easy, flat storage.

NOW TAKE YOUR LEAP!
Now, you decide whether to temporarily block out the visual noise and get valuable stuff done, quickly and super-focused - or - to participate in some refreshing, communicative collaboration or chitchat with your coworkers.  The applications are endless (please watch my above video)

 

WHAT YOU GET

FUNDING, DEVELOPMENT AND PRODUCTION
I estimated the complete, fixed funding for this project at 25.000€ to set things up into a professional production with my manufacturer. After some consideration with respect to finalizing the product with a product developer, setting up the production and proper manufacturer evaluation depending on the amount of the final funding, I've estimated the delivery of the caps to the backers by September 2019.

NOTE: fixed funding would mean, if we won't make the 25.000€, due to INDIEGOGO's policy, everybody will get back his funding – no strings attached.

Due to I love to help severe cases like me, I probably will make some caps on my sewing machine for fun every now and then. - no strain attached.

During the campaign respective to the initial reaction and funding of the FocusCap I will either produce a smaller production in Berlin or if we hopefully hit some roof and I can check and collaborate with major manufacturers either in Europe or Asia as they first willing to start developing a production line at a high demand. The best solution will always win. I'll update you on that.

Beforehand I will finalize crucial features of the FocusCap and its following production with both a German product developer and a pattern designer. The final 3 different caps will be therefore advanced and may vary a bit from their current prototype state.

My (and hopefully our all) major goal with this campaign is, to develop and deliver a solid, good looking and working product. I will constantly keep u updated with all mayor developments.

WHAT YOU GET
You decide by your preferences whether you get the 'Visor', the 'Jockey' or 'Baseball' version of the cap - all three have the same main blocking functionality. 
NOTE: The 'Baseball' version though fully foldable due to its hat construction is a bit longer when fully collapsed for flat storage!

As described I would like to have all 3 versions of the cap (visor, jockey cap, baseball cap) developed and produced, meeting my and especially your high expectations.

 

START WITH WHY (The Impact)

I assume a lot of people like me (This is to the Millenials! ...and I'm still in – *1980, tada!) currently question our social and corporate roles in society and what a meaningful life shall look like – so do I.
And slowly we all rediscover one interesting fact: that in the first place we are simply humans, emotional creatures with extraordinary senses (btw this is why Social Media is hijacking us so well - Cal Newport). 

So in one of our long philosophic nights with Philip, my super-veterinarian friend, we came up with this simple statement: 

"Humans are mammals and they are obviously kept in the wrong environment." 

Hey! - We are run by the same genetic programs like 200.000 years ago and lost track of our own nature - in fact, we work against it. 
We have been consistently brainwashed and rewarded to constantly think, compete, cheat and achieve – preferably in a 'team'. Instead that we feel, collaborate and create in a small familiar tribe like 200.000 years ago – most of the time even without any language! (Robert Greene).

And now, we, the human race, are entering a new era, the age of digitalization & connectivity. And according to Joshua Cooper Ramo's book "The Seventh Sense" our new major plague won't be cancer (fuck cancer! I deeply mean it!) BUT – it's insanity.

So the FocusCap as some other valuable inventions I came up in the past, shall work as our analog weapons, to tackle the real boss!

I believe in the impact that such simple tools like the FocusCap could have, in assisting us through these distracted times. 
Let's reconnect our minds back to our senses to finally unleash the possible magnitude of our actual creative potential.

– for a bright future!

Hannes


RISKS & CHALLENGES

I have been working as a product designer for over 10 years and am aware of the risks that can arise in the development of my first own product. Nevertheless, the cap in its 3 versions is a rather uncomplicated product.

After a successful campaign I will have the cap revised by a product developer and a pattern designer for the final production. I have organized both a functioning production on a small scale in Berlin, as well as possibly a larger production either in Portugal (Europe) or in Asia. Everything with focus to guarantee the best product quality, control and the fastest possible delivery to the backer.If unexpected complications occur, I'll let you know immediately - both during the campaign and afterwards. If you have further questions, feel free to contact us at hello@focuscap.ne

///ATTENTION: PLEASE SCROLL DOWN FOR ENGLISH. ///⇓ ⇓ ⇓

ÜBER MICH

Hallo, ich bin Hannes, Produktdesigner aus Berlin.Und da ich äußerst kreativ und hochsensibel bin und über Dinge immer aus verschiedenen Blickwinkeln und außerhalb der Box nachdenke, hatte ich oft Schwierigkeiten damit, meine eigenen Projekte zu strukturieren und "wichtige" Dinge zu erledigen. Ja! Ich bin leicht ablenkbar.Und diese Eigenschaft wäre als urmenschlicher Jäger sicher sehr von Vorteil gewesen, gewesen... 
DIE FOCUSCAP STORY
PROBLEME BEIM KONZENTRIERENBesonders bei geistig anstrengenden Aufgaben werde ich leicht von den viel interessanteren Dingen, die beispielsweise im Raum liegen, abgelenkt, genauso von der geringsten Bewegung.Dieses ‚komische‘ Verhalten hat sich bei der Arbeit mit anderen immer nur noch erhöht, obwohl ich die sozialen Aspekte des Zusammenseins mit Menschen durchaus mag.Ich wusste damals nämlich noch nicht, welche Auswirkungen das periphere Sichtfeld auf einen hat, also unser internes Alarmsystem („Kampf oder Flucht“), das für unser Überleben für Jahrtausende gesorgt hat.DAS STARTUPDas war auch der Fall, als ich zuletzt als ‚Director of Product Design‘ bei einem der größten Möbel-Startups in Europa gearbeitet habe - mehr als 60 Personen auf meiner Etage, keine Trennwände oder ein anderer Ort, an dem man sich in dieser unkontrollierbaren, ständigen Überforderungssituation hätte verstecken können: Leute, die plaudern, Dir kurz mal ne Frage stellen, jemand auf dem Weg zur Toilette oder zum Drucker – wir nennen es: die neue Arbeitsrealität.
Klar, ich habe ein paar nette, kreative Projekte erarbeitet... aber ich hatte irgendwie immer das dumpfe Gefühl, ich würde da täglich abliefern - was Cal Newport in seinem NYT-Bestseller "DEEP WORK" "Shallow Work" nennt – also einfache, mechanische Ergebnisse fernab von meinen wirklichen Möglichkeiten, faktisch nie mein wahres kreatives Potenzial (Deep Work), dazu brauche ich einen FLOW-Zustand. 
SICH AN DEN 'FLOW' ERINNERNIch kannte doch dieses erstaunliche Gefühl des totalen Eintauchens aus vielen vergangenen Situationen. Da wo man sich hyper-fokussiert wie in einem Tunnel befindet. Alle meine Fähigkeiten entfalten sich dann mühelos, fast magisch und die Dinge realisieren sich buchstäblich von selbst.
 
DER HEUREKA-MOMENTNun gut, ich habe mir also auf Anraten von Kollegen Kopfhörer mit Geräuschunterdrückung gekauft, die etwas geholfen haben. Aber Gott sei Dank habe ich mich plötzlich wieder an die Zeit erinnert, als ich meine Diplomarbeit schreiben musste (ich bin ja Designer und damals an der Bauhaus-Universität, haben wir viel gefeiert und coole Projekte in den Werkstatten entwickelt). Um Seminare und Vorlesungen haben wir uns meist kreativ drücken können. Als ich also diese lange, fast schon schmerzhafte Woche in der Bibliothek mit Texten zu kämpfen hatte, las ich langsam und vergas aber auch alles schon wieder. Das kam daher, weil die Studenten in der Bibliothek ständig in Bewegung waren. Es traf mich also wie ein Blitzschlag: Ich bin zum nächsten Optiker gelaufen, habe mir eine billige Brille gekauft, die Linsen herausgeploppt und daran kleine Pappkarten neben jedes Auge geklebt - und HEUREKA!!! - Diese zwei kleinen Dinger haben mein Problem im Nu gelöst: Das fühlte sich an wie "Ein Geist wie Wasser/Mind like Water" – ein Begriff, den ich beim Lesen von "Getting Things Done" / „Dinge Geregelt Bekommen“ (GTD) stark verinnerlicht hatte.
Schlussendlich war es doch der praktische Teil der Diplomarbeit "The Cozy Furniture Collection" die ein wenig Anerkennung bekam.THE FOCUSCAP WIRD GEBORENAlso zurück in den Großraumbüro-Alptraum unseres Startups: Ich habe mir sofort eine Schirmmütze gekauft, 2 schwarze Pappkarten links und rechts an den Schirm geheftet – et voila die FocusCap war geboren.Ich habe daraus in den letzten 3 Jahren ein einwandfrei funktionierendes Produkt mit integrierten, zusammenklappbaren „Scheuklappen“ entwickelt und patentiert. Die Kappe ist faltbar und man kann sie so einfach und flach verstauen.JETZT BIST DU DRAN!Entweder kannst Du mit der FocusCap jetzt alles blitzschnell erledigen und das super konzentriert – oder Du hast die Möglichkeit von jetzt auf gleich an einer frischen, kommunikativen Zusammenarbeit teilzunehmen oder einfach mit Deinen Kollegen zu plaudern. But thank god! one precious moment I've remembered my time when writing my diploma thesis (I'm an artist and back at the Bauhaus, we partied a lot and created cool stuff in the workshops) and most of the time we creatively found our way around almost any seminar and lecture.
So when I've struggled on texts for my thesis for one long painful week in the library, reading slowly and forgetting everything, because students in the library where moving, constantly,
So instantly a lightning bolt hit me: I've made my way to the next optician, bought me cheap glasses, popped out the lenses and tacked me small cardboards next to each eye - and YEW!!! - these two little fuckers solved everything: 'Mind like Water' (a term I've resonated so much when reading "Getting Things Done" (GTD). – Alas it was still my practical part of the thesis "The Cozy Furniture Collection" that got some recognition.
THE FOCUSCAP IS BORNSo back to the open office nightmare at our startup: I instantly bought me a visor, stapled 2 black cardboards to the bill, et voilà – the FocusCap was born.
I saw the potential and over the last 3 years I've developed and patented a properly working product with integrated, collapsible blinders and the cap is even foldable for easy, flat storage.
NOW TAKE YOUR LEAP!Now, you decide whether to temporarily block out the visual noise and get valuable stuff done, quickly and super-focused - or - to participate in some refreshing, communicative collaboration or chitchat with your coworkers.  The applications are endless (please watch my above video)

 
WHAT YOU GET
FUNDING, DEVELOPMENT AND PRODUCTIONI estimated the complete, fixed funding for this project at 25.000€ to set things up into a professional production with my manufacturer. After some consideration with respect to finalizing the product with a product developer, setting up the production and proper manufacturer evaluation depending on the amount of the final funding, I've estimated the delivery of the caps to the backers by September 2019.NOTE: fixed funding would mean, if we won't make the 25.000€, due to INDIEGOGO's policy, everybody will get back his funding – no strings attached.
Due to I love to help severe cases like me, I probably will make some caps on my sewing machine for fun every now and then. - no strain attached.
During the campaign respective to the initial reaction and funding of the FocusCap I will either produce a smaller production in Berlin or if we hopefully hit some roof and I can check and collaborate with major manufacturers either in Europe or Asia as they first willing to start developing a production line at a high demand. The best solution will always win. I'll update you on that.
Beforehand I will finalize crucial features of the FocusCap and its following production with both a German product developer and a pattern designer. The final 3 different caps will be therefore advanced and may vary a bit from their current prototype state.
My (and hopefully our all) major goal with this campaign is, to develop and deliver a solid, good looking and working product. I will constantly keep u updated with all mayor developments.
WHAT YOU GETYou decide by your preferences whether you get the 'Visor', the 'Jockey' or 'Baseball' version of the cap - all three have the same main blocking functionality. NOTE: The 'Baseball' version though fully foldable due to its hat construction is a bit longer when fully collapsed for flat storage!
As described I would like to have all 3 versions of the cap (visor, jockey cap, baseball cap) developed and produced, meeting my and especially your high expectations.

 
START WITH WHY (The Impact)
I assume a lot of people like me (This is to the Millenials! ...and I'm still in – *1980, tada!) currently question our social and corporate roles in society and what a meaningful life shall look like – so do I.And slowly we all rediscover one interesting fact: that in the first place we are simply humans, emotional creatures with extraordinary senses (btw this is why Social Media is hijacking us so well - Cal Newport). 
So in one of our long philosophic nights with Philip, my super-veterinarian friend, we came up with this simple statement: 

"Humans are mammals and they are obviously kept in the wrong environment." 
Hey! - We are run by the same genetic programs like 200.000 years ago and lost track of our own nature - in fact, we work against it. We have been consistently brainwashed and rewarded to constantly think, compete, cheat and achieve – preferably in a 'team'. Instead that we feel, collaborate and create in a small familiar tribe like 200.000 years ago – most of the time even without any language! (Robert Greene).
And now, we, the human race, are entering a new era, the age of digitalization & connectivity. And according to Joshua Cooper Ramo's book "The Seventh Sense" our new major plague won't be cancer (fuck cancer! I deeply mean it!) BUT – it's insanity.
So the FocusCap as some other valuable inventions I came up in the past, shall work as our analog weapons, to tackle the real boss!
I believe in the impact that such simple tools like the FocusCap could have, in assisting us through these distracted times. Let's reconnect our minds back to our senses to finally unleash the possible magnitude of our actual creative potential.
– for a bright future!
Hannes


RISKS & CHALLENGES

I have been working as a product designer for over 10 years and am aware of the risks that can arise in the development of my first own product. Nevertheless, the cap in its 3 versions is a rather uncomplicated product.
After a successful campaign I will have the cap revised by a product developer and a pattern designer for the final production. I have organized both a functioning production on a small scale in Berlin, as well as possibly a larger production either in Portugal (Europe) or in Asia. Everything with focus to guarantee the best product quality, control and the fastest possible delivery to the backer.If unexpected complications occur, I'll let you know immediately - both during the campaign and afterwards. If you have further questions, feel free to contact us at hello@focuscap.ne

story:
Intelligently designed sports socks using high-tech fibres and yarns. They have extraordinary characteristics which are of major importance during sports activities: temperature regulation, moisture wicking, preventing slips, good air flow, quick drying, high endurance, foot protection, durability and comfort. GO4GOAL sports socks are suitable for all sports activities. 

Feet of athletes are subject to extreme mechanical stress which can cause several injuries. A sock is a barrier between the foot and the shoe that should ensure protection while enabling controlled movement, optimising the temperature of the foot as well as the moisture wicking.

We set our minds to create a new generation of sport socks and we started by researching materials and their characteristics. The materials were chosen based on research and consultation with fabric experts. Then we consulted orthopaedists and physiotherapists to help determine the areas of the foot that needed to be protected and cushioned. In this way each material has been used in the parts of the sock where they serve their specific purpose.

After more than one year of research we created a first design and determined the structure of materials for our socks. We consulted different experts who helped us place the materials to specific parts of the socks so they can serve their purpose. We designed several prototypes improving them at each stage to create the final design of GO4GOAL sports socks that are now available in three different models.

 

First, we wanted to check the quality and functionality of GO4GOAL sport socks. We produced more than 200 prototypes and asked professional as well as recreational athletes from different disciplines to test them. To keep it brief, they were impressed.

 

MARCOS TAVARES (professional football player - NK Maribor):

 

BORUT MAČKOVŠEK (professional handball player):

 

JASMIN HERCEGOVAC (professional basketball 3x3 player):

 

GAŠPER PREDANIČ (strength and conditioning coach):

 

 

 

*sizes and colors for rewards: “team package” and “ambassador” will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended.

We’re aware of how important it is to take care of children’s feet as they are still growing and developing so we decided to also produce socks for children (starting at EU size 30). The socks will help to ensure safety and health of our children at the very beginning of their sports careers and during regular sports activities enabling them to show to a maximum their sports abilities.

Your socks will be produced by a top world designer and distributer of high-quality socks. The company uses cutting edge software to develop and constantly improve its products. It employs the newest and most modern production machines throughout the production process from weaving to the final product. The headquarters of the company are in Slovenia and the production facilities are in Italy.

    The idea to design a different kind of sport socks was conceived by the young Slovenian entrepreneur Tadej Glavač who himself is an enthusiastic athlete. However, he failed to find the right footwear and socks that would protect his feet and give him the sensation of stability in sports shoes so the foot wouldn’t move too much inside the shoe during activity. Another major problem was sweaty feet causing painful blisters hindering him from further activity.

    Tadej started to think about how he could improve his sport socks so they would serve him even better during sports activities making training easier and giving that superb feeling of comfort, support and protection. This was the beginning of GO4GOAL sport socks.

     

    We’re a young company investing a lot into quality materials. As a consequence, our initial production costs are very high so we decided to make our socks first available on the crowd-funding platform INDIEGOGO, where we will collect financial resources needed to realize our business idea.

    Your support will help launch GO4GOAL sport socks on the market and fulfil our main goal – to ensure professional and recreational athletes comfort and protection during sports activities improving their sports performance.

     

     

    If you back us on one of the ambassadors package, we offer you certain options of cooperation: 

    • publishing your logo on our website and in social media. Publishing stories on your company in our social media and channels,
    • publishing articles at portals and in newspapers with exposing your company (»company/club/person supported young Slovenian entrepreneur.«),
    • cooperation with athletes that support us,
    • photo/video material of your company
    • club sponsorship for our GO4GOAL sports socks.

    Contact us and together we can find the best way to cooperate (info@go4goal.net).

    If you back our project, we will start with production of GO4GOAL sports socks in December 2018. We will begin shipping your rewards when they will be ready for it - March 2019.

story:
Sculpt Master - Your Personal Trainer

If you've ever wanted the convenience of working out at home, now's the time. 

The Sculpt Master allows you to do a targeted workout in under 10 minutes and a full body workout in less than 30 minutes.

Whether you're looking to get in shape, get back into shape, or stay in shape, but don't want the expense or hassles of going to a gym, here's your answer.

 

Most compact fitness devices target one or two muscle groups. With the Sculpt Master, you can get an effective, low impact, full body workout. It's like a mini home gym for all fitness levels. 

Patented ergonomic design helps ensure proper form and maximum benefit

Design Feature 1:  There are significant exercises that cannot be done using other compact fitness devices. The ergonomic design helps ensure that you do these and all exercises in proper form, while receiving maximum benefit.

Crunches, crunches, crunches...

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Quickly feel & see results from the top to bottom tension targeting your abs.

Glutes & legs...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Friends don't let friends skip leg days

Arms, shoulders, & back

 

Over 50 different exercises.

Design Feature 2: Notice how the band runs underneath the platform. This allows the band to flow freely, promoting equal tension on both sides.

Lightweight, compact, convenient, effective, affordable...

Design Feature 3: The handles are angled keeping your wrists in a neutral position. The resistance band head support reduces stress on your head and neck.

 

Design Feature 4: Transitioning from one exercise to the next is a breeze!

What's convenience without a carrying bag?
 
Design Feature 5:  Safety first. Nothing is ever anchored onto a doorknob or other fixture that can come loose like a sling shot. With each exercise you are either standing or lying on the Sculpt Master board. The ergonomic design of the board and the low impact resistance bands also reduce stress and the chances of injury. 
 
Supersets, Circuit Training, & Cardio 
 
Fitness professionals agree that mixing up your workout routine offers both physical and mental benefits. With 100's of exercise combinations, you can quickly get the cardio and strength benefits of circuit training (a series of different exercises with no rest) and supersets (two exercises that activate opposing muscle groups with no rest) without ever having to wait for machines to open up.
 
 
For less than the price of a single month at most gyms, you can have the compact home gym that goes where you go and is ready when you're ready. 
 
Check out our perks! 

 

My Indiegogo campaign for the Sculpt Master is for preorders to finance the production and manufacture of the device and create free online videos. Check out our perks, now!

Sculpt Master is a registered trademark and a provisional patent has been filed with the United States Patent Office.

story:
My name is Radu, I'm 26 years old and I'm a bike courier in Bucharest, spare time rock climber and nature caregiver.

My BSc is in Architectural Technology and Construction Management and although I love everything about it, biking is my calling, my form of expression.
Most of my projects have a link with my passions. My last project in Denmark was designing the new Copenhagen Boulders gym.



For the past three years, ever since I hear about the Red Hook Crit, I made it a goal of mine to take part in at least one of these races.
Every time I planned it, something else came up that needed my attention and funds. Although I work my ass off delivering packages on the crazy streets of Bucharest, a few weeks ago my dream turned into a plan. The time is NOW!



The last few years I trained hard in order to get in the best shape possible and have specific training for this type of races.
In July 2016, I biked on a fixed bike from Bucharest to Cluj-Napoca, around 520 kilometers, 5300 meters total uphill elevation, in 3 days.
This trip was made in order to raise funds for an elders shelter and we managed to ace the target.



Getting to compete with all these athletes in Milano would make my dream come true.
Just thinking about it gives me goosebumps and I get so pumped up that I can imagine myself riding in the race.

The minimum goal for the funding is 800 Euros. This would cover the plane tickets, accomodation and the entrance fee.
The rest of the money would help me buy some bike parts so I could have at least a decent chance in competing with the other professional athletes.

At this point, my bike has a modest configuration. The frame, fork and headset are top notch, but I could use better wheels and a new crankset, along with some other supplies like tires, tubes and a spare chain.

Thank you for taking time out of your day and I hope to see some of you in Milano.

Peace and love!
