story:
Two guys with master's degrees in Chinese herbalism have joined forces in an effort to bring the best of this powerful medicine to as many people as possible! One of these guys, by the way, is a practicing (biomedical) pharmacist—he makes sure that our formulations are balanced and also watches out for possible herb-drug interactions. Several herbal formulations are currently in development—stay tuned!!


  • Our Chinese herbal formula helps gently promote deep, restful sleep
  • No lingering effects—wake up refreshed but not groggy!!
  • All-natural herbal extracts, wheat and gluten free, vegan
  • Does not contain Melatonin, Valerian Root, or GABA
  • Non-habit forming, non-addictive

Help us get started by trying a 100-count bottle of our Sleep Well Formula for $17 with shipping included or two bottles for $30 with shipping included! We will be selling this formula on our website and through other venues for $20 for a 100-count bottle (a one-month supply if used nightly at suggested dosages).

Our first 100 contributors will also receive a permanent 20 percent discount on all products sold through our website-to-be at bewellherbs.com!

Most "natural" non-prescription sleep aids contain, well...stuff other than plants. That might be okay (might not), but we've also found that many of them also tend to make the next morning a little hazy. Our Sleep Well Formula contains Chinese herbal granules only and, while it might make you sleepy, it won't make you feel drugged. We've also found that, at least in our own experience and in reported results, it doesn't cause unwanted lingering effects. If you need a heavy sedative you should probably try another product, but if you find that stress and overthinking make it hard to get to sleep or prevent restful sleep, please try our formula! 


We have several people currently taking the prototype of our formula (the exact formulation that we will be producing in quantity)—we haven't had a bad review to date!:

Within 20 minutes I'm feeling drowsy and ready for bed. I sleep more soundly for longer periods, and I get back to sleep faster  if I do wake up! Also—no morning drowsiness!!  

P.K., Wendell, MA

Makes me fall asleep calmly and easily, I wake well-rested. I had a bad night's sleep the other night—I forgot to take it!!
D.J., Greenfield, MA

I took it at  9 and fell asleep about 15 minutes later. Woke up once to go to the bathroom and fell right back to sleep until the alarm went off. I feel like I had a good night's sleep! Thank you for letting me try it!
M.H., Orange, MA  

I think your formula is really effective! I took it one night in the middle of the night and went back to sleep quite quickly and slept deeply. I took it again before bed last night and slept through. Let me know when it becomes available!
S.G., Florence, MA   

I took it one evening and slept like a baby -- this during a time when I'd been popping awake for a couple of hours in the wee hours. I'll use it again when it's important that I get a good night's sleep.
J.V., Wendell, MA


No Melatonin: A quick survey of "natural" sleep aids sold in the U.S. shows that the majority include melatonin in a chemically-synthesized form. While melatonin has its place in addressing certain sleep issues, users should be aware that it is a potent neurohormone that is available only by prescription in many countries. Morning grogginess is one of the well-established potential side effects associated with melatonin use.   

No Valerian Root: Valerian is another common addition to sleep aid products. Like melatonin, it makes some people tired or groggy during the day. It also has some other potential side effects: headache, stomach upset, restlessness, dry mouth... From the Chinese herbal perspective the suggested dosage range of 400 to 600mg of Valerian Root extract is a large dose of a single potent herb. We prefer the more balanced effect of multiple herbs in much smaller dosages.       


This is a fixed-funding campaign, which means that if we don't reach our goal our project will not go forward and your contribution will be refunded in full. We can't get halfway to our goal and move forward with production simply because we set our goal at the amount necessary to pay for our first production run and distribution costs. As soon as we reach our goal we will notify contributors of estimated ship dates. Our first production run has been pre-arranged and will take 3-6 weeks from the time the order is placed (when we reach our goal). We will make every effort to ship as soon as we possibly can!!    

We need to raise $1200 so that we can have the smallest possible batch of our Sleep Well Formula compounded, encapsulated, and bottled in a U.S. facility that is GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) certified. This will be our first production run and we've priced our perks as low as we can. We also hope that contributors will participate in our product surveys and help us spread the word about Chinese herbal medicine!!  See our "Impact" section below... 


You'll receive:

  • A high-quality herbal formula that is designed to help you to sleep better—at a low price! Each bottle will contain 100 "0" size gel capsules which will each contain approximately 400mg of granular herbal extracts. Suggested dosage is 3-4 gel caps taken one hour to 30 minutes before bedtime—so each bottle will contain about a one-month supply of Sleep Well Formula if it is used nightly. For complete information on herbal extracts and our quality assurance statement, please scroll down to the very bottom of our campaign page. If you have a hard time swallowing pills, the gel capsules can be emptied into 4-6 ounces of hot water—the resulting tea has, at least in our opinion, a pleasantly sweet flavor.
         
  • Our first 100 contributors will also automatically receive a permanent 20 percent discount on all of the herbal products sold through our website-to-be at bewellherbs.com. Permanent, lifetime, non-transferable, period. We're betting that we'll make it because we're trying to do good things—and we want to reward you if you're willing to bet with us! If you think that an all-natural all-herbal sleep aid deserves a place in your medicine cabinet, this is a chance to try it at a discounted price and to secure a permanent discount on it!


The Theory:

The Chinese say that, when we sleep, our energy retreats into yin (the body's physical substance) for rest and replenishment. When Chinese herbal practitioners see sleep that is disturbed by over-thinking and/or physiological stress, they don't look to directly calm the mind, they look to calm the spirit—and the heart is considered to be the seat of the spirit. The ancient Chinese understood that many herbs help to nourish the heart's yin substance and, in doing so, these herbs are said to calm the spirit. Our formula primarily nourishes the yin of the heart when that nourishment is most effective—as we rest.

The Impact

Well, first of all we hope to be able to help people...

We'd also like to spread greater awareness of, acceptance of, and use of Chinese herbal medicine:

We believe that the best way to further promote the use of Chinese herbal medicine is to build a body of anecdotal evidence that will help pave the way for case studies and carefully controlled clinical studies. Chinese herbalists relied on anecdotal evidence for centuries before the modern system of scientific research was developed. In  order for herbal medicine to reach and to help as many people as possible in modern times, it needs to receive increased scientific attention. If you look at an evidence pyramid, herbal medicine is currently stuck near the bottom, at the level of editorials and expert opinion. 


Our opinion is based on our training in Chinese medicine and on our treatment experience, but it is, of course, far from scientific proof. Many controlled trials have been conducted in China, but we'd like to see herbal medicine popularized to the point where controlled trials become commonplace around the world. Our plan is to gather anecdotal evidence in increasingly refined ways. We're starting with simple surveys, but as we attract some interest and develop momentum we plan to move to scientifically designed questionnaires, independently verified responses, and research collaborations with educational institutions. Our work may not get all the way to randomized controlled trials, but if we diligently collect "user feedback" in a transparent way and make it public knowledge, we'll be moving in the right direction!

Each of our contributors will be sent an e-mail with a link to our effectiveness survey for this formula. We hope you'll respond, but the survey is not mandatory. All survey results will be posted to this campaign page as they are received, in real time. Contributors will be able to verify this process, if they wish, by submitting their survey response and checking for its appearance directly after submission. 

Risks & Challenges

There is no risk to your investment in this sense: you will either receive the product we've promised you or you will receive your contribution back in full. However, in our experience no herbal formulation will generate the desired results for all people, and there is a possibility that this formula may not work well for you.

According to the Chinese theory described above this formula MAY work best for individuals who find it difficult to get to sleep—or to stay asleep—because they can't stop thinking about problems or their work, or because they are troubled by events. The formula may be most helpful if you are tired but cannot sleep well; it will likely be less effective if you are not tired but want to alter your sleeping schedule.


Disclaimer: We have designed this formulation solely for use as a sleep aid and this campaign does not constitute Chinese medical diagnostic advice or counseling. If you have a health condition and would like to use Chinese herbal therapy as a treatment method, we strongly advise you to consult with a licensed herbal practitioner. Herbal practitioners conduct extensive patient interviews and employ observational methods to select an appropriate formula for a specific presentation. Additionally, the content in this campaign is not medical advice and you should seek biomedical care when necessary.  These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. Dietary supplements, like Sleep Well Formula, are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease or condition.


Other Ways You Can Help

Do you know someone who often has a hard time getting a good night's sleep? Or someone who is going through a very stressful period and who can't seem to get much-needed rest? Tell them about Sleep Well!  

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Is your Sleep Well Formula safe for pregnant or nursing women?
A: No. Our product should not be used by those who are pregnant or nursing.

Q: Is there anyone who shouldn't use your Sleep Well Formula?
A: Please consult with your doctor before taking our Sleep Well Formula (or any other supplement) if you have a pre-existing condition or are taking any prescription medications.

Q: Is your Sleep Well Formula safe for children?
A: Our formula is intended for use by people 18 years of age and older.

Q: Is your Sleep Well Formula vegan/vegetarian?
A: Yes, our Sleep Well Formula will be vegan/vegetarian! Specifically, the product will contain only the herbs listed, a Non-GMO corn starch or Non-GMO potato starch binder, and vegetable cellulose gel capsules.

Q: When will the formula ship?
A: Anywhere from 3-8 weeks AFTER we reach our goal. This is a fixed-funding campaign and funds will not be released to us until shortly after we reach our goal. Arrangements for production are in place, but production will not begin until we can commit funds (until we reach our goal) and will take from 3-6 weeks. We will do everything we possibly can to speed the process, and we'll be providing schedule updates to contributors by e-mail. We will also be regularly posting updates on the campaign page as production and ship dates firm up.

Q: How much does shipping cost? What shipping methods do you use?
A: A flat shipping rate of $2 is charged for our Sleep Well Formula perks. Our single-bottle perk is $15.00 plus $2.00 shipping, and our two-bottle perk is $28 plus $2.00 shipping. All shipments of one or two bottles of our Sleep Well Formula will be shipped in bubble mailers by USPS First Class Mail with tracking—a tracking number will be included in your shipment notification e-mail. Shipments of 3 bottles or more that are shipping to the same address will be sent by Priority Mail with insurance and tracking.

Q: Do you ship internationally?
A: Not presently—this campaign is intended to support our first limited production run and we don't have a system in place to ship internationally at this time. We want very much to have an active presence in the global community and we welcome you to contact us at bewellherbs@gmail.com to express your interest in our formula. We will make every effort to accommodate international orders in the future!!

Q: Who can I e-mail for customer service and questions?
A: Please send e-mails to: bewellherbs@gmail.com


Herbal Extract Information and Quality

The herbal ingredients we will use are in a granulated herbal extract form. Herbs are cooked using a decoction/extraction process that recaptures constituents and essential oils, and the resulting concentration is applied to an excipient to form the granules. We will be using one of two Taiwanese granule producers, one uses Non-GMO potato starch as an excipient and the other uses Non-GMO corn starch. We will also use vegetable cellulose gel capsules, therefore the only substances in our formula will be the herbal extracts, a  starch excipient, and vegetable cellulose. The formula will be vegan, wheat free, and gluten free.

The herb granules are concentrated to a 5:1 ratio—5 grams of raw herbs are reduced to 1 gram of granule extract. Because each capsule will contain approximately 400mg of herb granules, each will contain the equivalent of 2 grams of raw herbs.

Quality Assurance

We have made arrangements with two major Taiwanese herb granule producers: both  have been in business for over 40 years and both are known for exceptional quality standards and for their strict adherence to Good Manufacturing Practices. We believe that these companies produce the highest quality granulated herbs available, and we have sourced our herbs knowing that quality and efficacy go hand in hand. The formula will be compounded, packaged, and labeled in the United States in a GMP-certified facility following strict FDA guidelines.

Finally, granule producers rigorously test their raw herbs for contaminants before going to the expense of making granules from them: for this reason we believe that herb granules are much more reliably safe than raw herbs.
story_txt:
Two
guys with master's degrees in Chinese herbalism have joined forces
in an effort to bring the best of this powerful medicine to as many people as possible! One of these guys, by the way, is a
practicing (biomedical) pharmacist—he makes sure that our
formulations are balanced and also watches out for possible herb-drug
interactions. Several herbal formulations are currently in development—stay tuned!!








Our Chinese herbal formula helps gently promote deep, restful sleep

No lingering effects—wake up refreshed but not groggy!!
All-natural herbal extracts, wheat and gluten free, vegan
Does not contain Melatonin, Valerian Root, or GABA
Non-habit forming, non-addictive

Help us get started by trying a 100-count bottle of our Sleep Well Formula for $17 with shipping included or two bottles for $30 with shipping included! We will be selling this formula on our website and through other venues for $20 for a 100-count bottle (a one-month supply if used nightly at suggested dosages). Our first 100 contributors will also receive a permanent 20 percent discount on all products sold through our website-to-be at bewellherbs.com!Most "natural" non-prescription sleep aids contain, well...stuff other 
than plants. That might be okay (might not), but we've also found that 
many of them also tend to make the next morning a little hazy. Our Sleep Well Formula contains Chinese herbal granules only and, while it might make you 
sleepy, it won't make you feel drugged. We've also found that, at least 
in our own experience and in reported results, it doesn't cause unwanted
 lingering effects. If you need a heavy sedative you should probably try another product, but if you find that stress and overthinking make it hard to get to sleep or prevent restful sleep, please try our formula!  

We have several people currently taking the prototype of our formula (the exact formulation that we will be producing in quantity)—we haven't had a bad review to date!:


Within 20 minutes I'm feeling drowsy and ready for bed. I sleep more soundly for longer periods, and I get back to sleep faster  if I do wake up! Also—no morning drowsiness!!   P.K., Wendell, MAMakes me fall asleep calmly and easily, I wake well-rested. I had a bad night's sleep the other night—I forgot to take it!!D.J., Greenfield, MAI took it at  9 and fell asleep about 15 minutes later. Woke up once to go to the bathroom and fell right back to sleep until the alarm went off. I feel like I had a good night's sleep! Thank you for letting me try it!M.H., Orange, MA   
I think your formula is really effective! I took it one night in the middle of the night and went back to sleep quite quickly and slept deeply. I took it again before bed last night and slept through. Let me know when it becomes available! S.G., Florence, MA    
I took it one evening and slept like a baby -- this during a time when 
I'd been popping awake for a couple of hours in the wee hours. I'll use 
it again when it's important that I get a good night's sleep.J.V., Wendell, MA 



No Melatonin: A quick survey of "natural" sleep aids sold in the U.S. shows that the majority include melatonin in
 a chemically-synthesized form. While melatonin has its place in 
addressing certain sleep issues, users should be aware that it is a 
potent neurohormone that is available  only by prescription in many 
countries. Morning grogginess is one of the well-established potential 
side effects associated with melatonin use.   
No Valerian Root: Valerian is another common addition to sleep aid products. Like melatonin, it makes some people tired or groggy during the day. It also has some other potential side effects: headache, stomach upset, restlessness, dry mouth... From the Chinese herbal perspective the suggested dosage range of 400 to 600mg of Valerian Root extract is a large dose of a single potent herb. We prefer the more balanced effect of multiple herbs in much smaller dosages.       


This is a fixed-funding campaign, which means that if we don't reach our
 goal our project will not go forward and your contribution will be 
refunded in full. We can't get halfway to our goal and move forward with
 production simply because we set our goal at the amount necessary to 
pay for our first production run and distribution costs. As soon as we reach our goal we will notify contributors of estimated ship dates. Our first production run has been pre-arranged and will take 3-6 weeks from the time the order is placed (when we reach our goal). We will make every effort to ship as soon as we possibly can!!    





We need to raise $1200 so that we can have the smallest possible batch of our Sleep Well Formula compounded, encapsulated, and bottled in a U.S. facility that is GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) certified. This will be our first production run and we've priced our perks as low as we can. We also hope that contributors will participate in our product surveys and help us spread the word about Chinese herbal medicine!!  See our "Impact" section below... 
You'll receive:

A high-quality herbal formula that is designed to help you to sleep better—at a low price! Each bottle will contain 100 "0" size gel capsules which will each contain approximately 400mg of granular herbal extracts. Suggested dosage is 3-4 gel caps taken one hour to 30 minutes before bedtime—so each bottle will contain about a one-month supply of Sleep Well Formula if it is used nightly. For complete information on herbal extracts and our quality assurance statement, please scroll down to the very bottom of our campaign page. If you have a hard time swallowing pills, the gel capsules can be emptied into 4-6 ounces of hot water—the resulting tea has, at least in our opinion, a pleasantly sweet flavor.        

Our first 100 contributors will also automatically receive a permanent 20 percent discount on all of the herbal products sold through our website-to-be at bewellherbs.com. Permanent, lifetime, non-transferable, period. We're betting that we'll make it because we're trying to do good things—and we want to reward you if you're willing to bet with us! If you think that an all-natural all-herbal sleep aid deserves a place in your medicine cabinet, this is a chance to try it at a discounted price and to secure a permanent discount on it!
















The Theory:

The Chinese say that, when we sleep,
our energy retreats into yin (the body's physical substance) for rest and replenishment. When
Chinese herbal practitioners see sleep that is disturbed by
over-thinking and/or physiological stress, they don't look to directly calm
the mind, they look to calm the spirit—and the heart is considered
to be the seat of the spirit. The ancient Chinese understood that
many herbs help to nourish the heart's yin substance and, in doing so, these
herbs are said to calm the spirit. Our formula primarily nourishes
the yin of the heart when that nourishment is most effective—as we rest.







The Impact Well, first of all we hope to be able to help people...


We'd also like to spread greater awareness of, acceptance of, and
use of Chinese herbal medicine: We believe that the best way to further promote the use of Chinese herbal medicine is to build a body of anecdotal evidence that will help pave the way for case studies and carefully controlled clinical studies. Chinese herbalists relied on anecdotal evidence for centuries before the modern system of scientific research was developed. In  order for herbal medicine to reach and to help as many people as possible in modern times, it needs to receive increased scientific attention. If you look at an evidence pyramid, herbal medicine is currently stuck near the bottom, at the level of editorials and expert opinion. 



Our opinion is based on our training in Chinese medicine and on our treatment experience, but it is, of course, far from scientific proof. Many controlled trials have been conducted in China, but we'd like to see herbal medicine popularized to the point where controlled trials become commonplace around the world. Our plan is to gather anecdotal evidence in increasingly refined 
ways. We're starting with simple surveys, but as we attract some interest and develop momentum we plan to move to 
scientifically designed questionnaires, independently verified 
responses, and research collaborations with educational institutions. Our work may not get all the way to randomized controlled trials, but if we diligently collect "user feedback" in a transparent way and make it public knowledge, we'll be moving in the right direction!
 Each of our contributors will be sent an e-mail with a link to our effectiveness survey for this formula. We hope you'll respond, but the survey is not mandatory. All survey results will be posted to this campaign page as they are received, in real time. Contributors will be able to verify this process, if they wish, by submitting their survey response and checking for its appearance directly after submission.  


Risks & Challenges
There is no risk to your investment in this sense: you will either receive the product we've promised you or you will receive your contribution back in full. However, in our experience no herbal formulation will generate the desired results for all people, and there is a possibility that this formula may not work well for you. 
According to the Chinese theory described above this formula MAY work best for individuals who find it difficult to get to sleep—or to stay asleep—because they can't stop thinking about problems or their work, or because they are troubled by events. The formula may be most helpful if you are tired but cannot sleep well; it will likely be less effective if you are not tired but want to alter your sleeping schedule.

Disclaimer: We have designed this formulation solely for use as a sleep aid and this campaign does not constitute Chinese medical diagnostic advice or counseling. If you have a health condition and would like to use Chinese herbal therapy as a treatment method, we strongly advise you to consult with a licensed herbal practitioner. Herbal practitioners conduct extensive patient interviews and employ observational methods to select an appropriate formula for a specific presentation. Additionally, the content in this campaign is not medical advice and you should seek biomedical care when necessary.  These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. Dietary supplements, like Sleep Well Formula, are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease or condition.




Other Ways You Can Help
Do you know someone who often has a hard time getting a good night's sleep? Or someone who is going through a very stressful period and who can't seem to get much-needed rest? Tell them about Sleep Well!

to express your interest in our formula. We will make every effort to

send e-mails to:  bewellherbs@gmail.com

story:
MicroSaber, may the force be with you!!!

MicroSaber is a tiny Led Flashlight Torch with built-in Gyroscope and sound synthesizer. Now you can really enjoy with your friends, families and kids the sensation to handle a real (?) light saber.

You can use MicroSaber alone or attach any object on it and play with light effects and hi-quality  sounds generated by the gyroscope. 





Dimensions



Tiny and portable


Tech specifications

We studied a small pcb circuit that can be fitted in small steel tube.
The challenge was to insert it into a round shape, for this reason we design ourself a small circuit with a Gyroscope that generates sounds processed by a small PIC microcontroller.

At the moment we have two working prototypes little bigger than the original concept. We need mass-production to use specific components avoiding standard shapes that are too big. 

Use of Funds

  • PCB size optimization
  • Production Tooling
  • Pic programming improvements
  • Speaker Cavity Optimization
  • Power Optimization
  • Certifications - FCC, CE

Media Kit Download

Press: download here

story:
About Me:

My name is Charles Vanchieri and my passion for health has deeply rooted me within the Health & Fitness Industry for the past 13 years.  I was fortunate enough to experience various departments of the industry, from private health coaching for executive families in the Silicon Valley, health club membership sales, to managing the personal training department for what is considered one of todays 'elite' fitness clubs Equinox in Palo Alto, CA.  Through my experiences & discoveries, there were always common issues within all aspects of the industry; communication, connection, support, and resources.

The Story:

Throughout my career, I have always thought there was a place for a platform that was focused on all aspects of health & wellness, one with a supportive environment and designed for both the health professional and health-minded individual.  Our health is too important for it to be an 'addition' to social platforms like we see happening today on Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.

The Purpose:

The goal for FitChirp is to be a focused social health & fitness platform where users are comfortable to share about their health, where they can build purposeful connections, get helpful support, and be an easy-to-use resource for quality information and much more.

The Problems with current social platforms: 

- They are made for entertainment, open to all types of content, making it difficult to use them as a true resource for the useful health & fitness information being created and shared.

- The majority of users don't feel comfortable sharing or talking about their health & wellness due to the negativity that occurs on the current platforms. 

- Searching information through hashtags, location tags, the user name is incredibly time-consuming with the vast amounts of information on the platforms and very inefficient when looking for specific health content.

- Building real valuable connections with health professionals is very tough to do with no ability to distinguish reputable helpful professionals from others just trying to grow a following to make money.

- With social platforms having no real direct focus on health, the majority of health professionals put in a lot of time, resources, and effort sharing information trying to build real connections for very little in return.

- The health & wellness platforms that are available are targeted towards 1-2 aspects of health, weights, running, yoga, cycling, sleep, personal training etc.

- For an individual to consider all aspects of their health they are looking at 4-8 apps that do not connect or work together well or at all.

The solution with the FitChirp:

- A health & fitness sharing community built for both the health-minded individual and the health professional.

- Find & share useful information, build valuable connections, locate health professionals, and get support in all aspects of health & wellness.

- Separate accounts for health professionals and the regular individual to distinguish the qualified professionals on the platform.

- Professional accounts contain an in-depth information page so users can get a better understanding of who the professional is.

- Professionals, users, and information are easily discoverable through the platform's simple and effective search functionality.

- Save and store the information wanted for later use in the account profile.

- A moderated platform to keep the interactions positive, supportive, and focused on health.

- Easily share directly to Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter accounts through the platform's posting capability.

What has been done:

About 4 years ago I embarked on this project, funding this myself I outsourced the development of the project to a group in India who had been working on the project until COVID-19 happened.  Working as a fitness professional, since lockdown I have been out of work and can not afford to keep putting funds into the project for the final development, the team I was using took a hit also and is not capable of further development at this time. 

Currently, you can download FitChirp on iOS & Android and find its webpage at www.FitChirp.com.  So far there is the basic functionality of a social platform, the home feed, your account page, different search capabilities, posting of videos, images, plain text, and additional links.  There are 2 types of accounts a professional account which is a referral only and a typical regular user account.  To focus on health & wellness there are multiple posting options for health categories and titles, both are used in the search functionality for a more precise result.

The app is working but is outdated, not optimized, and not efficient enough to make it a stable MVP or to start an initial marketing campaign.

What is needed to be done:

I am looking to raise $65,000 to fund a development team for 3 months and an initial marketing campaign.  The development team has already been sourced and the project scoped, the team is awaiting the go-ahead to get started. 

- week 1-2:  Completion of the UI/UX design, functionality, and architecture update.

- week 3-5:  addition of user live feeds functionality throughout the platform.

- week 6-8:  addition of health devices/platform connection sync with visual displays and analytics.

- week 9-11: addition of private and public groups with live feed capability.

Why Indiegogo?

I had always had the idea that I wanted this to be a 'user' built platform.  Meaning the ideas, concepts, and functionality come from individuals and professionals that are in the health & wellness industry, eventually platform users.  I chose Indiegogo because I currently own 100% of the platform, and at this point, I did not want to have anyone attempting to change the plan and purpose of the platform.  I think that funding the platform's development from a crowdfunding source is exactly how and hope this platform should be developed.

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks, that is life.  If the goal is met and or surpassed, all funding goes directly to the development that was listed above, marketing if the timing is right, and further development.  

I will not be taking any of the funding this is purely for platform development purposes.

Other Ways You Can Help

It is understood that in the current situation of the world with COVID-19 putting forth funding may be tough, if you are unable to assist with funding but do like the idea I would really appreciate it if you could share this campaign on your social platforms to get the word out to others, thank you.

story:
REVOLUTIONARY DESIGN

PAQ: The world's first and only air tight, water resistant, child proof, discreet, compartmentalized case for your rolled smoking material.

TAKE IT ANYWHERE

With a low profile which is designed to slip into a pocket or a purse, PAQ is the ideal case to take your rolled material on the go.

 

LOCK IN THE FRESHNESS

Every PAQ Case contains a gasket that locks in relative humidity and seals the internal contents to help preserve and prolong shelf-life.

LOCK IN THE SMELL

Designed with an airtight and water resistant seal, both freshness and smells stay sealed within PAQ.

SUSTAINABLE

Made with recyclable plastic, PAQ can be repurposed in a variety of ways without contributing additional materials into over-packed landfills. 

FIXED RANGE OPENING

PAQ was designed with you in mind. Its unique shape makes it easy to grab and enjoy rolled material without the struggle of wrestling something out of a tube. 

ONE AND ONLY "ROACH COACH"

PAQ's revolutionary design includes a bottom compartment known as the "Roach Coach". The Roach Coach enables partially smoked material to be stored separately from the rest of the PAQ in order to properly mitigate odor and debris.

COMPLIANCY

With two large flat surfaces, PAQ has plenty of room for all necessary compliance labeling and custom branded screen prints, stickers, and wraps.

CERTIFICATION PENDING

Federal compliancy child resistant packaging certification pending in accordance with CPSC 1700.

PATENT PENDING

PAQ is utility and design patent pending.

_____________________________________________________________________

We don't call them risks, we call them opportunities:

CHILD-PROOF CERTIFICATION

In states where it is legal to consume certain materials, use is warranted by strict governmental regulations and compliancy. One of which is child proof packaging for products. PAQ has been designed from birth to comply with CPSC 1700 of the FDA's child proofing regulations. PAQ is also working with a product development team that has a childproof certification division. We do not believe that PAQ will have any trouble acquiring this certification as late model prototypes have already prevented children from entering the PAQ. 

KEEPING UP WITH DEMAND

One of the biggest hurdles for new product-based companies is keeping up with demand in the market. We understand this is a heavily untapped industry and are focused on growing intelligently. By taking on one account at a time, assessing the market, ensuring complete customer satisfaction, and repeating, we are confident that we have the ability to maintain steady PAR levels in order to accommodate the hungry market as we grow for both consumers and wholesalers alike.

story:
LEO AND THE GONG

Hi, my name is Leo Cosendai. I'm a sound therapist, yoga teacher and gong master originally from  Switzerland. I now live and work in London, and often travel the world sharing the techniques and knowledge I've learnt from my teachers , Don Conreaux, Wendy Mandy and Yogi Ashokananda.

Gongs are my passion, I've seen their transformative effect both on myself, and others that come to experience them. They are a mystical vehicle that takes each individual on their own personalised adventure, offering whatever that person needs, even if they are not aware of it, a kind of telepathy with the soul! From babies to the elderly, the gong transfixes all.

 

Born in Lausanne, I grew up learning of the benefits of yoga and the healing arts from my family. I then moved to London to train as a composer/singer, and progressively learned how to weave the use of sound as a therapeutic tool alongside teaching yoga.

 

This vintage 60" gong by Paiste, formerly the iconic MTV gong, is a phenomenal healing instrument. It's currently living in a depot and would be far happier to have the opportunity to unleash its magic in London at Indaba! It is made by Walter Meyer, the revered gong maker who only made a few,  which is why it's so special. The craftsmanship, quality and quantity of precious metals used all contribute to the exceptional frequency and vibrations it omits. The stillness and peace it invokes when hearing, and feeling it played is something of a magical experience. If this all seems a bit 'alternative' for you, now's the opportunity to try it for yourself, you will be surprised!

Let's amp up the positive vibes of this city and give this gong a new home in London!

#MTVGONGINDABALONDON ​

 

 

WHAT THEY SAID, FELT AND THOUGHT

"London's foremost kundalini gong master"

THE TIMES - Top Retreats 2016

 

"I was pleasantly disorientated, like floating on thin air”.

HUFFINGTON POST - Health Wellness

 

“I’ve got no idea about the science behind it but it definitely pushes back the tight confines where my thoughts bang about like a pinball.  -Leo is a top bloke, musically gifted and very kind."

DR.GIDON LIEBERMAN BSc MBChB MD MRCOG - Gyneacology & Fertility

 

"Leo's treatments are equally transformational and healing. His work through sound is remarkable."

WENDY MANDY - Shaman, acupuncturist, counsellor

 

"Leo's sessions are the fastest way to transport your body to other dimensions."

GUDRUN JOHNSON - Biopath and author of ‘Gut Reaction'

 

“Leo is a servant to humanity.”

DON CONREAUX - Originator of the Gong bath , student of Yogananda and Yogi Bhajan

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

We need £20'000 to fund the whole project but are hoping to raise more in order to organise a magnificent large scale event for the benefit of a charitable cause, that will be chosen by everyone who has donated.

 

THE BUDGET:

MTV Gong : £13'000 

Brushed stainless steel gong stand: £1'500

Special gong mallets: £300

Gong safe travel case: £2'500

Shipping from USA to Indaba Yoga in London (ocean freight): £2'500 approx.

Wall Installation at Indaba to hang gong: £250 approx.

Van hire for transportation: £800 approx.

Restoration (erasing the logo, surface treatment and waxing): £200 approx.

         

THE PERKS & TREATS

1) THE ONO :: 45-minute gong bath recorded with the MTV Gong, incl. a 10 minute mantra chanted by Leo - digital copy (£10)

2) THE WOODSTOCK :: all-night gong bath with the MTV Gong, incl. a morning yoga class and a light breakfast (£99)

3) THE HARRISON :: Your own Gong bath, a 5-hour experience with the MTV Gong in your own home or location of your choice for unlimited guests, incl. a yoga and pranayama class, a group chanting kirtan and a guided meditation. A recording of the MTV Gong the 10 minute mantra is included for every guest. (£3000)

 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION AND MINE

The success of this campaign, and thus working with the 60" MTV Gong, will enable larger group healing sessions for a larger audience in various kinds of venues. London doesn't currently have a gong of this calibre, so this will be a first. 

The 60" MTV Gong is in a league of its own, kind of an instant portal to inner peace! The range of low wave frequencies it emits have an immediate soothing effect on the brain- bathing the senses into relaxation which ultimately stimulates the body's own self healing mechanisms. This instrument enables people to have the opportunity to transcend the mind and everyday stresses, peaceful = happy.

This is a time when finding a tool for inner stillness is key for emotional and physical wellbeing. Not everyone is able to just sit and meditate, and even if you know how to it's not always easy. This type of Gong takes you by the hand and helps you on your way.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

When £20'000 is reached, you are 100% guaranteed to receive 100% of whatever it is you have contributed for in our offerings. If the sum isn't reached, you get 100% of your money back. It's that simple.

 

CALLING FOR YOUR CREATIVE INPUT!

It would be great if you can also help spread the word! - the hashtag for the campaign on social media is #MTVGONGINDABALONDON

If you have any suggestions on how I can give this project a nudge let me know, it will be greatly appreciated!

 

THANK YOU TO.....!

A huge thank you to Pierre Bouvier Patron and his partner Blanca who made this video for me:

You guys were amazing. You made me feel at ease when we had less than 90 minutes to shoot and recording everything! I am really looking forward to working with you next year!

Here is how you can find Pierre Bouvier Patron: http://pierrebouvierpatron.tumblr.com/about

 

Many thanks to Sascha Kaus and Lululemon UK for the footage (taken at Lululemon Sweatlife festival 2016 in London), and to Indaba Yoga Studio in Marylebone for their help and support. 

A mammoth thank you to:

my teachers/mentors Don, Yogi and Wendy, to all the people who have helped me along the way, and my sister Julie & my wife to be Sara for their support and creativity.

 

QUESTIONS? CONTACT US!

Leo.cosendai@gmail.com

@leo.cosendai 

www.leocosendai.com

////////////////////

info@indabayoga.com

@indabayoga

www.indabayoga.com

story:
Highlights & Benefits:

Rocket Burn is ultra-convenient and easy to use - The smartest way to get fit!

  • 2 Technologies in One Product
  • Muscle Stimulation Trainings-Technology and ActiveBack Health System Technology
  • 33% higher fat-burning wherever you are – at home, at work, while shopping
  • ActiveBack Health System utilizes the newest generation of technology for relieving back pain and improving posture.
  • ActiveBack Health System - Releases sitting stress & slumping stress on your spine and hips, and promotes a healthier lifestyle.
  • ActiveBack Health System - Reduce fatigue, release stress & pain on neck, shoulder & Improves your mood every day.
  • Rocket Burn is made from high-quality neoprene material. It is particularly elastic, gentle on the skin, breathable, and also heat-insulating.
  • Rocket Burn was designed and developed in Germany.

 

AS SEEN ON

 

Rocket Burn is suitable for everyone. You can burn kilocalories everywhere without having to change your lifestyle and eating habits.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Story - Team Rocket

We are a young, dynamic company, headquartered in Berlin.

We asked ourselves why current studies indicate that approximately 65-70% of people in industrial nations suffer from frequent to constant back pain.

The potential causes of back pain are numerous and varied. One of the main reasons is body weight.

The idea was born!

Modern diets are not working. Across the globe people are struggling to maintain a lean and healthy body. Rocket Burn was designed and developed in germany to help people to be fitter, healthier and happier.

 

Electrical muscle stimulation originated in the field of physiotherapy.

It is a method of stimulating the muscles using electrical impulses that cause the muscle to contract. The constant muscle contractions accelerate your basal metabolic rate – allowing you to burn more calories and lose weight more easily. Consistent use will allow you to shrink your waistline day by day - A SMARTER WAY TO GET FIT.

 

Our newly-developed muscle stimulation training technology targets the slow twitch red muscle fibers. Its intensity and frequency set it apart from similar products. These red muscle fibers are particularly essential for stamina and fat-burning!

Rocket Burn’s pulsating frequency range is optimally designed for consuming energy in the individual muscle fibers. The repeated contractions mean that muscles use upmore oxygen and intensify the fat-burning process. In other words, training while using it will let you shed pounds effortlessly.

The newly-developed muscle stimulation training technology by Rocket Burn was developed by experts across the world as an astonishingly effective method for reducing body fat.

 

  • Very save and easy to use
  • Removable control unit
  • LCD display with easy-to-understand symbols
  • 5 programms (rookie, beginner, advanced, professional, perfect)
  • Adjustable intensity from 0 to 40
  • Countdown-Timer with remaining term
  • “Training memory”feature for constant monitoring of training

 

Rocket Burn’s newly-developed training technology for burning fat sounds like fitness for lazy people, right? In fact, it’s quite the opposite.

With Rocket Burn’s muscle stimulation training technology, calorie consumption is 33 percent higher during training than at a similar level of exertion without this technology.

Watch your muffin top and other fatty deposits melt away into thin air.

 

 

 

Rocket Burn’s newly-developed muscle stimulation training technology is the answer if you have limited time to exercise, or are unable or do not wishto do so for other reasons.

Our wear-resistant contact electrodes made from conductive carbon material train the front, upper, and side abdominalmuscles at the ideal frequency. You will burn stacks of calories with every use, lose weight and reduce body fat in next to no time.

It will improve your overall health, which you will notice in a general sense of wellbeing and more vitality in your day-to-day life: At home, at work, and everywhere you go – So start using it today!!!

 

The technology behind Rocket Burn has been exhaustively tested and it has been proven totally safe for everyday use. There is no increase in warmth, nor any other form of discomfort accompanying treatments. There are no known adverse or long-term side-effects. Rocket Burn is effective and 100% safe to use.

 

 

Reviews

 

 

 

 

 

 

Check your posture right now!

 

 

How’s your back? And your neck? Do you suffer from pain? If so, our ActiveBack Health System is the perfect solution. It automatically improves your posture when sitting or standing and relieves pain.

 

 

Highlights - ActiveBack Health System Technology

ActiveBack Health System utilizes the newest generation of technology for relieving back pain and improving posture.

ActiveBack – Stabilizes and improves posture. Poor posture is the most common cause of back pain.

ActiveBack – The soft, gentle, breathable, high-quality neoprene material also retainswarmth, which makes it perfectly suited for relieving back pain.

ActiveBack – It reduces the strain on muscles, nerves, tendons, and ligaments. Any existing back pain or lumbago is also relieved.

 

 

ActiveBack Health System – What exactly is that?

The ActiveBack Health System by Rocket Burn relieves strain on the intervertebral discs and reduces the effects of sciatica and lumbar spine syndrome. The newly-developed, flexible back support system stabilizes and supports the back and helps you achieve perfect posture.

Includes 5 stabilizing rods in the middle area and 2 more for support on the exterior.
Rocket Burn’s newly-developed, elasticated double Velcro fastening system also offers flexible compression that adjusts to fit each and every body type, thanks to its elasticity.

 

 

FAQs

1. Is it safe to use at home, at work, by shopping without clinical supervision?

Yes, ROCKET BURN is 100% safe for daily home use.

When used as directed on the recommended target areas there are no known associated risks. The product is still in the development phase and has begun the regulation process.

2. Are there any side effects?

Abolutely Safe. ROCKET BURN use doesn’t have any negative side effects whatsoever. It also doesn’t leave any marks on your body.

3. Was this tested with people?

Yes. ROCKET BURN was clinicly tested by many people.

4. How does it feel?

Lovely. It’s been best described as “a feeling of gentle vibrations”.

5. How long does it take for me to feel the effects?

No time at all. Once you attach the ROCKET BURN belt you feel an instant muscle contractions. It´s accelerate your basal metabolic rate. Just few minutes to reduce fat, no diet, no exercise! Proven technology.

6. Does the device get warm while working? Will I feel it if it does?

Not at all. While using ROCKET BURN you will not feel any change in temperature.

7. How do I know if it’s for me?

There’s no definite line dividing who ROCKET BURN is right for and who it isn’t. But keep in mind it is intended to target stubborn areas and help with body contouring. It is not meant as a tool to treat obesity or for significant weight loss.

8. Do I need to buy any extras or anything?

No. The ROCKET BURN package comes with everything you need. You need no extra Pads or something else. ROCKET BURN is durable, simple and "just work".

9. How is ROCKET BURN different from other contouring device?

IT WORKS! It’s that straightforward. ROCKET BURN uses science-backed, proven technology that has been used in medical clinics for years. Our innovation was to pack this costly clinical tech into a device conveniently sized for home use. Plus, to make it more effective we added EMS technology.

10. Rocket Rewards

The Referral Bonus with the Rocket Rewards are paid out after the production to the supporters.

11. Can I use it out in public?

Most definitely. ROCKET BURN is designed to be discreet and can be worn unnoticeably under any outfit.

You need no extra Pads or something else. ROCKET BURN is durable, simple and "just work".9. How is ROCKET BURN different from other contouring device?IT WORKS! It’s that straightforward. ROCKET BURN uses science-backed, proven technology that has been used in medical clinics for years. Our innovation was to pack this costly clinical tech into a device conveniently sized for home use. Plus, to make it more effective we added EMS technology.10. Rocket RewardsThe Referral Bonus with the Rocket Rewards are paid out after the production to the supporters.11. Can I use it out in public?Most definitely. ROCKET BURN is designed to be discreet and can be worn unnoticeably under any outfit.

story:
We need $20,000 to disseminate our Fellows' insights to the broader community. It will be used to market our conferences and learning modules, to pay for meeting space, to pay accounting, bookkeeping and clerical costs, and especially to create time for our creative folks to work on disruptive innovation. We also need funding for speaker travel and, in some cases, honoraria.

  • The beauty of our perks is that you become one of us. You join our caring community dedicated to improving the quality of people's lives.

  • Even if we don't reach our fundraising goals, your generosity will partially defray the cost of our efforts to improve decision making in healthcare. It will metaphorically "keep the lights on".

  • Our value proposition is broken into two segments. The first is the value proposition for society and the second is the value proposition for the individual Fellow. The two, of course, are interwoven.

  • Governance is the key factor in organizations and was essentially established to solve the agency problem. Examples in history include medieval town councils, The College of Cardinals, and the jury system. In a for-profit corporation, the executive team must maximize value for shareholders and it's the job of the Board of Directors to make sure they do so. In a not-for-profit organization such as a hospital, it is important that the executive team keep true to the mission and maximize value for the community and it's the job of the board of directors to make sure that the executive team fulfills that obligation. In not-for-profit hospitals, members are frequently appointed to the board of directors because they can give money or raise money or because they have a specific expertise that helps the organization or because they have political influence that helps the organization make its way in the world. Sometimes, especially in religious institutions, Directors are appointed to make sure that the executive team stays true to the hospitals charitable mission. Very few members of boards of directors have knowledge across the entire spectrum required to fulfill their fiduciary responsibility. This is particularly problematic since Board Members, after the Caremark Decision, can be held legally liable for compliance issues. The American College of healthcare trustees provides tools to help board members understand quality and safety, compliance and ethics, information technology management including cyber security, human resources, business decision-making with an emphasis on capital budgeting, and marketing. We do this by virtue of conferences and remote learning. We have a retreat service. 

  • Value for the individual Fellow-Fellows consist of present and future board members as well as many other leaders including Members of the surrounding community, Physicians, nurses, other executives, consultants, business people, entrepreneurs, scientists and inventors. We provide tools to help them advance their knowledge, skills, and abilities. The networking opportunities are priceless. We help entrepreneurs increase their brand awareness. We actively make introductions that help our fellows and we help each other solve problems. We have an evolving badge system that allows people to establish their bona fides as a health care leader, consistent with the micro credentialing trend for knowledge workers.

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Neither side in the present omnipresent debate about healthcare insurance addresses health care and how we make it commensurate with WHAT FOLKS WANT. Sure it needs to be safe and effective and constantly improving and The ACHT helps advance that cause. BUT WE WANT TO MAKE IT COMPASSIONATE, TIMELY, AND USER-FRIENDLY. With your help, we will continue to fight for that cause.

  • Our Board of Directors have a track record of success in a variety of endeavors. We have a Dean of nursing, a Director of Admissions at a Business School, a former Chairman and Professor of Clinical Surgery, a physiatrist and pain management specialist, a theologian and ethacist, a physician and entrepreneur, multiple MBA faculty, a former Director of a major burn unit. These are all people with a long history of contribution to society.

  • Join us. Lets face the challenge together.

Risks & Challenges

We face significant risks and challenges. We have launched this social enterprise with bootstrapping. We are a for profit C-corporation but have never made a profit. In fact, we are finally breaking even. We have had 4 fantastic conferences with visionary speakers. We have lost money on all but one where we essentially broke even. One can not break even at most innovative conferences without sponsorship from community spirited people or organizations. We struggle daily to pay the bills. The ACHT has significant funds committed to and at risk for our Innovation Conference November 7-10, 2018. Your participation as part of the team will sustain our mission.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We welcome you as a friend. Spend time on our website to get to know us and the issues we are passionate about

  • Make suggestions. We are eager to learn. We believe in brainstorming

  • Invite your friends to become Fellows

  • Introduce us to potential sponsors

  • Use our curated services if you find them a fit

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

he American College of Healthcare Trustees is proud to partner with the ICB. The Institute of Consultative Bioethics (ICBioethics) is a provider of comprehensive knowledge delivery software and consulting services that support health care, government, and other highly regulated industries. Dr. Kathy Gennuso and her husband Rich Gennuso formed ICBioethics in response to the lack of suitable, easy-to-use bioethics training resources available in the marketplace. ICBioethics' uniquely designed software product EthAssist® simplifies knowledge delivery and training for any organization who has students or staff affected by healthcare issues and regulations Go to the ICB WEBSITE TO SCHEDULE A DEMONSTRATION- http://www.icbioethics.com/

OR DISCUSS OUR RETREAT FACILITATION SERVICE BY EMAILING info@facht and putting "retreat" in subject line.Carl Middleton, SR. Vice President for Ethics American College of Healthcare Trustees

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Dr. Kathy Gennuso and her husband Rich Gennuso formed ICBioethics in response to the lack of suitable, easy-to-use bioethics training resources available in the marketplace. story:
Hi, my name is Chris. Five years ago I quit smoking, took up exercising and started counting calories. Four years ago I was diagnosed with anorexia nervosa. I'm a 32 year old male. I shouldn't get an eating disorder. But I did. I lost 20kg and went from a healthy 65kg to a dangerous 45kg. I have a photo of me, tethering a balloon in 2012, where I look so skeletal I don't even recognise myself.

I believed I was fine, whatever the world said. Stubbornness is a symptom. As long as I exercised, tracked what I ate and lived in a bubble there was no problem. I didn't have an eating disorder. My family and friends forced to watched me blindly imploding, powerless to help.

Without Beat I wouldn't be here. They opened my eyes that the life I thought was normal was, infarct, disordered, destructive and suicidal. They showed me that recovery was possible and isolation was not the answer. Allowing my friends and family back into my life was the route to health. I cannot thank them enough.

Beat's encouragement to fight back lead to my seeking help. I put on 15kg and remembered not only what it means to live, but also be happy. I hate anorexia so much for the life it forced me to lead, what I gave up to follow it's rules. I want to scream, shout and tell the world that anorexia is not something to accept, befriend, or manage. It can be beaten.

That is why I want to plaster their name across a balloon. Before I blindly followed anorexia I was a commercial hot air balloon pilot, flying balloons for corporate clients across the UK and Europe, it's a specialised job, but one I can do! I know how they can work to spread a message in a unique, novel and engaging way.

Please help me raise awareness of eating disorders by funding the balloon. For more information about me, eating disorders and everything I have planned for the balloon please have a look at the website: www.beatballoon.co.uk

story:
The x2 Sport Underwater Jet Pack

Have you ever been snorkeling and seen something incredible below you, but haven't been able to get to it before your breath runs out?  Until now you needed Scuba gear to take a closer look, but not any more thanks to the worlds first underwater jet pack; the x2 Sport. 

The x2 Sport is a wearable propulsion system that revolutionises the underwater experience bringing the adrenalin of action sports to the underwater world, enabling you to explore the ocean with the power and grace of a dolphin.

The x2 Sport can take you deeper and further than ever before.  The concept is simple; thrust generated by the patented Hydra thrusters propels you through the water faster than an Olympic swimmer.  The x2 provides the effort, saving your precious oxygen allowing longer duration dives.

We designed the x2 Sport for snorkelers, swimmers, extreme sports enthusiasts - anyone that loves being in the water.  Guiding yourself through the water is a breeze; all you have to do is point your arms where you want to go.  This action vectors the thrust and the x2 propels you in the new direction. 

The x2 opens up a whole new experience in underwater acrobatics by allowing you to twist, turn and spin.  You're only limited by your imagination and the best part is that your hands will be free enabling you to stop to take photos.

You control your speed using a handy throttle grip which is attached to you (so don't worry about letting it go, you won't lose it).  The analogue trigger gives you total control over how fast you go, so you can cruise along at a relaxed pace or hammer it at a top speeds in excess of 6mph!

Available Colours

We've received lots of interest in the Underwater Jet Pack over the last couple of years.  Our Indiegogo campaign represents the first opportunity for people to get their hands on a jet pack of their very own.

$5 - Hall of Fame

Your name will be forever remembered on our websites hall of fame as a one of the heroes that helped bring the underwater jet pack to the world.  The website will be updated with the names of everybody who has supported us by November 2015.

$30 - Supermarinovation T-Shirt

You can have your very own T-Shirt emblazoned with Supermarinovation.

$60 - Hoodie

If you live somewhere a little bit cooler then why not have your very own Supermarinovation hoodie.

$60 - Nemo Print

To express our vision, we commissioned our very own hero, Nemo – created by Peter Balogh and inspired by the underwater jet pack.  You will receive a print of Nemo on high quality metal plate which will looks fantastic on your wall.

$150 - Experience the x2 Sport

Enjoy the awesome power of the jet pack in a unique one off experience .  We'll be running events in the UK and Florida, USA where you can join us and have a 30 minute thrill ride with the x2 Sport.

$1400 Jet Pack Pioneer

This is a very special opportunity to join us as a jet pack pioneer. As a pioneer you will be receiving a pre-release version of the x2 Sport, a beta jet pack.  We'll provide you with upgrades and improved parts in the run up to the release of the production model.  Your feedback will help us shape the future of underwater jet pack.

$2000 Early Bird x2 Sport

An x2 Sport: Underwater Jet Pack of your very own - at an early bird price! You will own an x2 Sport and everything you need to get you moving at a significantly cheaper price than the MSRP.

$2500 x2 Sport

An x2 Sport: Underwater Jet Pack of your very own. You will own an x2 Sport and everything you need to get you moving at a cheaper price than the MSRP.

$3000 x2 Sport Signature Edition

An x2 Sport: Underwater Jet Pack of your very own with a flashy twist. The signature is a limited edition unit with a one of a kind exclusive custom paint job and comes signed by Simon and Chris, the creators of the jet pack.

$10000 We'll bring you your x2 Sport!

You'll receive an x2 Sport Signature Edition hand delivered by the creators Simon and Chris.  You can enjoy a day of jet packing together as they show your the ropes and get you well on your way to becoming an expert pilot.


We've dedicated the last three years to developing the underwater jet pack, the result of which is the x2 Sport prototype.  With your help we can make the next leap and turn our prototype into a full , production ready product.

To date we've been totally self funded but now we need your support so that everybody can have the opportunity to own their very own x2 Sport.

We need $35,000 which will enable us to finish development and move the x2 Sport to a production ready state over the next 12 months.

The funding will allow us to move to a larger facility, buy new components and equipment, which will help us to refine our production methods, reduce assembly time and improve build quality.

Some of the things that we desperately need are a walk in spray booth, a much larger testing tank, a permanent component testing rig and a bigger CNC machine - not to mention more 3D printers! 

Other Ways You Can Help 

If don't want an x2 Sport for yourself but are still interested in helping us succeed, then don't forget you can donate any amount without selecting a perk.  All donations are gratefully received and every person who pledges will get their name on our Wall of Fame.

Please share our Indiegogo campaign as much as you possibly can on Facebook and Twitter.  We need your help to get the word out!

There are some cool things that we want to add to the x2 Sport before it's ready for official release, such as a full sensor suite, smart battery management and a refined throttle system.

Once we've managed to squeeze all that good stuff in we'll go through a period of shakedown testing to make sure it's all working as we expect, before moving into full scale production, ready for shipping out rewards c.September 2016.
A successful Indiegogo campaign is hopefully just the beginning of our journey.  We have lots of exciting ideas for the future of the underwater jet pack which will build on the core experience.

The jet pack was born from two things; a dream to explore the underwater world deeper and further than before coupled with a desire to recreate the intense experience of skydiving for somebody that is afraid of heights!

The result was the x2 Sport; a device which enabled us to push our boundaries in the water without the need for Scuba gear and provides a thrilling ride along the way.

We've been working on the jet pack for about 36 months and what started as nothing more than a few components strewn about our Dad's shed has transformed into a fully functioning prototype.


Supply:  The jet pack brings together a number of components which we've attempted, where possible, to source locally.  In some instances availability and price have meant that we've had to go further afield to place orders but we've identified suppliers that we're confident can provide us with a reliable service.

Manufacturing:  All jet packs will be manufactured and assembled by us at our facility in Portsmouth and as such there is a limit to the rate at which we can put them together.  We have plans to expand our capabilities in the near future and are confident that we'll be able to deliver all rewards.

Quality Control:  We'll check all of the assembled jet packs in house using our custom testing facilities and nothing will be shipped until we are totally happy.

Simon and Chris Parke are brothers and inventors of the x2 Sport Underwater Jet Pack.

Simon has a long career within the enterprise software industry specialising in innovation, product development and strategic partnerships.

Chris is a Naval Architect currently working as a consultant on an extensive 43m Superyacht refit.  He specialises in technical design and has worked on projects from concept through to final build.

Both Simon and Chris live by the sea and love being in and around the water.

With Special Thanks To:

Chris Parke Snr

Simon and Chris' dad who has offered guidance and support since the beginning.

Colin Denahy

Simon's good friend and former colleague who specialises in electronics design and videography.  He has provided a lot of technical guidance to the boys.

Tom Barnett from Wave Photography

Tom met the team on Twitter and joined them for various underwater adventures, taking some fantastic photos along the way.  Check out his work at www.wavephotography.co.uk

The WAGs for putting up with the boys working all hours of the day, most weekends and basically never being at home!

Can I buy more than one x2 Sport?

Of course but there are only a limited number available at the moment so don’t be too greedy.

Is the x2 Sport waterproof?

Thankfully it is!

So what is the maximum depth?

We feel that 10m is the maximum safe depth regular users should repeatedly dive without getting into trouble.  As you approach 10m the x2 Sport will raise an alarm to let you know that you should start heading up again.  The power of the x2 Sport means that very rapid ascents and descents are possible so we recommend a very careful approach to jet packing at depth.

Does it come with a warranty?

We offer a 1 year full guarantee which will cover any genuine mechanical or electrical failures of the system.  For accidental damage or fair wear & tear we will offer replacement parts at a reasonable price.

What do you mean by standard use?

While it would be an incredibly intense experience to hit max power until the batteries died we've found that it quite difficult to hold our breath for that long. Typically our testing sessions have run for an hour of relatively constant use (allowing for breath catching between runs) until the batteries have run dry.

Is it easy to use?

The x2 Sport is easy to use but requires a certain amount of physical exertion and you will probably tire out before the batteries run down.  Manoeuvering requires the most physical output so the more you twist and turn the more tiring it can be.

Can I get spare batteries?

At the moment the batteries are sealed within the x2 Sport and therefore cannot be readily replaced but we have ensured that there is plenty of capacity in the unit to keep you going.  As a future development we will look at a removable battery system.

Will there be any stretch goal?

We have a full roadmap of development which will take the x2 Sport from its current prototype to a unit ready for shipping (see details above).  We feel that stretch goals could add risk to our ability to deliver the jet pack to you so have decided not to include any.

Can I do tricks?

Oh yes.  There are a variety of spins, twists and rolls which you can perform with the x2 Sport, it’s really only restricted by your imagination.  Some examples of a few tricks we’ve managed to pull off can be seen in the video at the top of the page.

Is the x2 Sport patented and trademarked?

The x2 Sport is fully patented and Supermarinovation is trademark of S.C.P. Marine Innovation.

Why is it called the x2 Sport?

Our final goal is to produce a four thruster underwater jet pack.  As a step along the way we decided to start with a two thruster system and named them the x2 and x4 to keep things easy.  The x2 Sport is the first of the x2 family which has made it to the ‘ready for human interaction’ stage.  We have some big ideas for both the x2 and x4 and hope to add to the range in the future.

Is there an age/weight limit?

The x2 Sport is a very powerful device which requires a level of strength for safe usage so we would not recommend that it be used by anyone under the age of 14 and pilots up to the age of 18 should be closely supervised by a responsible adult.

Can the charging time be reduced?

Charging time can be reduced using more powerful charging devices however, these need high amp power supplies which typical households don’t have access to.  We can recommend a suitable charger or advise if you will be able to use a charger you already own.

What about spare parts or upgrades?

We have built a certain amount of modularity into the system so that we will be able to offer not only replacement parts but upgrades as well.  Initially, we will offer spares that will be a direct replacement for the current x2 Sport but in the future we will be offering improved upgrades as well.

Should I take the x2 Sport out on my own?

Underwater activities are extremely dangerous and the ocean can be an unforgiving environment.  We recommend never going it alone; always have a buddy to watch your back and get you out of trouble.

Your video and pitch are just so slick and well put together, who did you get to do it for you?

We're flattered that you're impressed with the pitch/video and think you'll be shocked to know that we did it all ourselves.  We were certain that people would notice it was a little rough around the edges!
