production methods, reduce assembly time and improve build quality.

Some
of the things that we desperately need are a walk in spray booth, a
much larger testing tank, a permanent component testing rig and a
bigger CNC machine - not to mention more 3D printers! 

Other
Ways You Can Help 


If
don't want an x2 Sport for yourself but are still interested in helping us succeed, then don't forget you can donate any amount without selecting a perk.  All donations are gratefully received and every person who pledges will get their name on our Wall of Fame.

Please share our Indiegogo campaign as much as you possibly can on Facebook and Twitter.  We need your help to get the word out!
There are some cool things that we want to add to the x2 Sport before it's ready for official release, such as a full sensor suite, smart battery management and a refined throttle system.Once we've managed to squeeze all that good stuff in we'll go through a period of shakedown testing to make sure it's all working as we expect, before moving into full scale production, ready for shipping out rewards c.September 2016.A successful Indiegogo campaign is hopefully just the beginning of our journey.  We have lots of exciting ideas for the future of the underwater jet pack which will build on the core experience.The jet pack was born from two things; a dream to explore the underwater world deeper and further than before coupled with a desire to recreate the intense experience of skydiving for somebody that is afraid of heights!The result was the x2 Sport; a device which enabled us to push our boundaries in the water without the need for Scuba gear and provides a thrilling ride along the way.We've been working on the jet pack for about 36 months and what started as nothing more than a few components strewn about our Dad's shed has transformed into a fully functioning prototype.
Supply:  The
jet pack brings together a number of components which we've
attempted, where possible, to source locally.  In some instances
availability and price have meant that we've had to go further afield
to place orders but we've identified suppliers that we're confident
can provide us with a reliable service.Manufacturing:  All jet packs will be manufactured
and assembled by us at our facility in Portsmouth and as such there
is a limit to the rate at which we can put them together.  We have
plans to expand our capabilities in the near future and are confident that we'll be able to deliver all rewards. 



Quality
Control:  We'll check all of the
assembled jet packs in house using our custom testing facilities and
nothing will be shipped until we are totally happy. 

Simon and Chris Parke are brothers and inventors of the x2 Sport
Underwater Jet Pack.

Simon
has a long career within the enterprise software industry
specialising in innovation, product development and strategic
partnerships.

Chris
is a Naval Architect currently working as a consultant on an
extensive 43m Superyacht refit.  He specialises in technical
design and has worked on projects from concept through to final
build.

Both
Simon and Chris live by the sea and love being in and around the
water.

With
Special Thanks To:

Chris
Parke Snr

Simon
and Chris' dad who has offered guidance and support since the
beginning.

Colin Denahy

Simon's
good friend and former colleague who specialises in electronics
design and videography.  He has provided a lot of technical
guidance to the boys.

Tom
Barnett from Wave Photography

Tom
met the team on Twitter and joined them for various underwater
adventures, taking some fantastic photos along the way.  Check
out his work at www.wavephotography.co.uk

The
WAGs for putting up with the boys working all hours of the day,
most weekends and basically never being at home!
Can
I buy more than one x2 Sport?

Of
course but there are only a limited number available at the moment so
don’t be too greedy.

Is
the x2 Sport waterproof?

Thankfully
it is!

So
what is the maximum depth?

We
feel that 10m is the maximum safe depth regular users should
repeatedly dive without getting into trouble.  As you approach
10m the x2 Sport will raise an alarm to let you know that you should
start heading up again.  The power of the x2 Sport means that
very rapid ascents and descents are possible so we recommend a very
careful approach to jet packing at depth.


Does
it come with a warranty?

We
offer a 1 year full guarantee which will cover any genuine mechanical
or electrical failures of the system.  For accidental damage or
fair wear & tear we will offer replacement parts at a
reasonable price.

What do you mean by standard use?

While it would be an incredibly intense experience to hit max power until the batteries died we've found that it quite difficult to hold our breath for that long. Typically our testing sessions have run for an hour of relatively constant use (allowing for breath catching between runs) until the batteries have run dry.
Is it easy to use?The x2 Sport is easy to use but requires a certain amount of physical exertion and you will probably tire out before the batteries run down.  Manoeuvering requires the most physical output so the more you twist and turn the more tiring it can be.
Can
I get spare batteries?

At
the moment the batteries are sealed within the x2 Sport and therefore
cannot be readily replaced but we have ensured that there is plenty
of capacity in the unit to keep you going.  As a future
development we will look at a removable battery system.

Will
there be any stretch goal?

We
have a full roadmap of development which will take the x2 Sport from
its current prototype to a unit ready for shipping (see details
above).  We feel that stretch goals could add risk to our
ability to deliver the jet pack to you so have decided not to include
any.

Can
I do tricks?

Oh
yes.  There are a variety of spins, twists and rolls which you
can perform with the x2 Sport, it’s really only restricted by your
imagination.  Some examples of a few tricks we’ve managed to
pull off can be seen in the video at the top of the page.

Is
the x2 Sport patented and trademarked?

The
x2 Sport is fully patented and Supermarinovation is trademark of
S.C.P. Marine Innovation.

Why
is it called the x2 Sport?

Our
final goal is to produce a four thruster underwater jet pack. 
As a step along the way we decided to start with a two thruster
system and named them the x2 and x4 to keep things easy.  The x2
Sport is the first of the x2 family which has made it to the ‘ready
for human interaction’ stage.  We have some big ideas for both
the x2 and x4 and hope to add to the range in the future.

Is
there an age/weight limit?

The
x2 Sport is a very powerful device which requires a level of strength
for safe usage so we would not recommend that it be used by anyone
under the age of 14 and pilots up to the age of 18 should be
closely supervised by a responsible adult.

Can
the charging time be reduced?

Charging
time can be reduced using more powerful charging devices however,
these need high amp power supplies which typical households don’t
have access to.  We can recommend a suitable charger or advise
if you will be able to use a charger you already own.

What
about spare parts or upgrades?

We
have built a certain amount of modularity into the system so that we
will be able to offer not only replacement parts but upgrades as
well.  Initially, we will offer spares that will be a direct
replacement for the current x2 Sport but in the future we will be
offering improved upgrades as well.

Should
I take the x2 Sport out on my own?

Underwater
activities are extremely dangerous and the ocean can be an
unforgiving environment.  We recommend never going it alone;
always have a buddy to watch your back and get you out of trouble.
Your video and pitch are just so slick and well put together, who did you get to do it for you?We're flattered that you're impressed with the pitch/video and think you'll be shocked to know that we did it all ourselves.  We were certain that people would notice it was a little rough around the edges!

story: Please visit mygrowbot.com
story_txt: Please visit mygrowbot.com

story:
Please visit emojifit.com.au to get your emojifit merchandise

 

Stay up to date with what's happening by following us on   facebook

 

Want to be part of helping 101 million people- You can! 

 

Professor Timothy Skinner, a diabetes researcher from Charles Darwin University in the Northern Territory of Australia, and Professor Isabelle Skinner,  rural health and telehealth specialist, have teamed up with designer D'Arcy Ellis to make a difference for people with type 2 diabetes.

Through our years of research and clinical practice, we have discovered the most effective way to support people with lifestyle change: for weight loss, increasing exercise, making dietary changes, improving mental health and reducing diabetes distress.  To help people with type 2  diabetes, we have used this knowledge to develop an app,  emojifit Diabetes.

 

Now we need your help to help more people.

The emojifit Story

 

The language of emojis is a global language that we have harnessed for good.

We have added a range of health and wellbeing emojis to the standard dictionary of fun and quirky emojis that we all know so well. With our expanded library we have made an app called emojifit Diabetes that is easy to use and can be understood by people everywhere.

The emojifit pictorial library communicates health and wellbeing information to support lifestyle change including:

 

  • feelings,
  • emotions,
  • confidence,
  • activities,
  • food to eat and
  • foods to avoid.

 

Some emojis are used to communicate medical conditions such as high blood pressure, high blood sugar, high cholesterol, and depression and their complications.  Emojis form the basis or our app to help people focus on lifestyle changes that are targeted to address their biggest concern.

Who we are

 

To support everyone with Type 2 Diabetes to have access to evidence-based self management support Tim, Isabelle, D'Arcy, Ling An and the team at Decision Support Analytics have  developed emojifit Diabetes.

We have boot strapped our project with our own resources, funds from friends and family, a grant from the Northern Territory Government and support from State-based Diabetes organisations. With that, we have been able to make emojifit Diabetes for iPhones (iOS). From the start, we incorporated  Apple CareKit and  ResearchKit to ensure we could support secure health data sharing.

 

Now we need your help to produce it for Android.

 

Why it is needed

 

It is estimated that 101 million people with diabetes have an android phone, whilst 17 million people with diabetes around the world use an iPhone.  

We know that everyone with diabetes wants to live a long life, free from the complications of diabetes.

We know people with diabetes are interested in using emojifit to manage their lifestyle goal-setting because, in the months since we launched, people from 31 countries as diverse as America, Australia, Azerbaijan, Brazil and Thailand have downloaded and are using the app.

Lots of Android users have asked us to make the app available for them. Diabetes is a big global problem and getting bigger. We believe we can help slow down the rise. We need you to believe with us.

 

 

7 reasons we made emojifit Diabetes?

 

  1. Health Care Professionals struggle to support people  with Type 2  Diabetes with person-centred goal setting.
  2. There are no simple to use tools to support people after their group or 1 to 1 consultation.
  3. Many apps require high levels of health literacy as well as general literacy and numeracy
  4. Most diabetes apps are focused only on blood glucose.
  5. There are no tools to enable evidence based decision-making for lifestyle choices for people with Type 2 Diabetes
  6. There are no tools to help support person-centred goal setting designed specially for people with Type 2 Diabetes.
  7. There are no tools for people with poor access to diabetes education and care.

 

How emojifit Diabetes works

Our goal is to help people make choices about their diabetes that are consistent with their own individual values, goals, concerns, abilities, world views and resources. 

By helping people find their own path to manage their diabetes, emojifit Diabetes enables people to set their own diabetes management plan, set their own reminders, get the support they want, and succeed one step at a time.

Based on Theory (Self-Determination and Social Cognitive Theory) and evidence base.

emojifit Diabetes uses:

  • Choice
  • Focus
  • Self-Monitoring
  • Social support
  • Professional support 
  • The language of emojis.

 

Press

What We Need 

We have developed the iPhone version of emojifit Diabetes and it's working and being used. Prof Tim has been invited to the International Diabetes Federation meeting in Abu Dhabi in December 2017. This meeting of all the diabetes organisations from around the world only happens every 3 years. We would like to have emojifit Diabetes available for everyone everywhere, so delegates can take it back home with them and share the news with their communities. 

We need your support to make the Android version. 

 

  • We need $25,000 AUD to convert our iOS version to Android.

 

If we raise more than $25,000  we will add more features to the app more quickly:

if you support us with $30,000- We will add enhanced goal tracking to help users to see their progress over the month. 

If we reach $50,000 in support- We will add the language module to the app.

  • Lots of people want to be able to use the app in their own language.

If you go all out with $75,000 in support- We will add the map feature.

  • Individual health care providers want users to link directly to them through the app to securely share their plans. We need a map feature to make this possible.

And a huge effort of $100,000 support - We will add the medication module.

  • Some people want to manage their medications through their emojifit app as well as their lifestyle plan.

We have plans in the pipeline for the foot module and the sleep module. The more we raise the more people we can help.

 

What You Get

If you have Type 2 Diabetes, by helping us with $5 you get emojifit Diabetes extra, the paid version of the App with all the new features which we plan to make available for $4.99 AUD. That's a very good deal.

A great gift for $25 backing. You get the app and our E-Cookbook with all the yummy recipes that we feature on our popular emojifit Diabetes facebook page. In case you haven't been there yet, join our 230,000 followers to get recipes, tips and the latest research.

For $150 backing you get one of our emojifit active wear T-shirts designed by our emoji artist D'Arcy Ellis, the app and our E-Cookbook.

To show your support for people with diabetes you may want to back us with your work team. For $100 support we will send you a signed poster featuring the emojifit pictorial library for you to put up at work and a range of emojifit bumper stickers for the team.

For $2500 backing, Tim has agreed to speak about his latest diabetes research at a meeting of your group when he is in your town, or by videolink and you will all receive a copy of our E-Cookbook.

For our Sliver sponsors, you get to be part of the research journey and have your name or your company acknowledged in our research publications.

For our Gold sponsors, you get to be part of the research and dissemination journey. As well as acknowledgement, you will have your name and/or company logo on the front of all of the conference presentations we are invited to present around the world on emojifit Diabetes. 

 

What could go wrong?

Currently we are a small committed team- Prof Tim is our diabetes expert, Prof Isabelle is our Managing Director, social media manager and mHealth expert, Ling is our software engineer and D'Arcy is our graphic designer. We have big plans and a small team. We have achieved so much to date. With your help we can achieve so much more. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share with your friends on social media. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out for us.
  • Jump on our emojifit Diabetes Facebook page or our webpage. Tell us what you think and like and share our posts.
  • Download the free version of the app.  
  • Get your emojifit merchandise for yourself, or for a friend, or relative.

 

Get together with us to make emojifit Diabetes in Indigenous and minor languages

Emojis do most of the communication work in the App but there are small amounts of text that are really important to help people with Type 2 Diabetes understand their risk factors, the complications and how these can be managed.

For example:

Heart Disease- 

Heart disease happens when the arteries supplying blood to your heart, to make it pump, get blocked.  Without the blood, parts of the heart get damaged and don’t work any more.

Result: you risk having a heart attack

If you are a speaker of one of the world's Indigenous languages, or one of the world's minor languages you may want to get in touch and help us with translation 

 

We need your help 

Together we can reach every part of the Earth to provide evidence-based support for people with Type 2 Diabetes.

story:
The AirPhysio Community Benefits Program

Over the last two years we have designed and built the new AirPhysio device to help sufferers of respiratory ailments to help clean and exercise their lungs, as well as maximise the effects of any medication. Although low cost, we want to get it to those who are less fortunate and who really need the device as some people with these conditions can't work as they struggle to simply take a breath.

These are the people we particularly want to help and we have designed our Community Benefits Program to get these devices out there through various worldwide organisations.

If we can save or help to change just lives, then we will have achieved our own personal vision. The amount of children suffering from Chronic Asthma and Cystic Fibrosis is unbelievable and we would like to help change their lives so that they can live a more fulfilling lifestyle.

We want and need your help to realise this vision!

Please see how just 1 device has changed a child's life, imagine what 1,000 or more devices can do.

"My son Jet gets chronic asthma and became dependent on asthma medication, to the point where as soon as he stopped the medicine he would start getting a chest cold. Through winter he is the first one to get a cold and since his asthma started, he has never finished a cross country or any sporting events without an asthma attack and the need for a puffer.

Jet started using AirPhysio for the first time only a couple of months ago, but the results have been amazing. Not only has he not had a cold or flu so far this winter (which is an accomplishment in itself), but since starting to use the device, Jet not only finished his first cross country without an asthma attack, but he actually made it to district as well as weekly football and daily surfing.

I love this device, my son has managed to kick his dependency on medicines and he is improving his fitness. Now if only I could get him to use it every day I’d be happy."
Varley Frazer
NSW North Coast, Australia

 

Where Have We Come From?

AirPhysio came about from three business partners in Australia coming across a 20 year old mucus clearance device. At the time we thought, "what a great idea - where do we get one?" We then found out that these devices were hard to obtain and even more concerning, were not that well known by many in the health care industry.

We were passionate about helping others and this device ticked all of the boxes when we realised how much good it could do to help people with respiratory conditions to breathe easier. We believed that strongly in the device that we spent two years researching, designing, testing and gaining validation from the medical profession to create the new AirPhysio device (short for airway physiotherapy). With business, engineering and medical backgrounds within our team we knew we could improve on the old technology.  The interest is high, the research complete, all the certification, validations and approvals required have been done.

AirPhysio is now ready for the international market, and an important part of that is to also launch a Community Benefit Program. This will enable us to take these devices to areas less fortunate and we will be working with various project teams and charitable organisations to do this.

We have already heard some amazing stories of how the AirPhysio device has helped make major changes in people’s lives, now we need support to enable us to produce AirPhysio to help more people on a global scale. Funds raised via this campaign will allow us to increase production, provide education, gain health and compliance approvals in more countries, employ more people and best of all, help more and more people around the world to gain access to this device to breathe easier, naturally!

 

Sounds Great - But What IS AirPhysio?

 

AirPhysio is a natural lung expansion and mucus clearance device that operates on the principles of ‘Oscillating Positive Expiratory Pressure’ (OPEP). Blowing into the device causes the airway walls inside of the lungs to oscillate (you can actually feel it working immediately), shaking loose contaminated mucus and opening up the airways. It assists the body’s natural method of keeping the lungs hygienic by removing mucus and contaminants from the lungs and helps to maintain maximum lung capacity for users by opening up an block, closed or semi closed airways. There are 3 primary markets for AirPhysio:

  1. Adults and children with existing respiratory conditions (asthma, COPD, cystic fibrosis etc)
  2. Those seeking to mitigate the effects of air pollution on their health
  3. Individuals wishing to maintain maximum lung capacity for sports and general health

PEP devices have been in the public domain since the 1980’s and have primarily been promoted to individuals with an existing respiratory condition as a symptom alleviating product. A particular phenomenon in the manufacturing space with PEP devices has been the highly static nature of design and additional functionality - most PEP devices have received little or no development from launch. Also many are just another product sold by a larger company. A huge point of difference for AirPhysio is that it is all we do, and all we sell - we are 100% dedicated to our product and its future. Already a huge amount of new research and redesign has taken place.

 

An Instant INTERNATIONAL AWARD WINNER!

Australian made AirPhysio was invited to the Yiwu Imported Commodities Fair in China during May, 2017. It was held at the Yiwu International Expo Centre covering over 150,000 square metres of space and received over 500,000 visitors.

AirPhysio presented the device to around 60 key distributors and displayed our product on the CAUNZ stand at the fair. AirPhysio won the prestigious Best Product award over 3,500 other exhibitors with around 100,000 products in the fair in total.

 

As a result of this win, AirPhysio has already received extensive interest from distributors in China and India (the worlds two largest markets) and numerous enquiries from other countries. We have also been invited back to take part in another trade fair in China (Xiamen - September 2017) and a visit to India in November 2017. The device is already being sold and distributed around Australia and the initial interest in the prospects for the device is beyond our dreams.

 

Proudly Australian Made!

AirPhysio is totally designed and made in Australia from the highest quality materials and we are proud to be endorsed as "Australian Made"!

 

Our Growing Success Story...

In 2016/17, AirPhysio has steadily built an excellent reputation for the validity of the device. We have toured Australia, notably with the Asthma Australia Symposium Series (in all capital cities) and the TSANZ (Thoracic Society of Australia and New Zealand) event in Canberra, to raise awareness and demonstrate the device. We have been overwhelmed by the positive feedback and keen interest from many of those involved in respiratory health care.

Recently we were invited to Sydney to demonstrate the device to the Chinese Badminton Team taking part in the Australian Open. This demonstrated the value of using AirPhysio to build lung capacity and stamina, even for healthy athletes (all of the players that tested the device that day won their subsequent matches that night)!

 

What Is In It For Our Supporters...

We really do see this as a global mission to help people and we want you to join us and enjoy the ride! Everyone who contributes to this campaign will benefit in some way:

  • Through early adopter special offers and bargains.
  • By being offered a "2 for 1" deal - where you can give away the second device to somebody you know who needs it.
  • By being on our newsletter list to receive the latest information on AirPhysio.
  • By knowing part of what you contribute goes to a less fortunate community.
  • Having knowledge that you are contributing to the further development of a product of high demand that actually improves people health.
Note - all pledges will be fulfilled in late November/early December 2017.
 

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to be the number one OPEP device in the world, but of course we can see obstacles in our way:

  • Competition - yes, there are competitors but we have already addressed this by improving efficiency and build quality, whilst the others are the same as they were 20 years ago.
  • Lack of Awareness - many people who need these devices don't know they are out there. We have planned education through seminars, webinars and marketing to get the message out there.
  • Does it work? - well yes it does, there has been immense research into PEP devices over the last 20 years. We have also commissioned our own validation paper, by the Griffith University in Queensland - CLICK HERE to read.
  • Perception - we have had feedback about the use of respiratory drugs and if AirPhysio is a natural therapy. AirPhysio compliments and enhances medications - it is not meant to replace them - CLICK HERE to read how devices such as AirPhysio achieve this.
  • Cost - we have tried to push down the retail price of an AirPhysio so that more and more people can have access to one. We believe that in the world of expensive health care we have a very cost effective and reusable device within the reach of most people.
  • Duplication - success in Asia has its downside in that cheap copies can, and are, made of many products. We are aware of this and have a number of strategies in place (and a few secrets!) to keep a step ahead. It is certainly not something we are ignoring.

 

Other Ways You Can Support AirPhysio...

We appreciate any form of assistance that our followers and contributors can give:

  • Use our 2 for 1 offer to gift a device to someone you know who needs it.
  • Follow our social media pages and share with your own friends and followers.
  • Check out our website for videos and information.
  • If you don't wish to buy, just support us through our donation perk or just "back us"!
  • Have your own medical practitioners "look us up"!
  • Ask for AirPhysio at your local pharmacy.

 

NEWSFLASH!!! - AirPhysio has been announced as a finalist in the 2017 Optus My Business Awards to be held in Sydney, Australia on 10th November.

The Team

 

Testimonials from current AirPhysio users:

“The patient has been able to clear his chest of congestion with the AirPhysio. It has been an excellent device, easy to use and very effective. He lives in the country and could not attend a physiotherapist even if could afford to go everyday which is what he would have needed. Thank you for your help. I will be definitely recommending your product and will no doubt purchase one for our family use as it would be great.”

Jacquie Barnes – RN1 General Practice Nurse

Croydon, Victoria

 

"I had a chest cold for about a week, I was struggling to get a good night’s sleep and I just couldn’t shake it. I used the AirPhysio device for about 5 minutes in the evening before going to bed and couldn’t believe how much mucus and phlegm that I got off my chest. That night I had the first good sleep and after using the device again the next morning I was feeling great.I felt the results after using it just once and couldn’t believe how much better I felt after using the device. I’m not cured yet, but this has helped me on my road to recovery and I feel almost human for the first time in a week.I would have already recommended the device to others who have a cold or flu as it really helps and you can feel it working on you."

Katrina Peterson

Tweed Heads NSW

 

“I have suffered from asthma since I was a kid and the attacks got worse when I became a mother of three young active boys. My day is typically busy and I would often go to bed exhausted and then wake up the next day wheezing and needing my inhaler. A good friend of mine suggested that I try AirPhysio device and for three weeks I used the it every night before going to bed. I noticed the quality of my sleep has gotten better and my breathing easier since using the device. I have not had an asthma attack since. I am so happy with the AirPhysio device that I am going to continue to use it every night to keep my asthma symptoms at bay.”

Maria Lourdes Tala

Cebu, Philippines

 

CLICK HERE to visit our website to find out more about AirPhysio

 

Thank You For Your Ongoing Support!
story_txt:
The AirPhysio Community Benefits Program
Over the last two years we have designed and built the new AirPhysio device to help sufferers of respiratory ailments to help clean and exercise their lungs, as well as maximise the effects of any medication. Although low cost, we want to get it to those who are less fortunate and who really need the device as some people with these conditions can't work as they struggle to simply take a breath.
These are the people we particularly want to help and we have designed our Community Benefits Program to get these devices out there through various worldwide organisations.
If we can save or help to change just lives, then we will have achieved our own personal vision. The amount of children suffering from Chronic Asthma and Cystic Fibrosis is unbelievable and we would like to help change their lives so that they can live a more fulfilling lifestyle.
We want and need your help to realise this vision!
Please see how just 1 device has changed a child's life, imagine what 1,000 or more devices can do.
"My son Jet gets chronic asthma and became dependent on asthma medication, to the point where as soon as he stopped the medicine he would start getting a chest cold. Through winter he is the first one to get a cold and since his asthma started, he has never finished a cross country or any sporting events without an asthma attack and the need for a puffer.Jet started using AirPhysio for the first time only a couple of months ago, but the results have been amazing. Not only has he not had a cold or flu so far this winter (which is an accomplishment in itself), but since starting to use the device, Jet not only finished his first cross country without an asthma attack, but he actually made it to district as well as weekly football and daily surfing.I love this device, my son has managed to kick his dependency on medicines and he is improving his fitness. Now if only I could get him to use it every day I’d be happy."Varley FrazerNSW North Coast, Australia
 
Where Have We Come From?
AirPhysio came about from three business partners in Australia coming across a 20 year old mucus clearance device. At the time we thought, "what a great idea - where do we get one?" We then found out that these devices were hard to obtain and even more concerning, were not that well known by many in the health care industry.
We were passionate about helping others and this device ticked all of the boxes when we realised how much good it could do to help people with respiratory conditions to breathe easier. We believed that strongly in the device that we spent two years researching, designing, testing and gaining validation from the medical profession to create the new AirPhysio device (short for airway physiotherapy). With business, engineering and medical backgrounds within our team we knew we could improve on the old technology.  The interest is high, the research complete, all the certification, validations and approvals required have been done.

AirPhysio is now ready for the international market, and an important part of that is to also launch a Community Benefit Program. This will enable us to take these devices to areas less fortunate and we will be working with various project teams and charitable organisations to do this.
We have already heard some amazing stories of how the AirPhysio device has helped make major changes in people’s lives, now we need support to enable us to produce AirPhysio to help more people on a global scale. Funds raised via this campaign will allow us to increase production, provide education, gain health and compliance approvals in more countries, employ more people and best of all, help more and more people around the world to gain access to this device to breathe easier, naturally!
 
Sounds Great - But What IS AirPhysio?

 
AirPhysio is a natural lung expansion and mucus clearance device that operates on the principles of ‘Oscillating Positive Expiratory Pressure’ (OPEP). Blowing into the device causes the airway walls inside of the lungs to oscillate (you can actually feel it working immediately), shaking loose contaminated mucus and opening up the airways. It assists the body’s natural method of keeping the lungs hygienic by removing mucus and contaminants from the lungs and helps to maintain maximum lung capacity for users by opening up an block, closed or semi closed airways. There are 3 primary markets for AirPhysio:

Adults and children with existing respiratory conditions (asthma, COPD, cystic fibrosis etc)
Those seeking to mitigate the effects of air pollution on their health
Individuals wishing to maintain maximum lung capacity for sports and general health

PEP devices have been in the public domain since the 1980’s and have primarily been promoted to individuals with an existing respiratory condition as a symptom alleviating product. A particular phenomenon in the manufacturing space with PEP devices has been the highly static nature of design and additional functionality - most PEP devices have received little or no development from launch. Also many are just another product sold by a larger company. A huge point of difference for AirPhysio is that it is all we do, and all we sell - we are 100% dedicated to our product and its future. Already a huge amount of new research and redesign has taken place.

 
An Instant INTERNATIONAL AWARD WINNER!
Australian made AirPhysio was invited to the Yiwu Imported Commodities Fair in China during May, 2017. It was held at the Yiwu International Expo Centre covering over 150,000 square metres of space and received over 500,000 visitors.
AirPhysio presented the device to around 60 key distributors and displayed our product on the CAUNZ stand at the fair. AirPhysio won the prestigious Best Product award over 3,500 other exhibitors with around 100,000 products in the fair in total.

 

As a result of this win, AirPhysio has already received extensive interest from distributors in China and India (the worlds two largest markets) and numerous enquiries from other countries. We have also been invited back to take part in another trade fair in China (Xiamen - September 2017) and a visit to India in November 2017. The device is already being sold and distributed around Australia and the initial interest in the prospects for the device is beyond our dreams.
 
Proudly Australian Made!
AirPhysio is totally designed and made in Australia from the highest quality materials and we are proud to be endorsed as "Australian Made"!


 
Our Growing Success Story...

In 2016/17, AirPhysio has steadily built an excellent reputation for the validity of the device. We have toured Australia, notably with the Asthma Australia Symposium Series (in all capital cities) and the TSANZ (Thoracic Society of Australia and New Zealand) event in Canberra, to raise awareness and demonstrate the device. We have been overwhelmed by the positive feedback and keen interest from many of those involved in respiratory health care.


Recently we were invited to Sydney to demonstrate the device to the Chinese Badminton Team taking part in the Australian Open. This demonstrated the value of using AirPhysio to build lung capacity and stamina, even for healthy athletes (all of the players that tested the device that day won their subsequent matches that night)!

 
What Is In It For Our Supporters...
We really do see this as a global mission to help people and we want you to join us and enjoy the ride! Everyone who contributes to this campaign will benefit in some way:

Through early adopter special offers and bargains.
By being offered a "2 for 1" deal - where you can give away the second device to somebody you know who needs it.
By being on our newsletter list to receive the latest information on AirPhysio.

By knowing part of what you contribute goes to a less fortunate community.
Having knowledge that you are contributing to the further development of a product of high demand that actually improves people health.



Note - all pledges will be fulfilled in late November/early December 2017.

Competition - yes, there are competitors but we have already addressed this by improving efficiency and build quality, whilst the others are the same as they were 20 years ago.

Perception - we have had feedback about the use of respiratory drugs and if AirPhysio is a natural therapy. AirPhysio compliments and enhances medications - it is not meant to replace them - CLICK HERE to read how devices such as AirPhysio achieve this.
Cost - we have tried to push down the retail price of an AirPhysio so that more and more people can have access to one. We believe that in the world of expensive health care we have a very cost effective and reusable device within the reach of most people.
Duplication - success in Asia has its downside in that cheap copies can, and are, made of many products. We are aware of this and have a number of strategies in place (and a few secrets!) to keep a step ahead. It is certainly not something we are ignoring.

Use our 2 for 1 offer to gift a device to someone you know who needs it.
Follow our social media pages and share with your own friends and followers.
Check out our website for videos and information.
If you don't wish to buy, just support us through our donation perk or just "back us"!
Have your own medical practitioners "look us up"!
Ask for AirPhysio at your local pharmacy.

Katrina PetersonTweed Heads NSW “I have suffered from asthma since I was a kid and the attacks got worse when I became a mother of three young active boys. I noticed the quality of my sleep has gotten better and my breathing easier since using the device. I have not had an asthma attack since. I am so happy with the AirPhysio device that I am going to continue to use it every night to keep my asthma symptoms at bay.” Maria Lourdes TalaCebu, Philippines CLICK HERE to visit our website to find out more about AirPhysio Thank You For Your Ongoing Support!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
    • My name is Indu Aima married and have two children. I used to work as a computer teacher until I started observing challenges due to Thyroid dysfunction. To juggle between daily chores at home, work and parenting the kids was a herculean task and the thyroid dysfunction was having a huge negative impact on my health and life. Unfortunately my husband was also detected with thyroid dysfunction around the same time. We both struggled to get our health back on track but this could not happen until we took it up on ourselves.  Though information sources have been available in abundance in the form of books, web links, twitter chats etc. they are either confusing, misleading or at times do not help beyond a point and consume a lot of time. We were always envisioning a solution that will provide health status in a click for an individual. While figuring out modes to take our solution to a large market we chose mobile phones because of their presence among 6.9 billion people worldwide about 95% of the world population. Our vision was also to empower each individual to do the first pass tests by looking at the symptoms survey and self-test routine. In case the problem exists the individual can do blood tests, feed the results in to the app and get their unique thyroid profile, complete diagnosis along with information on suggested cure, self-treatment routine, do's & don't's, and supporting educational material.
    • Our aim is to not let anyone endure what we went through in last 10 yrs. We have started MyHealth Thyroid – An App that’s an example and an inspiration for all those people suffering with Thyroid dysfunction with insights on how to come out of it and help spreading the gospel around.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
    • Experts claim that thyroid dysfunction is the next epidemic to be dealt worldwide. The tough job on hand is two fold - on one side we have to detect the dysfunction and on the other we have to fix it. We have developed an analytics & cloud based solution that we are expecting would solve both the issues of detecting and correcting the problem by fixing it at the root cause.
    • To begin with our campaign's top 3 priorities are to improve reach, awareness, and affordability. With all our savings and best possible support received from few friends we have been able to develop and launch the app on android platform. There is a vast majority of people on other platforms as well who are yet to be benefited. To help stop this dysfunction we have to quickly make it available to them as well. We have to find ways to reduce the cost and make this solution affordable to more and more people.  We would also like to improve the awareness about the dysfunction by conducting awareness and educational campaigns. 
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.
    • We are expecting that we will need around USD 1,000,000 to achieve the following goals:
      • Improve affordability - Reduce the cost of report to make it available to those who cannot afford it
      • Improve Availability - Make the applications available on different platforms
      • Conduct Awareness and Educational Campaigns
      • Enhance User Experience - Existing Application
      • Research and development –
        • Continuous Research
        • Upgrades in line with latest technology

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.

Our dream is to make our solution available to all parts of the world and help people tide over the thyroid dysfunction epidemic. We do not want others to suffer like we did over the last 10 years. We cannot make this happen overnight nor can we fulfill this dream without your support and contribution. We are positive you will join us in this journey to fight this epidemic worldwide. Every drop makes the ocean and we need to build an ocean to scale this solution and fulfill every individual’s dream.

Activities

Description

$

Increase Availability

Make the application available on different platforms. Today the application is available only on Android and we would like to extend the capabilities on other platforms like IOS, Windows, etc.

  75,000

Conduct Awareness and Educational Campaigns

Run awareness campaigns across regions and societies

  50,000

Enhance User Experience - Existing Application

Existing application - Enhance user experience. There is further scope to make the application user friendly and enhance ease of use

  50,000

Research in other associated diseases

We need to further research, analyze and enhance the application for functional problems like Diabetics, Hypertension, Cholesterol, Uric Acid, etc. and its interaction with Thyroid Dysfunction

  75,000

Grand Total

USD 250,000
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!

We need your support to enable us create awareness and take our solution to the masses worldwide. We would like to return your favor and equally reward you for your contribution on a best effort basis within our limited scope. The below table explains what we can do in return to your contribution in making a difference to the world.

You could earn a multiple between 1.25 to 2 times of your contribution that could be redeemed against the services you may avail through our app based solution.

Services and Charges:

SERVICES CHARGES CHARGES PER
REPORT - UNIQUE THYROID PROFILE, SELF-TREATMENT, ETC., $100 REPORT
CONSULTATION ON THE REPORT $125 SESSION
TRADITIONAL REIKI $50 SESSION
KARUNA REIKI $75 SESSION
HEALTH ASTROLOGY $50 PERSON

The list of contribution against available and applicable services is tabled below for your reference.

PAY REDEMPTION MULTIPLIER APPLICABLE SERVICES***
$1-$100 1.25 REPORT*
>$100 - $500 1.5 REPORT*, TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**
>$500-$1000 1.75 REPORT*, TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**, HEALTH ASTROLOGY**
>$1000 2 REPORT*, CONSULTATION ON REPORT**, TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**, HEALTH ASTROLOGY**
FIRST 250 CONTRIBUTORS >=$20 2.5 REPORT*, CONSULTATION ON REPORT**, TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**, HEALTH ASTROLOGY**

* MyHealth Thyroid APP   ** Book Consultation 72hrs prior     *** Duration Validity Applicable

  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

We agree our dream is too big because it tries to cover the entire planet, however one must realize and agree that this is the need of the hour. Depending on how much we are able to garner together with your support we will drive the funds towards sustaining what we have built so far and more importantly improve awareness and availability, educate people world over by penetrating in to more platforms.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.

750Mn people worldwide have been detected with Thyroid dysfunction, the remaining 90% of the population are undetected and at risk. You are likely to be mistaken if you thought you didn’t have Thyroid and therefore not at risk. It’s not widely known that Thyroid Dysfunction is potentially a major cause for Diabetics, Hypertension, Cholesterol, Uric Acid and high Creatinine levels. If that’s not enough of a problem, the lack of physicians is another growing concern. WHO reports that there is less than 1 physician for every 1000 people and a shortage of 4.3Mn healthcare staff globally. Our estimate is that to handle an epidemic of this complexity we will need at least 1 physician for every 200 people. The risk of awareness, detection and lack of physicians are posing a huge threat to our mankind and we have taken a pledge to take our solution to mankind and service them. We would also like to improve the detection rate with our symptom survey and self-test routine that is encoded in our mobile application solution – My Health Thyroid.

  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).

We attribute our success of treating 1000+ people using our integrated, holistic and computer aided approach wherein we combine and use the best of the lines of treatments available by first focusing on detection , accurate diagnosis and then ensuring treatment by controlling, reversing and ultimately stopping the dysfunction by fixing the root cause. By making an online application that helps detect, diagnose and treat has made our  journey towards our vision very easy.

  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Visit our website: http://www.myhealth.net.in/testimonials.html to know more about patient experience, from people who were either treated  for thyroid dysfunction or for problems leading to the dysfunction.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • In this journey, we are expecting challenges on the lines of mobile network availability, mobile platform penetration, and availability of diagnostics centers in the remote corners of the world. Our solution cannot take off until each one of you believes in us and our solution. Our thorough understanding of the looming challenges, experience and satisfaction of successfully treating 1000+ patients, supported by a strong integrated deep dive first of its kind solution makes us feel confident to earn your trust and support. We will begin with the prioritized list of activities we have shared earlier in this document once we garner the necessary funding that will be needed to fulfill our dream. With prioritized activities like expansion in to other platforms, continuous research to improve diagnostics, etc., we are confident and hopeful to tide over some of the risks, overcome challenges within the scope of the solution and serve humankind.
  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
    • Our passion and your Trust in us will make it happen.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.
    • A major milestone was achieved by building this app. Now making it available on other platforms and making it available to Billions of people is just matter of time.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We understand that everyone may not be able to contribute financially; but there are multiple ways to contribute without getting into debt. You can do your bit by doing as simple a task as spreading word about the Thyroid dysfunction, our solution – My Health Thyroid app and about our dream to serve humankind. Alternatively, you could refer them to visit our campaign page to know more about us, our endeavor, and your contribution. With the advent of so many social media applications like Facebook, Twitter etc., we hope and trust that you will put them to the best use in spreading the gospel. To make it easier in sharing information about this campaign we also recommend you to use the tools provided on the Indiegogo platform.

  TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**


>$500-$1000

  TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**, HEALTH ASTROLOGY**


>$1000

REPORT*,
  CONSULTATION ON REPORT**, TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**, HEALTH ASTROLOGY**


FIRST 250 CONTRIBUTORS >=$20

  CONSULTATION ON REPORT**, TRADITIONAL REIKI**, KARUNA REIKI**, HEALTH ASTROLOGY**


* MyHealth Thyroid APP   ** Book Consultation 72hrs prior     *** Duration Validity Applicable


Describe where the funds go if
     you don't reach your entire goal.

We agree our dream is too big because it tries
to cover the entire planet, however one must realize and agree that this is the
need of the hour. Depending on how much we are able to garner together with
your support we will drive the funds towards sustaining what we have built so
far and more importantly improve awareness and availability, educate people
world over by penetrating in to more platforms. 
The Impact
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people
know how the difference their contribution will make:

Explain why your project is
     valuable to the contributor and to the world.

750Mn people worldwide have been detected with Thyroid
dysfunction, the remaining 90% of the population are undetected and at
risk. You are likely to be mistaken if you thought you didn’t have Thyroid and therefore
not at risk. It’s not widely known that Thyroid Dysfunction is potentially a major cause for Diabetics, Hypertension, Cholesterol,
Uric Acid and high Creatinine levels. If that’s not enough of a problem, the
lack of physicians is another growing concern. WHO reports that there is less
than 1 physician for every 1000 people and a shortage of 4.3Mn healthcare
staff globally. Our estimate is that to handle an epidemic of this complexity
we will need at least 1 physician for every 200 people. The risk of awareness,
detection and lack of physicians are posing a huge threat to our mankind and we
have taken a pledge to take our solution to mankind and service them. We would
also like to improve the detection rate with our symptom survey and self-test routine
that is encoded in our mobile application solution – My Health Thyroid.
Point out your successful track
     record with projects like this (if you have one).

We attribute our success of treating 1000+ people using our integrated,
holistic and computer aided approach wherein we combine and use
the best of the lines of treatments available by first
focusing on detection , accurate diagnosis and then ensuring treatment by
controlling, reversing and ultimately stopping the dysfunction by fixing the
root cause. By making an online application that helps detect, diagnose and
treat has made our  journey towards our vision very easy.

Make it real for people and
     build trust.

Visit our website: http://www.myhealth.net.in/testimonials.html to know more about patient experience, from people who were either treated  for thyroid dysfunction or for problems leading to the dysfunction.
Risks & Challenges
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by
providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to
achieving your goal.
In this journey, we are expecting challenges on the
     lines of mobile network availability, mobile platform penetration, and
     availability of diagnostics centers in the remote corners of the world. Our
     solution cannot take off until each one of you believes in us and our
     solution. Our thorough understanding of the looming challenges, experience
     and satisfaction of successfully treating 1000+ patients, supported by a
     strong integrated deep dive first of its kind solution makes us feel confident
     to earn your trust and support. We will begin with the prioritized list of
     activities we have shared earlier in this document once we garner the
     necessary funding that will be needed to fulfill our dream. With prioritized
     activities like expansion in to other platforms, continuous research to
     improve diagnostics, etc., we are confident and hopeful to tide over some
     of the risks, overcome challenges within the scope of the solution and serve
     humankind.

Share what qualifies you to
     overcome these hurdles.

Our passion and your Trust in
      us will make it happen. 

Describe your plan for solving
     these challenges.

A major milestone was achieved
      by building this app. Now making it available on other platforms and making
      it available to Billions of people is just matter of time.  


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they
can't help:

We understand that everyone may
     not be able to contribute financially; but there are multiple ways to
     contribute without getting into debt. You can do your bit by doing as
     simple a task as spreading word about the Thyroid dysfunction, our
     solution – My Health Thyroid app and about our dream to serve humankind.
     Alternatively, you could refer them to visit our campaign page to know
     more about us, our endeavor, and your contribution. With the advent of so
     many social media applications like Facebook, Twitter etc., we hope and
     trust that you will put them to the best use in spreading the gospel. To
     make it easier in sharing information about this campaign we also
     recommend you to use the tools provided on the Indiegogo platform.

story:
Our Mission

Let's be honest, we all need a little help once in a while.  And while our promo video may have been a little over-dramatized to capture attention and make you laugh, we promise our product really works. Whether you are partying or parenting, traveling or over-working, life has a way of wearing us down... and the negative effects typically show on your face.  Dark circles, red/puffy eyes, washed out features, stress and fatigue lines all make us look unnecessarily bad.  Party Face is the pick-me-up you need to look refreshed and presentable anytime, anywhere!

Party Face was created by a perpetually tired and haggard looking dad and his board-certified dermatologist friend.  Both wanted a quick fix to help reduce the visual effects of sleep deprivation and stress, and they noticed they were not the only ones needing a solution.  

Party Face was created to help solve the "I look like crap" problem.

98% of test users saw a noticeable difference after using Party Face.  The immediate positive effects will help you look better and more refreshed for the rest of the day.  Made with 100% natural ingredients, Party Face achieves both long-term benefits while providing a short-term facial tune-up.  And unlike other options, Party Face is safe, natural and affordable.    

Here is what one of our test users had to say, "Party Face is like botox in a bottle...minus the needles and permanent surprised expressions."

 

Exclusive To IndieGoGo

We need your help taking Party Face to the next level!  We've spent serious time and money creating, testing, and perfecting the product, and IndieGoGo backers will be the first to experience the "drab to fab" benefits on a large scale.

For a limited time, Party Face is available for only $12 with FREE shipping which is almost HALF of what Party Face will cost to the general public ($19.95).

Helping you look great is the least we can do for your campaign support!

 

Ingredients

So what exactly are these "magical" ingredients?

OK, they're not technically magical, but looking good despite a hangover is pretty impressive! The 100% natural/vegan ingredients help improve your skin's appearance while fighting the effects of aging and other skin problems. 

These natural ingredients work in coordination to help refresh your skin and give you that natural glow... anytime, anywhere!  Use liberally and often.  

 

Your Impact

We need your help to reach our $30,000 funding goal in order to produce the first large scale batch of Party Face.  We've spent years in testing, now it's time to go big!

Creating safe, effective, and natural products isn't easy or cheap and your backing means a lot to us!  Stock up now while the price is discounted.  Trust us, this stuff comes in handy.     

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We've kept the campaign price very low to help make it affordable for everybody.  But, If you aren't able to donate, there are lots of ways financial and emotional supporters can help!

Spread the word by sharing the campaign video, posting on social media, and using the hashtags #partyfaceserum #drabtofab.  You can also post your "party face" photo on our instagram account @partyfaceserum.  Consumer products (at least the good ones) get shared and forwarded, so thanks for helping us help you look energized and refreshed! 

 

Beta Tester Before & Afters

story:
D.CristianFracassi

Ing. edile-architetto,PhD in materiali e master in economia, si occupa di tutto ciò che è INNOVAZIONE

We are a group of technology veterans used to fast-paced, high-volume manufacturing and business around the world. Our expertise is the creation, execution and delivery of new products at break-neck speeds. Our business goes from concept to volume production in only a few months. We invest for speed, because every day makes a difference.

We are too dependent on overseas sources for critical supplies such as disposable face masks. When there's a crisis, we're vulnerable. Look no further than the recent challenges caused by COVID-19

A startup 3D-printed emergency breathing valves for COVID-19 patients at an Italian hospital in less than 6 hours

WE ARE ABLE TO DELIVER DISPOSABLE SURGICAL MASKS (7.000 pieces/week) WITH YOUR DONATION 

We can help support frontline healthcare workers, communities, hospitals, shelters....  Please DONATE TODAY!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our company was started to support the needs of our local and national community by providing a quality disposable face mask at a reasonable price.  To help us meet that goal, we need your support. With your help, we can complete these next steps:

  • Build a safety stock of materials so that we're not at supply risk
  • Start production and get face masks to those that need them as soon as possible
  • Expand our capacity
  • Start FDA-approval immediately of a 2nd version of face masks designed for medical use*

What will the money be spent on?

The collected funds will be spent on the production of medical masks that are needed as a prevention of the Covid-19 pandemic:

  • Free distribution of masks near the lobbies of metro stations.
  • Free distribution of masks near the streets of the city for the poor and homeless.
  • Free distribution of masks to ordinary people.
  • This is necessary in order to avoid the spread of infections.
  • * Our ultimate objective is to increase the supply of masks to doctors and nurses battling coronavirus now. The FDA approval process is expensive and takes time. We need to start this right away, and we will be working to expedite the process as much as possible. In the mean time, our first product will be designed for personal use.

 

The Impact

We will start shipping face masks in April this year. With your support, we'll grow the supply and accelerate certification of our masks so we can achieve as much reach as possible. The impact will be two-fold:

  • More critical respirators will be available to the doctors and nurses that need them
  • The sooner we certify our masks with the FDA, the faster we will be able to increase the supply of masks to doctors, nurses, and dentists for medical use

Risks & Challenges

  • Shipping and freight interruptions may occur during the next weeks and months - your contributions go towards building a secure safety stock of all materials

Other Ways You Can Help

All contributions to this cause will help. Please spread the word! We are considering ways to accelerate certification with the FDA. As we make plans, we will inform our contributors and campaign followers how to help - please stay tuned.

story:
It's Time To Rise!

 

 

In the wake of COVID-19 people of all ages and backgrounds are now facing a hard reality that social distancing from family, friends, and community members may be a new norm.

 

Understandably, society is seeking solutions to ensure adults (16+) have access to solutions that will support their mental health during such time while they are isolated due to social distancing and lockdown  measures.  

 

People need and crave human connections and research has shown us why it is essential for our wellbeing. It is the core of how we as humans pass our wisdom and learning onto each other and is a vital aspect in maintaining a state of good mental & emotional health. 

 

 

Virtual Reality (VR) is the new specialized wellness and mental health tool. It allows anyone to connect and learn techniques and tools from Personal Growth and Wellness coaches that address anxiety, overcoming fears, rising above depression, and mindfulness practices that reduce stress from anywhere. 

 

At Beams of Light, we understand people of all ages seek an ongoing deeper relationship with the human teaching experiences that no phone or screen can replace.

 

That’s why we are developing a collection of immersive wellness virtual reality video experiences titled, “Rise Together”. It will allow adults (16+) with mild mental health issues to escape the confinement of their homes and step inside the highest quality wellness experiences with the use of a Oculus Go virtual reality headset. 

 

 

How Rise Together Works 

 

 

“Rise Together” is a collection of mindfulness and mental health virtual reality video experiences designed for adults (16+) suffering from stress, anxiety and mild depression caused by social distancing and self isolation .

 

These videos will be bundled into a virtual reality app that will allow users to easily choose from a range of wellness related subjects. These subjects are designed to help you cope with the effects of social distancing and COVID-19. 

 

 

The VR video experiences are divided into two groups.

The first group of VR experiences allows you to feel like you are having a one-on-one teaching experience with personal growth & wellness based experts. These experiences would cover topics such as how to cope with anxiety, overcoming fear, how to stay motivated as an entrepreneur, etc.

 

 

The second group of VR experiences to be included in the Rise Together VR app are mindfulness based experiences. These would focus on reducing stress and promote relaxation techniques by transporting you into the middle of some of North Americas most scenic and beautiful outdoor environments.

 

 

 

Rise Together is designed to be incredibly accessible and easy to use with no prior technical skills required. 

 

Using an Oculus Go VR headset (which we are including) , an adult (16+) suffering from mild mental health issues can simply download the Rise Together app from the Oculus VR app store and begin viewing multiple inspiring VR experiences centered around mental health & wellness at the touch of a button.

 

 

 

How It will Help Fight Covid-19?

 

 

The majority of the population are faced with the stresses of being out of work, parenting and schooling their children, and financial burdens which were not present prior to the COVID-19 pandemic. Also, pre-diagnosed mild to moderate mental health patients are more easily prone to stresses than the general population.  

 

Directly speaking, Rise Together is designed to aid in the positive mental health of adults (16+) suffering with increased anxiety, fears, and stresses due to a lack of social interaction or economic pressures caused by the COVID-19 pandemic.

 

 

Rise Together VR application will help you:

 

Reduce isolation by having instant access to wellness coaches and environments; 

Encourage maintenance of social distancing as people will be less tempted to go to public areas if they can access them through VR (we miss the real thing too but experts have shown this will help).

Experiences set in nature based settings offer additional health benefits such as:

increased immune function, lowered blood pressure, stress relief, improved academic success, etc.

Source: https://positivepsychology.com/benefits-of-mind...

https://www.mamanatural.com/forest-bathing/

 

 

What We Need To Make Rise Happen & What You Get

 

We need your help right now to make an awe inspiring virtual reality wellness & mental health app to help address the stress, anxiety and fear caused by Covid-19 and this is how we plan to use your contribution.   

 

PHASE 1 Funding

We currently have the initial app set up but would require the funds in this phase to pay for our content delivery system and media encoding software to allow streaming and downloading of the Rise Together VR experiences. Additionally, we are going to produce another half dozen mindfulness VR experiences to add to the existing content we have ready for you. This phase gets Rise Together in your hands asap.

 

PHASE 2 (Stretch Goal)

Our next funding goal after the initial rollout of Rise Together is to produce and add more content to the existing Rise Together VR platform and have our developers make some improvements on the app itself that would allow for a greater degree of personalization inside the app experience.

 

PHASE 3 (Stretch Goal)

We plan to use the funds raised in this phase to develop a website that can offer free online tools to help those undergoing stress and anxiety during self isolation. We want to use the website and funds to offer those most in need the ability to apply to receive unlimited access to Rise Together including a free VR headset shipped to their home (partnering with a social service/ non-profit is also considered). Lastly, We are going to have an independent neuro research study done using Rise Together to help us optimize and improve the app and make future content more effective.

https://pages.ikona.health/about_us

 

THIS FUNDRAISING EFFORT WILL CONCLUDE ON JUNE 3, 2020.

 

 

  1. All money raised will solely be used to fund the Rise Together VR wellness & mental health initiative.
  2. Any excess funding will be used to support people most in need of this content by offering VR headsets to experience Rise Together.
  3. Any shortfall in funding for Rise Together Will be made up by Beams of Light Virtual Reality.

We need you to make this happen… SO SHOW US THAT YOU’RE BEHIND US, SHOW YOUR SUPPORT AND CONTRIBUTE TO OUR CAMPAIGN. Become a Founding Member of this exciting new technology for wellness and mental health today!

 

We are offering a number of levels to support us, including:

 

Rise Together VR App Package $375 CAD

  • Unlimited access to Rise Together wellness & mental health VR experiences
  • Oculus Go VR headset Mailed to your preferred shipping address

 

One-off donation of $25 

  • Access to exclusive digital materials including behind the scenes making of Rise Together

 

One-off donation of $100

  • Show your support with your Rise Together T-shirt, Rise Together mug and exclusive digital materials

 

One-off donation of $250

  • Show your support for  with your Rise Together T-shirt and Rise Together mug 
  • Also includes exclusive digital matials
  • Submit your feedback and help design new tailored experiences that will best serve you and the people in need of Rise Together 

 

One-off donation of $1000

  • Be a major supporter of the Rise Together wellness & mental health platform
  • Includes the Rise Together VR app package
  • Includes all of the benefits listed above 
  • A very heartfelt personalized thank you message.

 

All prices shown above are listed in Canadian Dollars (CAD).

 

The Impact & Benefits Rise Together Can Have

 

Rise Together is poised to benefit a tremendous amount of people living in both urban and rural environments suffering various mild mental health concerns due to COVID-19.

 

Under normal conditions, urban residents tend to find being outdoors relaxing and a relief from the stresses of everyday urban life. Now that people are required to self-isolate and socially distance due to COVID-19, the mindfulness based outdoor experiences from this pilot project gives them the opportunity to experience the benefits of nature without the risk of leaving home. 

 

 

Studies have found outdoor mindfulness and nature bathing experiences help reduce stress, increase immune function, lower blood pressure, lower anxiety levels, reduce depression and suicidal thoughts.

 

Introducing the aspect of having one-on-one teaching experiences in VR with wellness coaches would add an aspect of emotional support and sense of social interaction for residents living in urban and especially rural environments.

 

 

A study published in Nature Neuroscience, “finds that social interactions can have a profound effect on behaviors related to addiction, and on the brain’s response to drug-associated cues. These findings have implications for people with substance use disorders (SUDs), because it suggests that social interaction can change the activity of specific neuronal circuits that control drug craving and relapse”.

Cited from https://www.drugabuse.gov/news-events/news-rele.... Accessed 24 Apr. 2020.

 

Rise Together VR experiences promotes social interaction to isolated individuals and offers a lifelike human teaching experience thanks to the immersive nature of virtual reality.

These experiences address essential mental health related subjects that people are facing due to social distancing such as how to cope with anxiety, overcoming fear, how to stay motivated as an entrepreneur and more.

 

 

Beams of Light virtual reality experiences uses a micro-learning teaching approach, meaning each lesson is under 10 minutes. This means Rise Together would allow you to avoid being overwhelmed with new information and absorb the information within the VR video experiences more easily.

 

By developing and housing the Rise Together video experiences into an easy to use VR application, people suffering from the constraints of lockdown can quickly leverage a dynamic set of wellness tools from the comfort of their home. Using a compact mobile VR device such as the Oculus GO VR headset requires no prior technical skills to get started.

 

Timeline On Delivery

 

 

 

Our Team

 

Beams of Light VR Founder and Rise Together Creator Ron Angelo

 

The team behind RISE TOGETHER is made up by a team of strategists, designers and visionaries who are on a mission to help people find their strength in the hardest of times.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Although there are VR video assets already developed, some production is still required. Weather can be a factor when filming virtual reality experiences outdoors and could potentially delay delivery in extreme circumstances.

 

The Rise Together app will need to be reviewed for quality and acceptance on the Oculus store. This is a standard process with all app store submissions, but should be taken into consideration.

 

Extreme care and craftsmanship is always put into any Beams of Light Virtual Reality production. With that being said, a small percentage of people who use virtual reality can find the 3D nature of the medium uncomfortable. This is common with VR experiences that introduce movement within the experience that the user does not control themselves (e.g. roller coaster, driving, etc.). This would not be the case with Rise Together because all of the experiences would be stationary (no camera movements).

 

Additionally, getting headsets shipped out to you will be contingent on the Oculus supply chain.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help Us Rise Together!

 

We are very grateful for all your support. We understand that some people just can't contribute to Rise Together but here's how they can help:

  • If you feel this campaign and the Rise Together VR app would benefit people you know, please help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Don't forget to share this on social media by using the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page.

 

Thank you in advance for your support and we look forward to Rising Together!
