Additionally, we are going to produce another half dozen mindfulness VR experiences to add to the existing content we have ready for you. This phase gets Rise Together in your hands asap.
 
PHASE 2 (Stretch Goal)
Our next funding goal after the initial rollout of Rise Together is to produce and add more content to the existing Rise Together VR platform and have our developers make some improvements on the app itself that would allow for a greater degree of personalization inside the app experience.
 
PHASE 3 (Stretch Goal)
We plan to use the funds raised in this phase to develop a website that can offer free online tools to help those undergoing stress and anxiety during self isolation. We want to use the website and funds to offer those most in need the ability to apply to receive unlimited access to Rise Together including a free VR headset shipped to their home (partnering with a social service/ non-profit is also considered). Lastly, We are going to have an independent neuro research study done using Rise Together to help us optimize and improve the app and make future content more effective.
https://pages.ikona.health/about_us
 
THIS FUNDRAISING EFFORT WILL CONCLUDE ON JUNE 3, 2020.
 

 

All money raised will solely be used to fund the Rise Together VR wellness & mental health initiative.
Any excess funding will be used to support people most in need of this content by offering VR headsets to experience Rise Together.
Any shortfall in funding for Rise Together Will be made up by Beams of Light Virtual Reality.

We need you to make this happen… SO SHOW US THAT YOU’RE BEHIND US, SHOW YOUR SUPPORT AND CONTRIBUTE TO OUR CAMPAIGN. Become a Founding Member of this exciting new technology for wellness and mental health today!
 
We are offering a number of levels to support us, including:
 
Rise Together VR App Package $375 CAD

Unlimited access to Rise Together wellness & mental health VR experiences
Oculus Go VR headset Mailed to your preferred shipping address

 
One-off donation of $25 
Access to exclusive digital materials including behind the scenes making of Rise Together
 
One-off donation of $100
Show your support with your Rise Together T-shirt, Rise Together mug and exclusive digital materials
 
One-off donation of $250

Show your support for  with your Rise Together T-shirt and Rise Together mug 
Also includes exclusive digital matials
Submit your feedback and help design new tailored experiences that will best serve you and the people in need of Rise Together 

 
One-off donation of $1000

Be a major supporter of the Rise Together wellness & mental health platform
Includes the Rise Together VR app package
Includes all of the benefits listed above 
A very heartfelt personalized thank you message.

 
All prices shown above are listed in Canadian Dollars (CAD).
 
The Impact & Benefits Rise Together Can Have

 
Rise Together is poised to benefit a tremendous amount of people living in both urban and rural environments suffering various mild mental health concerns due to COVID-19. Under normal conditions, urban residents tend to find being outdoors relaxing and a relief from the stresses of everyday urban life. Now that people are required to self-isolate and socially distance due to COVID-19, the mindfulness based outdoor experiences from this pilot project gives them the opportunity to experience the benefits of nature without the risk of leaving home. 
 
 Studies have found outdoor mindfulness and nature bathing experiences help reduce stress, increase immune function, lower blood pressure, lower anxiety levels, reduce depression and suicidal thoughts.
 
Introducing the aspect of having one-on-one teaching experiences in VR with wellness coaches would add an aspect of emotional support and sense of social interaction for residents living in urban and especially rural environments.
 

 
A study published in Nature Neuroscience, “finds that social interactions can have a profound effect on behaviors related to addiction, and on the brain’s response to drug-associated cues. These findings have implications for people with substance use disorders (SUDs), because it suggests that social interaction can change the activity of specific neuronal circuits that control drug craving and relapse”.
Cited from https://www.drugabuse.gov/news-events/news-rele.... Accessed 24 Apr. 2020.
 
Rise Together VR experiences promotes social interaction to isolated individuals and offers a lifelike human teaching experience thanks to the immersive nature of virtual reality.
These experiences address essential mental health related subjects that people are facing due to social distancing such as how to cope with anxiety, overcoming fear, how to stay motivated as an entrepreneur and more.
 


 
Beams of Light virtual reality experiences uses a micro-learning teaching approach, meaning each lesson is under 10 minutes. This means Rise Together would allow you to avoid being overwhelmed with new information and absorb the information within the VR video experiences more easily.
 
By developing and housing the Rise Together video experiences into an easy to use VR application, people suffering from the constraints of lockdown can quickly leverage a dynamic set of wellness tools from the comfort of their home. Using a compact mobile VR device such as the Oculus GO VR headset requires no prior technical skills to get started.
 
Timeline On Delivery
 

 
 
Our Team
 

Beams of Light VR Founder and Rise Together Creator Ron Angelo
 
The team behind RISE TOGETHER is made up by a team of strategists, designers and visionaries who are on a mission to help people find their strength in the hardest of times.
 

 

Risks & Challenges
 
Although there are VR video assets already developed, some production is still required. Weather can be a factor when filming virtual reality experiences outdoors and could potentially delay delivery in extreme circumstances. The Rise Together app will need to be reviewed for quality and acceptance on the Oculus store. This is a standard process with all app store submissions, but should be taken into consideration. Extreme care and craftsmanship is always put into any Beams of Light Virtual Reality production. With that being said, a small percentage of people who use virtual reality can find the 3D nature of the medium uncomfortable. This is common with VR experiences that introduce movement within the experience that the user does not control themselves (e.g. roller coaster, driving, etc.). This would not be the case with Rise Together because all of the experiences would be stationary (no camera movements). Additionally, getting headsets shipped out to you will be contingent on the Oculus supply chain.
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help Us Rise Together!
 

We are very grateful for all your support. We understand that some people just can't contribute to Rise Together but here's how they can help:

If you feel this campaign and the Rise Together VR app would benefit people you know, please help get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
Don't forget to share this on social media by using the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page.

 Thank you in advance for your support and we look forward to Rising Together!

story:
Hi!

My name is Dr. Jeremy Miller and I am starting this campaign to create an environment that promotes healing, wellness, and vitality. As a doctor, health and wellness are of the utmost importance to me yet physicians and patients alike are bogged down in a system that doesn't promote health or wellness. I want to give people control over their health and access to science-based therapeutics to work towards curing their problem, not masking symptoms.

I am tired of hearing my patients tell me they have been in pain for decades. I am tired of people depending on a pill to get better when all they get is addicted. Using science, I have envisioned a health spa that promotes health and healing at the cellular level.

I find that most of my patients have TOO LITTLE nutrition, TOO MUCH inflammation, and an INABILITY for the body to use its normal metabolic processes to heal injured cells and tissue. This creates a cascade of worsening problems.

By using science-based therapeutics, Thrive is designed to enhance the bodies nutritional deficiencies through IV vitamin infusions, decrease inflammation with cryotherapy, and promote cellular growth with various low-light/cold-laser therapeutics.

Furthermore, we know its easier to keep people well then to fix them all over again. That is why this spa will promote continued wellness and preventative care so people can enjoy life more. THRIVE is designed with people in mind, not pocketbooks, and it is my hope that you will join me on this journey.

 

Why IV Vitamin Infusions

It is estimated that 92% of the US population has a vitamin deficiency. Numerous factors contribute to this but two big reasons are the quality of our food and the quality of our soil. Fast food and junk food are staples of the American diet while fresh, nutrient-rich foods are considered time-consuming, expensive, and are seen as a luxury rather than a standard. 

Multiple studies dating back to 1936 have shown that the soil of farmland across the globe is deficient in micronutrients. In 2003, a Canadian research team compared the nutritional data of current vegetables to data from 50 years ago and found that the mineral content had depleted from an average of 400 milligrams to less than 50 milligrams. 

FACTS:

  • 90% of Adults are Vitamin D and/or Vitamin E deficient
  • 60% are deficient in Magnesium
  • 50% have a Vitamin A and/or a Calcium deficient
  • 40% have a Vitamin C deficiency 

Being deficient in Vitamin D can result in obesity, diabetes, high blood pressure, depression, fibromyalgia, fatigue, as well as contribute to diseases like Alzheimer's and can increase the chances of developing some cancers. It is an epidemic that is ignored.

Having vitamin deficiencies can affect your mood, your nervous system, your blood, your immune system, and so much more.

IV VITAMIN INFUSION BENEFITS:

  • Near 100% vitamin absorption compared to a 50% absorption rate of oral vitamins
  • No nausea or GI irritation associated with oral vitamins
  • Energy boost
  • Increased metabolism
  • Improved mood and memory
  • Strengthened immune system
  • Enhanced cellular repair and wound healing
  • And so much more!!!

We plan to offer 14 IV Infusion blends to meet a variety of health needs!

It's Hot to be Subzero!

Developed in the 1970s and used in hospitals, athletic centers, and spas worldwide, immersive whole-body cryotherapy involves exposing the body to sub-zero temperatures for 2-3 mins to promote a plethora of healing effects. Cold air therapy in the whole body chamber is dry, fresh, oxygenated air so you won’t experience shivering, goosebumps or other reactions that you might associate with being cold. Because of this technology, unlike an ice bath or immersion therapy, whole body cryotherapy is not painful.

BENEFITS:

  • Increased circulation and lymphatics
  • Improved collagen production
  • Reduced inflammation
  • Increased energy
  • Increased metabolism
  • Decreased pain
  • Flushes toxins
  • Improved joint and tissue range of motion

Research has shown that whole-body cryotherapy reduces inflammation, improves spinal pain/arthritis (here and here), can lead to better sleep, improve cognitive function, improves pain and quality of life in patients with fibromyalgia (here and here) and reduces muscle pain and improves muscle recovery.

We are partnering with US Cryotherapy to bring the latest and safest cryotherapy to the Tampa region.

 

 
 

To the Future with Light, Laser, and PEMF

Since 1960 and the discovery of lasers, light-therapy and other electromagnetic waves have been used to treat ailments of the body.  The use of light and EM waves to heal tissue, termed photobiomodulation, has over 4000 clinical studies published and has scientifically shown to be effective in treat nerve pain, muscle pain, promote tissue growth, and enhance wound healing. Photobiomodulation clinical has short, medium, and long-term effects which speeds up the body's ability to heal itself. 

FDA approved CELLUMA light therapy uses NASA technology and three types of light to enhance cellular reactions to increase collagen production, kill surface bacteria, increase circulation, decrease inflammation, and infuse compromised cells with added energy to enhance cellular performance and repair.

 

We are made up of nearly 100 TRILLION cells, and each cell is connected to the body's life force, the blood, via microvessels (capillaries). Microvessels makeup 74% of all the blood vessels in our bodies and if this vast network of microvessels were lined up in a straight line it would be 74,000 miles long. That is enough to wrap around the globe three times!

Impaired microcirculation can lead to a build-up of cellular waste and an inability to deliver fresh nutrients to the tissues as well as other vital components such as hormones and white blood cells. This can lead to inflammation, toxicity, and disease.

 

 

BEMER is the perfect companion to compliment and maximize benefits from IV nutritional infusions or whole body cryotherapy. It has hundreds of published research papers, including studies that support BEMER as a treatment option for relieving pain and enhancing the quality of life. 

These are just a portion of the services Thrive plans to offer.  As we grow we plan to offer hormone replacement therapy, full spectrum blood panel testing, allergen testing, dietary and nutritional counseling, clean living coaching, and more. Our clinic will be supervised by a medical director and staffed by a team of nurses, therapists, and other professionals including a nurse practitioner, all of whom are dedicated to health, wellness, and vitality. 

 

Mock Floor Plan 2800 sqft

The Where

We are currently planning on opening in Pinellas County in the new Seminole City Center location. Secondary and tertiary locations are also being considered. 

Pinellas County has the highest density of any county in Florida and boasts a population nearing 1 million. Seminole City Center is a new, upscale development that is already busy with shoppers and includes businesses promoting health and wellness such as Earth Fare Grocery Store, LA Fitness, a chiropractic office, and a massage center. Seminole is home to the Bay Pines Veteran Hospital with over 100,000 patient visits annually. Seminole is home to hundreds of businesses dedicated to senior health. This location is also easily accessible to the rest of Pinellas County.

  • 450K+ people within an estimated 20-minute drive
  • The immediate area features approximately 90K people with a college degree and 70K+ households with over $50K in income
  • 80,000 vehicles per day pass by
  • 36k estimated tourist population annual in the area

 

Risks & Challenges

This project has been over 12 months in the making.  The hours I have put into it are countless and I am not alone. I have partnered with a small group of Tampa Bay doctors to work towards making this dream a reality. We have met with various commercial developers, vendors, manufacturers, and financers and we believe we are nearing the finish line. 

Despite all of our hard work and preparation, we know that opening any business is a risky endeavor. Site-build out delays could happen, private investor financing could fall through, our vendors may not be able to meet deadlines, hiring and training new staff can be a challenge, and so forth. We do believe our business plan is solid and will guide us through this process.

I am linking a PDF overview of our original business plan proposal. Some information is missing or redacted due to privacy concerns and trade secret protection but I want you to not only know we have a plan but to be able to see our plan and how much work we have put into this project. 

DISCLAIMER: This business plan is not final and information such as pricing for our services may change. The information enclosed is the sole property of Jeremy Miller and all information is private and copyrighted.

MY PROMISE to all backers and supports is this: if we are unable to launch. I will refund your contributions 100%. I want people to believe in this project and do so risk-free. I promise to stay active during and after the campaign to provide updates and information.

 

How else can you help?

EASY! Share this campaign on social media, follow us on facebook, and tell people we are coming!

story:
Short Summary

We are opening an indoor golf facility with full swing golf simulators. We will have 4 full swing golf sims and 4 driving range sims. We will also have a pro shop, an indoor putting green, and a bar serving beer and wine. We are still working out the food details but there will also be food and beverages. Ever wanted to play golf at night? How about when it's raining outside or too cold or too hot? Don't want to miss the game to play a round? Don't have 4-5 hours to play golf? Tired of losing $5 golf balls and hunting for your ball all day long? I have the answers to all of these issues with golf. We are open at night. The weather is always great inside. We have TV's playing the sports you want to watch. 1 person can play golf in about 45 minutes on the simulators. If you can't find your ball here, golf may not be for you. Mahony's Indoor Golf solves all of the problems that cause people to not play enough golf. We are not competing with golf courses, we are providing a place to play golf for when getting to the golf course isn't possible.

What We Need & What You Get

We need seed money while we wait for the financing to go through. The current plan is to open sometime between November 2016 and February 2017. We are looking for seed money to start advertising and buying merchandise.

The rewards for donations are just what they say. I am selling simulator time on the golf simulators and merchandise ahead of time at a discounted price. All gift cards will be available at the store once we open for anyone that purchases them. Just bring ID to show who you are and you will receive your reward. Financing has already been approved for the store, however we are still looking at the possibility of an investor, with a few potentials in mind. With that said, if for some reason, the store does not open, We will refund the money donated back to each individual except for the 1 dollar donations.

Risks & Challenges

The challenge for us right now is getting a suitable building in a location that will work. The rent has not been the issue, finding something that we want has been. We are confident that we will have a building within the next couple of months so I can update this part and eliminate any concerns about that.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate, please share this post. Even if I don't get a dime, getting the word out to everyone about this company is the #1 goal. It will open with or without donations, this is being used to generate buzz and get a head start on the tasks at hand. If this just turns out to be great advertising, then half the battle has already been won. Thank you.

story:
Welcome to the Turmoil’s IndieGoGo page!

There is a reason why report after report talks about how Ultimate Frisbee is one of the fastest growing team sports in the country. Each year, thousands of new people begin playing this great sport. One simple reason so many athletes start playing, it’s fun.

Turmoil is a Mixed Club team bringing together great ultimate players in the Mississippi area.

Unfortunately, Ultimate Frisbee isn’t cheap and with no funding the tournament costs will come directly from the players themselves.

We need your help to advance our program and bring our team to the next level.

Where The Funds Go

·  Revisable Tanks/ Jerseys: $750

May 21st Monkeybowl (Nashville)

·  Bid Fee: $350

·  Hotel for 20 people: $360

June 25th Huckfest (Decatur)

·  Bid Fee: $400

·  Hotel for 20 people: $360

July 2nd Shawn Adams (Chattanooga)

·  Bid Fee: $350

·  Hotel for 20 people: $360

July 23 Meltdown (Jackson)

·  Bid Fee: $350

·  Hotel for 20 people: $360

August 27 Sectionals (Tupelo)

·  Bid Fee: $350

·  Hotel for 20 people: $360

Total: $ 4,350

The Impact

For the players on the team, Ultimate Frisbee is their absolute passion. Most of us try to get summer jobs just to cover our Ultimate Frisbee expenses alone.

For us, Ultimate Frisbee is our way of playing the sport we love with some of our best friends. Every Turmoil player is involved with the Mississippi Ultimate community in some way and only wants to see it thrive into something bigger and better. So by helping our team, you are helping the Ultimate Frisbee program as a whole.

Your donation will help to ensure that Turmoil can be apart of the elite level tournaments, regardless of funds and allow the players to concentrate on their game rather than their wallets

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t have the funds to help us out? No worries!

Could you please share this campaign with your family and friends through email, Facebook, Twitter, or word of mouth?

Follow us on Twitter and Like our Facebook page please!

If you would like to discuss a more formal sponsorship, assist us in another way, or get more details about Turmoil, please contact us at Turmoilultimate@gmail.com 

Thanks Fam

players to concentrate on their game rather than their wallets
Other Ways You Can
Help
Don’t have the
funds to help us out? No worries!
Could you please share this campaign with your family and
friends through email, Facebook, Twitter, or word of mouth?
Follow us on Twitter and Like our Facebook page please! 
If you would like to discuss a more
formal sponsorship, assist us in another way, or get more details about
Turmoil, please contact us at Turmoilultimate@gmail.com 
Thanks Fam

story:
FIRST PRODUCT BY C'AMOUR EXCLUSIVELY ON THIS INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

WATER-BASED, NON-GREASY, HIGH-PERFORMANCE SERUM FOR ALL SKIN TYPES that fights against acne, evens skin tone, radiates your complexion and tightens skin.





SECOND PRODUCT BY C'AMOUR EXCLUSIVELY ON THIS INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

MATTE FINISH, NON-GREASY, HIGH-PERFORMANCE ANTI-AGING HYBRID MOISTURIZER FOR ALL SKIN TYPES


                                

      




THIRD PRODUCT BY C'AMOUR EXCLUSIVELY ON THIS INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN
WATER-RETAINER, HYDRATING, YOUTH REVIVAL AND SKIN TONE RETOUCH NATURAL EXTRACT SLEEPING MASK


                                     






The innocence of our childhood is shattered by disappointments, hurts, breakups, betrayals, loss, and other negative events. C'AMOUR wants to redefine beauty in an industry that has been commonly associated with vanity. There is real beauty in caring for one another in this ugly reality. And we know that deep down in everyone of us is a real desire to be loved, appreciated, cared and understood. C'AMOUR want you to help us launch this social media campaign that brings hope and love back into our world. We know you care and we care for you too. We want to surprise people in need with the gift of love. And it all starts with you. 
SO WE WANT TO THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR HELPING US THIS SOCIAL CAUSE. C'AMOUR CARES.


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT. IF YOU LIKE OUR BRAND, KINDLY SPREAD THE WORD AROUND ABOUT OUR CAMPAIGN. WE APPRECIATE YOUR HELP IMMENSELY. 


VISIT US AT www.camourbeauty.com.

story:
BG:

Кратка история 

Казвам се Александър Сръндев, на 20 години от София. Национален състезател съм по триатлон и лека атлетика от 2012 година. Имам редица международни състезания зад гърба си.

 

В момента главна цел ми е да мотивирам възможно повече подрастващите в България за по-активен начин на живот.

Имам редица международни състезания зад гърба си. Държа титли като държавен, балкански,

 

двоен вицеевропейски шампион (младежи - 2016г. и мъже до 23г. - 2017г.) , както и 33-то място при младежи на световното първенство по планинско бягане през 2016г. 
Стремя се да мотивирам подрастващите за по-активен начин на живот.
Главна цел ми е участие и добър резултат на Олимпийските игри в Токио 2020 година.

В последните години доказах на себе си и хората около мен, че съм достатъчно талантлив и трудолюбив, за да успея да взема участие на олимпиада някой ден. 

От началото на 2018 година всички състезатели по триатлон от целия свят ще се впуснат в 3 годишна борба за точки от световни купи, серии и първенства. Аз имам реални шансове за влизане в ранглистата и взимане на квота за Олимпиадата до лятото на 2020 година. 

От 2 години насам Българска Федерация по Триатлон не получава финансиране, за да може да подготви най-добрите български атлети и те да имат равен шанс като всички останали състезатели от другите страни, да премерят сили един срещу друг. За жалост първенствата, от които може да се вземат нужните точки са разпръснати из целия свят и е невъзможно без финансова подкрепа да се участва на тях!

Този проект ще бъде реализиран единствено и само, чрез намиране на финансиране. Треньорите ми помагат максимално и са ме издигнали на световно ниво, но въпреки това трябва да се наеме още екип, който да ме следи постоянно.

Интересен факт е, че българин до сега не е взимал участие в олимпийските игри и ако аз успея ще пренапиша историята!

Този проект няма да се реализира без вашата помощ!

EN:

Short Summary

My name is Alexander Srandev and I am bulgarian national athlete competing in triathlon and track and field.

I compete since 2011 and from this moment by now a days I am national champion in triathlon, duathlon, aquathlon, cross country running and mountain running, balkan champion in triathlon, duathlon and cross duathlon. I am also vice European champion in cross duathlon in junior 2016 and in men U23 2017. From last year I became national champion in two different sports in elite men.

From the begging of 2018, all triathletes from all over the world will start 3-yearcollection of points from European and World Championship, Cups and Series. I have real chances to enter the ranking and take a quota for the Olympics by the summer of 2020.

Currently, the Bulgarian Triathlon Federation does not receive funding to prepare the best Bulgarian athletes and we don't have the same chance as all other competitors from other countries.

This project will only be realized by finding funding.

EN:
Short Summary
My name is Alexander Srandev and I am bulgarian national athlete competing in triathlon and track and field.
I compete since 2011 and from this moment by now a days I am national champion in triathlon, duathlon, aquathlon, cross country running and mountain running, balkan champion in triathlon, duathlon and cross duathlon. I am also vice European champion in cross duathlon in junior 2016 and in men U23 2017. From last year I became national champion in two different sports in elite men.


From the begging of 2018, all triathletes from all over the world will start 3-yearcollection of points from European and World Championship, Cups and Series. I have real chances to enter the ranking and take a quota for the Olympics by the summer of 2020.
Currently, the Bulgarian Triathlon Federation does not receive funding to prepare the best Bulgarian athletes and we don't have the same chance as all other competitors from other countries.

This project will only be realized by finding funding.

story:
A brand built on community. I am constantly speaking to my beauty community about the products they need me to create and since the very beginning foundations have been a recurring request. 

Diversity is deeper than skin tone. An area of diversity that people don't really talk about is price point. So as well as creating a high quality product it is important to me to that my foundations are affordable. 

                     

The MDMflow Flawless Base foundation is a  serum based formula,  formulated to work on all skin types. It gives a light yet build-able coverage, so you can go for a naturally flawless look or build up to full coverage. I have selected over 16 colours for the range and every single person that backs the campaign will receive a colour matching kit to find their perfect match. 

Creatine – Boosts the metabolism of the skin cells that help produce collagen, elastin and keratin.

Vitamin C – Protects the skin against UVB damage and reduces the formation of acne.

Resveraterol – Anti-oxidant that protects against the early signs of skin ageing and against   environmental pollutants.

Hyaluronic Acid – Improves skin’s barrier function reinforcing the skin’s natural short and long   term moisturisation.

 

 

I studied A Levels in Biology, Chemistry and Art & Design. A career in Pharmacy was quickly swapped for something beauty related after landing my first job on a beauty counter at 18.

After seeing a video on youtube of cosmetic science students at the London College of Fashion  formulating foundations, last minute I made a passionate application for the BSc (Hons) Cosmetic Science.  I sent a letter and personal statement to every email address associated with the course explaining that I'd finally found my calling. I then called the department to  triple check they'd gotten my application albeit past the deadline.  Eventually I was invited down for an interview and I got offered a place on the course on the spot. There I learnt skills specific to the cosmetics industry such as research and development, product manufacturing, marketing, technical sales, product testing, quality assurance, logistics, regulation and legislation. I also completed a 12-month placement in Antwerp, Belgium, working as a marketing assistant for cosmetic ingredient supplier Kreglinger.

During my time at London College of Fashion, I worked part time as a beauty retail associate and was exposed to several luxury brands. While working for these other brands I became obsessed with a particular niche in the market. Established make-up giants weren’t experimenting with new technology, and they weren’t producing exciting and inclusive colour palettes that worked on black and Asian skin. So when I graduated from LCF, I decided to establish my own brand, MDMflow.

Since launching MDMflow I have also had the opportunity to take the MDMflow ethos into other areas. I teamed up with EDF Energy on a campaign to address the lack of women in science and to promote STEM careers to school girls across the UK, and I was selected as a UN Mentor for International Day of the Girl Child. I am extremely passionate about promoting diversity in the beauty industry as well as increasing the numbers of women in STEM careers.

 

 

✨NEW✨ - Byrdie UK MDMflow Is Creating a New Foundation, and the Product Developer Is You

✨NEW✨ - Forbes MDMflow Is Building A Beauty Brand To Flatter All Skin Shades

✨NEW✨ - KNOTORYUS MDMflow set to develop affordable foundations for all skin tones

✨NEW✨ - Spell Magazine Hold the phone - MDMflow now do foundation

✨NEW✨ - The Debrief MDMflow launches inclusive new make up

✨NEW✨ - The Telegraph Women Mean Business campaign

✨NEW✨ - Trend hunter MDMflow's Multitasking Flawless Base Foundation Flatters All​

✨NEW✨ - Glamour UK We got to preview MDMflow's new foundation and we were SO impressed

✨NEW✨ - Irish Times New foundation for around a tenner aims to be best on market

✨NEW✨ - The Pool Young black girls are still having the same experiences I did as a teenager buying make-up

 "If there’s one thing to take away from Florence’s story it’s her stick-to-it-iveness proving the age-old adage that if you can dream it, you can do it."  (source)

 

"Her small-batch process has allowed for happy accidents of the kind unlikely to pass muster at a big cosmetics company." (source)

“A new brand designed especially for black skin is part of a diverse make-up revolution” (source)

story:
In a world where the “future is today”, I am determined to come forward with a daring project to which I truly wish you become a part, to support me in its implementation and to enjoy the success with me. EGO Smart watch goes beyond the limits of innovation, incorporating the most recent technologies, the best materials, an exquisite and remarkable design so that everybody will envy you. 

I designed EGO Smart watch so that it becomes an extension of you, of your thoughts, actions and dreams, so that anytime and with promptitude, it will make your wishes come true by only  making a simple gesture or uttering just one word. 

                                                UNISEX DESIGN

                                            conceived for any moment of the day

Ego is a watch that you can wear it with any outfit: whether you have a business meeting, you go to work, for jogging, to a pub or to a fancy party, to take an exam or merely go on a vacation.

                         MATCH YOUR DISPLAY

                                             by a single gesture

What’s your mood? Are you today in a mood for something classic, heavy, discrete or soft? You may choose the theme and you can enjoy the new look perfectly adjusted to your mood or wish.

If you do not want to blend in with the other persons and you want to be different and to live your life just as you wish and imagine, we have especially designed Ego Desert Rose model. This is a limited edition product. 

             HOW DID IT START?    

                      When you have a dream, dare to accomplish it! 


We live in a world where time is money. We commit ourselves to projects for which we spend time in order to be effective, thus we see ourselves compelled to simplify some things. This is how the idea of developing the watch concept emerged, a watch designed to facilitate our access to information or to elements of interest, aiming to satisfy our desire for convenience. It is an accessory easy to wear, polyvalent and which may provide us all the benefits of technology that, once we could enjoy only within an office. 

We need technology, we need the dialogue, but we also need that these may take place whenever, wherever and more important, easily. You may receive emails, messages, check your agenda or even answer your calls on the street, on the metro or behind the wheel, on your way home. 

          

        PERFECT COMPATIBILITY

                                                               with your phone

          We care about our health condition, we are more than eager to improve it, to monitor it and Ego smart watch takes care to collect all the data of interest and to provide you the essential information on its own display or even directly on your cell phone.


Ego synchronises with the notifications of the applications set up on your cell phone. Thus, you may find on time the news, what have your friends been doing lately or even get an invitation to an event, you may have conversations or share in real time pictures, movies on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp and on the other social networks. 

This function will help you anytime to quickly find your lost phone. You also have the possibility of setting your smart watch to inform you whenever you will move away for more than 10 m of your smart phone. 


Ego thought of all those who love and wish to keep alive their memories from holidays, special moments spent with friends or family. It is simple, convenient and no longer necessary to run in order to be a part of the picture, without missing a picture! No need to stretch your arms in order to take a picture. 

Fitted with Bluetooth connection, Ego ensures you the comfort of having everything under control without having to use all the communication devices. 

We understood that your desire is to have a resistant watch, which may be worn anytime and anywhere. We took into account the active lifestyle and the need of independence. The battery life lasts even for 9 days, with a display conceived according to the latest technology and with delicate lines that ensure it a posh design, Ego makes you live a unique experience.

                                              DETAIL-ORIENTED

Ego was designed to have an ergonomic shape, a small quantity, a friendly design in order to be more comfortable and easy to use. With a case and its whole frame made of stainless steel, non-allergic, resistant to any environmental factors, Ego smart watch is a long-lasting, strong and indestructible watch. 

We are aware that people love to have the freedom of choosing. Ego did not neglect your wish!

By its metallic and leather straps, Ego may anytime change its look. You have the possibility of adopting a fancy style with the metallic straps or a casual look when choosing the leather straps. You may also adjust the theme of the display as you consider it best suits you and you will definitely smile all day long!


                              DO YOU NEED MORE INFORMATION?


Because you are important in this successful project, everything takes place thanks to your support, therefore be among the first ones who will get to enjoy Ego!

                           PERKS

                                                       


                                  TRUST AND TRANSPARENCY

We have a complete confidence in our team and our ability to successfully made this product.We have an experienced team, very skilled and we are absolutely confident that we can ship Ego Smartwatch according to our timeline.We understand that are few risks associated with the launch of any brand new technology to the market, but we are convinced that in our case these are very minimal. We  believe in a transparent project management approach and we have decided to inform all our backers on a regular basis about the progress made during the production phase.Some specifications are subject to change by the progress in development .


                   WE ARE DIRECTLY LIABLE FOR OUR FUTURE

                                                thus, it is best to wisely plan it! 


               


                                Thank you for being a part of my dream!

I want to thank you all who support me, to the persons with whom I share the excitement of developing this wonderful and innovating concept, but also to those who distribute this campaign in the social media, providing me thus their assistance. Each beginning becomes less harder when there are persons who support and believe in you!


FAQs:

1) Is the watch delivered with 2 straps?

Yes. The watch shall be delivered with a metallic strap and with a black leather strap.

2) Is the strap adjustable?

Yes, you may adjust the strap till it becomes comfortable for your wrist.

3) Can I change the strap of the watch by myself?

Yes. It is very simple. This way you may enjoy a new aspect of the watch by simply changing the strap. 

4) Is it a backlight watch?

Yes. Shake the watch and the screen will light up.

5) How do I choose the colour of the watch?

Carefully select the name of the watch you want and you will definitely receive exactly what you chose.

6) If I choose several perks, will these be delivered to different addresses?

Unfortunately, not. We will deliver all perks to the same address.

7) If I do not get the reward, may I claim my donation back?

You should not forget that you supported a project and we assure you of all our gratitude and we do our best to reward you with the perk you chose. We apologize if any issue could occur during the delivery and we will try to solve the issue as soon as possible.

8) What happens with the funds raised?

The entire amount of money will be used for research, development and production.

9) Will there be designed other Ego models?

Yes, this is only the beginning.

10) Why is Ego Desert Rose a limited edition?

We are aware that people need to feel special on certain occasions.

11) Do you deliver all over the world?

Yes. We have already had discussions with an important logistics company operating worldwide which will handle all deliveries in a professional manner.

12) Which languages does it recognize?

Ego recognizes 9 languages: English, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Polish, Turkish.

13) If I choose to have delivered 2 watches at the same address, how much does the delivery cost?

Choose the Ego Due perk and the delivery will cost you as if you ordered one single smart watch.

14) If I want to buy 2 watches, may I pay additionally using the same perk?

No. If you want you may choose Ego Due perk or if you opt for another combination of 2 watches, you have to chosoe them by making different orders. 

15) Will the delivery of Ego smart watch face any issue in countries such as Germany, Italy or other EU countries?

No, we cooperate with a first-class logistics company which provides global deliveries and we have obtained all necessary documents. 

16) Will VAT be added for EU countries?

The additional fees perceived by the countries where you live shall be covered by us.

17) If I want to buy the accessories, can I do it by means of one single contribution?

 Unfortunately, you will have to pay 2 different contributions, but the accessories are exempted of delivery payment.

18) If I have any other questions, to whom may I address?

For any other further questions or suggestions, you may mention them by writing us an email at: ego.smart.tech@gmail.com or by accessing the contact box on INDIEGOGO platform.
story_txt:
In a world where the “future is today”,
I am determined to come forward with a daring project to which I truly wish you
become a part, to support me in its implementation and to enjoy the success
with me. EGO Smart watch goes beyond the limits of innovation, incorporating
the most recent technologies, the best materials, an exquisite and remarkable
design so that everybody will envy you. 
I designed EGO Smart watch so that it
becomes an extension of you, of your thoughts, actions and dreams, so that
anytime and with promptitude, it will make your wishes come true by only  making a simple gesture or uttering just one
word. 





                                                UNISEX DESIGN

                                            conceived for any moment of the day


Ego is a watch
that you can wear it with any outfit: whether you have a business meeting, you
go to work, for jogging, to a pub or to a fancy party, to take an exam or
merely go on a vacation.
                         MATCH YOUR DISPLAY
                                             by a single gesture


What’s your
mood? Are you today in a mood for something classic, heavy, discrete or soft?
You may choose the theme and you can enjoy the new look perfectly adjusted to
your mood or wish.



If you do not
want to blend in with the other persons and you want to be different and to
live your life just as you wish and imagine, we have especially designed Ego Desert
Rose model. This is a limited edition product. 
             HOW DID IT START?    
                      When you have a dream, dare to accomplish it! 





We live in a
world where time is money. We commit ourselves to projects for which we spend
time in order to be effective, thus we see ourselves compelled to simplify some
things. This is how the idea of developing the watch concept emerged, a watch designed
to facilitate our access to information or to elements of interest, aiming to
satisfy our desire for convenience. It is an accessory easy to wear, polyvalent
and which may provide us all the benefits of technology that, once we could enjoy
only within an office. 


We need technology, we need the dialogue, but we also
need that these may take place whenever, wherever and more important, easily.
You may receive emails, messages, check your agenda or even answer your calls
on the street, on the metro or behind the wheel, on your way home. 













          
        PERFECT COMPATIBILITY
                                                               with your phone






          We care about
our health condition, we are more than eager to improve it, to monitor it and
Ego smart watch takes care to collect all the data of interest and to provide
you the essential information on its own display or even directly on your cell phone.
















Ego synchronises
with the notifications of the applications set up on your cell phone. Thus, you
may find on time the news, what have your friends been doing lately or even get
an invitation to an event, you may have conversations or share in real time
pictures, movies on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp and on the other
social networks. 













This function will help you anytime to quickly find
your lost phone. You also have the possibility of setting your smart watch to
inform you whenever you will move away for more than 10 m of your smart phone. 







Ego thought
of all those who love and wish to keep alive their memories from holidays,
special moments spent with friends or family. It is simple, convenient and no
longer necessary to run in order to be a part of the picture, without missing a
picture! No need to stretch your arms in order to take a picture. 




Fitted with
Bluetooth connection, Ego ensures you the comfort of having everything under
control without having to use all the communication devices. 




We understood
that your desire is to have a resistant watch, which may be worn anytime and
anywhere. We took into account the active lifestyle and the need of
independence. The battery life lasts even for 9 days, with a display conceived
according to the latest technology and with delicate lines that ensure it a
posh design, Ego makes you live a unique experience.



                                              DETAIL-ORIENTED
Ego was
designed to have an ergonomic shape, a small quantity, a friendly design in
order to be more comfortable and easy to use. With a case and its whole frame
made of stainless steel, non-allergic, resistant to any environmental factors,
Ego smart watch is a long-lasting, strong and indestructible watch. 
We are aware that people love to have the freedom of
choosing. Ego did not neglect your wish!
By its
metallic and leather straps, Ego may anytime change its look. You have the
possibility of adopting a fancy style with the metallic straps or a casual look
when choosing the leather straps. You may also adjust the theme of the display
as you consider it best suits you and you will definitely smile all day long!









                              DO YOU NEED MORE INFORMATION?












Because you are important in this successful project,
everything takes place thanks to your support, therefore be among the first
ones who will get to enjoy Ego!
                           PERKS










                                                        

                                  TRUST AND TRANSPARENCYWe have a complete confidence in our team and our ability to successfully made this product.We have an experienced team, very skilled and we are absolutely confident that we can ship Ego Smartwatch according to our timeline.We understand that are few risks associated with the launch of any brand new technology to the market, but we are convinced that in our case these are very minimal. We  believe in a transparent project management approach and we have decided to inform all our backers on a regular basis about the progress made during the production phase.Some specifications are subject to change by the progress in development .




                   WE ARE DIRECTLY LIABLE FOR OUR FUTURE
                                                thus, it is best to wisely plan it! 





                









                                Thank you for being a part of my dream!

I want to
thank you all who support me, to the persons with whom I share the excitement
of developing this wonderful and innovating concept, but also to those who distribute
this campaign in the social media, providing me thus their assistance. Each
beginning becomes less harder when there are persons who support and believe in
you!



FAQs:
1) Is the watch delivered with 2 straps?
Yes. The watch shall be delivered with a metallic
strap and with a black leather strap.

2) Is the strap adjustable?
Yes, you may adjust the strap till it becomes comfortable
for your wrist.

3) Can I change the strap of the watch by myself?
Yes. It is very simple. This way you may enjoy a new
aspect of the watch by simply changing the strap. 

4) Is it a backlight watch?
Yes. Shake the watch and the screen will light up.

5) How do I choose the colour of the watch?
Carefully
select the name of the watch you want and you will definitely receive exactly
what you chose.

6) If I choose several perks, will these be delivered
to different addresses?
Unfortunately, not. We will deliver
all perks to the same address.

7) If I do not get the reward, may I claim my donation
back?
You should
not forget that you supported a project and we assure you of all our gratitude and
we do our best to reward you with the perk you chose. We apologize if any issue
could occur during the delivery and we will try to solve the issue as soon as
possible.

8) What happens with the funds raised?
The entire amount of money will be used for research,
development and production.

9) Will there be designed other Ego models?
Yes, this is only the beginning.

10) Why is Ego Desert Rose a limited edition?
We are aware that people need to feel special on
certain occasions.

11) Do you deliver all over the world?
Yes. We have already
had discussions with an important logistics company operating worldwide which
will handle all deliveries in a professional manner.

12) Which languages does it recognize?
Ego recognizes 9 languages: English, German, French,
Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Russian, Polish, Turkish.

13) If I choose to have delivered 2 watches at the
same address, how much does the delivery cost?
Choose the Ego Due perk and the delivery will cost you
as if you ordered one single smart watch.

14) If I want to buy 2 watches, may I pay additionally
using the same perk?
No. If you
want you may choose Ego Due perk or if you opt for another combination of 2 watches,
you have to chosoe them by making different orders. 

15) Will the
delivery of Ego smart watch face any issue in countries such as Germany, Italy
or other EU countries?
No, we cooperate with a first-class logistics company
which provides global deliveries and we have obtained all necessary documents. 

16) Will VAT
be added for EU countries?
The
additional fees perceived by the countries where you live shall be covered by
us.

17) If I want to buy the accessories, can I do it by
means of one single contribution?
 Unfortunately, you will have to pay 2
different contributions, but the accessories are exempted of delivery payment.

18) If I
have any other questions, to whom may I address?
For any other further questions or suggestions, you may
mention them by writing us an email at: ego.smart.tech@gmail.com or by
accessing the contact box on INDIEGOGO platform.

story:
Have you ever wanted to have a huge food fight? One where you could have all the fun but don’t have to worry about the clean up? Even better, the food fight would be for a good cause.

Well you are in luck!

Owen’s Outrageous Food Fight allows you to have all the fun of an EPIC food fight without any of the clean up! All of that with the added benefit of donating to a good cause. Proceeds from the event will go towards Pediatric Gastroenterology Research, a cause near and dear to me. My son, the eponymous Owen, has a condition known as Short Bowel Syndrome and we have seen that GI conditions do not get the research attention they deserve. So our mission here is 3 fold: to help you have fun, raise awareness of pediatric GI conditions and fund research as well.

We plan to use the money from this campaign to design the event, buy the necessary materials and rent the space.

Design the event? Yes because this won’t just be a field with some tables of food. There will be stations like the jello catapult or mayo cannon. This will be an event you will never forget.

The materials will be one of the largest costs because we will have to buy food for the event and pay staff.

Don't worry, we will not be wasting food! The food will either be things that would have otherwise went to waste or they will be simulations of the food

Lastly, our plan is to hold the first event in the New Jersey area. Don't live in the New Jersey area but are still interested in participating? You are in luck, we plan to expand to other areas with your help. After you contribute we will send you a survey asking you which other areas you would like to see the event held. We will then use those responses to organize future events!

If you are interested in our event please contribute whatever you can and share our page with your friends!

Take a look at our recent press coverage!

NBC10 Philadelphia

Rutgers Daily Targum

_____________________________________________________________________________

Perks

_____________________________________________________________________________

 Side Salad $5

What you get: Our undying gratitude and our thanks for helping us make this happen! You will receive a personal thank you from us on all of our social media platform.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

               Cup of Soup $10

What you get: Along with our thanks and gratitude we will list you as a donor in all of our event materials! Thank you again for making this event a reality and helping pediatric GI research!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

              Panini $25

What you get: We will list your organization as a sponsor in all of our program materials and website Thank you and your organization for your generosity.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

         Full English Breakfast $65

What you get: EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!! As an early supporter you get a discounted entry ticket for the epic food fight you are making possible. With entry you will get a T-Shirt and anything else included with a regular ticket. Thank you for your support!

75 available!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

            Ice Cream Sundae $90

What you get: One regular entry into the event you are helping make possible. With entry you will get a T-Shirt and anything else included with a regular ticket. Thank you for your support!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

        Brunch with friends $240

What you get: EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!! As an early supporter you get 4 discounted entry tickets for you and 3 friends to the epic food fight you are making possible. With entry you will get 4 T-Shirts and anything else included with a regular ticket. Thank you for your support!

50 Available!!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

   Fondue for 4 $340

What you get: For you contribution you get 4 discounted entry tickets for you and 3 friends to the epic food fight you are making possible. With entry you will get 4 T-Shirts and anything else included with a regular ticket. Thank you for your support!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

          Chef's Tasting Menu $1000

What you get: An entry in the event AND you get to help design part of the fight that we will name after you! Maybe you have always wanted to wield a jello catapult and now is your chance! Thank you for your support!

5 available!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

              Five-star Buffet $2500

What you get: Have you company listed as a primary sponsor and partner for the event. Your company logo will appear on all event materials including T-Shirts, emails, website, etc.. We will also hang a banner at every event with your company name and logo on it. A booth would also be set up at every event for a representative from your company. Thank you for your support and generosity!!

5 available!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

              Personal Chef Experience $15,000

What you get: Corporate event - We will hold a separate event just for you and your organization! We will include personalized team building exercises and T-Shirts made just for your organization. Thank you for you support and generosity!

1 available!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Our Story

Why are we the right people to make this idea happen?
This is probably most important question you can ask and the answer is simple: passion. Often times in life it is the people with the most passion for a project or issue that are the most successful. They are willing to put the most of themselves into it because it is such a big part of them. And passion for this project is something we have in spades.

This is my son Owen whom this epic food fight is named after. When he was born he had to have part of his intestine removed which caused him to be diagnosed with short bowel syndrome. In the years since he was diagnosed we have been in contact with countless medical professionals. What we have learned is that research for pediatric GI conditions are underfunded. That was when we began to look for an idea that could raise awareness for these conditions and funds for research. And then one day, while feeding Owen, it came to me. A food fight! It's fun and has meaning.

And it because of that passion that we would be the most ideal team to run this campaign and make this project a reality.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Possible setbacks:
Finding a venue might prove to be difficult due to the nature of the event but difficult is not impossible. There will be venues that will want to host this epic event.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Partnerships

We will be actively looking for partners to help make our event as fun as possible for the participants

Caterers and/or Food Trucks: While there will be plenty of food in the fight it is only going to make them hungrier. If you are interested please email us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

Craft Beer Producers: What does someone want after they were just in an epic culinary battle? A cold beer. We plan to include one beer in with the event ticket as well. If you are interested please email us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

Photographers/Videographers: Pictures or it didn't happen, right? Well it is pretty difficult to snap a picture while you are hurling handfuls of mashed potatoes at your enemy. That's where you come in. If you are interested please email us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

DJs/Musicians: Have you ever heard of an epic battle that didn't have a soundtrack? Of course not. We are looking for DJs and live bands to play both during the fight and at the after party. If you are interested please email us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

Vendors: Have something that you think our food warriors would like to procure after a days battle? Please contact us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Sponsors

If your company would like to join us as an official sponsor please contact us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

There will several levels of sponsorship and any contribution you would like to make would be highly appreciated.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Charity

The driver behind this project and the reason we started it in the first place is to help children like our son. GI conditions do not get nearly as much attention as many other diseases even if they are just as life altering and threatening. This is why our primary mission, after making sure you have fun, is to try and make a difference. The way we plan to do that, at first, is to donate at least 50% of our profits to pediatric GI research at the nations top children's hospitals. And that is the bare minimum that we plan to donate. The actual amount will probably be much high but we cannot predict the exact amount until we know all of our costs. With the additional funds we hope that they will be able to help more children live full and happy lives. Along with donating profits from ticket sales, we will also have fundraising at the events as well with activities that have yet TBD. 

So please, help us make this a reality. Not only will you have a great time at an EPIC food fight, you will also help children in their greatest time of need.


__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Questions?

If you have any more question or have any suggestion please contact us at OwensFoodFight@gmail.com

You can also reach us on social media

story:
Anlässlich des Opferfestes Organisiert Jugendfußballverband Dorf Iminflousse mit Einigen anderen Teams in der Region jedes Jahr Regelmässig Fußball. In diesem zusammenhang wollen wir ein Projekt starten das Spielplatz zu reparieren. für diesen Zweck benötigen wir Eine materielle Unterstützung von ca 25.000 Dirham Um dieses Ziel zu erreichen  möchte ich im Namen des Taems das Projekt veröffentlichen.


1 - Es wird Kinder und Jugendlichen von der Region,die nicht über finanzielle Mittel verfügen geholfen.( Zukunftige Jugenfussball Organisation).
 2- Ich bin in diese Region geboren,und kenne die finanzielle Lage der einzelnen Familien.      Die meisten Familien von Ihnen haben gar kein Arbeit,um die Familie zu ernähren,geschweige denn      Einrichtungen für Aktivitäten für die Kinder zu realisieren.
 3- Ich und viele von meine Freunde,die die Region verlassen haben wie ich ,möchten diese Kinder     dort helfen.
 4- wir wollen hilfen,in dem wir dieses Projekt starten und noch andere freiwillige  Menschen im Land      erreichen.
 5- Die Spendengelder werden für die Einrichtung und bau eines Spielplatzes und die Sportliche       Aktivitäten der Kinder verwendet.
6- Die Spiele werden dann an diesem Spielplatz in ( Dorf Iminflousse ) stattfinden. 7- Bis jetzt gibt es keine eingetragne Organisation,aber wir sind ein Zusammenhalt von Bekannten      und Freunde und haben uns alle zusammengetan und werden eine Liste mit Namen durchführen.
Wir werden auch eine  Organisation gründen.

story:
Introducing  

 

It is a fair assumption, unless you have completely eschewed news and radio for the past 20+ years, that you have heard of children, pets, and K-9s dying in cars via hot temperatures subsequently causing hyperthermia which subsequently can cause heatstroke and/or death. What is not always apparent is the number of children that have died. Since 1991, 740+ kids have died due to hot-vehicle heatstrokes. 740 and climbing! Tragically and extremely unfortunately, three have been confirmed in 2016 (Jan 2016 in GA and Apr 2016 in Texas and Kentucky) well before the summer of 2016 and the normal summer-temperatures that ensue (scroll-to-US-map-and-click-dots-in-GA-and-TX-and-KY-for-reports).

We at VIKIE are passionate about solving this nationwide dilemma. We have a patent-pending solution that will prevent and/or eliminate these tragic events in the near future and from here on out.

However, to further VIKIE and save kids and pets, we need funding assistance. This project has been ongoing and patent-pending since 2014. It has been personally funded by my team and myself. Funds have been completely exhausted. With your help, we can finish development which entails taking the VIKIE prototype to a live proof-of-concept vehicle(s). This vehicle will subsequently be scheduled for NHTSA testing to demonstrate to the government and the auto industry a viable and rock-solid solution to this problem. Together we can save these small kids' and pets' lives.

Why Develop A Child/Pet Car Device?

It seems unfathomable that children and pets could be left alone in cars long enough to die. Yet it has happened time and again. This brings up two pertinent questions:

Why VIKIE?

  • 740+ kids have died since 2011
  • 4 kids have died in 2016 months before summer temperatures begin
  • 46 K-9s have died since 2011
  • Unknown and/or unreported number of pets

And what can VIKIE do?

  • Will detect small kids and pets
  • Will monitor detected small kids and pets
  • Will alert others until saved; if not will contact 911

Also, VIKIE does not judge. VIKIE does not care how or why a kid or pet is alone. VIKIE only cares about saving kids and pets. VIKIE will simply do its job which is to detect, monitor, and begin alerts upon dangerous temperatures and/or time alone (and other proprietary factors). If VIKIE's alerts do not cause passersby or the driver to respond in a timely manner, VIKIE will send GPS coordinates and a VIKIE message to 911. 

As aforementioned, VIKIE will prevent or completely eliminate kids/pets/K-9s from dying in hot-cars (or cold for that matter). VIKIE is not a stop-gap or a gadget alarm system. VIKIE is a fully autonomous, integrated, and embedded system. VIKIE is completely unseen by all. In other words, if a child/pet is never alone and/or in distress, you would never know VIKIE was even installed and active. The same can be said for an airbag. You don't really know it's there unless it is deployed.

VIKIE works silently in the background detecting, monitoring, and alerting when/if necessary. The driver has nothing to do but operate the vehicle as normal. It is a really innovative and great system.


The following :14 second video shows a few of VIKIE's simulated alarms after a  child has been detected. This doesn't even scratch the surface; there are a quite a few more things VIKIE does as well.


So, Whats Next For VIKIE? Where To From Here?

The prototype shown throughout is ready for tooling and further industrial design. Derek has taken the prototype as far as he can with current financials. Once the project is funded, we may or may not need to hand the prototype over to an industrial design team. First order of business once funded is to utilize the AT&T Foundry (Atlanta, GA). They do great things and may assist in taking the prototype to the next level. Derek and Justin will seemingly live there and work closely with them and guide them through all of VIKIE's intricate details and needs. The same can be said for using an industrial design team as well. These steps (design & tooling) are intended for the proof-of-concept vehicle. They may finalize the industrial design & tooling steps noted in the attached timeline below. However, if they do not, they will simply have taken first steps towards completion of such and the timeline of design and tooling will remain intact.

Justin will keep different phases on schedule. Additional coding for different vehicles will be handled by Derek and all should be debugged and refined in 4 - 8 weeks. Once coding and hardware are finished, Derek will work closely with an automotive engineer to wire up the vehicle(s).

Once the initial vehicle(s) are wired, NHTSA testing will be scheduled. We are confident we will achieve and receive a resounding and favorable report from NHTSA, which in turn will satisfy a new federal mandated bill (Dec. 2015) to research a hot-car solution.

Upon completion of NHTSA/Government approval, manufacturing will commence. Derek and Anthony will then market and reach out to various auto makers and other auto parts' makers to get VIKIE in vehicles to save kids, pets, and K-9s.

Funding

Where Will The Money Go?

VIKIE needs to raise $100,000 to accomplish the next two phases in sequence:
  • Proof-of-concept vehicle(s) for NHTSA testing
  • Initial manufacturing/marketing for first line of kid/pet/K-9 saving vehicles

If VIKIE does not accomplish the entire crowdfunding goal, funds raised can still go towards parts, tools, and other equipment that will lose no value whatsoever while awaiting further funds in the near future.

What Perks Are Offered? Cost?

To begin, every single backer should understand that the most important perk of all is the innocent child/pet/K-9 life-saving mission we are all set forth to accomplish!

That being said every backer will be listed (if so desired) on VIKIE's soon-to-be created "Wall of Supporters." This wall will remain a part of VIKIE forever and become VIKIE lore. When VIKIE becomes ubiquitous like the seat belt & airbag or when all cars are flying around like "The Jetsons" with mandatory VIKIEs installed, VIKIE's wall will have it's place in history and be cemented with all that supported it. On this wall will be stated "<yourName> gave to save a kid and pet's life. <yourName> helped make VIKIE happen!" Derek will assure this database (backups, encryption, etc.) of supporters lasts and honors every single supporter. This mission is just too important and credit will be given accordingly. It will be an honor to have contributed to saving a life. And we will all feel a great relief when we no longer hear about a kid or pet suffering or figuratively and literally "baking" in a car.

Perks:

  • Thank You: $5 USD
  • VIKIE Star: $25 USD
  • VIKIE Super Star: $100 USD
  • VIKIE Dynamo: $500 USD
  • VIKIE Elite: $1,000 USD
  • VIKIE Believer: $2,500 USD
  • VIKIE: $5,000 USD
  • VIKIE Inspiration: $7,500 USD
  • VIKIE The One: $10,000 USD

Computer Consulting In The Perks

You may notice some of the perks include computer consulting services by Derek. These perks will be fulfilled by Derek's computer consulting firm as contracted under VIKIE to fulfill these obligations. The services offered will be fulfilled electronically, professionally, and completely by Derek (unless, see note below, a unique requirement that Derek will subcontract out).

These consulting perks will be fulfilled electronically (email, website, manually created PDF tutorial, etc.) and, wherein a phonetic language barrier does not exist, via telephone where feasible and necessary. Note that any created PDF will be personally created by Derek in great step-by-step detail per each unique consult to the satisfaction of solving your specific consult need.

Consulting Perks Contained Inside Of Perks:

  • VIKIE Super Star: $25 consult voucher
  • VIKIE Dynamo: $150 voucher
  • VIKIE Elite: $500 voucher
  • VIKIE Believer: 1 consult package below (up to $2000 USD value)
  • VIKIE: up to 2 consult packages below (up to $5000 USD value)
  • VIKIE Inspiration: up to 3 consult packages below (up to $7500 USD value)
  • VIKIE The One: up to consult 3 packages below (up to $7500 USD value)

Consulting Packages Offered For Perks:

  • Consult/System Analysis
  • Network Audit/Design (remote access where allowed)
  • Website SEO Consult (may exceed value of voucher over time)
  • Pen Test (thoroughly test your network's security)
  • Security Consult (measures to increase your network security)
  • Software debugging
  • Software development (may exceed value of voucher over time)

*For software development/debugging, git access will be cleanest option for access; else encrypted source code to Derek will suffice.

*Software development and SEO work may exceed value of vouchers over time. At that time before proceeding, Derek will discuss further costs involved.

*Additional hardware that may be deemed necessary is not included. Derek will advise on appropriate hardware choices and leave that to you to fulfill. Derek will electronically (email, website, step-by-step PDF tutorials manually prepared per problem by Derek) assist in implementing the procured equipment however.

*Any unique service Derek might not be able to fulfill will be subcontracted at Derek's expense to accommodate.

*For those not in need of consulting services, note that these vouchers will not expire. They will be serialized and are transferable to others (if desired). Note each voucher can be used once only per serial number regardless of ownership and up to package listed and/or value.

Shipping

PLEASE NOTE: Shipping for some backers will occur in Sep. 2016 wherein for others it will occur in Jan. 2017. The perk you choose will provide you with the estimated delivery date.

What Is VIKIE's Impact? What Is My Impact?

VIKIE is not the normal flashy new invention and recall VIKIE will not even be seen. Aesthetics and new-gadget-flash aside, know this about VIKIE's impact: VIKIE Saves Kids! VIKIE Saves Pets! VIKIE Saves Lives! This project is uber-important. VIKIE has to rank in the upper echelons of all projects and/or inventions. Okay we are a little biased. However, VIKIE will be used to save a 2-year old from dying due to hyperthermia. VIKIE will save that loving pet panting in the backseat helplessly with no recourse. That 4-year old that might can open the door but was told to stay in the car banging at the window while literally burning up will also be helped by VIKIE. These are HORRIFIC events to discuss! However, these types of occurrences happen some 37+ times every year. And that's what backing VIKIE will impact. It will impact the number of kid/pets/K-9s hot-car deaths each year, until hopefully that number is 0!

Rest assured your impact of backing VIKIE will be felt in society and globally. This happens in the U.S. and overseas as well. Biased or not, VIKIE is a top-notch system and helping VIKIE to become realized will leave a pleasant feeling to any supporter. The fact that by summer of 2017, VIKIE can be live in multiple vehicle lines is heart-pounding; which is much better than our stomach cringing in knots as our ears hear of 4 kids dying already this year alone - well before summer temperatures. And unfortunately, possibly more to come!

Risks & Challenges

VIKIE is new and our CTO has went to great lengths to make the prototype-to-demo "easy peasy." However, manufacturing and production delays and other snafus may arise.  Due to these various scenarios, VIKIE will procure assistance from an industrial team or at the very least an experienced automotive engineer.

Once funding has been met, information will be available of VIKIE's status on www.social.vikie.net to keep all backers in the loop.

In addition, VIKIE is not shying away from improvement. Recall the first step is to schedule NHTSA testing. NHTSA runs extensive testing and does not simply hand out high ratings. Once VIKIE succeeds in becoming NHTSA approved, the standard for VIKIE and its life-saving system will be set and future challenges will be lessened greatly.

How Can I Help? How Can I Help Save Kids & Pets?

The best way to help VIKIE is to fund/back us. In backing VIKIE, you are actually helping to save a life!

If you cannot help fund us, but are passionate about VIKIE and it's societal impact worldwide, please share this campaign with friends, family, and others. Every contribution or word-of-mouth helps.

story:
Hi! My name is And Vatika, I am 36 years old, from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I am a Yoga and Ayurveda teacher, been working with these amazing philosophies for more than 15 years now. After a few trips to India, I've realized I had a message to pass on.

I've always wanted to make a book on Ayurveda, because in this lifestyle I've found healing and plenty of answers. So I thought about sharing them with the world, in a broader way than what I had been doing (teaching classes and workshops to 10/20 people each time).

And so I did: all the love, energy, time, (and money) I put into the book project gave great results: it came out beautiful, people gave me empowering loving feedbacks, and it was a success in Argentina and Uruguay. 

But that was only a Spanish version of my message to the world. Now I want to reach all the people who don't speak Spanish, and probably speak English. And I need your help. Your help will make my dream not only become real, but also multicultural.

 

I need $2000 to translate the book (190 pages) into English, edit and correct it, and hire an e-book designer to create the e-book edition of the book (it exists in a printed version).

In Argentina, I used a local crown founding site to raise money for the last part (printing of the book) and the project reached the goal in the first weeks. This was a clear reflexion on how people are eager to learn about, and support these matters. The fact of having supportive community was a fundamental part of the process, it made me feel stronger and connected.

Thank you so very much in advance, and if you support the project and cause, don't forget to share it with your friends and community, using indiegogo share tools. Love to all,

Andi
