story:
Have you ever got up on the wrong side of the bed and felt like your whole day has been ruined? 
You are not alone. 
Your mood in the morning will definitely affect your entire day.

 

Hey there!

 

My name is Renato and I am the founder of Sugr.

The simple idea of kickstarting your day by experiencing something positive is based on a good amount of human-psychology research. It is clearly shown that morning mood has significant effect on the rest of the day. The task is easy - experience something positive right after you wake up.

What on Earth could be such a positive experience in the morning? There is not much fun associated with getting up, right?

 

 

Well, if you imagine the situation of walking by the street and having someone compliment you on your hairstyle, jacket or whatever it is, you can easily see why I have chosen compliments. These little experiences boost happiness. Why is complimenting so rare then?

Why?

We are usually too shy to express our feelings or generally give our opinion out. We prefer to stay in our safe spot, called the comfort zone. There is nothing wrong about it, this is general human nature.

When I first started imagining Sugr, I immediately knew it has to be anonymous. This removes the barrier of leaving the comfort zone and makes complimenting others as easy as pressing a button, without giving out identity.

In Sugr you receive your compliments in the morning, so you can start every day by reading what other people like about you. This is an extremely good feeling and a great motivator.

But there is more to this story. In Sugr the number of compliments you get is only determined by the number of compliments you send to others. This spiral of positive energy can realistically make the world a better, happier and even more beautiful place. 
This is my dream.

 

So what can you do with Sugr?

I have kept it simple and only focused on the most important part. That is to deliver the experience as easily as possible.

1. Get compliments

Get compliments from people all over the world. Let's be fair - to get compliments, you also have to send some. In Sugr the number of compliments you receive is solely based on the number of compliments you send. Your received compliments are delivered to you every morning. This way you can start every day with discovering what people like about you.

2. Only positive

Every message is analyzed. Messages that contain offensive context will not be delivered. The Sugr is built upon a sophisticated fraud prevention algorithm. The system flags every suspicious compliment and prevents them from being delivered. These compliments are then being inspected by human eyes. If the message is obviously offensive, it gets deleted, while the user associated with the message gets terminated immediately.

3. Chat

Start chatting with people you get compliments from. This is a great way to say thanks. 

4. Anonymous

Every compliment is anonymous by default.  This means that you appear as "Anonymous" with your blurred main picture to the receivers of your compliment  by default. You can ask others to reveal themselves or you can reveal yourself if you get requested. 

 

Let's talk about business

Money is important, but…

 

Sugr is a self funded project and will be launched almost certainly.

The money raised through Indiegogo is directly helping to reach more people than I could afford by myself. This is everyone's interest. The more people are using the application, the more compliments there are to receive. Remember: The aim is to reach as much people as possible to make Sugr an extraordinary user experience.

The most important goal of this campaign therefore is to build a community and share our thoughts. Sugr is in the last stage of development and will be available for early access shortly. Every contributor of this campaign will automatically be invited to our enthusiast community and will be able to download the app before launch.

What do community members get?

1. All community members have early access to the application.

2. Get regular updates about the final stage of the project.

Members who contribute financially to the project will get limited premium features in the application once launched, including:

3. Non purchasable items (green, gold and red border for your uploaded pictures, so every user is going to see that you are part of Sugr’s success from the first day)

4. Purchasable premium features at a great discount (Double compliments, Triple compliments)

5. All contributors will be placed under “People who made Sugr possible” both on the Website and in the App, with an optional social media link, for lifetime.

See more details under the Perks section.

 

Perks (detailed)

Every community member's benefits:

1.Early access

Community members will be able to download and get the hang of Sugr before the official launch later this year. This is a great way to shape Sugr to personal needs before the official launch.

2.Regular updates

I share regular updates in the community where every member can stay up do date with the project. This is especially important for a member who is contributing financially.

 

Financially contributing community member's benefits:

3.Borders

You are able to select a non-purchasable special border for your pictures.
Other users will see this when they navigate to your profile. This way everyone will know that you were here from the start and invested in Sugr. If Sugr ever will be a success story, everyone will know that you were an essential part of it.

  1. Default (none)
  2. Serious backer's green
  3. Epic backer's golden
  4. Invaluable backer's signature red

4.Premium features

In Sugr the number of compliments you receive is solely based on the number of compliments you send. The more compliments you send, the more compliments you are going to receive. You can also boost the number of compliments with the following features:

The "Double compliments" feature allows you to get two times as much compliments as regular users do. 

The "Triple compliments" feature allows you to get three times as much compliments as regular users do.

5.Appear in App and on the Website

Both the App and the Website will have a section for all community members who contributed financially. This section is called "People who made Sugr possible". Contributing members will be listed here with optional social media link after launch.

Members will stay here for the lifetime of the app.

 

Risks?

The risks associated with this project are minimal, but for the sake of transparency, they are included.

The main risk is that Sugr can't attract enough users in time to cover operating costs. For this reason, it is extremely important to reach as many people as possible after launch. This requires resources. 

 

Milestones

2017.12. The idea of Sugr has taken shape. Business and financial plan. Decided on technology stack. Started design, architecture and development.

2018.01. Started developing core functionality of the app for Android.

2018.02. First basic prototype ready. Cross platform compatibility issues.

2018.03. Finished iOS prototype. Design polished. Sugr image video production started.

2018.06. Crowdfunding campaign started to support the last stage of the development. 

2018.06. Google Play store and App store compatibility. 

2018.07. Early access for community members. Initializing first feedback loop, polishing before production.

2018.07. Incorporating feedbacks into the app. Starting marketing campaign. 

2018.09. Sugr official launch. Fulfilling Indiegogo perks. Reacting to user needs.

2018.09. Market validation. Planning new releases.

2018.11. Continue developing new features. 

...

 

Have questions about Sugr?

Ask me on facebook: click here.
story_txt:
Have you ever got up on the wrong side of the bed and felt like your whole day has been ruined? You are not alone. Your mood in the morning will definitely affect your entire day.
 
Hey there!
 
My name is Renato and I am the founder of Sugr.

The simple idea of kickstarting your day by experiencing something positive is based on a good amount of human-psychology research. It is clearly shown that morning mood has significant effect on the rest of the day. The task is easy - experience something positive right after you wake up.
What on Earth could be such a positive experience in the morning? There is not much fun associated with getting up, right?
 

 
Well, if you imagine the situation of walking by the street and having someone compliment you on your hairstyle, jacket or whatever it is, you can easily see why I have chosen compliments. These little experiences boost happiness. Why is complimenting so rare then?
Why?
We are usually too shy to express our feelings or generally give our opinion out. We prefer to stay in our safe spot, called the comfort zone. There is nothing wrong about it, this is general human nature.
When I first started imagining Sugr, I immediately knew it has to be anonymous. This removes the barrier of leaving the comfort zone and makes complimenting others as easy as pressing a button, without giving out identity.
In Sugr you receive your compliments in the morning, so you can start every day by reading what other people like about you. This is an extremely good feeling and a great motivator.
But there is more to this story. In Sugr the number of compliments you get is only determined by the number of compliments you send to others. This spiral of positive energy can realistically make the world a better, happier and even more beautiful place. This is my dream.
 
So what can you do with Sugr?
I have kept it simple and only focused on the most important part. That is to deliver the experience as easily as possible.
1. Get compliments


Get compliments from people all over the world. Let's be fair - to get compliments, you also have to send some. In Sugr the number of compliments you receive is solely based on the number of compliments you send. Your received compliments are delivered to you every morning. This way you can start every day with discovering what people like about you.
2. Only positive

Every message is analyzed. Messages that contain offensive context will not be delivered. The Sugr is built upon a sophisticated fraud prevention algorithm. The system flags every suspicious compliment and prevents them from being delivered. These compliments are then being inspected by human eyes. If the message is obviously offensive, it gets deleted, while the user associated with the message gets terminated immediately.
3. Chat

Start chatting with people you get compliments from. This is a great way to say thanks. 
4. Anonymous

Every compliment is anonymous by default.  This means that you appear as "Anonymous" with your blurred main picture to the receivers of your compliment  by default. You can ask others to reveal themselves or you can reveal yourself if you get requested. 
 
Let's talk about business


Money is important, but… Sugr is a self funded project and will be launched almost certainly.
The money raised through Indiegogo is directly helping to reach more people than I could afford by myself. This is everyone's interest. The more people are using the application, the more compliments there are to receive. Remember: The aim is to reach as much people as possible to make Sugr an extraordinary user experience.

The most important goal of this campaign therefore is to build a community and share our thoughts. Sugr is in the last stage of development and will be available for early access shortly. Every contributor of this campaign will automatically be invited to our enthusiast community and will be able to download the app before launch.
What do community members get?
1. All community members have early access to the application.
2. Get regular updates about the final stage of the project.
Members who contribute financially to the project will get limited premium features in the application once launched, including:
3. Non purchasable items (green, gold and red border for your uploaded pictures, so every user is going to see that you are part of Sugr’s success from the first day)
4. Purchasable premium features at a great discount (Double compliments, Triple compliments)
5. All contributors will be placed under “People who made Sugr possible” both on the Website and in the App, with an optional social media link, for lifetime.
See more details under the Perks section.
 
Perks (detailed)
Every community member's benefits:
1.Early access

Community members will be able to download and get the hang of Sugr before the official launch later this year. This is a great way to shape Sugr to personal needs before the official launch.
2.Regular updates

I share regular updates in the community where every member can stay up do date with the project. This is especially important for a member who is contributing financially.
 
Financially contributing community member's benefits:
3.Borders

You are able to select a non-purchasable special border for your pictures.Other users will see this when they navigate to your profile. This way everyone will know that you were here from the start and invested in Sugr. If Sugr ever will be a success story, everyone will know that you were an essential part of it.

The "Double compliments" feature allows you to get two times as much compliments as regular users do. 
The "Triple compliments" feature allows you to get three times as much compliments as regular users do.
5.Appear in App and on the Website

Both the App and the Website will have a section for all community members who contributed financially. This section is called "People who made Sugr possible". Contributing members will be listed here with optional social media link after launch.
Members will stay here for the lifetime of the app.

story:
Through international innovation,

we provide feminine care products designed with your health, comfort and overall well-being as our top priority.

Then we deliver these products straight to your door, which means no more uncomfortable (tissue-stuffed underwear) trips to the drug store -- you'll never run out of pads or tampons again!

Our Goddess Giftbag Options:

1) Anion pads: 15 in sizes regular or heavy

2) 100% organic cotton tampons: 16 in sizes regular or super

3) Combination: 5 regular anion pads, 5 heavy/overnight anion pads, & 5 regular 100% organic cotton tampons

 

DEMOS

 

Q: HOW DOES THE ANION IN YOUR PAD WORK?

Anions are naturally occurring negative ions that are released in high quantities in places like forests, beaches, and waterfalls.

Their health benefits have been studied extensively and have been shown to promote positive moods, relieve stress, and provide a boost in energy. While positive ions are considered harmful to the body, negative ions are highly beneficial.

When in contact with moisture or friction, the core of our pad releases 6000cm3 of anions in order to aid in balancing the body, providing cramp relief, and eliminating odor-causing bacteria without any added fragrances or irritants!


 

Q: ARE LEADING TAMPON BRANDS NOT 100% COTTON?

A: Most tampons contain various blends of viscose rayon, cotton covered in pesticides, cheap synthetic ingredients, and are then bleached. This process releases small amounts of dioxin, which is a toxin often associated with gynecological defects, birth deformities, and cancer. It is not required by law for these brands to disclose all their ingredients, and many don't. Goddess in the Red tampons are 100% organic cotton, which means no pesticides, no synthetics, and no bleach. We want you to have a healthy, happy period.

Infographic created by jockomo.com and edited by Goddess in the Red

 

Q: WHY NOT MENSTRUAL CUPS?

94% of menstruating women prefer to use either pads or tampons, while only 6% prefer to use alternative options. Despite sales having risen over the years for menstrual cups, through our research into feminine care products and surveys, we've found that the majority of women would still prefer to use their traditional methods over switching to this option, even though it produces little to no waste. What we decided as a company was that for mass adoption we needed to offer women products that were familiar, but more sustainable than the ones they were currently using, as well as better for their bodies.

We believe our applicator free, completely biodegradable tampons will have just as large, if not a larger, positive environmental impact because of the ease of mass adoption. And while our pads are not completely biodegradable, the anion provides other amazing health benefits that a menstrual cup does not, such as promoting positive moods, pain relief, balancing the body and eliminating harmful bacteria.

At Goddess in the Red, we still acknowledge and believe that menstrual cups are a great option for women who don't want to use pads or tampons! We hope to introduce our very own design in the future and will continue to innovate towards better, more sustainable products .

 

 

Q: ARE YOUR TAMPONS SAFE AND DO THEY WORK AS WELL AS THE CONVENTIONAL ONES?

A: Of course! :) Our tampons (and anion pads) are FDA-approved and meet all the typical absorbency standards. Our manufacturer’s facilities are both ICEA and GOTS (ICEA: European Eco/Bio Standard, GOTS: Global Organic Textile Standard) certified. Our tampons are lab-tested to ensure there are no chemicals, synthetic fibers, pesticides, or dioxins. Moreover, they are designed to provide optimal leak protection, because they expand into the natural curve of your body to seal in your flow and avoid any leaks.

 

Q: IS TSS REALLY AN ISSUE ANYMORE?

A: While rare, the risk of TSS still exists and can be life threatening. It is the main reason the FDA requires all companies to list TSS warnings, and absorbency charts on tampon boxes. The viscose rayon found in conventional tampons provides the optimal breeding grounds for the toxin that is responsible for Toxic Shock Syndrome. Often times rayon fibers can break off and remain in the vagina even after the removal of a tampon. Our tampons have a smooth organic cotton coating that not only aids in a more comfortable insertion but also stops fibers from being left behind. Additionally, there has never been a reported case of tampon-related TSS with 100% cotton tampons.

What we need!

 

We need $30,000 to complete our first stock order of our anion pads and organic cotton tampons. Your support not only allows you to be one of the first people to purchase our products, but it also  means helping disrupt the feminine care industry and bettering women's health. Additionally, you are officially joining a community of women who aim to build up and inspire one another #goddessinthered!

Even if you can't contribute monetarily,  what you can do is share our campaign and YouTube video with as many people as you can! The more our campaign is shared, the more likely it will be successful and the more women will know about healthier alternatives to their kind-of-toxic (but really) and cheaply made feminine care products. It is SO important that we reach as many women as possible.

Success! Week One Update.

Thank you so much!

Feel free to contact us with any questions either by leaving a comment or emailing us!

admin@goddessinthered.com

The more our campaign is shared, the more likely it will be successful and the more women will know about healthier alternatives to their kind-of-toxic (but really) and cheaply made feminine care products. It is SO important that we reach as many women as possible.

Thank you so much!

story:
Hello, my name is Bob Huebner.  I am the CEO/Chief Scientist and one of the founders of Algoceutics International Inc. 

    Most importantly I am a father of 5 fantastic children and 7 marvelous grandchildren.

    In their early teens, my eldest son was diagnosed with ADHD and one of my daughters was found to suffer from Bi-Polar Disease.  As a concerned father, I did not wish to inject my children with Ritalin so I began to research and find out some of the causes of these ailments.

    As a scientist, I discovered that indeed there was a direct correlation between nutrition and lack of communication on the cellular level.

    Further research into the nutritional lunch programs in the schools in West Palm Beach, Florida and throughout the entire country illustrated some alarming issues associated with providing our children with sound nutrition while attending school.

    In Palm Beach County schools in 2016 upwards of 50% of the school-aged children were coming to school with nothing, I repeat nothing in their young tummies.

    Upon further research Algoceutics discovered that the national average was approaching as high as 85% of the 50,000,000 children across the United States were malnourished and were coming to school empty.  In addition, the food distribution program at lunchtime was grossly insufficient.  This has lead to a 35% obesity rate and a sharp increase each year in Stage ll childhood diabetes, lower test scores and less federal funding to schools.

    The Kidz Cookie was created to address these issues.  Six delicious flavors offer our children a morning cookie and an afternoon cookie.  This  2 stage approach provides 100% of the daily nutrition intake, (RDI) recommended for all 30,000,000 children.

    Algoceutics International Inc. is now ready to launch Phase ll of our protocol with the introduction of the Kidz Cookie in a controlled double-blind study to be conducted with 75 select participants from the  3 most challenged schools in Palm Beach: Belle Glade, Pahokee, and Riveria Beach, Florida.

    Upon completion of this 4-month study introduction of the Kidz Cookie to the remainder of the school systems in Florida and the entire country will begin. 

    Indiegogo's crowdfunding approach will allow our company to complete the first 3 flavors and begin the distribution to our schools.  

    All contributors to our effort become an important data source for Algoceutics in regards to determining the potential list of additional school systems that may be approached for assistance with our Kidz Cookie.

    We are also seeking retail partners as well to assist in the distribution of the Kidz Cookies.  These partners will allow for the Kidz Cookie to be disbursed on non-school days.

    Our initial funding will allow for sufficient supplies of the Kidz Cookie to be produced for distribution into Broward, Dade and Palm Beach schools.

    Upon completion of our campaign with Indiegogo, we will begin to address other states and counties that have a great need for assistance.

    I implore everyone that reads our story to assist Algoceutics International Inc, in achieving our goal.  I also encourage all to become involved in your community, your schools and discover how Algoceutics  may be able to help your children, your schools, and your communities to put an end to all our children's poor nutrition.

story:
The Short Version

The most requested feature on the free web app shrib.com is rich text formatting.

I am Luzi, the maker of shrib.com, and I challenge you to put your money where your mouth is: Fund the time to implement this feature for all future generations of shrib.com users.

The more money we can collect, the more formatting features will I be able to implement for you!

I Need Time To Give You Rich Text Formatting

The funds collected through this campaign go into the development of the rich text formatting feature at shrib.com. Since the scope of the feature and the implementation details are easily scalable, there is a rather arbitrary campaign goal of $10'000.  Any more funds will help make the feature even better. If you and I don't meet the basic goal - then the time for the feature is not now. You will get your money back.

You will make a difference to thousands of people like you who use shrib.com for their daily notes, their flexible to-do lists, their knowledge sharing platform, their work tool, their family reunion planning, etc.

Depending on your funding support, you will get early access to the new feature and varying free subscriptions to shrib.com's sibling, shrib.co. Plus, there is a rare chance to get your own shrib.com note address! A shrib.com URL that will be reserved for you alone.

Feature Details

Here are the main requirements for this change:

  • shrib.com must work like it does today: very fast, very simple, no login requirement.
  • all new features must load asynchronously: the page must be ready for typing fast.
  • the feature must degrade gracefully: if a browser does not support the RTF feature, formatted notes must still be editable in some way.
  • the overall site design must stay as clean as possible.

These are the feature details:

  1. basic inline style formatting (bold, italic, underline, links)
  2. extended inline style formatting (colors)
  3. block style formatting (paragraph, headings, lists)
  4. images (integration with imgur or other service)
  5. other multi-media embeds

The plan is to get at least the steps 1-3 within the campaign goal budget. Any additional funds or extra time left will go into the other ones.

shrib.com's user base is growing steadily since its inception. It gets over 10'000 visits daily, from all around the world. It is used by lots of different crowds for a huge number of different purposes. It is a piece of the global internet infrastructure.

Expected Challenges

So far, implementing and improving shrib.com over the years was one big lesson in the non-deterministic world of so-called "internet standards". One of the biggest challenges (of any internet product) is cross-browser compatibility.

One specialty of shrib.com is its inherent aim to be compatible with as many browsers and devices as possible (not just the latest versions of the 5 most common browsers!).

The other one is that the overall download volume must be minimal. Therefore, the number of third-party libraries are kept to an absolute minimum (or zero if possible). For rich text formatting, I will definitely use a third party library. But, as mentioned above, it will be included in an asynchronous way.

Finally, there will be a whole challenge for the sharing of formatted notes across devices and browsers of varying capabilities. I will have to take good care to the case where the same note is created with formatting, then is edited with a browser without javascript. What should the app do? These are the kinds of things that usually are and really should be totally unknown and irrelevant to the user - but they can take a huge lot of time.

No Money? No Worries!

There are lots of ways you can help that go beyond money:

  • Spread the word about this campaign and tell your family and friends how you would love to get this shrib.com feature - use the Indiegogo share tools on this page.
  • Help me once I start testing the new feature. If you are available for testing the new feature, let me know through this contact form.

the overall site design must stay as clean as possible.

These are the feature details:

basic inline style formatting (bold, italic, underline, links)
extended inline style formatting (colors)
block style formatting (paragraph, headings, lists)
images (integration with imgur or other service)
other multi-media embeds

The plan is to get at least the steps 1-3 within the campaign goal 
budget. Any additional funds or extra time left will go into the other ones.


shrib.com's user base is growing steadily since its inception. It gets over 10'000 visits daily, from all around the world. It is used by lots of different crowds for a huge number of different purposes. It is a piece of the global internet infrastructure.
Expected Challenges
 So far, implementing and improving shrib.com over the years was one big lesson in the non-deterministic world of so-called "internet standards". One of the biggest challenges (of any internet product) is cross-browser compatibility. 
One specialty of shrib.com is its inherent aim to be compatible with as many browsers and devices as possible (not just the latest versions of the 5 most common browsers!). 
The other one is that the overall download volume must be minimal. Therefore, the number of third-party libraries are kept to an absolute minimum (or zero if possible). For rich text formatting, I will definitely use a third party library. But, as mentioned above, it will be included in an asynchronous way.
Finally, there will be a whole challenge for the sharing of formatted notes across devices and browsers of varying capabilities. I will have to take good care to the case where the same note is created with formatting, then is edited with a browser without javascript. What should the app do? These are the kinds of things that usually are and really should be totally unknown and irrelevant to the user - but they can take a huge lot of time.
  No Money? No Worries!
 There are lots of ways you can help that go beyond money:


Spread the word about this campaign and tell your family and friends how you would love to get this shrib.com feature - use the Indiegogo share tools on this page.
Help me once I start testing the new feature. If you are available for testing the new feature, let me know through this contact form.

story:
INTRODUCTION

At GloFingerz we are dedicated to creating simple expressions of fun that brighten the world around us – expressions based on color, whimsy and humor.

The idea for our company and product line was born out of the interest of 11 year old Co-Founder, Jackson Chadwick to start his first business.  Paired with his father’s nutty idea for a large, expressive finger… the GloFingerz product line was established. 

                     

 

After several iterations with the help of our co-founding design partner… all that remains is to scale production of the colorful light-emitting “Fingerz” and bring the product to market.

Next Steps… we are now ready and eager to achieve the dual goals of ramping up product manufacturing and professionalizing our marketing to ensure that the playful GloFingerz product line reaches the largest possible fan base - to do so...  WE NEED YOUR HELP!

To get our plan into full motion we seek to raise $8,500 in contributions. 

Upon reaching the set funding target, we will deliver from an attractive set of “Perks” as shown below.  With your help, we are determined to achieve our goal and bring you an expanded range of fun and amusing GloFingerz products and merchandise.  Since this is a "Fixed Funding" campaign, we are under pressure to achieve our full target.  Short of that, all contributions will be returned.

Again, OUR SUCCESS DEPENDS ON YOUR SUPPORT!  


THE TEAM

GloFingerz was launched by father and son team, Eric and Jackson Chadwick, who were soon joined by Technologist and Designer, Ted Watler. 

  Jackson:

Jackson is currently an elementary school student in northern Virginia.

  • Favorite Cartoon Character: Mr. Crabs - Money, Money, Money!

  • Favorite Pastime:  Playing Minecraft

  • Goal:  Start a company, learn how to do business, and make some money!

  Eric:


Eric is a corporate manager turned Entrepreneur, Advisor and Start-up Leader.

  • Favorite Role Model:  Alexander The Great – bold, intuitive, decisive!
  • Favorite Pastime(s):  Acoustic guitar, Hiking, Adventure travel
  • Goal:  Build multiple products into healthy, growing, sustainable businesses

Ted:

Ted is an accomplished Inventor, Technologist, Entrepreneur and Business Leader.

  • Favorite Role Model:  Dad – adventurer, fisherman, hunter, loyal friend with a great work ethic

  • Favorite Pastime(s):  Biking, Hiking, Spear Fishing, SCUBA diving, Bug Hunting (spiny lobsters) and Eco/Adventure travel

  • Goal:  Leverage technical and business skills to create, develop and commercially launch products that lead to financial success


THE COLLECTION

GloFingerz are perfect for a variety of users including serious Sports Fans...

Avid Party Goers...

And enthusiastic Protesters...

                                             


To focus our early marketing and sales efforts, the company will initially target the Sports Novelty and Party Supply markets.  As our roll out gains momentum, we will extend the products to a broad range of specialty novelties for use in activities and celebrations of all kinds… ranging from Spring break to practical jokes to daily play at home. 

Sports – our initial focus will include sports fans who can choose from a wide selection of team colors to cheer on their favorite team with shining spirit. 

                 

Schools and athletic supply companies also have the option place their brand on orders of sufficient size.

                      

Parties – party goers of all ages will find GloFingerz a refreshing change from the typical range of party favors.  The playful light-emitting feature and the custom naming option will help set your celebration apart.

                   

Specialty Novelty – as GloFingerz gains momentum we will make available a wider range of specialty Fingerz and merchandise, including items currently in our list of Perks.


THE PROJECT

While we have vision, creativity and extensive business experience, achieving scale and reach within our targeted consumer market requires partnerships and resources beyond our current capabilities and budgets.  With your contributions we have a clear plan for accomplishing the steps required to grow and thrive. Initial actions will focus on the following:

Manufacturing

  •   Design
  •   Sourcing
  •   Production
  •   Assembly
  •   Delivery
  •   Volume


Marketing

  •   Web presence
  •   Web optimization
  •   E-commerce
  •  Retail channels

THE BUDGET

  Target:  $8,500 to cover the following business launch needs:


THE PERKS



NOT CURRENTLY ABLE TO CONTRIBUTE - NOT TO WORRY!

There are plenty of ways that you can support the cause:

1.   Like us on FaceBook at https://facebook.com/glofingerz

2.  Join our mailing list at http://glofingerz.com/contact-us.html

3.  Share us with your friends!

story:
Inception

Sothy has been a market gardener for over two decades. An inventor at heart, he would always create new things to make work easier. This is how the Wire Weeder came about.
Wire Weeder is a simple tool which utilises a wire to pull out weeds . The wire isn't sharp and won't cut. Simply apply a small downward pressure to the tool whilst dragging it across the ground; weeds will be pulled out by their roots and you will be left with a clean and lightly tilled surface.

Our Philosophy

Eating organically grown fruits and vegetables has always been important to our family and has also become more important to others. Before the advent of "man made" pesticides and herbicides, organic farming was the norm. Limiting the amount of chemicals we ingest is healthier and in turn will also benefit our environment.

Many of us opt for the choice that makes things easier and we think that using the Wire Weeder is the easiest and fastest way to organically do the weeding even when compared to using herbicides.

Simple design

Wire Weeder is made to last. Materials we use include:

  1. A UV resistant plastic for the handle.
  2. Spring steel for the forks to help resist permanent bending and used to locate the wire at an optimal position
  3. A high tensile wire is used for the most important component that does the "work".

The only maintenance required is cleaning off the dirt and replacing the wire when required. From our experience, we would replace the wire 2 to 3 times a season, and that's with commercial use. Replacing the wire is straightforward, and we'll give you instructions on how to do so.




What will I get?

With every Wire Weeder you will receive 4 replacement wires. The final product will come in orange.

Please be aware that shipping costs are separate from your pledge and is at a flat rate of $5 worldwide.


Where are we at?

The design has been finalised and is ready for manufacturing. What we need now is the money to fund tooling and the initial production run. Your contributions will help us bring our product to market and you'll also assist us in bringing a revolution to weed management. We strive to make the Wire Weeder available in the Q2 of 2016.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are a number of reasons why not all of us can contribute financially, but you can still help. If you think our device could be useful to someone you know, please help us get the word out by sharing it with your network on the various social media platforms.

story:
The Idea

Hello, my name is Jacob Willis, and I am the creator of MoneyStat.

Personal finances used to be such a burden for me when I was younger. A few years ago, I created a custom budget spreadsheet to make things a little easier. For the most part, it helped me to know how much money I had available at any point in time so that I didn’t accidentally spend too much and overdraft my account. Over the years I tweaked and improved it so that it did most of the organizing automatically. As helpful as it was, I realized that spreadsheets are still very limiting. I wanted an app that I could access anytime on my smartphone, that had calendar reminders built in, and that basically did all my budgeting for me. I looked around for an app that could take care of those needs, but I wasn’t able to find one. Most apps or budget programs out there function on a monthly basis and don’t account for the fact that most people are paid biweekly, so paychecks never line-up. They also don’t factor in things like grace periods and late fees. I wanted an app that did what my spreadsheet did, but with all the benefits that you get with an app, so I decided to just create one myself. That app is MoneyStat.

This campaign will help me and the amazing development team I am working with to get MoneyStat off the ground. This is something that I have been dreaming about and working on for years, and we have all the designs, functionality, and formulas figured out. It’s become so much more than just an idea, and we’re super excited about it! What we need from each of you now is your support so that we can hit our goal and make MoneyStat a reality so others can realize freedom from finances that I've experienced! We can’t do it without you!

What It Will Cost

The app will be FREE and that's why we need your help, to get this amazing FREE tool into everyone's hands. We decided this was too big of an idea and too important of a need to make everyone pay for it. So we decided to keep the basic version of the app  100% free to anyone with a smartphone or tablet device. We will NOT be selling or giving away anyone's data! PERIOD! What is on your device stays on your device and that's it.

To help sustain the company and keep the product growing we will be offering a premium monthly Cloud Sync service for $4.99/Month that will allow you to access your financial data in MoneyStat on multiple devices, share a single account with your significant other, help teach your kids how to budget and teach them sound financial practices, and give you access to a wealth of additional data and statistics about your financial habits. Everything will be kept secure, safe, and encrypted. We are still committed to your privacy and will NOT be selling or giving away anyone's data! PERIOD! It's your data, and your privacy. Reporting information will all be calculated and generated on the fly. Information stored will be kept to a minimum and what we can encrypt we will. We'll be using this too and will protect your data with as much care as we do our own!

What We Need

We feel that MoneyStat is too important to not give it 100% of what it deserves, so we have decided to launch our campaign with fixed funding. We will only receive the funding if we reach our full goal of $15,000, which will cover MoneyStat’s programming and development. This task will be completed by ThinkDigital.io, a local development team with many years of experience. The members are hard workers, and I personally know and trust each one of them. Feel free to check out their website to learn more about them yourselves!

What You Will Get

When you pre-order MoneyStat, you can expect the following unique features, and more!

Platforms We're Targeting

We're targeting iPhones running iOS 8 and higher and Android devices running Jelly Bean / 4.2 and higher. In addition any subscribers to the MoneyStat Secure Cloud Sync service will be able to use the service on a web browser on any modern device, smartphone, tablet, laptop, or desktop.

iPhone

Android

iOS 8+

Jelly Bean 4.2+

Devices this should include are 

  • iPhone 4S
  • iPhone 5
  • iPhone 5C
  • iPhone 5S
  • iPhone 6
  • iPhone 6+
  • Samsung Galaxy S3 / S4 / S5
  • Samsung Galaxy S6 / S6 Edge
  • Samsung Galaxy Note3
  • Motorola Moto G
  • Moto X
  • LG G4
  • OnePlus 2
If you have a question about whether your device will be supported drop us a comment and we'd be happy to answer it for you. Eventually we want to support every device and platform and we have some stretch goals in mind to work towards that. Our next platform we would target would be Windows Phones and then Tablets for all 3 platforms. 

The Projected Features

Bill Reminders

Bill reminders with custom alerts to help you keep track of due dates. Has a calendar view as well as the main list view of transactions in order by due date. Never accidentally forget about or pay a bill late again.

Budget Assistant

Calculates the most efficient, cost-effective and timely way to pay bills based on your current balance and budget. If you fall short, MoneyStat will calculate the best adjustments to compensate; in essence, it is predictive budgeting.

Quick Receipts

Easily and quickly track your daily transactions. Depending on how advanced we are able to make the program, this will be done through easy manual entries, receipt scans, or bank account access that does everything for you.

Check-to-check Plan

Adjusts budget categories based on your pay schedule, not monthly like most other budget programs. Also calculates ahead and adjusts budget accordingly for bills that don’t match up with your pay schedule.

Money Statistics

Know your spending habits so that you can adjust either your habits or your budget accordingly. If you consistently spend more on a particular category than you have budgeted, it will alert you so you can either increase that category’s budget or adjust your spending. If you spend money consistently on a non-budgeted category, like movie theaters, fast food, etc., then it will recommend a new budget category. Knowledge is power, so knowing your budget in depth is the best way to control it.

Debt Tracker

Tracks your progress for paying off debts and calculates which debts to put extra money towards or to pay off first so you can save the most money.

Late Payment Logic

Lets you know when to pay bills late. If your account is projected to go negative, MoneyStat will instead suggest a late payment for the bill with the least expensive late fee. For example, late fees for cell phone bills are usually around $5, whereas for credit cards they are usually around $25.

The Impact

“Where the heck did all my money go?” Since MoneyStat's conception, this phrase rang true with everyone who we determined to help. We realized that we ALL need to manage our budget more efficiently, but in a way that is actually applicable to real life. So many people, maybe your close friends, could’ve saved their homes or at least put food on the table if they had just been able to get their money problems under control. But we all go through that; the reality is that we (us, the MoneyStat creators and developers) have had to live paycheck-to-paycheck ourselves, so we set out to offer everyone the opportunity to experience REAL financial stability and be able to do what they choose with their money. Let us help bring you one step closer to a complete peace of mind that we wholeheartedly believe all should be able to enjoy.

Risks & Challenges

There are always hurdles when you have a vision and genuinely want it realized and working just as you thought it would. Nothing goes exactly to plan, but we can certainly do our best to make the plan go as smoothly as possible. But one of the biggest challenges that we have is to build our name as a reputable, reliable source for budgeting solutions. We understand why people might be weary to enter personal information like account numbers and such, after all these are your finances and your good name. We get all that, and that is why we are working with more than capable ThinkDigital to go through all the specs and security so that when people use our product, they know they can really put their trust in MoneyStat. Furthermore, we are working deeper with ThinkDigital’s marketing department to really let people know that when it comes to a personal financial assistant, there is no comparison to MoneyStat!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can monetarily contribute large sums to our vision, but that’s not the only way to help us reach our goals! We need you to journey with us, and help share our story! There are already share tools attached to the campaign, so go ahead and utilize those! But don’t just stop there! Talk to people about it, share it on your social media accounts, let people know how much MoneyStat helped your own finances and help spread this entire idea of personal financial management and peace of mind so that we can actually make it a reality! It’s all hands on deck to help bring this to life!

We understand why people might be weary to enter personal information like account numbers and such, after all these are your finances and your good name. We get all that, and that is why we are working with more than capable ThinkDigital to go through all the specs and security so that when people use our product, they know they can really put their trust in MoneyStat. Furthermore, we are working deeper with ThinkDigital’s marketing department to really let people know that when it comes to a personal financial assistant, there is no comparison to MoneyStat!
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone can monetarily contribute large sums to our vision, but that’s not the only way to help us reach our goals! We need you to journey with us, and help share our story! There are already share tools attached to the campaign, so go ahead and utilize those! But don’t just stop there! Talk to people about it, share it on your social media accounts, let people know how much MoneyStat helped your own finances and help spread this entire idea of personal financial management and peace of mind so that we can actually make it a reality! It’s all hands on deck to help bring this to life!

story:
Short Summary

We are a small company founded by two friends trying to find cool solutions for daily problems. Yochai Paran – Electronics Engineer and Oded Matas- Mechanical
Engineer. Together with our friend, Yadin Porat, we came up with a solution to one of the most frustrating  things for young parents – How not to lose precious time searching for pacifiers while our sweet and beloved baby is crying. Or even worse - threatens to wake up if the saver pacifier does not enter his mouth immediately.

As most young parents we suffered a lot untill an idea came up and NELI (Never
lose it) was created in our frustrated minds.

NELI will beep and flash when you whistle to it. It will reveal itself and help all
parents and their babies sleep better.

Our first prototype was very basic but did the trick:


Our proto raised a few issues and challenges:

- How are we going to sterilize and clean it without harming the electronics?

- How to maintain low weight to fit a baby's mouth?

- How to make sure it will not beep when not asked to ( false alarms)

- And of course – How to prepare it for serial production. 

After a few months of intensive work we came up with our current cool NELI prototype.


The first two challenges were solved - The electronics part is bayonet detachable for safe and easy cleaning and the weight is minimal.

Although our prototype is great we still have two costly issues to solve and that’s why we need your help. To complete the design and start serial production we still have some work to do:

1.  Redesign the electronic module to eliminate all false alarms. We estimate this task at 6 months and $40,000.

2. Serial production preparation is easy but the most costly part. Plastic injection molds , production fixtures and packaging design are estimated at 5 months and $130,000

3. We estimate some more logistics and certifications (Like FDA approval) at another $20,000.

Help us bring NELI to serial production and help all parents sleep better . In return for your help and contribution  we are offering  the following Perks:

For $10 - If you like our idea and just want help with a small contribution we'll send you a NELI picture with our thank you note.

For $50 - Together with our thanks , we'll send you one (1) boy's or a girl's NELI and you'll get to be one of the first few to have it.


For $70 - Together with our thanks, we'll send you one ( 1)  boy's or a girl's NELI packed in a fancy gift package and you'll get to be one of the first few to have it.


For $150 - Together with our thanks, we'll send you one (1) boy's or a girl's NELI  and you'll be able to choose the name to appear on the back of your pacifer , instead of the NELI logo .


For $1000 - Together with our deep appreciation and one of the above choices , you'll get to be mentioned and your name printed on the back of all NELI's packages, as a contributer to bringing NELI to the market.
 

We don't belive in partial work , so  If we don't reach our entire funding  goal we'll not claim it and you'll get your contribution back, with our thanks.

If we'll reach the funding goal the promised perks are garentied .

story:
GREEN ROSALES

- Organic and nicotine-free Hemp Cigarettes


As a smoker for more than 20 years, I continually tried to find an effective remedy to ease the process of quitting the cigarettes completely. I tried several very different products but always ended up surrendering to the urge and long-time habit of smoking. As these remedies did not have the desired effect on me, I started searching for a substitute for tobacco and it was during this process I discovered ‘Industrial grade hemp’. Though traditional cannabis is often used as an illegal drug, other strains of the same plant species has other uses. Industrial grade hemp is already used as a legal raw material for as various purposes as animal feed, clothing fibers, car panels and bedding material etc. Industrial hemp is known to contain an insignificant amount of the intoxicating substance THC (Tetrahydrocannabinol) - it contains as little as 0,2% and has absolutely no intoxicating effect at all. I have now joined forces with some like-minded people and we are hoping IndieGoGo will be be the perfect platform for the start-up of a project like ours.


We call ourselves GREEN ROSALES and we would like to produce organic and nicotine-free Hemp Cigarettes and make them available as a product for smokers worldwide. The Green Rosales Hemp Cigarettes contain no nicotine, are produced 100% organic and are a less toxic alternative to smoking tobacco. As the Green Rosales Hemp Cigarettes produce a thick and soothing white smoke, which tastes mildly of hemp, they can be used as a placebo for smokers who want to fully quit their addiction to nicotine. You cannot get addicted to Hemp Cigarettes as they contain 0% nicotine.


We are not endorsing anyone to smoke, even though our Hemp Cigarettes are not addictive. But if you want to QUIT smoking we encourage you to try our Green Rosales Hemp Cigarettes by participating in our crowdfunding and help us make our product a reality.


We have set our crowdfunding goal at $100.000 as this will enable us to set up a small-scale production of our Hemp Cigarettes. One of the primary reasons Green Rosales Hemp Cigarettes is launched through IndieGoGo is to explore if there is a marked for a product like this. We are in collaboration with an organic and authorized hemp farmer, who grows the hemp we need for our Hemp Cigarettes and by launching a crowdfunding we will be able to know the quantity needed to meet the hopefully substantial demand for a product like this.

We hope to get support from everyone who wants to quit smoking tobacco or, at least, smoke an organic product with no nicotine or additives. If we can get enough people to support these organic and legal Hemp Cigarettes, we will try to make the product available through resellers worldwide.

The setup of a larger production is depended on, whether this crowdfunding on IndieGoGo gets overfunded or not. If sufficient overfunding is achieved, we will use these funds primarily for the set-up of a larger-scaled production to meet the demand but we will also launch a scientifically sound study of the hemp plant and the benefits of smoking hemp instead of tobacco.

If we do not reach our goal, the gained funds will be used for sponsoring the scientific study as mentioned above.


Tell people about the Green Rosales Hemp Cigarettes and support our crowdfunding by sharing on IndieGoGo and Your favorite social media.

story:
Diet Tracking to Avoid Overfeeding

Childhood obesity is one of the most serious public health challenges of the 21st century. Globally, in 2015 the number of overweight children under the age of five, is estimated to be over 42 million. Overweight and obese children are likely to stay obese into adulthood and more likely to develop noncommunicable diseases like diabetes and cardiovascular diseases at a younger age. (Global Strategy on Diet, Physical Activity and Health. WHO.)

Inattention to a child’s hunger and satiety cues has been associated with infant overfeeding. (American Academy of Pediatrics.) The continuously growing population of working parents has encouraged multiple family members to raise the baby in joint effort. On the other hand, without a proper knowledge sharing mechanism, satiety cues are often overlooked.  

How Feedibaby helps?

Feedibaby makes it a breeze to keep track, recall and analyze your baby’s most important feeding and growth information. We have all the features you would normally expect to assist you from the time baby is a newborn to 18 months.

We take your privacy very seriously and take all precautions to ensure confidential information is stored safely and can only be accessed by the user and subsequently user verified accounts.

Go Automatic with Feedibaby Smart Dock

Go automatic when you purchase our Feedibaby Smart dock – the first of its kind and a game-changer for every mom. Our device works seamlessly with our App to automatically track the volume, timing, meal type and temperature of every feed.

Compatible with Major Bottles & Jars

It is compatible with the most trusted and popular baby container brands including: Dr Brown, Tomme Tippe, Philips Avent, NUK, Chu Chu, Pigeon, Difrax. Heinz, Hipp and more.

Local Storage

Feedibaby blends in the intimate feeding process with 15-day local storage. After feeding, parents can focus on burping and interacting with your precious one. When your baby is sweetly falls asleep, you may connect the dock with the App to collect the locally stored feeding data.  

BPA-free Material

Feedibaby is made of BPA-free materials Tritan and Silicone. It enables the dock to be strong to withstand drop, while keeping the Silicone flexible to fit a great variety of bottles and jars and easy to clean. 

Temperature Sensor

In the premium Feedibaby dock, there is a non-contact temperature sensor to measure whether the milk temperature is suitable for feeding.

 

Perks

Feedibaby comes in a set which includes a pair of adapters and a smart dock. Simply slip the flexible adapter onto your baby's bottle or puree jar before you feed, and place the bottle onto the Feedibaby dock afterwards. Data on consumption will be automatically stored.

 

Every Meal Shapes a Better Way to Feed

A proper diet pattern in the first 5 years of life could sharply reduce the baby risk of adult obesity and food allergy. We're not saying having a good appetite on one day is something worrying, but if your is drinking more than the WHO suggestions for 2 weeks or more, there's something we need to pay attention to.

Feedibaby is therefore here to visualize the pattern and encourage everyone in the family to tackle the issue together. Compared with manual logging on papers, Feedibaby collects massive data and draws insights from the pattern spotted. Every meal we collect not only helping a single baby, but also taking the guesswork out of how the next generation feeding our precious ones.

story:
This is FitBowl

In daily life, we always unconsciously give more food to our dog than we think. Maybe a bite more, but bite by bite, our dog will be on the way to be overweight or even obese, which will cause weight-related diseases as time goes by.

We all know the importance of a healthy weight for our dogs. FitBowl is specially designed for maintaining our dog’s weight at a safer weight.

Smarter Feeding

Healthier Feeding:

Guiding appropriate calories your dog should take everyday. Daily calories your dog should take are timely adjusted through her weight trend. In this way of constant data correction and adjustment, your dog will eventually reach its own optimal weight.

 

Adjustable Height：

Helping your dog feed with a proper height，which reduces pressure on his leg joints and neckbone. Meanwhile, with the head above the stomach, food travels more efficiently down the digest track.

Removable Barriers:

Choosing better way to feed your dog with or without easy-to-wash removable barriers.

Features

  • Wet/Dry Food:  Works with either wet or dry food, even water.
  • 3-Way Installations: Either hanging on wall or on cage. Even on wall, you can choose a strong fastener or four screws to fix FitBowl.
  • Microwave and dishwasher safe: Easy to wash & easy to heat.
  • Battery: Straight three-month use.
  • Manage the meals: Record daily food portion and calories.
  • Track weight trend: The food portion is constantly adjusted due to the actual weight trend.
  • No socket：You can place it anywhere you like.

How it works

One difficulty realized by many veterinarians is the need to accurately prescribe the amount of food that dog owner should feed to the dog in order to attain the optimum level of health for the dog. The first step to accurately prescribe the amount of food is to accurately assess the energy needs of the dog. That’s what FitBowl is doing. FitBowl calculates the energy your dog daily need upon the details of dog’s breed, age, gender, weight, activity level, BCS (Body Condition Scoring), castrated or spayed and food. Btw, the technique of BCS is the most accessible and popular method for estimating obesity in dogs.

FitBowl is a smart bowl for weight control management system which includes weight gain, weight loss and weight maintenance. This system comprising an App with data entry system coupled advanced data analysis system and configured to receive information regarding a defined energy need of an individual dog to transmit the information to FitBowl to weight the food.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Bring any smart hardware product to fulfillment is a significant undertaking. Our biggest challenge will be missing our shipping delivery deadline. Since this is our third run of prototypes, we may improve FitBowl depending on your advice and market feedbacks. Sometimes, things just go unplanned: a supplier misses a deadline, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. However, any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise and an ultimate goal of making the FitBowl for you.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Please contact info@domusbot.com with further questions or requests.
1.    How long is FitBowl warranty coverage?
Two years.
2.    What foods are suitable for FitBowl?
FitBowl works with all dry/wet dog foods and water.
3.    What’s the power supply?
FitBowl takes one ER18505M battery that lasts approximately 3 months.
4.    Is FitBowl dishwasher/microwave safe?
Yes, just feel free to clean it as you always do and to poo it into the microwave.
5.    Where can u download the App?
The App is free in the Apple iTunes Store.
6.    What are FitBowl 3-way installations?
➢    Fixed on the wall with screws.
➢    Fixed on the wall with strong fastener.
➢    Hang directly on the dog cage.
7.    How can I remove/install the slow-feed barriers?
With an easy twist, you can remove or install the barriers. You can check the video above to see how easy it is.

story:
What is Shilajit?

Shilajit is a rare compound comprised of a medley of naturally occurring ionic minerals native to the mighty Himalayan Mountains. It has been celebrated as a form of traditional medicine; as a rejuvenator with numerous pharmacological activities for over 3,000 years.

Figure 1: Himalayas

 

My Journey

I embarked on this journey more than 3 years ago when I was sourcing the best product to improve my health. After doing extensive research and trying various brands I came to a conclusion that more than 90% of the products are absolute fake and unsuitable for consumption. Part of my research led me to the mighty Himalayas i.e. the original source of Shilajit. I invested quite a bit of time to source the right locations & materials,  and discovered traditional purification techniques from ancient text. Shilajit comes in the following grades:

  • Gold and Red (Top Grade)
  • Yellow (2nd Grade)
  • Grey (3rd Grade)
  • Brown (4th Grade)

All other grades are of inferior quality and not suitable for humans due to impurities and low efficacy. Most suppliers add fulvic acid (a component of fertilizer) to their products to increase volume and claim minimum content. Shilajit is an organic compound that has approx. 30 minerals in ionic forms. Fulvic, Humic and Amino Acids are naturally found in shilajit and the content will vary depending on it's source even if it is sourced within the same mountain. Sourcing, grading, purification and sun drying are all important aspects to preserve it's true nature. We also test each batch through an independent laboratory to check for heavy metals and it's quality.

 

We have raised the bar to introduce an Authentic and Pure Gold Grade Shilajit.

Figure 2: K2 Mountain

 

Fair Trade Shilajit

We take pride in our product and our process. Without the support of local villagers and communities in the Himalyan mountain range, it would be impossible to bring the highest grade of shilajit to you. All of our shilajit is 'fair-trade' meaning we provide fair compensation to those who harvest and process our product before it is passed along to you.

Doing Our Part to Give Back

In addition to employment opportunities and fair compensation, we also donate a percentage of our proceeds to local communities to help provide basic health care and support education initiatives in the area.

Figure 3: Giving Back to Local Communities

 

Bottled in Miron Glass

Miron Glass is a high-quality, violet-coloured glass that works as a natural filter to block harmful aspects of sunlight and only allows UV-A and infrared light to pass through. Miron Glass packaging will preserve the quality of the shilajit, protect against environmental factors, and prevent the molecular decay of the substances.

Figure 4: Miron Glass

 

Benefits of Shilajit

Experience first-hand benefits for your mind and body. From the  inside out, this natural remedy can help contribute to your health and  well-being.

Enhanced Brain Health

– Shilajit has been used as a cognitive and memory enhancer.

Rejuvenation & Slow Aging

– it can help slow down the aging process and aid in rejuvenation due to its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.

Hormonal Balance

–  it helps promote a natural hormonal balance within your body,  especially reproductive hormone functions, through a gradual increase  over time.

Relieve Stress & Anxiety

–  preliminary studies have noted Shilajit’s ability to increase dopamine  levels, increasing your ability to counteract day-to-day stress and  anxiety.

Effective Weight Management

– adding pure shilajit to your diet is a great way to improve the efficiency of your metabolism and boost your energy.

Decrease Fatigue & Increase Energy

–  rich in fulvic and humic acids, shilajit is a natural and effective  source of energy and can help decrease symptoms of chronic fatigue.

Figure 5: The Mighty Himalayas

 

Our Group (Established 1890)

We have a long history of being in business for over 4 generations. Established in 1890, our group companies are involved in manufacturing, imports, exports,  distribution & services for a wide variety of products such as  Textiles, Iron & Steel, Plastics, Porcelain Tableware, Aluminum,  Dyes & Chemicals, Healthcare, Consulting Services & General  Merchandise.

Continuing on this legacy, I feel privileged to introduce the finest resin of pure shilajit that you can cherish and bring back your health to peak harmony.

In celebration of this, we are introducing a 45 grams packaging i.e. 50% more product than our competitors at better prices + provided an option with the addition to 24k pure gold that exceeds 100 PPM. 

 

REWARDS - Designed for You

Figure 6: Rewards Chart

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Common risks and challenges of working in the Himalayas is the weather and rough terrain. We have made arrangements with the villagers to store the raw materials for us on an ongoing basis to avoid any disruption to the supply. We understand the current situation due to COVID-19 but don't anticipate delays in bottling and resin availability. There are delays in shipping during the pandemic and we have factored that in to adhere to our delivery schedules. We anticipate all deliveries to be completed before end of Oct 2020.
story_txt:
What is Shilajit?Shilajit is a rare compound comprised of a medley of naturally occurring ionic minerals native to the mighty Himalayan Mountains. It has been celebrated as a form of traditional medicine; as a rejuvenator with numerous pharmacological activities for over 3,000 years. Figure 1: Himalayas My JourneyI embarked on this journey more than 3 years ago when I was sourcing the best product to improve my health. After doing extensive research and trying various brands I came to a conclusion that more than 90% of the products are absolute fake and unsuitable for consumption. Part of my research led me to the mighty Himalayas i.e. the original source of Shilajit. I invested quite a bit of time to source the right locations & materials,  and discovered traditional purification techniques from ancient text. Shilajit comes in the following grades:
Gold and Red (Top Grade)
Yellow (2nd Grade)
Grey (3rd Grade)
Brown (4th Grade)
All other grades are of inferior quality and not suitable for humans due to impurities and low efficacy. Most suppliers add fulvic acid (a component of fertilizer) to their products to increase volume and claim minimum content. Shilajit is an organic compound that has approx. 30 minerals in ionic forms. Fulvic, Humic and Amino Acids are naturally found in shilajit and the content will vary depending on it's source even if it is sourced within the same mountain. Sourcing, grading, purification and sun drying are all important aspects to preserve it's true nature. We also test each batch through an independent laboratory to check for heavy metals and it's quality. We have raised the bar to introduce an Authentic and Pure Gold Grade Shilajit.Figure 2: K2 Mountain Fair Trade ShilajitWe take pride in our product and our process. Without the support of local villagers and communities in the Himalyan mountain range, it would be impossible to bring the highest grade of shilajit to you. All of our shilajit is 'fair-trade' meaning we provide fair compensation to those who harvest and process our product before it is passed along to you.Doing Our Part to Give BackIn addition to employment opportunities and fair compensation, we also donate a percentage of our proceeds to local communities to help provide basic health care and support education initiatives in the area.Figure 3: Giving Back to Local Communities Bottled in Miron GlassMiron Glass is a high-quality, violet-coloured glass that works as a natural filter to block harmful aspects of sunlight and only allows UV-A and infrared light to pass through. Miron Glass packaging will preserve the quality of the shilajit, protect against environmental factors, and prevent the molecular decay of the substances. Figure 4: Miron Glass Benefits of ShilajitExperience first-hand benefits for your mind and body. From the  inside out, this natural remedy can help contribute to your health and  well-being.Enhanced Brain Health– Shilajit has been used as a cognitive and memory enhancer.Rejuvenation & Slow Aging– it can help slow down the aging process and aid in rejuvenation due to its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.Hormonal Balance–  it helps promote a natural hormonal balance within your body,  especially reproductive hormone functions, through a gradual increase  over time.Relieve Stress & Anxiety–  preliminary studies have noted Shilajit’s ability to increase dopamine  levels, increasing your ability to counteract day-to-day stress and  anxiety.Effective Weight Management– adding pure shilajit to your diet is a great way to improve the efficiency of your metabolism and boost your energy.Decrease Fatigue & Increase Energy–  rich in fulvic and humic acids, shilajit is a natural and effective  source of energy and can help decrease symptoms of chronic fatigue.Figure 5: The Mighty Himalayas Our Group (Established 1890)We have a long history of being in business for over 4 generations. Established in 1890, our group companies are involved in manufacturing, imports, exports,  distribution & services for a wide variety of products such as  Textiles, Iron & Steel, Plastics, Porcelain Tableware, Aluminum,  Dyes & Chemicals, Healthcare, Consulting Services & General  Merchandise.Continuing on this legacy, I feel privileged to introduce the finest resin of pure shilajit that you can cherish and bring back your health to peak harmony.In celebration of this, we are introducing a 45 grams packaging i.e. 50% more product than our competitors at better prices + provided an option with the addition to 24k pure gold that exceeds 100 PPM.  REWARDS - Designed for YouFigure 6: Rewards Chart    Risks and challengesCommon risks and challenges of working in the Himalayas is the weather and rough terrain. We have made arrangements with the villagers to store the raw materials for us on an ongoing basis to avoid any disruption to the supply. We understand the current situation due to COVID-19 but don't anticipate delays in bottling and resin availability. There are delays in shipping during the pandemic and we have factored that in to adhere to our delivery schedules. We anticipate all deliveries to be completed before end of Oct 2020.

story:
Matt Bottle è la prima bottiglia termica Hi-Tech pensata e disegnata in Italia. Permette di portare con te la tua bevanda preferita, di ascoltare la musica che ami e di avere sempre a disposizione una stazione di ricarica per il tuo dispositivo.

 

Matt Bottle is the first Hi-Techthermal bottle conceived and designed in Italy. It allows you to take your favorite drink with you, listen to the music you love and always have a charging station available for your device.

 

 

 

FREE SHIPPING IN ALL EUROPE...

 

 

Perché Matt Bottle?

Nata da un'idea per risolvere un problema di spazio e comodità, Matt Bottle si pone sul mercato come una soluzione innovativa, con l'obbiettivo di semplificare con un'unico prodotto diverse esigenze!

 

Why Matt Bottle?

Born from an idea to solve a problem of space and comfort, Matt Bottle is placed on the market as an innovative solution, with the aim of simplifying different needs with a single product!

 

 

 

 

Caratteristiche:

 

  • 2 pareti isolate
  • cassa bluetooth da 4W
  • Power Bank da 4000 mah
  • Usb Type C di ultima generazione
  • Indicatore di stato a led
  • Resistente all'acqua
  • Design innovativo 3 in 1

 

Specifications:

 

  • 2 insulated walls
  • 4W bluetooth speaker
  • Power Bank 4000 mah
  • Usb Type C, last generation
  • LED status indicator
  • Waterproof  body
  • Innovative design 3 in 1

 

 

 

 

 

Portala sempre con te, ovunque...

 

Prova ad immaginarti durante la pausa pranzo di lavoro, una gita in montagna, un pic-nic al lago... Matt Bottle manterrà la tua bevanda calda/fredda e attraverso la sua cassa bluetooth riprodurrà la tua musica preferita. 

Ma se il tuo telefono fosse scarico?? nessun problema, fa anche da Power Bank ;)

 

Always with you, everywhere...

 

Try to imagine yourself during your business lunch break, mountains trip, a picnic at the lake ... Matt Bottle will keep your drink hot/cold and through its bluetooth speaker it will play your favorite music. 

And if the phone was exhaust?? no problem, it also a Power Bank ;)

 

 

 

 

La borraccia con la sua doppia parete isolata permette di tenere calda la vostra bevanda per 12 ore e fredda fino a 24 ore.

 

The bottle with its double insulated wall allows you to keep your drink warm for 12 hours and cold for up to 24 hours.

 

 

 

 

Con la cassa bluetooth da 4W puoi portare sempre con te la tua musica preferita: al mare, con gli amici, in una passeggiata in montagna o durante una seduta di yoga, insomma... ovunque tu voglia!!

 

With the 4W bluetooth speaker you can always take your favorite music with you: at the beach, with friends, on a walk in the mountains or during a yoga session, definitely... wherever you want!!

 

 

 

 

Grazie al power bank integrato da 4000 mah con uscita USB Type C ti scorderai completamente del problema batteria, avrai a disposizione sempre con te una stazioni di ricarica per il tuo smartphone, il tuo ipad o qualsasi altro device.

 

Thanks to the integrated 4000 mah power bank with USB Type C output you will completely forget about the battery problem, you will always have a charging station for your smartphone, your ipad or any other device with you.

 

 

 

 

Time Line:

 

  • Febbraio 2020: Fase di progettazione
  • Giugno 2020: Analisi di mercato
  • Luglio 2020: Ricerca fornitori
  • Settembre 2020: Verifica Campione
  • Novembre 2020: Inizio campagna su Indiegogo

 

Se la campagna riscuote successo...

 

  • Marzo 2021: Consegna in esclusiva per i nostri sostenitori
  • Maggio 2021: Influencer Marketing
  • Giugno 2021: Lancio dello store ufficiale mattbottle.com

 

Time Line:

 

  • February 2020: Design stage
  • June 2020: Market Analysis 
  • July 2020: Search for suppliers
  • September 2020: Sample verification
  • November 2020: Start campaign on Indiegogo 

​

If the campaign is successful...

 

  • March 2021: Delivery for our supporters
  • May 2021: Influencer Marketing
  • June 2021: The official store mattbottle.com is Born

 

 

 

 

Rischi & Sfide

Se la campagna avrà successo, abbiamo già preso accordi con i nostri fornitori per avviare velocemente la produzione. Noi ce la metteremo tutta per rispettare i tempi di consegna dichiarati monitorando costantemente le varie fasi. Chiaramente, può sempre capitare qualche contrattempo, visto sopratutto il periodo, ma vi terremo sempre aggiornati durante tutto il processo...

Risks & Challenges

If the campaign is successful, we have already made arrangements with our suppliers to quickly start production. We will do our best to respect the delivery times stated by constantly monitoring the various phases. obviously some mishap can always happen, especially in this period but we will always keep you updated throughout the process...

 

 

Cosa Ci Serve & Cosa Avrai In Cambio

Per procedere con la creazione dello stampo definitivo dobbiamo ordinare un quantitativo minimo di pezzi, raggiunto questo target, partiremo immediatamente con la produzione in serie. Per assicurarvi la maggior garanzia possibile abbiamo optato per la formula "FIXED FUNDING", in questo modo vi verrà addebitato l'importo solo ed esclusivamente al raggiungimento dell'obbiettivo così che possiate essere certi di ricevere l'articolo.

What We Need & What You Get

To proceed with the creation of the definitive mold we must order a minimum quantity of pieces, once this target is reached, we will immediately start with mass production. To ensure the best possible guarantee we have opted for the "FIXED FUNDING" formula, in this way you will be charged the amount only and exclusively when the objective is reached so that you can be sure of receiving the item.

 

 

In Che Modo Puoi Aiutarci?

Sia che tu proceda con l'acquisto o meno sarebbe di grandissimo aiuto la condivisione del progetto con il maggior pubblico possibile. Utilizza gli strumenti di condivisione messi a disposizione qui su Indiegogo.

Grazie!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you proceed with the purchase or not, sharing the project with the largest possible audience would be of great help. Use the sharing tools made available here on Indiegogo.

Thanks !!!

 

 

FREE SHIPPING IN ALL EUROPE...
