story:
Hey Everyone! This is Stephen (guy in the video), and I wanted to thank you for coming to the Tier 3 Energy Drink Mix page. As the video stated, I have been an energy supplement junkie for over 10 years, and Tier 3 is like a love letter to energy drinks. I have cherry-picked the very best ingredients from all the products I've consumed over the years and combined them into the only energy supplement you'll need. It's made specifically with your workday in mind so you can stop wanting to take naps halfway through the day and start crushing the day. 

Tier 3 energy drink mix is single-serve packets with 3 choices of caffeine levels, while also containing nootropics for aiding in concentration and memory retention, electrolytes for maximum hydration and vitamins to boost your immune system. You simply add the contents of the stick to 12oz of water, stir, shake, or mix and BOOM; you're good to go.  It was created for your workday - whatever that looks like, as we all need more energy at work.

The graphic below shows the equivalent to how many cups of coffee equals the caffeine amount.

 

 

​Energy is what we all want more of. Tier 3 uses a combination of green coffee bean extract and theanine. The green coffee bean extract is a natural caffeine source, and theanine is a relaxing agent that doesn't sedate you. This awesome combo means that you get the alertness and energy from the caffeine but without the harsh jolt that caffeine usually brings. Think of it like taking off in a plane instead of slamming into your seat on a rocket. Theanine also helps with relaxation, so if your job is extra stressful, we have you.

Best part? Tier 3 lets you choose which caffeine level is right for you by offering 90mg of caffeine, 185mg of caffeine, or 285mg. You get the focus, hydration, and immune boosts at every level - so don't worry! All of this is also carried in convenient to-go packets. 

 

 

 

The focus blend is brought to you by nootropics, or brain vitamins as they're sometimes referred to. CDP-Choline is the first nootropic included that aids in increasing attention and memory retention while helping cognitive decline. Have you noticed how you feel more alert in the morning and more mentally sluggish as the day goes on? CDP-Choline helps alleviate that. 

L-Carnitine is up next, which also aids in decreasing cognitive decline while also supporting the learning markers in the brain. This practically means you can stay sharp longer and cut through the brain fog we all sometimes get.

Last and certainly not least is phosphatidylserine. This spelling bee participant's worst nightmare is a powerhouse of a nootropic, which aids in memory retention and increasing attention. It also helps regulate mood swings and reduce cortisol levels (cortisol is the stress hormone).

 

 

If you're anything like the team here at Tier 3, you carry around your water bottle wherever you go. We know staying hydrated is essential as staying hydrated leads to more energy, a clearer mind, better mood, and helps in weight loss. Tier 3 want's to make sure you're getting the most out of your water by adding potassium, sodium, and magnesium to the mix. Say goodbye to the sticky carbonated energy drinks, and hello to the hydrating energy mix of Tier 3. 

 

 

 

No one likes getting sick. Let's start using our sick days at work to spend more time with friends and family and leave the sickness behind. Tier 3 has vitamins D3 and C for the immune system boosts and vitamins B6 and B12, for an extra energy boost. 

 

 

Tier 3 uses natural flavoring and coloring, is keto diet-friendly, is 0g net carbs and has no sugar or added sugar. It is sweetened with a mixture of stevia and a little bit of erythritol, NOT sucralose. Sucralose is in a lot of our competitors, but we at Tier 3 weren't satisfied with some of the studies done on how it affects gut health and insulin levels.

Tier 3 will also launch with the Tropical flavor for all 3 strengths. We will also have a non-proprietary label once we begin manufacturing (meaning we tell you how much of each ingredient is in there).

 

 

 

As stated in the video, we need support in the form of $40,000. That number represents what it costs to manufacture the minimum amount of product for a manufacturing run (not cheap, I know). We have brought the product as far as we can financially, and we need YOUR help to get us this last mile to the finish line.

SO! In order to help you get you all fired up, we are offering Tier 3 boxes at a big discount to what it will eventually be at the retail level. If successfully funded, we will manufacture and have boxes with 15 sticks to a box. We are for the people here at Tier 3 after all, so you get to choose which levels you want to go in your box.

This means that if you're a total caffeine juggernaut and your significant other is a total caffeine whimp, no worries! You can build your box to satisfy both of you.

Tier 3 was also formulated here in the United States and will be manufactured right here in the United States. THIS IS ALSO AN ALL OR NOTHING FUNDING. Meaning, if we cannot reach our goal, Tier 3 will not be manufactured at this time. With that being said, if you contributed and this doesn't get funded, you will get your money back.

So pick the perk that you're comfortable contributing to and get your pre-order confirmed!

 

 

If we reach our goal of $40,000, we will then take that money straight to the manufacturer and begin manufacturing. They quoted us approximately 10 weeks to get everything right and packaged up to ship. We will, of course, be updating you all with every update we get. It's our hope that there's nothing but smooth sailing, but we will update you if any delays occur.

 

 

 

Tier 3 was made for YOUR workday. We wanted to make something that didn't just give energy, but other benefits like focus, memory retention, feeling hydrated, and boosting the immune system. This way, you can have more energy and a clearer mind to crush your workday. And as the video stated, I have been an energy drink consumer for YEARS. I know what works and what doesn't work, and Tier 3 combines the ingredients that just work. The chart below does a good job explaining the difference between the other guys and us.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This wouldn't be possible without your help! You all are the reason we are so excited to create Tier 3. We know it's a great product, but know sharing it with you means we all win!

It would mean a lot to us if you shared this campaign with anyone you think could benefit from a more energized workday - or your rich friends with a hole burning in their pocket! Please message us with any questions, and we will get back to you as soon as possible. hello@tier3energy.com.

Also, if you enjoyed the video and thought to yourself, "where can I get a professional video with cool directors and amazing end product?" the answer is here ----> https://www.millbrookstudios.com/  or email Carl at carl@millbrookstudios.com.

All graphics on the page were created and implemented by Mark Lawrence. He's a graphic design wizard who has been instrumental in our graphic design work at Tier 3 on both our social pages and this Indiegogo page. He can be reached at mark@andmarkdesign.com if you ever need a stellar graphic designer.
story_txt:
Hey Everyone! This is Stephen (guy in the video), and I wanted to thank you for coming to the Tier 3 Energy Drink Mix page. As the video stated, I have been an energy supplement junkie for over 10 years, and Tier 3 is like a love letter to energy drinks. I have cherry-picked the very best ingredients from all the products I've consumed over the years and combined them into the only energy supplement you'll need. It's made specifically with your workday in mind so you can stop wanting to take naps halfway through the day and start crushing the day. 


Tier 3 energy drink mix is single-serve packets with 3 choices of caffeine levels, while also containing nootropics for aiding in concentration and memory retention, electrolytes for maximum hydration and vitamins to boost your immune system. You simply add the contents of the stick to 12oz of water, stir, shake, or mix and BOOM; you're good to go.  It was created for your workday - whatever that looks like, as we all need more energy at work.
The graphic below shows the equivalent to how many cups of coffee equals the caffeine amount.


 

 
​Energy is what we all want more of. Tier 3 uses a combination of green coffee bean extract and theanine. The green coffee bean extract is a natural caffeine source, and theanine is a relaxing agent that doesn't sedate you. This awesome combo means that you get the alertness and energy from the caffeine but without the harsh jolt that caffeine usually brings. Think of it like taking off in a plane instead of slamming into your seat on a rocket. Theanine also helps with relaxation, so if your job is extra stressful, we have you.
Best part? Tier 3 lets you choose which caffeine level is right for you by offering 90mg of caffeine, 185mg of caffeine, or 285mg. You get the focus, hydration, and immune boosts at every level - so don't worry! All of this is also carried in convenient to-go packets. 
 

 

 
The focus blend is brought to you by nootropics, or brain vitamins as they're sometimes referred to. CDP-Choline is the first nootropic included that aids in increasing attention and memory retention while helping cognitive decline. Have you noticed how you feel more alert in the morning and more mentally sluggish as the day goes on? CDP-Choline helps alleviate that. 
L-Carnitine is up next, which also aids in decreasing cognitive decline while also supporting the learning markers in the brain. This practically means you can stay sharp longer and cut through the brain fog we all sometimes get.
Last and certainly not least is phosphatidylserine. This spelling bee participant's worst nightmare is a powerhouse of a nootropic, which aids in memory retention and increasing attention. It also helps regulate mood swings and reduce cortisol levels (cortisol is the stress hormone).
 

 
If you're anything like the team here at Tier 3, you carry around your water bottle wherever you go. We know staying hydrated is essential as staying hydrated leads to more energy, a clearer mind, better mood, and helps in weight loss. Tier 3 want's to make sure you're getting the most out of your water by adding potassium, sodium, and magnesium to the mix. Say goodbye to the sticky carbonated energy drinks, and hello to the hydrating energy mix of Tier 3. 
 

 

 
No one likes getting sick. Let's start using our sick days at work to spend more time with friends and family and leave the sickness behind. Tier 3 has vitamins D3 and C for the immune system boosts and vitamins B6 and B12, for an extra energy boost. 
 

 
Tier 3 uses natural flavoring and coloring, is keto diet-friendly, is 0g net carbs and has no sugar or added sugar. It is sweetened with a mixture of stevia and a little bit of erythritol, NOT sucralose. Sucralose is in a lot of our competitors, but we at Tier 3 weren't satisfied with some of the studies done on how it affects gut health and insulin levels.
Tier 3 will also launch with the Tropical flavor for all 3 strengths. We will also have a non-proprietary label once we begin manufacturing (meaning we tell you how much of each ingredient is in there).
 


 

 
As stated in the video, we need support in the form of $40,000. That number represents what it costs to manufacture the minimum amount of product for a manufacturing run (not cheap, I know). We have brought the product as far as we can financially, and we need YOUR help to get us this last mile to the finish line.
SO! In order to help you get you all fired up, we are offering Tier 3 boxes at a big discount to what it will eventually be at the retail level. If successfully funded, we will manufacture and have boxes with 15 sticks to a box. We are for the people here at Tier 3 after all, so you get to choose which levels you want to go in your box.
This means that if you're a total caffeine juggernaut and your significant other is a total caffeine whimp, no worries! You can build your box to satisfy both of you.
Tier 3 was also formulated here in the United States and will be manufactured right here in the United States. THIS IS ALSO AN ALL OR NOTHING FUNDING. Meaning, if we cannot reach our goal, Tier 3 will not be manufactured at this time. With that being said, if you contributed and this doesn't get funded, you will get your money back.
So pick the perk that you're comfortable contributing to and get your pre-order confirmed!
 

 
If we reach our goal of $40,000, we will then take that money straight to the manufacturer and begin manufacturing. They quoted us approximately 10 weeks to get everything right and packaged up to ship. We will, of course, be updating you all with every update we get. It's our hope that there's nothing but smooth sailing, but we will update you if any delays occur.
 


 

 
Tier 3 was made for YOUR workday. We wanted to make something that didn't just give energy, but other benefits like focus, memory retention, feeling hydrated, and boosting the immune system. This way, you can have more energy and a clearer mind to crush your workday. And as the video stated, I have been an energy drink consumer for YEARS. I know what works and what doesn't work, and Tier 3 combines the ingredients that just work. The chart below does a good job explaining the difference between the other guys and us.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This wouldn't be possible without your help! You all are the reason we are so excited to create Tier 3. We know it's a great product, but know sharing it with you means we all win!
It would mean a lot to us if you shared this campaign with anyone you think could benefit from a more energized workday - or your rich friends with a hole burning in their pocket! Please message us with any questions, and we will get back to you as soon as possible. hello@tier3energy.com.
Also, if you enjoyed the video and thought to yourself, "where can I get a professional video with cool directors and amazing end product?" the answer is here ----> https://www.millbrookstudios.com/  or email Carl at carl@millbrookstudios.com.
All graphics on the page were created and implemented by Mark Lawrence. He's a graphic design wizard who has been instrumental in our graphic design work at Tier 3 on both our social pages and this Indiegogo page. He can be reached at mark@andmarkdesign.com if you ever need a stellar graphic designer.

story:
English readers please scroll down----------------------------------------------------------------------

L'histoire de Sam on Board

Il y a quelques années, j'ai fait des crises d'asthme sévères qui m'ont valu des hospitalisations au service des urgences et en pneumologie. Je précise que je ne suis pas asthmatique. Après une multitude d'examens, le pneumologue m'a annoncé que j'étais victime d'un syndrome qui déclenche des crises d’asthme à la prise de certains médicaments. Comme je ne veux pas que cette maladie soit un frein à mon besoin de voyager, j'ai donc traduit sur papier, dans la langue du pays où je me trouvais, le nom du syndrome qui fait définitivement partie de ma vie ainsi que les produits qui peuvent déclencher les crises d'asthme.

Plus tard, alors que je me trouvais à l'aéroport d'Orly, j'ai rencontré à la descente de mon avion un couple d'espagnols qui avait l'air paniqué. Ils ne parlaient que leur langue maternelle et ne savaient pas comment expliquer leur problème. Je leur ai demandé ce qui se passait et la dame m'a expliqué que la compagnie avait oublié son bagage à Barcelone et que tous ses médicaments se trouvaient à l'intérieur. Je lui ai donc indiqué où se trouvait le service des urgences de l'aéroport afin qu'elle aille leur expliquer la situation et se faire prescrire le traitement adéquat. J'ai alors réalisé que j'étais loin d'être le seul à connaitre cette angoisse de ne pas être compris à l'étranger en cas d'urgence médicale. C'est à ce moment que j'ai décidé de me lancer dans la création d'une application mobile simple et intuitive qui pourrait faciliter la vie des personnes malades ou allergiques.

 

Les fonctions de Sam on Board 

Sam on Board est un interprète santé de poche gratuit. Cette application gratuite aide les personnes allergiques et malades en traduisant automatiquement leurs pathologies lors de leurs voyages à travers le monde. De par sa conception, la confidentialité des données est assurée et ne peut être partagée.

Plus besoin de parler, Sam parle à votre place. Les fonctionnalités de Sam on Board sont nombreuses.

J'aimerais que des millions de personnes malades et allergiques puissent bénéficier de cette aide. Cette application est conçue de telle sorte que la confidentialité de l'utilisateur soit préservée (aucune démarche commerciale ni fichier utilisateur). 

Pourquoi SAM a besoin d'argent? 

- Sam on Board aimerait devenir plus intelligent en ajoutant plus de fonctions
- Sam aimerait parler plus de langues
- Sam aimerait agrandir sa famille en créant une grande communauté à travers le monde

Pour chaque don à partir de 10€, vous recevrez de petits cadeaux de remerciement : 

ENGLISH VERSION 

The story of Sam on Board

A few years ago, I had severe asthma attacks that led to hospitalizations in the emergency department and in pneumology. I specify that I am not asthmatic. After a multitude of exams, the pulmonologist told me that I was suffering from a syndrome that triggers asthma attacks when taking certain medications. Since I do not want this disease to be a hindrance to my need to travel, I translated on paper, in the language of the country where I was, the name of the syndrome that is definitely part of my life and the products that can trigger asthma attacks.

Later, while I was at the Orly airport, I met a Spanish couple who was panicked when I got off the plane. They spoke only their mother tongue and did not know how to explain their problem. I asked them what was going on and the lady told me that the company had forgotten her luggage in Barcelona and that all her medicines were inside. I told her where the airport emergency department was so that she could explain the situation to them and be prescribed the appropriate treatment. I then realized that I was far from being the only one to know this anxiety of not being understood abroad in case of a medical emergency. That's when I decided to start creating a simple and intuitive mobile application that could make life easier for people who are sick or allergic.

 

The functions of the app

Sam on Board is a free pocket health interpreter. This free app helps people with allergies and disease by automatically translating their pathologies during their travels around the world. By design, data confidentiality is assured and can not be shared. No need to talk, Sam speaks for you. The features of Sam on Board are numerous.

 

I would like millions of sick and allergic people to benefit from this help. This application is designed so that the confidentiality of the user is preserved (no commercial approach or user file).

Why SAM needs money?

- Sam on Board would like to become smarter by adding more features
- Sam would like to speak more languages
- Sam would like to expand his family by creating a large community around the world

 

For each donation from 10€, you will receive small thank you gifts:

story:
What is VOXXBODY?®

We all want to be fit and healthy. That's why so many people invest their time and money in gym memberships, classes, home workouts, personal trainers, or fitness apps. 

But there's one crucial part of your body that is neglected by virtually every fitness program on the market today. Something you use every single day: your voice. 

I'm Charles Simmons, vocal coach, personal fitness trainer, and creator of The VOXXBODY® Vocal Fitness System. This award-winning workout combines fitness training and vocal exercises.

Many people hire me to help them get physically fit, or to help them improve their voices for shows, presentations, or general daily use. I created VOXXBODY® to be the best of both worlds. It allows you to train your voice and your body at the same time, through a series of safe, short, effective workouts. This saves you lots of time, money, and stress.

Who Is VOXXBODY® For?

VOXXBODY® is probably the world's first true full-body workout. It's great for

  • amateur, semi-professional & professional performers (singers, actors) who don’t have time to workout and take voice lessons separately
  • public speakers who want to improve their vocal and physical stamina
  • teachers & trainers who quickly lose their voices while teaching
  • fitness fans looking for a fun, innovative new way to train

 

The best part: you don't have to know how to sing to do VOXXBODY®! In fact, over 60% of our current VOXXBODY® users are not singers. I created the program for everyone who has a desire to improve their voices, get in shape, and have some fun in the process.

What We Need, What You Get

The feedback we've received since launching VOXXBODY in 2018 has been phenomenal. We are looking to secure funding for our newest program, VOXXBODY II®, a workout that will take our VOXXBODY® concept to a whole new level.

As part of the new program, we are proud to introduce the VOXXStick™, an innovative weight training device that compliments the brand-new workouts in VOXXBODY II®. The VOXXStick consists of two dumbbells, a weighted pole, and a base. This device can be used in three different modes:

  • Stage Mode, which looks like a microphone on a stand.
  • Barbell Mode, which allows it to be used like a classic barbell seen in gyms the world over.
  • Freddie Mode, which simulates the microphone setup of legendary Queen frontman Freddie Mercury.

 

The VOXXStick™ provides you with the necessary resistance to make your training physically challenging. At the same time, it will let you experience what it’s like to perform like your favorite artist. 

In other words: You’ll train like an athlete, but feel like a rock star.

Do you like Pop, Rock, R&B, Hip-Hop, Dance, or Latin-influenced music? We got you covered! VOXXBODY II® will have brand-new workouts that are more modular and genre-specific. This will allow you to freely mix and match your favorite music styles for your workout sessions. For example, you will be able to combine a Warmup circuit in an R&B style, a Core circuit in a Hip-Hop style, a Full-Body circuit in a Latin style, and a Cardio circuit in a Dance style. This gives you more flexibility in your workouts and makes VOXXBODY II® more fun. More genre-specific workouts will be made available in future updates.

My company, Charles Simmons Music & Fitness UG, needs 25.000€ to launch VOXXBODY II® and the VOXXStick™ worldwide. The funding will be used for the production of the new workout videos, prototyping and manufacturing of the VOXXStick™, and online advertising via our website and social media.

We have working mockups of the VOXXStick™ that we are using to choreograph the new workouts. We’re excited to be working with the company König and Meyer (www.k-m.de), one of the world’s leading makers of musical instrument accessories, on the production of the VOXXStick™.

Depending on your level of sponsorship, you will receive special discounts on (or free versions of) VOXXBODY®, VOXXBODY II® and the VOXXStick™. 

Even if we don't reach our complete funding goal, rest assured that your investment will be put to good use. As an early adopter, you will definitely receive the perk based on the amount of your investment. 

Risks & Challenges

Fitness trends come and go. It seems like a new exercise fad is popping up every week, and it's sometimes hard to keep up with every new trend. Rarely does a workout program come along that combines two things that everyone loves to do; in this case, working out and singing.

VOXXBODY® has been battle-tested. I've had the privilege of working with some of the most talented musicians in Europe and the USA, from my celebrity clients (Alice Merton, Rea Garvey, The Backstreet Boys, Marius-Müller Westernhagen, Guano Apes, Moses Pelham, Shaggy, and many more) to my students at the renowned University of Popular Music and Business (aka Popakademie) in Mannheim, Germany. All of them agree that VOXXBODY® is an innovative way to get physically and vocally fit.

I believe that everyone should reap the benefits of having a strong body and voice, which is why my company wants to bring VOXXBODY® to as many people as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

We need your help to build critical mass and help keep production costs down. But even if you can't make a financial contribution, you can still support the VOXXBODY® cause by doing the following:

  • Spread the word about our campaign among your family, friends, and colleagues.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.

 

With your backing and our expertise, we want to bring this innovative way to work out to everyone. Join us today, and together we’ll start a brand new fitness revolution!

Learn more about VOXXBODY® at voxxbody.com

story:
LET’S USE TECH FOR THE SOCIAL GOOD AND END LONELINESS

To treat this epidemic, we need to launch three unique social platforms. One for Millennials, one for Boomers and one for Gen Y.  Each platform will help users find “friends like them” in their own zip code. Next, our social psychologist hosts will identify potential groups of friends.

Then we will help these groups meet face-to-face at a series of sequential events. It takes time to make real friends -- and we’re after lasting results.

DONATE.

HELP END THIS SCARY EPIDEMIC BEFORE IT GETS WORSE!
Right now, almost half of Americans identify as lonely, a condition now closely associated with serious mental and medical health risks for Gen Y, Millenials and Boomers alike.

Plan B is to continue to rely on The National Hotline. Imagine if a hotline was all we did to end smoking. So let’s tackle loneliness together before it kills even more 18 to 20 year olds — and before it leads even more Millennials and Boomers to a profoundly unhealthy place both physically and emotionally.

WHY WE NEED $2.5 MILLION.

Each of our age-specific social platforms requires its own full menu of social psychologists, relationship specialists, and event and urban planners in addition to designers, engineers etc. Course correcting in real time is critical. Especially when we need to reach three very different generations in every zip code in America, both on and offline…

Once we launch, however, we fully expect all three of our age-specific social platforms to be self-sustaining just like every other social platform — through advertising. Offline, we also believe our peer dance nights, clubhouses and special events tactics will rapidly appeal to national and local event sponsors.

MEET THE LONELINESS INITIATIVE

We have one sole mission: to end loneliness.

At this point in time, we believe our brain’s need for companionship is now more than well documented. Yet, after years of awareness of the unique health and morbidity rate specific to Gen Y, Millennials and Boomers, we believe using technology to strategically and realistically take on loneliness at a grassroots level is far more effective as a cure than a hotline.

We want to start by creating age-specific online social platforms to encourage people feeling lonely to make meaningful connections with peers at their own pace (Instant coffee platforms risk far too high a rate of rejection to be effective). Once our metrics show groups in individual zip codes have interacted successfully, we will begin to migrate them offline via a series of consecutive events specific to their geographic location.

Yes, we also have a long game.

Our next step is to innovate and implement the kind of public spaces, clubhouses and events we no longer have in this country.

To accomplish our goal, we need YOUR  help.

One for Millennials, one for Boomers and one for Gen Y.  Each platform will help users find “friends like them” in their own zip code. Next, our social psychologist hosts will identify potential groups of friends.Then we will help these groups meet face-to-face at a series of sequential events. It takes time to make real friends -- and we’re after lasting results.DONATE.HELP END THIS SCARY EPIDEMIC BEFORE IT GETS WORSE!Right now, almost half of Americans identify as lonely, a condition now closely associated with serious mental and medical health risks for Gen Y, Millenials and Boomers alike.Plan B is to continue to rely on The National Hotline. Imagine if a hotline was all we did to end smoking. So let’s tackle loneliness together before it kills even more 18 to 20 year olds — and before it leads even more Millennials and Boomers to a profoundly unhealthy place both physically and emotionally.WHY WE NEED $2.5 MILLION.Each of our age-specific social platforms requires its own full menu of social psychologists, relationship specialists, and event and urban planners in addition to designers, engineers etc. Course correcting in real time is critical. Especially when we need to reach three very different generations in every zip code in America, both on and offline…Once we launch, however, we fully expect all three of our age-specific social platforms to be self-sustaining just like every other social platform — through advertising. Offline, we also believe our peer dance nights, clubhouses and special events tactics will rapidly appeal to national and local event sponsors.MEET THE LONELINESS INITIATIVEWe have one sole mission: to end loneliness.At this point in time, we believe our brain’s need for companionship is now more than well documented. Yet, after years of awareness of the unique health and morbidity rate specific to Gen Y, Millennials and Boomers, we believe using technology to strategically and realistically take on loneliness at a grassroots level is far more effective as a cure than a hotline.We want to start by creating age-specific online social platforms to encourage people feeling lonely to make meaningful connections with peers at their own pace (Instant coffee platforms risk far too high a rate of rejection to be effective). Once our metrics show groups in individual zip codes have interacted successfully, we will begin to migrate them offline via a series of consecutive events specific to their geographic location.Yes, we also have a long game.Our next step is to innovate and implement the kind of public spaces, clubhouses and events we no longer have in this country.To accomplish our goal, we need YOUR  help.

story:
Overview

Multiz helps you sit in the perfect posture, work from anywhere in your home, iron shirts faster, climb heights in safety and keep your handy stuff organized.

It is a 5-in-1 ergonomic chair, work desk, ironing board, ladder and mini-shelf, all in one.

Portable Work Desk

Working from home? Multiz is the perfect work desk that fits into your living spaces.

Whether you are working from the living room, bedroom, balcony or the garden, Multiz is lightweight, easily movable and has spacious legroom.

Ergonomic Chair: Improve Your Life

Effortlessly sit in perfect posture at home to prevent and ease back pain.

Good posture improves your mood, health, confidence and immune.

Faster Ironing Board

Multiz ironing board saves you time. The thick rounded edge on Multiz is a holder for shirt shoulders, making ironing faster and less tedious.

Climb in Safety

Functioning a two-step ladder, Multiz prevent accidents and falls caused by climbing with make-shift stands. Multiz is strong and steady for climbing to reach heights at home.

Organize Handy Stuff

Are there small items that you want handy but organized? The mini-shelf is a handy place to store books, magazines, keys, remote controls, iron, flowers and other items that you want handy but organized.

story:
Glossy Teeth Whitening Kit + Pens

 

Glossy Teeth Whitening Kit & Pens are made in Canada ensuring the highest quality ingredients. We currently have our mint kit and pens in pre-production. We will be ready to ship out by October 2020 if not sooner! The net proceeds will go towards expanding to amazon.com and amazon.ca before the holiday season! Our kits include 2ml MORE then the other kits on the market.

 

Teeth Whitening Kit

Apply a thin layer of gel & activate with the LED light for 20 minutes a day to achieve a whiter, brighter smile. Use daily until desired results are achieved.

Teeth Whitening Pen

Twist Pen to expose gel, brush and paint each tooth. After 1 minute, relax your smile and the gel will whiten your teeth without any sensitivity. Repeat use 1-2 times per day for best results and avoid eating or drinking for 1 hour after each use for best results. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Shipping will be done by October 2020 if not sooner with Shipwire ensuring no problems occur.

story:
Our mission

With my background as Vietnamese restaurateur and food importer, I always think about ways I can remind people of the beautiful Vietnamese cuisine they enjoy. I love PHO noodle soup and I know many people do ! But I don’t have the time to make the proper stock . I also don't want to use stockcubes containing MSG and preservatives. So I decide to make Pho stock cubes so I can have it anytime I want, quick and hassle –free without any nasties. And so can you. So please help me make this dream a reality. 


What is special about the products ?

  • Traditional, authentic recipe my Mum has passed on to me -  no nonsense, no cut-corner approach.
  •  Tasty and healthy with no MSG, preservatives 
  • Convenient – super easy to use and ready in seconds
  • Can be used to replace seasoning in instant noodles

A bit about me

I was born in An Giang, the Mekong Delta of Vietnam . I went to the UK to pursue my study at 17 years old on my own. Since graduating, I have been working as an Orthoptist for the NHS in Birmingham. With a passion in business and desire to contribute to Vietnam, I opened my first Vietnamese restaurant in Birmingham at 27. I then set up an import business importing Vietnamese foods to the UK two years later. I was chosen by the Vietnamese Embassy in London as business representative to promote bilateral trade link between UK-Vietnam in 2013.

Featured in Birmingham Post
Featured in Vietnam National Youth Newspaper


What are we doing with the money raised ?

We will make a big batch of delicious Pho stock cubes by collaborating with food scientists at the Regional Food Academy. The money will then be used to sharpen up our packaging. The cash also helps us to pay fees for food festivals, trade shows and pop up shops to promote the products.


Rewards

The column on the right gives you the breakdown but here are the extra details for the perks you are going to get. The exclusive Vinatasty conical leaf hats– also the  are handmade for us in limited numbers. 


The recipes book “Quick and easy Vietnamese recipes to blow your taste buds away” is a collection of 20 both classic and modern, visually creative, tasty Vietnamese dishes guaranteed to inspire you.There will only be LIMITED number of books printed so please be quick !

I have partnered with cookery schools in  Birmingham, Bristol and Devon to hold interactive, fun Vietnamese cooking lessons  with food and drink throughout the evenings.



Your support

This project will not be funded if we do not meet the target so please support me. However, if you are not able to contribute but like what we are doing, please spread the word. Follow us on Twitter @Vinatasty and Facebook Vinatasty, email this campaign to your colleagues and talk about it in your family. And feel free to get in touch. 

Thank you

story:
Innovative technology changes the classic smartphone or tablet into a communication device that can be used by a deaf-blind or blind person. With the help of this invention they can read the news, write and read texts, write and read e-mails, make a telephone call and have fun playing games.

DB COMMUNICATOR GIVES A MASSIVE BOOST TO EVERYDAY LIFE OF DEAF-BLIND & BLIND PEOPLE, ENHANCING THEIR QUALITY OF LIFE AND MAKING THEM MORE INDEPENDENT.



A special relief grid over traditional touch screen device (smartphone, tablet) gives blind and deaf-blind person spatial orientation for the otherwise smooth screen surface.The attached grid helps the user to differentiate between individual Braille characters and menu options.

GRID AND SMARTPHONE (TABLET) ARE BONDED WITH A SPECIAL APP THAT WE DEVELOPED.

Touch screen device expresses characters to deaf-blind and blind users with vibration of individual raised Braille dots.




WE STRIVE FOR QUALITY AND GREAT USER EXPERIENCE AT AFFORDABLE PRICES!

The price of the package depends on the grid size which is related to the size of your smart phone or tablet. Below you can see grid dimensions and find the right size for your device. Pricing information for packages and subscriptions is also listed below.


GRID DIMENSION

In aspect ratio 9:16

Depending on the display size of your device you can choose the best grid size for you



PACKAGE PRICING

 

Who are we?

Boldness, innovation, uniqueness and a high level of social responsibility

We are a group of professional web developers and designers that complement and support each other and can boast with years of experience. We are a team, not just a group of individual experts, who carries out its work with passion and strives toward outstanding service. We are a team who are constantly looking for new stories and new solutions.
We are 4WEB d.o.o.

What we care about?

Fact 1: 285 million people are estimated to be visually impaired worldwide, 39 million are blind and 2,3 million are deaf-blind. About 90% of the world's visually impaired live in a low income setting, that percentage is even higher for deaf-blind people.

Fact 2: Many blind or deaf-blind people rely solely on their sense of touch to communicate, live alone and cannot leave their homes safely without assistance.

As a team of highly motivated and socially responsible people we care deeply about those less fortunate individuals and their ability to communicate with others in everyday life. We want to provide a better life for them, reduce their overwhelming feelings of isolation, frustration and even depression. We want them to live their lives to the fullest!

Specialized communication devices for people who are blind or deaf-blind, when manufactured, are relatively expensive. Costing upwards of $5000 per device, and are affordable only to few.

Our DB Communicator will change that.

Achievements

In November 2014, we attended the 9th Slovenian Innovation Forum. Its purpose is about encouraging companies so that they contribute to the development of innovative society. Our invention, the DB Communicator, placed us among the finalists.


Media

Heroes of tomorrow: Smart phones will finally be useful to deaf-blind people
Video interview for the Slovenian Association of Deaf and Hard of Hearing

We need your help!

We need your help in order to complete developing the app, support grid manufacturing in all their dimensions, establish our future help center, maintain our systems and keep improving our product.

We've always known we'd eventually be called upon to open our shirts and save the day, and the superhero was a crude, hopeful attempt to talk about how we all might feel on that day of great power, and great responsibility.

Unleash the superhero within you!

By buying or donating you will greatly improve someone's life. Thank you!

story:
Our Campaign

NoSweat's founder has been a personal trainer for over 30 years. He is a state and national power lifting champion and like he spends much of his time sweating in gyms and on exercise equipment. He has seen first hand the devastating effects of regular contact with the germs and bacteria that live on gym equipment.  He combines his experience and vision to assist athletes and fitness enthusiasts to reach their personal fitness goals free from the contamination of MRSA and other skin diseases that are daily infecting fitness enthusiasts.   He has created state-of-the-art products that will safeguard the user while protecting our planet from global warming.

After five and a half years of research and development, NoSweat Technologies has produced state-of-the-art products with proven technology that will help protect you and your loved-ones from bacteria, germs and other people's sweat while in the fitness clubs.  In doing so, you will be using fashionable equipment that is Eco-friendly and washer and dryer safe.  And NoSweat’s products are all American made!       

                                                     The NoSweat Mat Gym Bags

                                            

What We Need & What You Get

Our NoSweat Technologies company needs your help to produce the first batch of product for its launch..  We've taken necessary steps to build a team of professionals to ensure product quality and value.  Using our products will also help eliminate pre/post clean-up time and using unnecessary supplies in all venues.  The funds received will allow NoSweat to purchase premium materials that will stand the test with our product's purpose. The funds will also be used to help with marketing to larger markets while we "Brand" The NoSweat Mat globally. Several fitness and training and retail clients are eager to partner with us once we have the inventory of quality produce to meet their needs.

NoSweat Technologies is needing to raise $75K to purchase units that will allow us to meet early demand. Your support will allow us to attend three trade and expo shows.  There we will promote our product personally to thousands of users, retailers and health and fitness club owners.  

Over this 5.5 year journey we have talked with many folks who have experienced or know someone who has had a Staph or MRSA infection.  The fitness clubs are among the primary places where an open cut or even a scratch coming in contact with fitness equipment can become life threatening.  

 

                                                                           Customize

 

 

It's waterproof!

No Pre or Post Clean up!

It's Made in America!

 

 

 

 

                                                     

 

 

                                 

 

     

                                          

 

 

 

 

                                            

 

                                    

 

 

                                                              

 

 

 

                           

                                    

 

 

                                                                                   

 

 

 

                                            

            

                      

                                             

                                                 

                                     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                                          

 

All you "Weight-heads" be the first to get the Ronnie Coleman Signature series NoSweat mat.

             Ronnie Coleman 8X Mr. Olympia

               Hall of Fame Legendary Body Builder

                                

                                                                            Free Perk RC Signature Series Dog tags

                           

 

The Impact

The impact of The NoSweat Mat should be global! There are 157 million plus gym enthusiasts and more than 70 thousand fitness clubs spanning the globe from the USA to other countries.  These countries have all taken on the lifestyle of better health.

The NoSweat Mat is far more safer than cotton towels, whose life expectancy is shorter and is involved in the membership monthly dues.

Other Way You Can Help

NoSweat Technologies-Cincinnati, Ohio asks for those who can pre-order a NoSweat Mat to get involved. Please email, text and use the Indiegogo share tools to tell others you know about our unique products.

Whether you purchase a NoSweat Mat for yourself, for your child playing sports at their school or encourage those who own health and fitness centers that they should offer their patrons state-of-the-art barrier protection verses the sliding, moisture absorbing towels, you are helping our us provide barrier protection for a safer healthier world.

Jeff Blake, Former NFL Quarterback/Fitness trainer

"This is a no-brainer! The NoSweat mat protects the user and the equipment".

 

 

"The NoSweat mat is a product that I foresee as being an item that users will enjoy for personal  protection with style and comfort.  If you own a fitness clubs the NoSweat mat helps to protect your equipment and cut down on leaning costs. This is a great piece of equipment to offer your members.

Jim Riggs          

        

                                                

*The Towel absorbs, slides and you'll end up wiping your face with it during your workout!

 

FAQ's

Is the NoSweat Mat washer friendly?

Yes, the NoSweat Mat is washer friendly.  Wash in light cycle using cold water.  Small amount of detergent is fine but no bleach is to be used.

Is the NoSweat Mat dryer safe?

Yes, the NoSweat Mat can be placed in the dryer.  However, use fluff/no heat for 10 minutes.  Preferred drying is by hanging/air dry. 

How do you store the NoSweat Mat?

The NoSweat Mat should be stored in a cool, dry location.  NEVER store your NoSweat Mat in your automobile or trunk. Do not expose to direct sunlight, heat or flames. If you have neoprene allergies, Do not use this product! If your NoSweat Mat should ever become stiff, submerge the mat in a sink using cold water.  Hold your mat down for 15-30 seconds then allow to air dry.  Recheck and never pull on threaded areas beyond a 1/2" in any direction.

story:
I have been a health coach for a few years; I mostly work with people who have infertility issues and stress-related health problems. I'm always seeking new ways to help others, which brought me to yoga. I have learned that the combination of yoga and health coaching can help my clients gain fertility sooner than by following dietary changes alone. This is why I decided to incorporate yoga in my treatment methods.

Health is 70% nutrition and 30% exercise so it’s worth focusing on proper exercises – I have found that yoga is an incredibly effective way of improving female health and fertility.

The Benefits of the well-chosen yoga sequences:

  • can increase your chances of getting pregnant
  • reduces stress
  • strengthens the endocrine system
  • increases blood flow to the reproductive organs
  • may help to clear adhesions and blockages int he reproductive areas
  • can increase libido (which is not a bad thing if you are trying to get pregnant)
  • supports a healthy immune system and supports the body in detoxifying
  • encourages a positive mindset
  • lessens side effects of hormonal treatments
  • increases IVF success rates

This is why I decided to incorporate yoga in my treatment methods and if I can support my studies financially, I will start a Fertility Yoga Teacher Course this spring. Using the knowledge and skills from this course I want to create accessible online videos to teach women about healthy, alternative treatments for infertility.

In order to do this, I need your help.

The combination of nutrition, stress management, and the proper exercise supports positive growth and increased health. It is important to use several treatment methods to provide the best overall health care. The Fertility Yoga Teacher Course will allow me to learn the best yoga sequences and ayurvedic eating styles to treat infertility, menstrual problems and stress-related health issues.

I find it important to support women on their journey of getting pregnant in as many ways as possible, so I will create online videos to teach women about alternative treatment methods in case of infertility, including yoga. This way, anybody could access the knowledge, regardless location. I would really-really love to expand my services and offer a 2in1 experience because it's for sure that nutrition, stress management and the proper choice of exercises can support real health. That is why I find it important to combine the methods. 

 

What’s in it for you, what can you get from me?

  • my happy face
  • a thank you note and mentioning you on my Instagram page
  • my first fertility yoga video
  • a 50-minute health coaching session
  • 2*90 minutes of action packed strategy session for your health
  • a 6-week health coaching program

Check out the offers by donation on the right.

All my work is online – I’m available worldwide!

What I need:

  • money for the course fees
  • money for course supplies
  • positive encouragement and support aka „You can do it!”

Thank you for helping me fulfil my dreams of helping others.
story_txt:
I have been a health coach for a few years; I mostly work with people who have infertility issues and stress-related health problems. I'm always seeking new ways to help others, which brought me to yoga. I have learned that the combination of yoga and health coaching can help my clients gain fertility sooner than by following dietary changes alone. This is why I decided to incorporate yoga in my treatment methods.
Health is 70% nutrition and 30% exercise so it’s worth focusing on proper exercises – I have found that yoga is an incredibly effective way of improving female health and fertility.
The Benefits of the well-chosen yoga sequences:

can increase your chances of getting pregnant
reduces stress
strengthens the endocrine system
increases blood flow to the reproductive organs
may help to clear adhesions and blockages int he reproductive areas
can increase libido (which is not a bad thing if you are trying to get pregnant)
supports a healthy immune system and supports the body in detoxifying
encourages a positive mindset
lessens side effects of hormonal treatments
increases IVF success rates

This is why I decided to incorporate yoga in my treatment methods and if I can support my studies financially, I will start a Fertility Yoga Teacher Course this spring. Using the knowledge and skills from this course I want to create accessible online videos to teach women about healthy, alternative treatments for infertility.
In order to do this, I need your help.
The combination of nutrition, stress management, and the proper exercise supports positive growth and increased health. It is important to use several treatment methods to provide the best overall health care. The Fertility Yoga Teacher Course will allow me to learn the best yoga sequences and ayurvedic eating styles to treat infertility, menstrual problems and stress-related health issues.
I find it important to support women on their journey of getting pregnant in as many ways as possible, so I will create online videos to teach women about alternative treatment methods in case of infertility, including yoga. story:
She*Pak Is a Cool Idea!

My name is Pam Cole, the inventor of She*Pak and President of Femicorp.  Hi!  I am a physical therapist (PT) and wound specialist.  I invented She*Pak while having my own issues with chronic vaginitis.  In PT, we ice inflammation, but when I was having issues, I was told to take a warm sitz bath, which only made me feel worse.  I found a way to ice the area, and I got so much relief!  As I was developing the idea of She*Pak many friends and clinicians have told me all the others reasons that She*Pak can calm burning, swelling, itching, and pain of the vagina and external structures:

  • Vaginitis - bacterial or yeast
  • Vaginal child birth
  • Post menopausal intimacy
  • Post cancer treatment intimacy
  • Syndromes causing painful sex: vulvodynia, clitorodynia, vestibulodynia
  • Urogynecological surgeries
  • Endometriosis

I have become passionate about folks getting pelvic floor relief without pharmaceuticals, or at least until the prescription medication can work!

We made an initial batch of She*Paks to see if it would work in the market place.  Would people buy it?  Would clinicians embrace it?  The answer is a resounding yes and yes!   I have passionate, good feedback from customers (see Amazon and  testimonials at the bottom of femicorp.com).  Many depend on their She*Pak on a regular basis.  When we have exhibited at professional meetings the She*Pak booth gets a lot of traffic and attention.  Frankly, then clean us out of thousands of brochures and website business cards.

We are ready to fund our next batch of She*Paks but with feedback and ideas from customers, and in a way that it can support manufacturing in volume and in bringing down the cost, so we can reach more women around the world! 

Where Will Your Support Go?  

  • Design work - We need to design and test the changes that customers want in She*Pak, as well as, redesigning the package to be smaller and more eco-friendly.
  • Tooling/Molds - The changes to product and moving to high volume manufacturing means new molds.  These are quite expensive but can last the company for a long time.
  • Product - The real point of all this is making She*Paks that we can go BIG with!

What Can You Get?  

Fun things for everyone, whether you need a She*Pak or not!   We have regular ice packs, t-shirts, the next version of She*Pak, and combination perks.  Stay tuned for additional perks as the campaign evolves!

We Only Keep the Money If We reach Our Goal!  

We are out to make new and improved product,  so we need to hit our goal.  If we don't make our goal, we can't move on.  We need your support!  

If you can't contribute, please share this cool idea on social media by clicking on the Indiegogo share tools.  The pictures and topic certainly make people's head turn and give them a chuckle!

story:
I'm a high school senior from Queens, New York. Volunteering in a nursing home and thinking about my grandma back home, I realized the same level of emergent help might also be needed by other elderly who live alone at home. I hope to bring more protection and help to the elderly and lessen the worries of family members.

Then an idea came to my mind. Why not designing a wearable medicine box, which is connected with a smart phone via Bluetooth. So when emergency happens, the user can get medicine immediately and call his or her family, as well as sending out his or her location. This can help the elderly receive proper help in time. 


The fund will be used to optimize the structure of Hiband. The additional functions will be added: the control of temperature of Hiband pill box. We 3D printed the first Hiband in the picture. I need your help to keep on doing this project and make it real. With your support, I will be able to bring this product to more people.


Timeline:

1. Complete Product Molding [March to April]

2. Completing the mobile application [May]

3. Mass Production for Early Bird Backers [May to June]

4. Fulfillment and Delivery [July to August]

5. The Hiband application will be available on Google Apps on the estimate delivery date for you to download [July]

6. Mass Production and Delivery to other backers [September]



There are still risks associated with producing Hiband. It might take longer to finalize the product and ship it due to unforeseen reasons.

Hiband is able to protect the people who we care about! Let's bring more protection and love to people around us!

story:
Summary

"Safe Sex In A Bottle®" is a condom specially packaged and approved by the F.D.A(Federal Food and Drug Administration) and will be offered to the consumer worldwide via convenience stores, gas station mini-marts, nightclubs, barber shops, wholesale product distributors and even in your neighborhood salons. Have your own logo advertised. Private labeling available world-wide, for AIDS organizations, sponsors for health promotions, sporting events, motel/hotels, private parties etc. "Safe Sex In A Bottle®" will be conveniently available everywhere to help you and your partner stay SAFE. Independent studies conclude that the sensitive condom package can be damaged by being carried in a man's wallet or a woman's purse. The wallet acts as a vise that can crush and render this important health product ineffective. Condom packages carried in a woman's purse can rub against other items and be rendered ineffective as well. "Safe Sex In A Bottle®" is designed to be carried on his or her keychain and the durable plastic bottle will keep the condom safe even from extreme heat and cold. The best way to keep you and your partner SAFE is with "Safe Sex In A Bottle®"!  We have spent years developing the product and have it trademarked in the US and in Europe. 

                                          

The Impact and Recent Media

There are health issues and social issues both nationally and globally stemming from unprotected sex.  Some of those issues include:

  • Unwanted pregnancies that either contribute to an ever increasing global population crisis, or tragically end in abortion.
  • Sexually Transmitted and life-threatening diseases that affect the individual and family/friends.
  • This is a proven and safe form of birth control and protection used for over 400 years.  On October 14, 2015 the New York Times published an article about yet another form of birth control with purported health risks.
  • The specially designed packaging essentially protects your protection.
  • In the past 7 days of this month, both Digital Trends and the Inquisitr published stories online about the trending "NETFLIX and chill" condoms.
  • On October 14th, a Daily News article about Lamar Odom collapsing at a Nevada brothel owned by Dennis Hof of HBO's Cathouse series states in the article that "all men must wear a latex condom".
  • In February 2015 CNN reported that due to a shortage in Venezuela, a box of condoms was selling for $755.00 which represents 85% of the average Venezuelan monthly income.
  • In July 2015 QUARTZ reported that India lifted a price cap on condoms because quality condoms were disappearing off the shelves.  Some living in the country were forced to order quality condoms from Amazon here in the USA.
  • In Google SERP's(Search Engine Results Pages), most people worldwide are embarrassed to purchase condoms over the counter, this innovation of our unique packaging concept makes it interesting and easy.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute due to financial limitations, which we understand, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo automated social media and email sharing tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The ninja of feudal Japan were quick to adopt and innovate and were always on the cutting edge of technology. They were known to rapidly adapt to new technologies such as blackpowder, rockets and guns imported from China or Europe. Training tools for ninjutsu have always been difficult to acquire because they were not commercially viable to produce on a mass scale, but with the advent of 3D printing the capability of manufacturing specialist products in small batches has become a reality.

Embodying the spirit of the ninja, Sekibi was founded to provide high quality, historically accurate and cost effective training equipment for ninjutsu and the other schools of the Bujinkan, an organisation dedicated to preserving the history and traditions of the samurai and ninja.

The Togakure Ryū Equipment Set One is the culmination of years of training, research and study into the ninjutsu school of Togakure Ryū. The tools are based on designs in Hatsumi Masaaki's collection, the grandmaster of the Bujinkan, and modified for safety in a martial arts training environment.

The Togakure Ryū Equipment Set project is comprised of seven ninja tools. The set includes traditional equipment used by ninja and in the school of Togakure Ryū ninjutsu; the Kyoketsushoge, a straight edge with a hook connected to a ring by rope or hair used for scaling and climbing; the Kunai, a heavy trowel used for digging, cutting and scaling; the Shuko, hand claws used for climbing and scaling walls; the Bo Shuriken, a nail used for securing or scratching; the Ita Ken, a double sided hand chisel used for scraping or drilling; the Hira Shuriken, a star shaped star that could be thrown or used to misdirect; and the Senban Shuriken, a square shaped blade that was used to lever up nails among other things. 

Each tool is printed using PETG (Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol), a strong, light and durable impact resistant polymer also used in the manufacture of a variety of consumer and industrial goods such as protective equipment, bottles and medical devices.  

The equipment set comes with jute, sisal or cotton twine, which can be used to wrap handles or modify the fit of the training tools. Jute is a natural soft fibre used in twine, rope and matting; Sisal is a courser material, but more durable, used in in the manufacture of paper, cloth, footwear, hats, bags and carpets; and cotton, a softer alternative used primarily for textiles. All three twine varieties are included in the set to cater to different preferences. 

The rope for the Kyoketsushoge is constructed from multi-filament polypropylene, which has a high break strength but is also soft and comfortable to handle. The ring is made of high density pressure hose and wrapped in elastometric insulation that is soft and durable. This makes the ring flexible on impact, but also softens hits and lets the ring retain its shape. 

The backer reward for this project is the Togakure Ryū Equipment Set. Supporters can order multiple sets including Pair (2x), Triple (x3), Small Dōjō (x5) and Dōjō (x10) at special rates. There is also an early bird special for first supporters at all tiers, but with a limited number of sets. Every set will include seven tools, twine (jute, sisal, cotton) and rope. 

There are 145 Early Bird Equipment Sets available in 5 tiers at a special rate. These sets will be our first production run and will also receive priority dispatch to first supporters.  

The Standard Equipment Set contains seven tools and will be dispatched to supporters by order number in batches. Special rates apply to multiple orders with the Dōjō set representing almost the same rate as the early bird single order. 

All shipping costs are included in the full price of the equipment set. We have decided to bear the burden of this cost to provide a fair and equitable price for all practitioners around the world.

3D printing is an exciting new technology which is allowing the manufacture and production of a range of products which were not previously accessible to the general public.  

Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol (PETG) is strong, light and durable, used in many industrial and consumer goods. It is also impact resistant and heat resistant, making it an excellent material for training equipment. The printing process creates the object by placing down thin layers of filament, one atop another. Our printers have over 100 layers per 25mm, giving our tools a strong and solid bond. 

Our tool designs have been specifically tailored for 3D printing in mind in order to optimise the unique properties available in the printing process. As training tools, we have added elements of safety, rounding edges and blunting points to make the equipment set effective for even intensive training and techniques. 

Sekibi already has the infrastructure to produce 180 equipment sets in 6 months, however 3D printing is subject to economies of scale. What this means is that the more money we raise, the more printers we can buy, the faster we can produce equipment and the more rewards we can offer per tier.  

We have created the following stretch goals to promote the project and give supporters incentives to share and talk about the equipment set. The larger we grow, the more we can offer.

Should orders exceed $120,000 AUD, more stretch goals will be added. 

Each of the stretch goal addition will be added to every equipment set. The kakushi is a ring with a pointed end; the kanide are small cat claws, historically used by Kunoichi (female ninja) as a concealed self-defence tool; and the alternate Kunai design has a straighter blade with deeper angled tip making it more useful for sawing or drilling.

This project is specifically geared towards the Bujinkan and Bujinkan members. The training equipment is designed according to the tools found in Soke's collection and are specifically tailored for Togakure Ryū Ninjutsu. Sekibi's founding purpose is to provide safer equipment for training and to spread the history and traditions of the Bujinkan. 

Your assistance as Buyu (fellow practitioners) spreading this project by word of mouth, social media and through your own training groups and Dōjō would be greatly appreciated. The Bujinkan is a small close knit community and every little bit helps to strengthen the bonds and training practices of our organisation. 

Sekibi is the manufacturing and design subsidiary of Ikari Dojo, Brisbane Australia. Founded in 2018 to provide 3D printed training equipment to martial arts communities around the world.  

Founded and managed by Richard Roth, 8th Dan Bujinkan Budo Taijutsu, Sekibi is committed to providing safe, affordable and high quality training equipment for the Bujinkan and related martial arts. Richard joined the Bujinkan in 2005 and travels yearly to Honbu to train and network.

All Sekibi designs are provided by Scott Robertson, 7th Kyu Bujinkan Budo Taijutsu. Scott has 15 years of martial arts training and has been using new technologies to revisit traditional practices for over a decade. His experience and knowledge of emergent technologies have made this project a reality

The Togakure Ryū Equipment Set is strictly for training purposes. Plastic/Rubber tools should never be used against other material tools such as metal, wood or bamboo/rattan. Only use against other plastic/rubber tools. Eye protection should always be used in training. 

Do Not use any of the training tools for climbing.

Do Not use them in hard sparring or full contact activities. 

Do Not throw them.

Do Not use them to lever or pry.

Do Not use when broken or damaged.

Togakure Ryū Equipment Set - LIMITATION OF LIABILITY AND DISCLAIMER  

The buyer(s) of Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' assume all associated risk of the purchase and/or use of this product, including, but not limited to, events that could unfold in any location in which the training tools are used for any purpose. Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' are sold on an "as is" and "where is" basis. Anyone purchasing or using a Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' is hereby advised that IN NO EVENT SHALL IKARI DOJO OR SEKIBI OR ANY OF ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE TO THE BUYER OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR OTHER DAMAGES, FOR ANY LOSS, DAMAGE TO PROPERTY, INJURY, OR LOSS OF LIFE, WHATSOEVER ARISING OUT OF OR CONNECTED WITH THE USE OR MISUSE OF ITS PRODUCTS, WHETHER ARISING UNDER BREACH OF CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), STRICT LIABILITY OR OTHERWISE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. Users of Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' should comply with any and all local, state and federal safety procedures, be trained in the use of equipment or be supervised by qualified and professional instructors, superiors or supervisors. The Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' is exclusively intended for training purposes only.

IKARI DOJO AND SEKIBI MAKE NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WITH RESPECT TO ANY PRODUCT, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

Ikari Dojo and Sekibi hereby advises all purchasers and end users of its products to follow all laws associated with possession of, handling, carrying and storage of training equipment governing the individual jurisdictions in which our products are used. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi make no representations as to the legality of carrying concealed training tools and cannot be held liable for actions or issues related to the carrying of training tools in jurisdictions where concealed carry tools are not lawful. 

Ikari Dojo and Sekibi further advises all purchasers and end users of its products that while the Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' are intended for training purposes, the company is not responsible for any acts, whether intentional, negligent or accidental, which involve the use of a training tools used in any location. Martial arts practitioners alone are responsible for the possession of, cleaning, handling, carrying and storage of their training tools. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi hereby advises all purchasers and end users of its training tools that it assumes no liability for any actions related to the use of training tools owned or operated by individuals, whether such use is intentional or inadvertent. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi recommends that purchasers or end users utilise the Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' for its intended purpose and makes no warranties or representations regarding any modifications made by any purchasers or end users, assuming no liability whatsoever for third party products. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi makes no warranties and assumes no responsibility for matters related to training tools which are the property of, or in possession of, purchasers or users of its training tools. 

Ikari Dojo and Sekibi hereby advises anyone purchasing or using training tools to ensure he or she is properly trained on all matters related to martial arts tools, including, but not limited to, training related to the use of training tools in a training environment. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi recommends that anyone who chooses to use training tools, receives professional training from certified martial arts instructors regarding safety issues such as accessibility, security, safe use and proper procedures. Sekibi are a maker of training equipment, and hereby refers any training tool related questions to the individual instructors of training establishments, which may be carried by the purchasers or end users of Ikari Dojo and Sekibi. Responsibility for the condition, retention and security of any training tools used in training rests solely with the individual in possession of the training equipment.

The manufacture and production of training equipment is a complex operation requiring the management and execution of several moving parts in both the organisation and the production process. Members of Sekibi are highly trained and educated professionals in their fields, and have several systems in place to mitigate risk and complications.

The greatest risk the project faces is the production of training tools by the deadline of February 2019. Printer failure, damage and misprints can slow down production and cause issues with delivery. Lead times have been adjusted to account for these possible issues.

Another minor risk is fulfillment and delivery. Sekibi will rely on third parties to deliver products. If these third parties fail to deliver or lose products, Sekibi will take responsibility and will ensure that every supporter absolutely receives what they ordered and paid for, regardless of failure on the part of any third party working in concert with Sekibi to deliver this project.

A great deal of time and effort has been placed in this project. The members of Sekibi are also respected members of the Bujinkan community, so reputations must be upheld in the delivery of this project.

The Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' will certainly be a challenge to produce and deliver, but both Richard Roth and Scott Robertson are confident in their skills to make this project a reality and to promote the warrior arts of the Bujinkan.
