The Togakure Ryū Equipment Set One is the culmination of years of training, research and study into the ninjutsu school of Togakure Ryū. The tools are based on designs in Hatsumi Masaaki's collection, the grandmaster of the Bujinkan, and modified for safety in a martial arts training environment.

The Togakure Ryū Equipment Set project is comprised of seven ninja tools. The set includes traditional equipment used by ninja and in the school of Togakure Ryū ninjutsu; the Kyoketsushoge, a straight edge with a hook connected to a ring by rope or hair used for scaling and climbing; the Kunai, a heavy trowel used for digging, cutting and scaling; the Shuko, hand claws used for climbing and scaling walls; the Bo Shuriken, a nail used for securing or scratching; the Ita Ken, a double sided hand chisel used for scraping or drilling; the Hira Shuriken, a star shaped star that could be thrown or used to misdirect; and the Senban Shuriken, a square shaped blade that was used to lever up nails among other things. 

Each tool is printed using PETG (Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol), a strong, light and durable impact resistant polymer also used in the manufacture of a variety of consumer and industrial goods such as protective equipment, bottles and medical devices.  

The equipment set comes with jute, sisal or cotton twine, which can be used to wrap handles or modify the fit of the training tools. Jute is a natural soft fibre used in twine, rope and matting; Sisal is a courser material, but more durable, used in in the manufacture of paper, cloth, footwear, hats, bags and carpets; and cotton, a softer alternative used primarily for textiles. All three twine varieties are included in the set to cater to different preferences. 

The rope for the Kyoketsushoge is constructed from multi-filament polypropylene, which has a high break strength but is also soft and comfortable to handle. The ring is made of high density pressure hose and wrapped in elastometric insulation that is soft and durable. This makes the ring flexible on impact, but also softens hits and lets the ring retain its shape. 

The backer reward for this project is the Togakure Ryū Equipment Set. Supporters can order multiple sets including Pair (2x), Triple (x3), Small Dōjō (x5) and Dōjō (x10) at special rates. There is also an early bird special for first supporters at all tiers, but with a limited number of sets. Every set will include seven tools, twine (jute, sisal, cotton) and rope. 

There are 145 Early Bird Equipment Sets available in 5 tiers at a special rate. These sets will be our first production run and will also receive priority dispatch to first supporters.  

The Standard Equipment Set contains seven tools and will be dispatched to supporters by order number in batches. Special rates apply to multiple orders with the Dōjō set representing almost the same rate as the early bird single order. 
All shipping costs are included in the full price of the equipment set. We have decided to bear the burden of this cost to provide a fair and equitable price for all practitioners around the world.

3D printing is an exciting new technology which is allowing the manufacture and production of a range of products which were not previously accessible to the general public.  


Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol (PETG) is strong, light and durable, used in many industrial and consumer goods. It is also impact resistant and heat resistant, making it an excellent material for training equipment. The printing process creates the object by placing down thin layers of filament, one atop another. Our printers have over 100 layers per 25mm, giving our tools a strong and solid bond. 


Our tool designs have been specifically tailored for 3D printing in mind in order to optimise the unique properties available in the printing process. As training tools, we have added elements of safety, rounding edges and blunting points to make the equipment set effective for even intensive training and techniques. 

Sekibi already has the infrastructure to produce 180 equipment sets in 6 months, however 3D printing is subject to economies of scale. What this means is that the more money we raise, the more printers we can buy, the faster we can produce equipment and the more rewards we can offer per tier.  
We have created the following stretch goals to promote the project and give supporters incentives to share and talk about the equipment set. The larger we grow, the more we can offer.

Should orders exceed $120,000 AUD, more stretch goals will be added. 
Each of the stretch goal addition will be added to every equipment set. The kakushi is a ring with a pointed end; the kanide are small cat claws, historically used by Kunoichi (female ninja) as a concealed self-defence tool; and the alternate Kunai design has a straighter blade with deeper angled tip making it more useful for sawing or drilling.

This project is specifically geared towards the Bujinkan and Bujinkan members. The training equipment is designed according to the tools found in Soke's collection and are specifically tailored for Togakure Ryū Ninjutsu. Sekibi's founding purpose is to provide safer equipment for training and to spread the history and traditions of the Bujinkan. 
Your assistance as Buyu (fellow practitioners) spreading this project by word of mouth, social media and through your own training groups and Dōjō would be greatly appreciated. The Bujinkan is a small close knit community and every little bit helps to strengthen the bonds and training practices of our organisation. 

Sekibi is the manufacturing and design subsidiary of Ikari Dojo, Brisbane Australia. Founded in 2018 to provide 3D printed training equipment to martial arts communities around the world.  
Founded and managed by Richard Roth, 8th Dan Bujinkan Budo Taijutsu, Sekibi is committed to providing safe, affordable and high quality training equipment for the Bujinkan and related martial arts. Richard joined the Bujinkan in 2005 and travels yearly to Honbu to train and network.
All Sekibi designs are provided by Scott Robertson, 7th Kyu Bujinkan Budo Taijutsu. Scott has 15 years of martial arts training and has been using new technologies to revisit traditional practices for over a decade. His experience and knowledge of emergent technologies have made this project a reality


The Togakure Ryū Equipment Set is strictly for training purposes. Plastic/Rubber tools should never be used against other material tools such as metal, wood or bamboo/rattan. Only use against other plastic/rubber tools. Eye protection should always be used in training. 
Do Not use any of the training tools for climbing.
Do Not use them in hard sparring or full contact activities. 
Do Not throw them.
Do Not use them to lever or pry.
Do Not use when broken or damaged.
Togakure Ryū Equipment Set - LIMITATION OF LIABILITY AND DISCLAIMER  
The buyer(s) of Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' assume all associated risk of the purchase and/or use of this product, including, but not limited to, events that could unfold in any location in which the training tools are used for any purpose. Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' are sold on an "as is" and "where is" basis. Anyone purchasing or using a Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' is hereby advised that IN NO EVENT SHALL IKARI DOJO OR SEKIBI OR ANY OF ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE TO THE BUYER OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR OTHER DAMAGES, FOR ANY LOSS, DAMAGE TO PROPERTY, INJURY, OR LOSS OF LIFE, WHATSOEVER ARISING OUT OF OR CONNECTED WITH THE USE OR MISUSE OF ITS PRODUCTS, WHETHER ARISING UNDER BREACH OF CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), STRICT LIABILITY OR OTHERWISE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. Users of Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' should comply with any and all local, state and federal safety procedures, be trained in the use of equipment or be supervised by qualified and professional instructors, superiors or supervisors. The Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' is exclusively intended for training purposes only.
IKARI DOJO AND SEKIBI MAKE NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WITH RESPECT TO ANY PRODUCT, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
Ikari Dojo and Sekibi hereby advises all purchasers and end users of its products to follow all laws associated with possession of, handling, carrying and storage of training equipment governing the individual jurisdictions in which our products are used. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi make no representations as to the legality of carrying concealed training tools and cannot be held liable for actions or issues related to the carrying of training tools in jurisdictions where concealed carry tools are not lawful. 
Ikari Dojo and Sekibi further advises all purchasers and end users of its products that while the Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' are intended for training purposes, the company is not responsible for any acts, whether intentional, negligent or accidental, which involve the use of a training tools used in any location. Martial arts practitioners alone are responsible for the possession of, cleaning, handling, carrying and storage of their training tools. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi hereby advises all purchasers and end users of its training tools that it assumes no liability for any actions related to the use of training tools owned or operated by individuals, whether such use is intentional or inadvertent. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi recommends that purchasers or end users utilise the Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' for its intended purpose and makes no warranties or representations regarding any modifications made by any purchasers or end users, assuming no liability whatsoever for third party products. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi makes no warranties and assumes no responsibility for matters related to training tools which are the property of, or in possession of, purchasers or users of its training tools. 
Ikari Dojo and Sekibi hereby advises anyone purchasing or using training tools to ensure he or she is properly trained on all matters related to martial arts tools, including, but not limited to, training related to the use of training tools in a training environment. Ikari Dojo and Sekibi recommends that anyone who chooses to use training tools, receives professional training from certified martial arts instructors regarding safety issues such as accessibility, security, safe use and proper procedures. Sekibi are a maker of training equipment, and hereby refers any training tool related questions to the individual instructors of training establishments, which may be carried by the purchasers or end users of Ikari Dojo and Sekibi. Responsibility for the condition, retention and security of any training tools used in training rests solely with the individual in possession of the training equipment.

The manufacture and production of training equipment is a complex operation requiring the management and execution of several moving parts in both the organisation and the production process. Members of Sekibi are highly trained and educated professionals in their fields, and have several systems in place to mitigate risk and complications.
The greatest risk the project faces is the production of training tools by the deadline of February 2019. Printer failure, damage and misprints can slow down production and cause issues with delivery. Lead times have been adjusted to account for these possible issues.
Another minor risk is fulfillment and delivery. Sekibi will rely on third parties to deliver products. If these third parties fail to deliver or lose products, Sekibi will take responsibility and will ensure that every supporter absolutely receives what they ordered and paid for, regardless of failure on the part of any third party working in concert with Sekibi to deliver this project.
A great deal of time and effort has been placed in this project. The members of Sekibi are also respected members of the Bujinkan community, so reputations must be upheld in the delivery of this project.
The Sekibi 'Togakure Ryū Equipment Set' will certainly be a challenge to produce and deliver, but both Richard Roth and Scott Robertson are confident in their skills to make this project a reality and to promote the warrior arts of the Bujinkan.

story:
Alarm!

In 2018, an estimated 1,735,350 new cases of cancer will be diagnosed in the United States and 609,640 people will die from the disease (according to the National Cancer Institute).

Approximately 38.4% of men and women will be diagnosed with cancer at some point during their lifetimes (based on 2013–2015 data).

In 2017, an estimated 15,270 children and adolescents ages 0 to 19 were diagnosed with cancer and 1,790 died of the disease.

Estimated national expenditures for cancer care in the United States in 2017 were $147.3 billion. In future years, costs are likely to increase as the population ages and cancer prevalence increases. 

 

Is There a Way Out?

YES! And my experience proves it. Now it's time to spread this knowledge all over the world. I want this book to be a guide to the Victory. It comprises the unique knowledge of famous medical researchers of the world. This knowledge was carefully collected, practiced and enriched by the author for many decades. Hundreds of lives were saved. Let it be hundreds of thousands! Millions! Why not? 

 

Why this Book?

In this Book, you're about to learn the most unusual methods of cancer treatment. The philosophy of this treatment has been based on the awakening of inner reserved forces of the organism during the active fight for health.

Traditional medical science (allopathic medicine) and an alternative medical science (naturopathy) have been developing independently and have achieved great progress in their development.

To my great regret, a thousand year experience is not being sufficiently used.

I'm convinced, that if these two systems were united, the effectiveness and quality of treatment would grow ten times higher. Now is high time for their unification.

This book includes the results of medical research, collected by the author for forty years. This vital information will help you prevent diseases and restore health.

I'll be happy to see this book published because it awakens the consciousness and faith of Man in his own forces.

I express my gratitude to those, who consecrated their time, knowledge and energy to have this book published.

Dr. Widoff

 

It's easy to read. You may start to change your life right away after you get this book. 

 

45 Years of Healing Practice

 
Dr. Boris Widoff - has more than 45 years of experience in research and practice of natural healing in Europe, Asia, the United States, and Russia. He is the author of five books on health, a healer, a master of alternative medicine, a professor of naturopathy, a psychotherapist, a nutrition psychologist, a specialist in medication, a lecturer and a member of the American Health Federation, a scientific researcher and consultant for various clinics in the US and Mexico.
 

What Do You Get?

​

 

The Book contains: 

  • Variety of easy yet effective procedures of cleaning, healing, and reinforcement of organism.
  • Dietary & Recipes of your longevity.
  • Motivational healing cases from real people.
  • Rules & Secrets of healthy life for every day.
  • Theory & Lifehacks.

 

BUDGET

Manufacturing the books and shipping to Los Angeles: $15,000 for 1000 sets.

Packaging and shipping the books to you: $3,000 

Translating to other languages: $9,000  

Editing and correcion: $3,000 

Miscellaneous/adding buffer to estimates: $1,000 

Kickstarter + Amazon together take 8-10% 

Total: about $33,000

Perks (up to 40% discount)

Timeline

August 2018: Launch Indiegogo 

September 2018: Finishing of editing, Manufacturing process. Shipping to You the E-version!

October 2018:  Start of shipping to You the Print version of the Book.

 

 

Let's fight together!

We need your help to spread the light of knowledge. Share it with your friends and relatives. Many folks in your social networks will be thankful for your concern.

story:
Short Summary

I am Psusennes Bey, a Yoga Therapist out to create lasting positive change in a world that needs it. Under my business Pain Solutions, I am in the final stages of completing a self healing system that I developed. This system will be used to help provide an alternative to medicine and give hope for people suffering from Dis-Ease around the world who want to heal their bodies naturally with minimal resources .

On my own journey of healing, I myself overcame from chronic ailments; such as incurable DIS-ease’s and condition's known as Asthma, Arthritis, Gastritis and joint injuries. Thus over the last 16 years I was able to make my own personal health breakthrough's; through the processes of: Self-analysis, Diligent comparative conceptual study, physical confirmations & personal realizations. Time and time again, ailment after ailment I was able to over come painful issues that affected my overall health and still today reap the benefits of my efforts. Now I am out to share that system with the world, in a way that is consumable and can be personalized by all.

Currently however though the system is technically complete, it has a very narrow margin for the amount of people who it would work for. Its missing a few key elements that would allow it to be robust enough to stand against the many conditions that exist around the world. Conditions that play a vital role such as consistent access to: healthy foods, clean water, proper development of will power to increase tolerance levels and then a variety of other environmental and individual specific conditions.

My plans are to under go specific traditional training's in China, India, Thailand and Estonia. Then go to my final destination in Japan, where I will conduct a series of Holistic Case Studies under a controlled demographic, Compile my research, then Complete my robust self healing system and Finally seek investors to open my 1st healing centers and traveling to different areas conduct workshops.

 With the proper financial resources I would be able to speed up a process I had already planned to do and further my knowledge of not only the world, but attain additional keys of information to further my understanding of the body. All together this is about 1 years worth of traveling, training, cultural comparison, data crunching and effort; however it’s a creation of my life’s work for everyday human consumption. I love what I do and I am dedicated to the task at hand.

_________________________________________________

What We need and what you get

With your valuable assistance I would be able to meet my goal of $25,000 to complete the healing system.

The current perks and benefits to donating are

$1 - all donor’s will receive an option to opt in for my Bi-weekly project updates

$25 - a Male’s or Female’s essential health guide and chart in PDF form. This is a compilation of a list of studies that I have found useful for today’s busy world with only time to do and not enough time to slow down.

$45 - Parenting in the 21st century - a pdf to basics of keeping your child healthy in the 21st century.

$65 - Slowing down Aging in the 21st century.

$85 - This would allow you to have a 1 hour Yoga Therapy virtual consultation with me, 1 on 1 over Skype. We would go over your personal goals for your body and walk through how to get there. From chronic Ailments to weight loss, recovering from injuries and conquering severe depression.

$145 - This would be a full 2 hour Skype session and you would receive a personalized recorded recap video message after every session

$500 - This would be a series of Four 2 hour virtual sessions.
__________________________________________________

Impact:

In a world that technology and convenience are growing at exponential rates and yet however, our health conditions continue to rise. I truly feel there needs to be a place and system for people to refer to. That’s not just the ER room or a Pharmacy with the latest over the counter drug.

We have to ask ourselves:
Are we living to enjoy life or living to participate in a life where we are seeking joy constantly as our present life leaves us dissatisfied. Our health is our wealth and while some find the treasures of a smile with a satisfied life on a daily basis, many don’t have the opportunities to feel that way: regardless of financial class, ethnicity, nationality and other social terms applied to us that differentiate us as people experiencing this thing called life here on earth.

I have worked with many clients and friends over the last 8 years as I developed, tested and improved my techniques. I have been able to allow people to Conquer Severe depression, Trample Fears, Prevent unneeded surgery, Gain the ability to run marathon’s confidently, Reach new heights of their dance and expression & much more. Proud to have the experience of knowing that I have affected people’s lives positively, I have decided to do even more. I decided to take things to the Global Arena.

And so a valuable quote I hold dear and has humbled me in my efforts:

“What you are the World is. And without your transformation, there can be no transformation of the world.” Jiddu Krishnamurti

Risks & Challenges

With the Challenges ahead of Traveling in timely manner to attend the seasonal courses in each location , challenging language barriers, collecting and compiling data - many would say there is unlikelihood of my success. Aside from any possible doubts, my convictions are set and my efforts are dedicated to the completion of this journey.

The development of my Yoga Therapy practice and this healing system are the result of my life’s work. From this point I would be expanding the system to be tested under further variables to complete the Research and Development process. I would  also increase my knowledge on all of the areas that I have studied personally and begin filling in the gaps of unknown information and perspectives, while becoming more aware of and identifying further uncontrollable factors. So to truly know them, I must experience them 1st hand.

My personal track record currently of capabilities :
-20 years of dance,
-15 years without Asthma symptoms (after 16 years of acute conditions, from birth)
-10 years working as a professional in the I.T. field,
-10 years of therapeutic massage techniques/body work (not a L.M.T. - however received 1 year of apprenticeship under 2 different therapist as their therapist.)
-8 years of Yoga for both personal wellness and also as an instructor (RYT 200 x2)
-5 years Arthritis free (after 2 years of having the condition)
This by no means to boast or gloat, just adding to the variables of validation and informing to support my cause :).

 My current language proficiency conversational for both Spanish and Japanese (verbally). A beginner at Chinese, French, Korean and Vietnamese (for social use). I am truly a language enthusiast and communicator at heart; so in my mind where there is a will there is a always a way to get your point across. I am head over heels in love with this journey and will take it by the wheel and steer it to a success, so that as many can reap the benefits as possible.

Travel experience - It isn’t my 1st time abroad or traveling alone. I’ve traveled to multiple locations across the U.S., Canada and 3 non obligatory English speaking countries in Europe.
__________________________________________________


Other Ways You Can Help

It would be of great assistance if you shared this with any people who Love Yoga, Appreciate Volunteer work and so on. Share this on social media through this campaign website link and Use the Indiegogo Tools so that I know you shared. I will include you in the list of Donors that I thank at the end of this campaign .

story:
Short Summary
 

My goal is to make Ecuador 100% biological agriculture and to become a beacon of light to the rest of the world by applying the most important technology of the 21st century to improve our health, halt global warming, increase fresh and clean water and live harmoniously with nature.

Today, there are now 3 chemical companies (Bayer/Monsanto, ChemChina/Syngenta and Dow/DuPont) that have assets of almost $350 billion fighting for the $4 trillion food agricultural industry.  They are competing with each other to sell producers more chemicals and GMO seeds.  They are concentrating capital in agro-chemical business because they are losing money from their own competition but also, more importantly, due to many food producers not wanting their products and would prefer to go back to a natural approach to agriculture based on soil microbiology.  Now is the time to accelerate the growth of organic agriculture and put more nails in their coffin.

Non-infectious diseases from chemicals in our foods and applied to our bodies are growing at epidemic rates and they include 35 types of cancer, diabetes types 1 and 2, autism, Parkinson, Alzheimer, depression, sexual dysfunction, metabolic syndrome and many others.  Conventional agriculture is responsible for almost 40% of global warming due to 1.  Tillage and chemical pesticides that kill microorganisms in the soils who consume almost 50% of carbon for their diet, 2. Deforestation, and 3. Cattle methane gas.  Conventional agriculture also uses almost twice the water as organic and poisons it with excess nitrogen which destroys streams, rivers and water life. 

The UN 2013 Conference on Trade and Development Report written by over 50 world scientific experts clearly stated that the all agriculture must become sustainable by 2025 to halt disease and the environmental destructive effects from conventional agriculture.

The book was written to primarily inform Ecuadorian producers and consumers of the basic science of biological agriculture and provide an approach to organize and change the societal infrastructure for a better life.  It can also be applied globally.

Contrary to agribusiness mythology, it is indeed possible to turn every farm - cost effectively - into an organic farm and we must for our children and our future.

Your support will help accelerate the growth of organic farms in Ecuador and around the world, creating more organic food at affordable prices and a healthier planet Earth.

   Together we can change the world!

What We Need & What You Get

The funding target is $5000 for a first printing.  This amount will help print and distribute 4000 books within Ecuador at the major universities and key book stores in several major cities.  The revenues gained from the sales will be used to print more books and should be self-funding from this point forward.

The more money that is raised, the more books can be printed. If the goal is not reached, whatever money is raised will be used to print as many books as possible.  We believe that we can change the world and make it better for everyone, something we are dedicated to make happen in our work and personal lives.

Your support will help accelerate the growth of organic farms around the world and produce healthy food for all. 

Shelly is originally from Chicago where he grew up after coming to the United States from Germany after WWII.  His working career started in steel mills and factories as a machinist and mechanic. He received his electronic engineering degree (at the age of 35) from Purdue, graduating number one in his class and then worked in data communications for the next thirty years for many global corporations.  He received his Master’s in Information Technology at 55 and spent two years studying organizational behavior towards a PhD. During his last twelve years working at Cisco, Avaya and Zebra Technologies he has provided leadership in strategic alliances with other global companies such as Motorola, Honeywell, Rockwell Automation, IBM, and HP.  He wrote a book explaining his collaboration model that is considered a best practice at all of these companies, Strategic Collaborative Partnering.

After retiring to Ecuador on a farm, he began to learn what organic agriculture was all about and applied his engineering and organizational experience to learn, change and teach.  His interest in the value of organic food increased significantly when he learned that his oldest daughter’s breast cancer and his granddaughter’s type one diabetes were both directly related to food and the immune system.  He now teaches nutrition and biological farming in Ecuador to local people at rural clinics, universities and towns to small and large producers.

Shelly has a successful track record in engineering and business and is very committed to doing the right thing that benefits all of humanity and our environment.

Risks & Challenges

The book is the culmination of three years of intensive research sifting through many hundreds of peer reviewed papers and books from all over the world.  It is divided into chapters that cover every aspect of conventional and organic agriculture and their impacts on society, mostly focused on Ecuador.  However, it can generally be applied to any country in the world since the principles of the science, economics, culture and sociology remains the same.

The book is currently available online, however most Ecuadorians and also South Americans do not have internet access.  Printing is the only way to reach the most people

Together let’s change the world by helping every farmer cost effectively turn their farm into an organic farm that produces only healthy natural food, uses less energy and water while reducing global warming!

story:
Why You Will Love This

It's Comfortable

Ok, I’m about to get real here. Going through 9 months of crazy hormonal changes and, lets be honest, a lot of weird bodily changes (anyone else start growing hair in places they didn’t expect??) leaves your nipples feeling super tender. Then, what do we do with those already tender nipples? We stick them in a little person’s mouth! And while you and baby are getting the hang of how to breastfeed, it can get a bit uncomforta…scratch that. It can be painful. The last thing you need is something itchy on your nipple. These breast pads are soft.

It's Absorbent

You may be thinking “Yada, yada, yada. The one-piece, recyclable packaging thing sound cool and all, but most importantly I need this thing to absorb all the leakiness coming out of my milk bags.” Not to fear, Mama! These premium breast pads are manufactured with high-absorbency technology and keep you looking dry and not like a crazy, half asleep lady who wondered out of the wet T-shirt contest.

It's Discrete

No one wants to be walking around looking like their “headlights” are on, am I right? Yikes. Some breast pads out there are so cone shaped it looks like your nipples are tiny rocket ships attempting to blast off from earth, but are being rudely interrupted by your shirt. Maybe some people are into that look…uh, ya, but I’m definitely not. If you’re not into that look either, you should defiantly try Maytera’s breast pads. If you are into the rocket ship look, you’re going to want to pass on this product.

 

No gel beads

You know those little beads that are in a lot of things that are absorbent? If you have any kids in diapers, you’ve probably seen them. Basically, if the diaper gets super full, the gel beads absorb the moisture, but some of the beads can soak through onto the other side, i.e. you have little gel beads on your baby’s cute little bottom. You just wipe them off and then you’re good to go. The thing that I’m concerned about though, is if my breast pad uses those gel beads, what if some of them seep through onto my skin and I don’t know it? What if I go to feed my baby and, without me knowing, my newborn baby eats those things? Now, in a product that uses gel beads for absorbency, they don’t get on the skin super often. So it may never be a problem. But, for me and my baby, I don’t want to risk it.

Recyclable Packaging

Ugh, so much waste. Have you ever used a different disposable breast pad? You end up with a ton of tiny pieces of trash. With Maytera’s breast pad, the packaging is recyclable. So, rather than being upset about all the trash you have to throw away, you can be a proud Mama-Warrior who laughs in the face of excess waste and victoriously recycles her breast pad wrapper like the strong and heroic champion you are!

It's Easy to Open

This is the part that gets me really excited. I have two small children of my own, so I’ve been there. I get it. I understand that right after you’ve had a baby, the tiniest thing can fill your warm heart with joy or make you well up in tears, because you just… can’t… do it. It’s a hard time in a mama’s life. You need everything to be as easy for you as possible, because you have one really, really hard thing using up all your energy. Don’t get me wrong, having a child is wonderful and such a blessing. However, it’s also super difficult. Anything you can do to make things easier on yourself during this difficult time, do it.

Why I Started Maytera

When I was pregnant with my daughter, I did a bunch of research on how to take care of myself and my baby. I found tons of information on how to take care of my baby, but not much info at all about how to take care of myself. I looked at websites. I went to bookstores. I talked to my doctor. All had so much to tell me about taking care of my baby, but very little about how to take care of myself. The little information I was able to get on taking care of myself was almost exclusively regarding during pregnancy. What do I do for myself after I give birth? Don’t get me wrong, it is very important to take care of baby, and I’m so glad there is a wealth of information out there on that topic. But that’s not the only thing that is important.

The health and well being of mama after giving birth is important. You just endured 9 months of sickness, exhaustion, and huge hormonal and physical changes. Then you followed that up with the scariest marathon of contractions, more exhaustion, and the worst pain you’ve ever felt in your life. But finally, after all that, you are overwhelmed with feelings of deep, deep joy when you finally get to hold that precious little blessing. Wow. You went through a lot. No one can be expected to bounce right back to normal after that.

I have made it my mission to find ways to take care of and make life easier for postpartum mamas. I want to design and provide women with products that help them during this wonderful, but difficult time in their lives. I’m on a journey to improve women’s lives and let them know they are not tossed aside and forgotten about after having a baby. You are now a mom, which is wonderful, but you still matter. You get the joy and the blessing of caring for and molding the life of a human being. Nonetheless, your health, your well being, even your hopes and dreams still matter.

 

Why Donate A Box

No matter who we are or where we’ve been, we’ve all had a time in our lives where things were not going well. Hopefully, you’ve never been in a situation where things were so bad that you didn’t even have a safe place to live, but that’s not the case for every woman. Sadly, there are many women who either don’t have the means to pay for their own shelter, or they have become victims of domestic abuse and don’t have a safe place they can call home. Can you imagine being in that situation AND being pregnant? Just being pregnant alone can give you a lot of things to be scared about, but what if on top of that you also didn’t have a safe place to give your baby a home? You can join the movement and buy an additional box to be donated to women in need  

 

Meet Rebekah

I’m a mother of two precious little kids—a 4 year old boy and a 10 month old girl. So yes, most of the work I have done on building Maytera and developing this product has been done while taking care of a toddler AND newborn baby. Let’s just say I’ve had a lot of late nights. But I keep going because I’m driven to build something that changes my life and the lives of postpartum mothers everywhere. I also love anything crafty (especially knitting) and I enjoy taking the kids out on bike rides during the summer.

story:
All of this information is on our user-friendly website www.publicfitnessplaygroundprogram.com

The Public Fitness Playground Program helps build stronger communities by advancing athletic and health conscious play through proper outdoor fitness equipment, playgrounds, research, programs, and partnerships. The ‘PFPP’ is a Public Benefit Corporation and Social Enterprise. We were built to infuse a ‘free outdoor fitness opportunity’ into our everyday lives, through the combination of inspired physical, mental, educational and enlightened fitness programming for everyone...

PFPP identifies the unique benefits of outdoor exercise and how to ensure that societal spaces offer the tools for a well-rounded workout. A diverse outdoor recreation system contributes to the community in many ways. Providing a free and high-quality fitness option for the life of residents in any economy! PFPP is for the greater good! With increasing urbanization, communities are continuously seeking new ways to provide outdoor spaces and activities to residents; and outdoor exercise is one amazing ideal option…

'The World is a Playground. We knew that when we were kids. Yet, somewhere along the way, we forgot it.' Adult Public Fitness Playgrounds and Children Playgrounds can be located at any new, existing, public, private, commercial, residential and business properties. And of course, parks and recreation recourse. Allowing users to exercise, while enjoying natural and designed landscapes in an open-air environment with well-defined and innovative outdoor fitness equipment and playgrounds that serve a diverse range of users and contributes to the overall health of the population.

You can also contribute to our cause and sign the petition through:

~ Go Fund Me - https://www.gofundme.com/f/public-fitness-playground-program

~ CashApp - https://cash.app/$PFPP

~ The Petition - Care2Petitions - https://www.thepetitionsite.com/744/352/436/adult-outdoor-fitness-playgrounds-in-all-public-parks-across-the-usa/

~ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/publicfitnessplaygroun...

story:
In the past few months we have faced one of the biggest challenges in our lives. Now we know we were not ready for this type of disaster. Many people got infected and sadly many lost their lives. Socializing stopped; meeting up with friends at local restaurants and bars became a thing in the past. Offices and businesses closed down. Doctors and dentist appointments got cancelled indefinitely. But the question is for how long? and how can we make the situation better? How many times a day do we have to sanitize our office and home using the harmful chemicals? Disinfectant products can be effective, but they can't be used on surfaces like rugs, walls, electronics, professional equipment, and many more. Hence, we invented T-150, the heavy-duty smartphone-controlled disinfecting machine that uses ultraviolet radiation to disinfect all surfaces within minutes. 

 

Meet T-150

We are UV APEX, an American manufacturer that specializes in commercial grade equipment. Using sturdy long-lasting materials and engineering excellence, our team has designed and built T-150, an ultimate addition to any home, office, gym, etc. T-150 sanitizes virtually any space. Packed with mighty 150 watts of power and 360 degrees of UVC light, T-150 cleans the surrounding space of any kind of viruses, bacteria, mold, algae yeast and roundworms. 

 

 

To Our Dear Backers

For the past 5 months UV Apex has been working on the design, prototyping and testing T-150. Today we have the production sample ready. We manufacture T-150 at our facility in Los Angeles along with handheld units we have been manufacturing and they are sold out (check our website www.uvapex.com ). The machine you see in our video is the actual production sample. The good news is we are ready to start the production. We are hoping Indiegogo can help us to reach more people. 

 

Powerful UVC, not the "ordinary" UV

Ultraviolet (UV) light is a component of the electromagnetic spectrum that falls in the region between visible light and X-Rays. This invisible radiation includes the wavelength range of 100 nm to 400 nm. Known as Germicidal Ultraviolet, UVC light emits radiation specifically within the 200 - 300 nanometer wavelength. Do not be mistaken by the cheap products using regular UV lights (100-200 nm wavelength). T-150 leverages the UVC Germicidal lights for powerful and deep disinfecting action.

 

 

How UVC Light Kills Viruses 

As evident by multiple research studies and reports, when biological organisms are exposed to deep UV light in the range of 200 nm to 300 nm it is absorbed by DNA, RNA, and proteins. Absorption by proteins can lead to rupture of cell walls and death of the organism. Absorption by DNA or RNA (specifically by thymine bases) is known to cause inactivation of the DNA or RNA double helix strands through the formation of thymine dimers. If enough of these dimers are created in DNA, the DNA replication process is disrupted, and the cell cannot replicate.

UVC technology is not a new thing. It has been in use for a decade. We have used UVC light in air and water filtration systems for a long time. The pandemic forced us to expand the usage of UVC light. Nowadays people are using UVC light to sanitize their phones, countertops, computers and many other devices and surfaces. Why? Because there are no chemicals involved. You cannot spray disinfecting chemicals on everything, for example your electronics or foods. But how about your room, office, bathroom or basically any space you have to spend time in? Is there any way to sanitize the whole space in a few minutes without using any chemical? And not only the surfaces and devices but also the air.

 

 

A Note from CDC

Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) is the use of ultraviolet (UV) energy (electromagnetic radiation with a wavelength shorter than that of visible light) to kill or inactivate viral, bacterial, and fungal species. The UV spectrum is commonly divided into UVA (wavelengths of 400 nm to 315 nm), UVB (315 nm to 280 nm), and UVC (280 nm to 200 nm). The entire UV spectrum can kill or inactivate many microorganisms, but UVC energy provides the most germicidal effect, with 265 nm being the optimum wavelength

 

Say Goodbye to:

  • Viruses that attack humans and animals
  • Viruses that attack plants
  • Bacteria that causes food-borne illness
  • Other Potentially Harmful Bacteria
  • Mold
  • Roundworms
  • Algae
  • Yeast

 

 

     

     

    About UV Apex Company

    UV Apex is an electronic product manufacturing a division of MWW Manufacturing company located in Los Angles, California. We are proud to be able to design and manufacture our products in the U.S.

    UV Apex has been in manufacturing for over 20 years. When we saw people’s need to fight viruses we made the UVC sanitizing light available for everyone. We have been manufacturing handheld UVC sanitizing units and they were sold out quickly. People are using our lights to sanitize their electronics, packages, food and equipment at home and office.

    Now it is time for a bigger and more powerful machine to sanitize the whole room. We designed and manufactured T-150 to help people and businesses to get back to normal life.

     

    Proudly Made in the U.S.A

     

    Let’s Talk About T-150

    T-150 Features

    • Automatic Rise and Fall light 
    • 150 Watt Power. 360 degrees coverage
    • Bluetooth Controlled
    • Control APP for Start, Stop and Timer
    • Multi Units App Connectivity
    • Powerful Strobe Light for Warning
    • Motion Detector to Stop the Machine Automatically
    • Aluminum Body
    • Heavy Duty Casters
    • Side Handles to Lift or Move the Machine
    • 10,000 Hours Bulb Life
    • Stainless Steel Liquid/Dust Resistance On/Off Switch
    • 30 Feet Power Cable Reel
    • Powder Coat Painted
    • Made in the USA
    • 1 year Warranty

     

    How to Sanitize a Room Using UV Apex T-150

    • Place T-150 in the middle of the room you wish to sanitize
    • Press the power button
    • Leave the room and close the door
    • Open the App
    • Start the machine
    • Setup the desired time

    That's it. The machine will finish the work and turn off automatically


     

    Simple Connect. Smart Control

    Just connect your smartphone or tablet to T-150 to start sanitizing. Using Bluetooth. Why Bluetooth and not Wi-Fi, because we want the operator to be available and nobody be able to control the machine without being present. This is a safety feature. You can control your machine from 50 feet.

    Once you start the machine and setup the desired time you can turn off your phone and place it in your pocket. Once the machine is done it will send you a notification and let you know the job is done.

    T-150 is compatible with IOS and Android.

     

     

    Heavy Duty and Powerful yet Compact Size

    T-150 has 4 heavy duty casters installed. You can move the machine easily. At the same time due to the compact size you can easily store the machine anywhere.

    The power cable reel installed in the machine will pull the cable back inside and there would be no messy cable hanging out of the machine.

    We designed T-150 with commercial use in mind. The body of T-150 is made of 16 GA aluminum and it is covered with powder coat paint. The paint withstand heavy use. It will not fade, chip or scratch easily.

    150 watt would be plenty to sanitize your space. You have the option to turn on the machine from 1 min to few hours. The bulb life is about 10,000 hours. This will give you many years of life bulb.


     

    Built with Safety in Mind

    Safety is the first. We know UVC light is dangerous and human, animals and plants are not supposed to be exposed to UVC light for long time.

    • So the first thing is Bluetooth controller. You do not need to be in the room to start or stop the machine. Place the machine in the room, close the door and leave. Start and stop the machine using your smartphone without being anywhere close.
    • Second, the powerful strobe light. The powerful flashing LED light could alert from far away that the machine is on. Actually the strobe light is so powerful once it is on nobody wants to be around.
    • Third, the motion sensor. T-150 is equipped with motion sensor. If the machine senses any type of movement in the room it will shut down the lights automatically.

     

     

    Operating Power Options

    We have designed T-150 to be used anywhere. If you would like to purchase T-150 to use outside the US you can contact us for 220V option. 


     

    See Who is Using UVC

     

     

     

    Beware of Fake Products

     

     

    Dimensions

    • 15.125" W x 10.25"D x 34.25"H
    • Weight: 35 Lbs

     

     

    Rewards
story_txt:
In the past few months we have faced one of the biggest challenges in our lives. Now we know we were not ready for this type of disaster. Many people got infected and sadly many lost their lives. Socializing stopped; meeting up with friends at local restaurants and bars became a thing in the past. Offices and businesses closed down. Doctors and dentist appointments got cancelled indefinitely. But the question is for how long? and how can we make the situation better? How many times a day do we have to sanitize our office and home using the harmful chemicals? Disinfectant products can be effective, but they can't be used on surfaces like rugs, walls, electronics, professional equipment, and many more. Hence, we invented T-150, the heavy-duty smartphone-controlled disinfecting machine that uses ultraviolet radiation to disinfect all surfaces within minutes.  Meet T-150We are UV APEX, an American manufacturer that specializes in commercial grade equipment. Using sturdy long-lasting materials and engineering excellence, our team has designed and built T-150, an ultimate addition to any home, office, gym, etc. T-150 sanitizes virtually any space. Packed with mighty 150 watts of power and 360 degrees of UVC light, T-150 cleans the surrounding space of any kind of viruses, bacteria, mold, algae yeast and roundworms.   To Our Dear BackersFor the past 5 months UV Apex has been working on the design, prototyping and testing T-150. Today we have the production sample ready. We manufacture T-150 at our facility in Los Angeles along with handheld units we have been manufacturing and they are sold out (check our website www.uvapex.com ). The machine you see in our video is the actual production sample. The good news is we are ready to start the production. We are hoping Indiegogo can help us to reach more people.  Powerful UVC, not the "ordinary" UVUltraviolet (UV) light is a component of the electromagnetic spectrum that falls in the region between visible light and X-Rays. This invisible radiation includes the wavelength range of 100 nm to 400 nm. Known as Germicidal Ultraviolet, UVC light emits radiation specifically within the 200 - 300 nanometer wavelength. Do not be mistaken by the cheap products using regular UV lights (100-200 nm wavelength). T-150 leverages the UVC Germicidal lights for powerful and deep disinfecting action.  How UVC Light Kills Viruses As evident by multiple research studies and reports, when biological organisms are exposed to deep UV light in the range of 200 nm to 300 nm it is absorbed by DNA, RNA, and proteins. Absorption by proteins can lead to rupture of cell walls and death of the organism. Absorption by DNA or RNA (specifically by thymine bases) is known to cause inactivation of the DNA or RNA double helix strands through the formation of thymine dimers. If enough of these dimers are created in DNA, the DNA replication process is disrupted, and the cell cannot replicate.UVC technology is not a new thing. It has been in use for a decade. We have used UVC light in air and water filtration systems for a long time. The pandemic forced us to expand the usage of UVC light. Nowadays people are using UVC light to sanitize their phones, countertops, computers and many other devices and surfaces. Why? Because there are no chemicals involved. You cannot spray disinfecting chemicals on everything, for example your electronics or foods. But how about your room, office, bathroom or basically any space you have to spend time in? Is there any way to sanitize the whole space in a few minutes without using any chemical? And not only the surfaces and devices but also the air.  A Note from CDCUltraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) is the use of ultraviolet (UV) energy (electromagnetic radiation with a wavelength shorter than that of visible light) to kill or inactivate viral, bacterial, and fungal species. The UV spectrum is commonly divided into UVA (wavelengths of 400 nm to 315 nm), UVB (315 nm to 280 nm), and UVC (280 nm to 200 nm). The entire UV spectrum can kill or inactivate many microorganisms, but UVC energy provides the most germicidal effect, with 265 nm being the optimum wavelength Say Goodbye to:
Viruses that attack humans and animals
Viruses that attack plants
Bacteria that causes food-borne illness
Other Potentially Harmful Bacteria
Mold
Roundworms
Algae
Yeast
    About UV Apex CompanyUV Apex is an electronic product manufacturing a division of MWW Manufacturing company located in Los Angles, California. We are proud to be able to design and manufacture our products in the U.S.UV Apex has been in manufacturing for over 20 years. When we saw people’s need to fight viruses we made the UVC sanitizing light available for everyone. We have been manufacturing handheld UVC sanitizing units and they were sold out quickly. People are using our lights to sanitize their electronics, packages, food and equipment at home and office.Now it is time for a bigger and more powerful machine to sanitize the whole room. We designed and manufactured T-150 to help people and businesses to get back to normal life. Proudly Made in the U.S.A Let’s Talk About T-150T-150 Features
Automatic Rise and Fall light 
150 Watt Power. 360 degrees coverage
Bluetooth Controlled
Control APP for Start, Stop and Timer
Multi Units App Connectivity
Powerful Strobe Light for Warning

Motion Detector to Stop the Machine Automatically

Aluminum Body
Heavy Duty Casters
Side Handles to Lift or Move the Machine
10,000 Hours Bulb Life
Stainless Steel Liquid/Dust Resistance On/Off Switch
30 Feet Power Cable Reel
Powder Coat Painted
Made in the USA
1 year Warranty
 How to Sanitize a Room Using UV Apex T-150
Place T-150 in the middle of the room you wish to sanitize
Press the power button
Leave the room and close the door
Open the App
Start the machine
Setup the desired time
That's it. The machine will finish the work and turn off automatically Simple Connect. Smart ControlJust connect your smartphone or tablet to T-150 to start sanitizing. Using Bluetooth. Why Bluetooth and not Wi-Fi, because we want the operator to be available and nobody be able to control the machine without being present. This is a safety feature. You can control your machine from 50 feet.Once you start the machine and setup the desired time you can turn off your phone and place it in your pocket. Once the machine is done it will send you a notification and let you know the job is done.T-150 is compatible with IOS and Android.  Heavy Duty and Powerful yet Compact SizeT-150 has 4 heavy duty casters installed. You can move the machine easily. At the same time due to the compact size you can easily store the machine anywhere.The power cable reel installed in the machine will pull the cable back inside and there would be no messy cable hanging out of the machine.We designed T-150 with commercial use in mind. The body of T-150 is made of 16 GA aluminum and it is covered with powder coat paint. The paint withstand heavy use. It will not fade, chip or scratch easily.150 watt would be plenty to sanitize your space. You have the option to turn on the machine from 1 min to few hours. The bulb life is about 10,000 hours. This will give you many years of life bulb. Built with Safety in MindSafety is the first. We know UVC light is dangerous and human, animals and plants are not supposed to be exposed to UVC light for long time.
So the first thing is Bluetooth controller. You do not need to be in the room to start or stop the machine. Place the machine in the room, close the door and leave. Start and stop the machine using your smartphone without being anywhere close.
Second, the powerful strobe light. The powerful flashing LED light could alert from far away that the machine is on. Actually the strobe light is so powerful once it is on nobody wants to be around.
Third, the motion sensor. T-150 is equipped with motion sensor. If the machine senses any type of movement in the room it will shut down the lights automatically.

story:
Is your snoring giving you a hard time?

More than 40% of adults suffer from snoring, having less sleep,and more daytime fatigue and irritability. When we sleep, our airway muscles relax, and our throat tissues vibrate,causing those annoying rasps and snorts that can start divorces.

Small,light and completely wireless,SleepMi Pro is the ultimate Snoring solution that helps you breathe smoother to get a good night’s sleep! With smart control and advanced data monitoring to track your progress and check how you have improved

How it works ?

People snore because their upper throat muscles loosen up when they sleep and start blocking the airways, making it harder to breathe and causing irritating night noises.

Sleep Mi Pro will relax the hypoglossal nerve and massage your mandibular muscles through soothing micro-vibrations at different frequencies, ultimately adjusting your respiratory rate and allowing you to breathe smoother for an extra refreshing rest.

When turning on Sleep Mi Pro, place it properly on your throat, and it will start massaging automatically- reducing the sound and frequency of your snoring right away

We strongly recommend using SleepMi Pro for one or two weeks to observe and confirm all the changes in your sleep and snoring.

The following graph shows the progress during the first two weeks:the yellow line represents data from the first week and the Blue line from the second week.

Sleep Mi Pro V.S. First -Generation Version

Product working level the sleep mi pro version is optimized for the algorithm which improves the working intensity from 10levels to 26levels of the Sleep Mi Pro version, so that the product can cover a wider range of groups.

Languages and surface : the sleepmi pro version,including English,Japanese and Chinese,old version only have Chinese languages and surface.

A number of working motors:the sleepmi pro version of the product has two motors, higher working maximum intensity ,which can be freely switched from a single motor to double motor to provide more intensity levels and improve user experience.

Easy To Use Anytime Anywhere

You can use sleep mi pro anytime and anywhere you want! perfect for your relaxing lunch breaks and for sleeping in any position, whether lying down flat or on your side.

Better sleep means better living

SMALL,LIGHT & PORTABLE

SleepMi Pro is extra compact,extra light,and super easy to carry! Weighing only 16g,it fits easily in your pockets, purses,and more-making it perfect to use on the go.

Smart  Structureal  Design

Smarter internal design for safe throat muscle stimulation, effective snoring recognition, and fully automatic working mode!

Snoring & Sleep Date At A Glance

With Sleep Mi Pro placed comfortably on your throat, its advanced sensors and software will start collecting your snoring and sleeping data, automatically saving it for you to check after waking up!

Multlple Anti-snoring  Levles

Sleep Mi Pro has multiple anti-snoring levels with different massage settings and simple timers to adapt to all snorers- so you can freely find the right modes for you!

Convenient  USB C Harging

Requiring just two hours of charging for full capacity, you can use SleepMi Pro for about 1 for 2 nights ,depending on your snoring intensity.

Never Falls Off

With the best ergonomic design to ensure it doesn’t fall off your head, you can use Sleep Mi Pro whenever and wherever you want-be it travelling ,at home, or in the office.

 

 

  • FCC/EMC/PES/ROHS patent certificate

story:
I started Muay Thai at the age of 14years old and have been training since then. I entered Singapore Kickboxing Championship in March 2019. I was representing the 54kg weight category and due to the lack of opponents, I fought at the 60kg weight category and emerged as a Champion from the two days tournament.

 

This will be a great opportunity to further my experience on a international level. As a kid, I never finished anything I started and when I found combat sports, I’ve always wanted to do more and achieve to the best of my ability. 

 

I hope with your contribution, it will allow me to partake this competition but at the same time, prove to myself that I’m better than I was before. I can complete any task that I’ve started. 

 

What is this funding for? It’s going to be used for my expenses (Travel, Accommodation and Daily Expenses) when I’m in Bosnia. I’m not exactly sure what’s the actual amount I need, but I hope with the funds raised, it will be sufficient for my trip. In the event where there’s an amount left after my trip, I’m planning to use the funds to do some charity work (Still have yet to do my research and decide what I’m gonna do- but I’ll keep y’all posted)

 

I have participated in 6 Amateur Fights with 5W 1L. Those are just statistics and numbers. What I wanna show and prove us that even with my lack of experience in competition, I have the knowledge, ability and HEART to participate in any competition and share my experience with the world.

 

Besides proving to myself that I am of a person who doesn’t do things halfway and give up, I wanna show the world and the nation, Singapore has decent combat athletics and it’s isn’t all about brawls and power. IT’S ABOUT BEING SMART, AND, HAVING A STRONG HEART. 

 

The hardest part of this is proving to people that it’s an equally risky sport as any other sport. 

 

What’s make it safer? The ability of myself to defend myself in the ring, in some sports, you don’t have the option to protect yourself to prevent an injury but in combat sports (although we go on head to head with each other) I still have the chance and opportunity to protect myself with the techniques I have.

 

Through this upcoming competition, I’m going for the gold and hope that I have an opportunity to tell people that combat sports is like a game of chess (who makes the wrong move loses the game) and not a dog fight- Misconception this days. 

 

If any of you want to contribute in other ways beside crowdfunding, below is a list of contributions that I would appreciate if you could help me out with.

 

Share this post

Give me a shoutout on your social medias

Hit me up for Personal Trainings (Source of Income)

Follow me on IG: @mrlengzai.sg

 

To end it off, I would like each and everyone of you to remember, “If you can’t make the world a better place, make yourself better for the world.”

story:
hey guys, I'm Bill. 

I come from a small country town in Queensland Australia and have moved down south to the beautiful city of Melbourne to pursue my dreams. Let me go a little more in depth on this.

Based off my own unintentional trial and error (late nights - busy job - partying) it's become quite evident that my weekends are becoming less productive - due to sleep ins, lazing around and hangovers.  Not just myself.. but I was seeing this happen with my friends, my brothers, co-workers .. everyone!

So I've created a product that aids in combating the negative effects and co-factors of alcohol consumption and late nights out. Pretty much to give you that kick up the bum to get you out of bed feeling replenished, hydrated and ready to take on the day. Made from all natural ingredients I truly believe in this product.. I literally have it every single day. 


What We Need & What You Get

Being successful with funds - they will all be put towards:

  • All funding will go towards launch/marketing of the first batch (1000 units) = $25000 
  • Perks for you include Instagram shout out (11.4k followers) and the option of branded stickers sent to your door 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • This is something that's not yet relevant within our market! 
  • We want to make a shift within people and encourage more productive and active lifestyles. Our product caters for that. 

Risks & Challenges

  • As you're aware - there is always risk in nearly everything. However we have a marketing strategy and distribution/collaborations in place waiting for our launch. 
  • Having a background in ecommerce and marketing i'm beyond confident in reaching success from this. I truly believe in this product. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We understand if you're genuinely unable to chip in, which is totally cool! 
  • So if you could, we would appreciate if you could share our indiegogo campaign to help us make some noise!
