story:
THIS IS SOUNDOX™ SLIM

After hearing how thousands of peoples lives have been changed by using our original SOUNDOX™ Ear Protectors to turn down the volume of their world, we knew it was only right to continue to develop a sleeker, ever more stunning, and increasingly powerful earplug. 

When developing a truly magnificent earplugs, there are two key factors that need to be met, and those are FUNCTION & FORM. We engineered SOUNDOX™ SLIM so sleek and comfortable you will forget they are even there. 

The all new SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are now available to pre-order.

 

SOUNDOX™ SLIM deploys a patent-pending design that combines active noise filtration and acoustic noise attenuation to create a beautiful sound experience.  We have developed the SOUNDOX™ SLIM in three stunning finishes; JET BLACK, SPACE SILVER and ROSE PINK.

With your help, if we exceed our goals we will engineer a solid TITANIUM edition of the SOUNDOX™ SLIMS. All SOUNDOX™ SLIMS will feature anodized space grade alloys with a miraculous HIGH-POLISH finish, and smooth edges that are pleasant to the eye and amazing to the touch.

 

SOUNDOX SLIM are engineered to produce optimal comfort for all day and night usage. They include interchangeable tips in 3 sizes; SMALL, MEDIUM and LARGE. With this intended design, you can effortlessly swap your FOAM TIPS to find a size that fits you perfectly while providing maximum attenuation and true comfort.

Always use protection, and we got you covered...

  • Concerts and Events (The beauty is in the detail, enjoy every moment with incredible details at very safe levels)
  • Sleeping (Say goodbye to those sleepless nights, block out snoring and other noises and get the sleep you deserve)
  • Traveling (Wether its by plane, train or car do it the right way)
  • Motorsports (Nothing beats the sound of a fine tuned motor, enjoy it the safe way)
  • Working (Your in it for the long run, protect your ears and look good doing it)

 

Why SOUNDOX™ SLIM you might ask...

What sets the SOUNDOX™ SLIMS apart from any other generic ear plug, is that SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are engineered to hoist a ergonomic fit that provides a seal to block damaging decibel levels from entering your ear, while allowing low frequency decibel levels to pass through. The beauty behind the design is that you can block out damaging sounds, while still enjoying a casual conversation.

We have engineered the patent-pending technology, produced various prototypes and tested SOUNDOX™ SLIMS in ears of all shapes and sizes. After extensive test and implementations, we have fostered the perfect design that is truly accustomed to all ears.

With the help and support of crowd funding, we will be able to bring this truly amazing earplug to the market and allow the world to enjoy ear protection as it should be, amazing.  By backing our crowdfunding campaign you will be the first receive SOUNDOX™ SLIMS before any online retailers.

 

THE MAGIC BEHIND IT

SOUNDOX™ patent-pending Technology.

Soundox™ designers set out to discover why traditional ear plugs were performing so poorly. And the answer was hiding in plain sight, we realized that traditional foam, plastic and silicone ear plugs don't block sound, they absorb it!

Its quite simple when you think about it. Imagine wearing a plastic or foam helmet over your head. What would you hear? The sound level would be reduced but the resonating sound coming through would not be so clean and crisp. Both materials do block sound to some degree, but given their composition, they don't do such a great job. Plastic and foam ear plugs just don't cut it when it comes to low frequencies, and all of the fine details are lost in process and you are left in a world of sub-sonic pressure thats inescapable.  

Now imagine having that same helmet over your head, but instead of plastic or foam, imagine it is solid TITANIUM or ALLOY. Now what would you be hearing?

... Thats exactly what we thought!

TITANIUM or ALLOY is traditionally a good conductor for sound, so it has been discredited for being a suitable ear plugs. Until now. What we have discovered is that once you incorporate a solid piece of dense metal into a soft foam tip that molds in your ear, sound can't penetrate through the metal. And without a direct connection between the sound source and the ear plug, the sound is no longer conducted, its blocked!

 

SPACE SILVER

Behind Blocking Low Frequencies

Low frequencies produce the highest amount of energy, and traditional ear plugs do not do a good job at blocking out such high energy. When low frequencies are not properly diverted, it makes for a very unpleasant experience, almost as if you were to be underwater. Traditional ear plugs create a very muffled and disconnected feeling, whereas SOUNDOX™ SLIMS were specifically designed to avoid that experience at all cost necessary. 

SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are tested by a third party against a traditional foam earplug. All earplugs are tested using a direct sound source to sample the frequency levels of each earplug.

The orange signal trace displays the frequency attenuation of traditional foam earplug, the green signal tracing is the attenuation using the ALLOY SOUNDOX™ SLIMS and the blue signal trace is the attenuation of  the TITANIUM SOUNDOX™ SLIMS. 

The data shows how both ALLOY and TITANIUM out perform traditional foam earplugs. When analyzing the blue and green signal traces, it can be seen that the SLIMS composed of TITANIUM block approximately 9dB more than the ALUMINUM SLIMS, this is due to the dense properties of titanium, allowing for a more detailed and harmonic hearing experience. 



 

Design

JET BLACK

SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are designed to stand the test of time. 

A revolutionary design is not just about FUNCTION, it is also about great visual FORM. We set out to design a ear plug that defines and pushes the limits of modern craftsmanship. With a design that incorporates smooth and symmetrical shapes to the fullest SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are as functional as they are ascetically pleasing. 

SOUNDOX™ SLIMS were designed to last forever. By using space grade ALLOYS and TITANIUM, the base of the ear plug will stand the test of time and anything you put them through. SOUNDOX™ foam tips are designed to last for continuous daily use, they are both water proof and hypoallergenic. 

When the time comes to replace the foam tips, simply grip and twist the foam tip to remove it from the metal base. To equip the ear plug with a new foam tip, simply slide the foam tip onto the tip connector, and with your index finer and thumb, press down on the base of the ear plug and the top of the foam tip and the ear plug will effortlessly come together with a gratifying click. 

SOUNDOX™ SLIMS include SMALL, MEDIUM and LARGE foam tips to ensure that you will find your perfect fit.

 

 

Have you ever experienced your ears ringing? Thats the sound of damage.

The damage can happen anywhere, spinning class, live sport events, concerts the list goes on. Traditional ear plugs just don't get it done; they are fiddly, uncool and no fun to wear, especially in public.

With SOUNDOX™ SLIMS ear plugs, you can still hear whats going on around you through natural bone conduction, but in much safer and practical manner. Most of us have experienced ringing ears, and then it fades away, but if you continuously expose your ears to damaging sounds that ringing sensation will no longer fade away, this is known as tinnitus. SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are designed specifically to combat this effect. 

 

ROSE PINK

 

 

Forcefield of Protection

When using SOUNDOX™ SLIMS the feeling they bring is comparable to having a force field of protection for your ears. What separates SOUNDOX™ SLIMS from every other ear plug, is not only the pleasing design, its the function of having the power to put the volume knob on the world around you. In a blaring environment, you will be able to hear the peaks of sound, while cutting out the damaging sound levels that harm your ears. They truly put your ears in a safe world, where you can still hear through natural bone-conduction allowing for a hearing experience paralleled by no other ear plugs.

This force field of protection are ideal for blocking irritating sounds such as:

  • Sleeping
  • Motorsports
  • Work Place
  • Snoring
  • Planes, trains, buses and cars
  • Concerts
  • Fitness classes
  • Noisy households

And everywhere else that you would like to put a volume knob on.

 

The secret behind it all.
Don't try to absorb sound... Block it!

Where traditional earplugs failed, is where SOUNDOX™ SLIMS picked up the slack. Standard foam ear plugs absorb sound attenuation, they can't physically block it. Considering the small size of a foam earplug, there just simply isn't enough body to block out sound. This lack of size allows sound to penetrate through the earplug making its way into your ear, the results are muffled distorted sounds in the high and mid frequencies with little to no reduction with low frequencies.

SOUNDOX™ SLIMS dense ALLOY and TITANIUM composition block noise from entering the ears and attenuates mid and high frequencies with a clean finish. The design of SOUNDOX™ patent-pending technology disallows noise from conducting with the earplugs which allows the suer to effectively block their ears from direct sound waves.

TITANIUM

 

 

FoamTips

All set of earplugs are equipped with FoamTips in sizes small, medium and large.

Developing a revolutionary FoamTip is key to SOUNDOX™. After countless test and trials Soundox developed a propriety memory foam tip that formulates into a perfect seal using your body's heat. SOUNDOX™ memory FoamTips are designed for ultra-comfort and continuous use. Our FoamTips are formulated to not tear or break down under normal wearing conditions.

SOUNDOX™ FoamTips key features:

  • Ultra-Comfort
  • Durability to resistance ripping and breaking down
  • Body heat activated memory foam

 

Fitting SLIMS

Every pair includes a set of small, medium and large foam tips, we suggest you try each size to determine what suits your ears best. Once suited with the ideal foam tip for your ear, simple squeeze and roll the foam tip between your thumb and index finger. Next insert the earplug into your ear and allow 45 seconds for the foam tip to fully rebound and create a sound proof seal. The info graph below provides a detailed illustration of the fitting process step by step.

 

Risks and Challenges:

SOUNDOX current risk and challenges consist of receiving adequate funding that is needed to bring the project to life. With your help we can change the world of traditional hearing protection.

 

Current production stage:

SOUNDOX SLIMS have been tested via prototype and are ready for production.

 

Deliveries:

Once we reach our funding goals, we expect to have orders going out 2-3 weeks after.
story_txt:
THIS IS SOUNDOX™ SLIMAfter hearing how thousands of peoples lives have been changed by using our original SOUNDOX™ Ear Protectors to turn down the volume of their world, we knew it was only right to continue to develop a sleeker, ever more stunning, and increasingly powerful earplug. When developing a truly magnificent earplugs, there are two key factors that need to be met, and those are FUNCTION & FORM. We engineered SOUNDOX™ SLIM so sleek and comfortable you will forget they are even there. The all new SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are now available to pre-order. SOUNDOX™ SLIM deploys a patent-pending design that combines active noise filtration and acoustic noise attenuation to create a beautiful sound experience.  We have developed the SOUNDOX™ SLIM in three stunning finishes; JET BLACK, SPACE SILVER and ROSE PINK. With your help, if we exceed our goals we will engineer a solid TITANIUM edition of the SOUNDOX™ SLIMS. All SOUNDOX™ SLIMS will feature anodized space grade alloys with a miraculous HIGH-POLISH finish, and smooth edges that are pleasant to the eye and amazing to the touch. SOUNDOX SLIM are engineered to produce optimal comfort for all day and night usage. They include interchangeable tips in 3 sizes; SMALL, MEDIUM and LARGE. With this intended design, you can effortlessly swap your FOAM TIPS to find a size that fits you perfectly while providing maximum attenuation and true comfort.Always use protection, and we got you covered...

Concerts and Events (The beauty is in the detail, enjoy every moment with incredible details at very safe levels)

Sleeping (Say goodbye to those sleepless nights, block out snoring and other noises and get the sleep you deserve)

Traveling (Wether its by plane, train or car do it the right way)

Motorsports (Nothing beats the sound of a fine tuned motor, enjoy it the safe way)

Working (Your in it for the long run, protect your ears and look good doing it)
 Why SOUNDOX™ SLIM you might ask...What sets the SOUNDOX™ SLIMS apart from any other generic ear plug, is that SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are engineered to hoist a ergonomic fit that provides a seal to block damaging decibel levels from entering your ear, while allowing low frequency decibel levels to pass through. The beauty behind the design is that you can block out damaging sounds, while still enjoying a casual conversation.We have engineered the patent-pending technology, produced various prototypes and tested SOUNDOX™ SLIMS in ears of all shapes and sizes. After extensive test and implementations, we have fostered the perfect design that is truly accustomed to all ears.With the help and support of crowd funding, we will be able to bring this truly amazing earplug to the market and allow the world to enjoy ear protection as it should be, amazing.  By backing our crowdfunding campaign you will be the first receive SOUNDOX™ SLIMS before any online retailers. THE MAGIC BEHIND ITSOUNDOX™ patent-pending Technology.Soundox™ designers set out to discover why traditional ear plugs were performing so poorly. And the answer was hiding in plain sight, we realized that traditional foam, plastic and silicone ear plugs don't block sound, they absorb it!Its quite simple when you think about it. Imagine wearing a plastic or foam helmet over your head. What would you hear? The sound level would be reduced but the resonating sound coming through would not be so clean and crisp. Both materials do block sound to some degree, but given their composition, they don't do such a great job. Plastic and foam ear plugs just don't cut it when it comes to low frequencies, and all of the fine details are lost in process and you are left in a world of sub-sonic pressure thats inescapable.  Now imagine having that same helmet over your head, but instead of plastic or foam, imagine it is solid TITANIUM or ALLOY. Now what would you be hearing?... Thats exactly what we thought!TITANIUM or ALLOY is traditionally a good conductor for sound, so it has been discredited for being a suitable ear plugs. Until now. What we have discovered is that once you incorporate a solid piece of dense metal into a soft foam tip that molds in your ear, sound can't penetrate through the metal. And without a direct connection between the sound source and the ear plug, the sound is no longer conducted, its blocked! SPACE SILVERBehind Blocking Low FrequenciesLow frequencies produce the highest amount of energy, and traditional ear plugs do not do a good job at blocking out such high energy. When low frequencies are not properly diverted, it makes for a very unpleasant experience, almost as if you were to be underwater. Traditional ear plugs create a very muffled and disconnected feeling, whereas SOUNDOX™ SLIMS were specifically designed to avoid that experience at all cost necessary. SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are tested by a third party against a traditional foam earplug. All earplugs are tested using a direct sound source to sample the frequency levels of each earplug.The orange signal trace displays the frequency attenuation of traditional foam earplug, the green signal tracing is the attenuation using the ALLOY SOUNDOX™ SLIMS and the blue signal trace is the attenuation of  the TITANIUM SOUNDOX™ SLIMS. The data shows how both ALLOY and TITANIUM out perform traditional foam earplugs. When analyzing the blue and green signal traces, it can be seen that the SLIMS composed of TITANIUM block approximately 9dB more than the ALUMINUM SLIMS, this is due to the dense properties of titanium, allowing for a more detailed and harmonic hearing experience.  DesignJET BLACKSOUNDOX™ SLIMS are designed to stand the test of time. A revolutionary design is not just about FUNCTION, it is also about great visual FORM. We set out to design a ear plug that defines and pushes the limits of modern craftsmanship. With a design that incorporates smooth and symmetrical shapes to the fullest SOUNDOX™ SLIMS are as functional as they are ascetically pleasing. SOUNDOX™ SLIMS were designed to last forever. story:
HYPERBELL was designed to maximize your workout, while minimizing the amount of space and money you spend. HYPERBELL transforms your dumbbells into a loaded gym—no need to buy plates, curl bars, kettlebells, and macebells. Create the ultimate home gym for 1/10th of the cost!

 

Don't get stuck doing the same exercises over and over. Unlock an entire gym's worth of equipment with HYPERBELL. Think of it as the Swiss Army Knife for your gym. The kettlebell handle and bar are interchangeable so you can quickly swap them in and out to maximize your workout, change up your exercises, and get better results.  

 

 

HYPERBELL is simple. It clamps on to nearly any dumbbell (or adjustable dumbbell) in a matter of seconds.  When using the kettlebell handle, you can keep it parallel with the dumbbell for exercises such as cleans, or you can lock in a perpendicular position for swings. No more banging the dumbbell into your legs while doing swings. 

 

We built HYPERBELL to be as tough as you are, so you can flip it, rack it, and drop it. We over-built and over-designed it to withstand any workout. Each clamp can hold up to 100 lbs, which means the kettlebell attachment holds up to 100 lbs and the bar holds up to 200 lbs (100 lbs on each side). The clamp and collar are made from polycarbonate which is the same material used in bulletproof glass, riot shields, and other safety products. It is some of the toughest material available. 

 

 

(Video above) - Trying (and failing) to break HYPERBELL. *Sledgehammer is for demonstration only and not an intended purpose.

story:
No catch, no side effects, zero hassle.

The key to hair care is just a patch away.

 

Buddie is a scalp and hair care device that uses clinically proven technology to send nutrients to your scalp. It’s a safe and effective method of treatment that will protect and regrow your hair so you stay confident in how you look.

 

Safe and effective.

Just 7 mins a day, 2x a week.

 

Going to the clinic requires extra time and money. Buddie, on the other hand, allows you to enjoy clinical care in the comfort of your home.


 

 

 

 

We combined the benefits of Transdermal Drug Delivery System (TDDS) and Iontophoresis for the nutrients to be delivered efficiently while remaining safe and non-invasive. As the nutrients reach the hair follicles from within your system, you’ll find the results to be more effective than treatment methods that attempt to spread nutrients from the outside in (shampoos, oils, laser treatment, etc),

 

 

 

Buddie is meant to be placed on pulse points, where blood vessels are closest to the skin. This ensures the gel patch nutrients are absorbed and delivered directly to the scalp. We recommend placing Buddie behind the ears or on your shoulders to see greatest results.

 
The gel patch’s adhesive layer allows you to keep Buddie securely attached even while you move about. However, it is also best to avoid areas with a lot of hair so that the patch has direct contact with your skin.


 

 

 

Enough with the hassle, the heavy helmets, and harmful ingredients. None of these provide the hair solution you asked for.

Many hair growth products out in the market lead to empty promises. The progress is slow or perhaps nonexistent because they don't target hair loss problems at its core – the scalp.

 

Let us introduce you to Buddie.

 

FDA-cleared, clinically proven, and optimized efficiency. Read on to learn why we believe Buddie is so great.

 

 

 

 

 

The before and after results were measured after a 30-day use of Buddie 3 times a week. Please keep in mind that results vary greatly depending on each individual's lifestyle and diet. But here's clear proof that Buddie really works!

 

Not only recommended by regular users, Buddie has also been cleared by the FDA, FCC as well as received the CE mark of Europe and KC of Korea.

*Documents above show certification for “Peatch,” our product’s previous name before it became “Buddie.”

 

 

 

A clinical test conducted on 20 people using Buddie showed an immediate improvement on the scalp. Scalp firmness was improved by 12.99% and redness reduced by 36.34%.

 

 

 

 

Buddie was created by Rootonix, a team of scalp care specialists. We spent months perfecting the technology and design to make hair treatment accessible to all.

The Rootonix team has actively participated in several hardware, patent, and tech expos in excitement to share our proud work. We’ve been lucky enough to have received recognition through several awards worldwide:

  • Grand Prix Award at the 2021 International Exhibition of Inventions Geneva
  • 4 awards (Best Inventor, Gold, Silver, and Bronze) at the 2020 Seoul International Invention Fair (SIIF)
  • 2 awards (Best Invention and Bronze Award) at the 2019 International Trade Fair for Ideas, Inventions, and New Products (iENA)

 

 

 

 

Buddie uses a combination of Iontophoresis and TDDS (Transdermal Drug Delivery System) to absorb nutrients from the gel patch’s serum into the skin.
 

 

Once the nutrients enter below the skin, it enters the bloodstream. Buddie's technology then speeds up the circulation to your scalp.

 

 

The nutrients are dispersed from within your system to the scalp and hair follicles, creating an optimized environment for healthy hair growth.

Just incorporate 7 minutes a day, 2 times a week into your routine and you’ll experience an effective hair treatment right at home.

 

 

Transdermal patches have become a popular form of drug delivery – melatonin patches, stress relief patches, nicotine patches, etc. But in order to maximize absorption, Buddie incorporates the  technology of iontophoresis.

 

We conducted an experiment to measure the difference in absorption with and without iontophoresis. The test showed an 8x increase in effectiveness when iontophoresis was used, which leads to seeing much clearer results.

This is why we decided to use iontophoresis in Buddie and how it can show you the progress you want to see.

 

 

 

 

Buddie helps to absorb all the moisture and nutrients from its patch. The level of absorption from Buddie's technology reaches a new depth that just patting down with your hands cannot.

 

 

 

 

The gel patch’s serum is made up of the best-quality ingredients, inspired by Korean skincare. It contains salicylic acid to reduce dandruff and excess oil, dexpanthenol to deeply hydrate the scalp and hair follicles, and l-menthol which helps soothe scalp irritation.

These, along with other natural components like green tea and ginger extract, create the perfect formula for scalp care.

 

 

 

Buddie’s patch is composed of three thin layers that ensures the serum is delivered to the skin in a safe and effective manner.

 

 

 


 

 

You’ve got enough things to check off your to-do list. We didn’t want to add another.

That’s why Buddie is designed to be carried easily and used anywhere. Pop it on during your work hours, downtime, or while you get other house chores done. 

Just incorporate 7 minutes a day, 2 times a week into your routine and you’ll experience an effective hair treatment right at home.

 

 

 

 

One unit weighs just 13g, less than half an ounce. Its case makes it extremely convenient to carry around too so that you can use it anywhere.

 

 


To maximize portability, Buddie is designed to charge within its case. So even after the unit runs out of battery, you can place it back in the case to recharge.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A single scalp or hair treatment can cost up to $100 per session. Say you try to keep up with this, like you should, and the bill can easily pile up.

Buddie comes at a single cost while providing the same clinical care. It also saves you tremendous time by being able to receive the treatment right at home.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please note: 1 device comes with 10 gel patch packs in the box, which contain two patches each — one for each unit.

We're also providing a special $0 shipping fee promotion on the add-on patches for Indiegogo ONLY. Take this as encouragement to make scalp-care a long-term commitment!

 

Looking for even more gel patches?

We got you. After the campaign is over, additional orders of gel patches will be available on www.rootonix.com. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please note: 1 device comes with 10 gel patch packs, which contain two patches each — one for each unit.

 

 

 

 

Q: How do I turn the device on?

  1. After attaching the bridge and patch to the unit, press the center button for 3 seconds until you feel a light vibration. 
  2. The session begins simultaneously as the device is turned on. Keep it placed behind your ear or on your shoulders during the session.
  3. Once 7 minutes have passed, the unit will shut off automatically. Peel it off once it’s done.

 

Q: Is it dangerous to stare at the LED light directly?

A: Although there is no potential harm, it is not recommended to look directly at it for long periods of time.

 

Q: Can people with sensitive skin also use Buddie?

A: Please consult a professional first. It is not recommended for those using steroids or other drug substances, have allergic skin reactions, or have been diagnosed with skin conditions.

 

Q: Are the bridge pieces easily damaged?

A: They will not be damaged unless direct force is applied. However, please still be careful with how you handle the pieces when attaching them to the unit.

 

Q: Can I place Buddie on my skin if it’s wet or sweaty?

A: Please make sure to apply Buddie on dry, clean skin. This will maximize the effect of Buddie’s technology and thus help the nutrients absorb better into the skin.

 

Q: Can I lie down while wearing Buddie?

A: In order to avoid damaging the device, please do not apply force or pressure while wearing Buddie by lying down on it.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our company has been recognized for its innovative efforts in Korea. We worked tirelessly to build a great product and to form connections with established agencies like KOTRA and KITRA that provide us the resources to go through the delivery process smoothly.

We launched Buddie on Indiegogo knowing we will be shipping worldwide. Through our experience of fulfilling other products of ours, we know what to expect. We’ll do our best to keep our end of the promise for those who believe in us.

Thank you for your support. We’re so excited for you all to meet Buddie soon!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Altos Business Group is a product launch consulting agency that specializes in helping global tech startups launch their products in the United States. Contact Us: support@altosbusiness.com

Trend Adopter showcases the best new crowdfunding products from all around the world! Contact us: hello@trendadopter.com | Learn more at www.trendadopter.com

Pop it on during your work hours, downtime, or while you get other house chores done. Just incorporate 7 minutes a day, 2 times a week into your routine and you’ll experience an effective hair treatment right at home.    One unit weighs just 13g, less than half an ounce. Its case makes it extremely convenient to carry around too so that you can use it anywhere.  To maximize portability, Buddie is designed to charge within its case. So even after the unit runs out of battery, you can place it back in the case to recharge.        A single scalp or hair treatment can cost up to $100 per session. Say you try to keep up with this, like you should, and the bill can easily pile up.Buddie comes at a single cost while providing the same clinical care. It also saves you tremendous time by being able to receive the treatment right at home.           Please note: 1 device comes with 10 gel patch packs in the box, which contain two patches each — one for each unit.We're also providing a special $0 shipping fee promotion on the add-on patches for Indiegogo ONLY. Take this as encouragement to make scalp-care a long-term commitment! Looking for even more gel patches?We got you. After the campaign is over, additional orders of gel patches will be available on www.rootonix.com.          Please note: 1 device comes with 10 gel patch packs, which contain two patches each — one for each unit.    Q: How do I turn the device on?
After attaching the bridge and patch to the unit, press the center button for 3 seconds until you feel a light vibration. 
The session begins simultaneously as the device is turned on. Keep it placed behind your ear or on your shoulders during the session.
Once 7 minutes have passed, the unit will shut off automatically. Peel it off once it’s done.
 Q: Is it dangerous to stare at the LED light directly?A: Although there is no potential harm, it is not recommended to look directly at it for long periods of time. Q: Can people with sensitive skin also use Buddie?A: Please consult a professional first. It is not recommended for those using steroids or other drug substances, have allergic skin reactions, or have been diagnosed with skin conditions. Q: Are the bridge pieces easily damaged?A: They will not be damaged unless direct force is applied. However, please still be careful with how you handle the pieces when attaching them to the unit. Q: Can I place Buddie on my skin if it’s wet or sweaty?A: Please make sure to apply Buddie on dry, clean skin. This will maximize the effect of Buddie’s technology and thus help the nutrients absorb better into the skin. Q: Can I lie down while wearing Buddie?A: In order to avoid damaging the device, please do not apply force or pressure while wearing Buddie by lying down on it.    

 
    Our company has been recognized for its innovative efforts in Korea. We worked tirelessly to build a great product and to form connections with established agencies like KOTRA and KITRA that provide us the resources to go through the delivery process smoothly.We launched Buddie on Indiegogo knowing we will be shipping worldwide. Through our experience of fulfilling other products of ours, we know what to expect. We’ll do our best to keep our end of the promise for those who believe in us.Thank you for your support. We’re so excited for you all to meet Buddie soon!        Altos Business Group is a product launch consulting agency that specializes in helping global tech startups launch their products in the United States. Contact Us: support@altosbusiness.comTrend Adopter showcases the best new crowdfunding products from all around the world! Contact us: hello@trendadopter.com | Learn more at www.trendadopter.com

story:
Kendo Mae Lai

The beginnings of a new Kendo Dojo in the northern Thai mountains.

  • My name is Catherine Thompson and I have been practicing kendo for about 38 years. I started Kendo in Toronto, Canada when I was around 20, practiced for 4 years, was away from Kendo for a time and then came back in my late 20s. Now 63, these days I find myself helping with leading and teaching at a wonderful and unique dojo, Lanna Kendo, in Chiang Mai.
  • This fundraising campaign is concerned with raising enough money to start a Kendo practice  close to where I live in Mae Kampong in the mountains to the east of Chiang Mai.
  • At the beginning we will have our practices every week on Sunday mornings. My main intention is to try and and encourage some of the kids in the local villages here abouts to try out Kendo.  As is the norm with Kendo dojos around the world, all Kendoka, new or experienced, and of all ages will be welcomed as well.

The initial plan to get things started 

and what the funds raised will go towards:

  • All funds raised will go towards renting a great practice space at Tharnthong Lodges for 6 months and to purchase Shinai (the bamboo swords we use in Kendo) for the kids to use free of charge. Adults who wish to begin Kendo will be able to purchase their own shinai.
  • I'm choosing to commit to the 6 month period of time as I think that it will take a few months for word to get around and hopefully with time we can attract a number of people in the area who will wish to start Kendo.
  • There will be a very small charge for practices and will take the form of a donation box with a suggested minimum of 20 baht (80 cents) for children and 100 baht ($3) for adults. This will just be a suggestion and no one will be excluded if unable to contribute. Those with extra money to spare will be able to contribute more than the minimum, if they wish, knowing that all funds raised will go towards the dojo. Having the donation box will allow anonymity.  This is a part of the world where the minimum wage is around 10-12$ per day.
  • All money raised at practices will be put aside with the hope of garnering enough to continue with the practice space rental after the initial 6 months.
  • Any funds raised beyond our goal of $1200 will be used for other expenses that may come up such as Kendo uniforms, additional shinai, tournaments, gradings etc. I will also keep this campaign open beyond the end date in case people might like to contribute in the future. My hope is that this will be a long lived Kendo dojo and perhaps can even evolve to practicing more than once a week. Starting small and simple and see where we can take it from there!
  • Please note that any size donation that a person might wish to contribute will be deeply appreciated no matter how small or large that might be. I know that this is a tricky time financially for so many of us!
  • The funding goal of $1200 that I have set is enough to cover the initial expenses of 6 months of dojo space rental (฿21,600/~$660) and 10 children's shinai purchases ($340) in addition to the expenses that come by using the Indiegogo fundraising process, exchange rates and the 5% that is automatically put on hold for 6 months.

What I hope to be the impact of this new dojo

  • The All Japan Kendo Federation states that an essential aspect of the practice of Kendo is to develop the human spirit and character through the principals of the Japanese sword. In Kendo we learn that our biggest challenge is with our own selves and that it is a lifelong journey of learning, teaching and sharing. I believe that these principals combined with a disciplined and respectful structure certainly is of great benefit to young people and adults alike. 
  • I have been at Lanna Kendo in Chiang Mai for about 6 years now and will continue to practice, teach and help out there.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If possible, please share this fundraising campaign on social media, email etc. Throughout the coming month of fundraising, I'll be making reports and posting videos on the progress of this Indiegogo campaign.
  • I have a Wordpress site up for Kendo Mae Lai which can be found here... https://kendomaelai.wordpress.com

Many thanks for having a look here and considering our worthwhile project.
Cheers and all the very best from the currently rainy mountains in the north of Thailand!
Catherine Thompson

Kendo Mae Lai
The beginnings of a new Kendo Dojo in the northern Thai mountains.

My name is Catherine Thompson and I have been practicing kendo for about 38 years. I started Kendo in Toronto, Canada when I was around 20, practiced for 4 years, was away from Kendo for a time and then came back in my late 20s. Now 63, these days I find myself helping with leading and teaching at a wonderful and unique dojo, Lanna Kendo, in Chiang Mai.
This fundraising campaign is concerned with raising enough money to start a Kendo practice  close to where I live in Mae Kampong in the mountains to the east of Chiang Mai.
At the beginning we will have our practices every week on Sunday mornings. My main intention is to try and and encourage some of the kids in the local villages here abouts to try out Kendo.  As is the norm with Kendo dojos around the world, all Kendoka, new or experienced, and of all ages will be welcomed as well.


The initial plan to get things started 
and what the funds raised will go towards:

All funds raised will go towards renting a great practice space at Tharnthong Lodges for 6 months and to purchase Shinai (the bamboo swords we use in Kendo) for the kids to use free of charge. Adults who wish to begin Kendo will be able to purchase their own shinai.
I'm choosing to commit to the 6 month period of time as I think that it will take a few months for word to get around and hopefully with time we can attract a number of people in the area who will wish to start Kendo.
There will be a very small charge for practices and will take the form of a donation box with a suggested minimum of 20 baht (80 cents) for children and 100 baht ($3) for adults. This will just be a suggestion and no one will be excluded if unable to contribute. Those with extra money to spare will be able to contribute more than the minimum, if they wish, knowing that all funds raised will go towards the dojo. Having the donation box will allow anonymity.  This is a part of the world where the minimum wage is around 10-12$ per day.
All money raised at practices will be put aside with the hope of garnering enough to continue with the practice space rental after the initial 6 months.
Any funds raised beyond our goal of $1200 will be used for other expenses that may come up such as Kendo uniforms, additional shinai, tournaments, gradings etc. I will also keep this campaign open beyond the end date in case people might like to contribute in the future. My hope is that this will be a long lived Kendo dojo and perhaps can even evolve to practicing more than once a week. Starting small and simple and see where we can take it from there!
Please note that any size donation that a person might wish to contribute will be deeply appreciated no matter how small or large that might be. I know that this is a tricky time financially for so many of us!
The funding goal of $1200 that I have set is enough to cover the initial expenses of 6 months of dojo space rental (฿21,600/~$660) and 10 children's shinai purchases ($340) in addition to the expenses that come by using the Indiegogo fundraising process, exchange rates and the 5% that is automatically put on hold for 6 months.


What I hope to be the impact of this new dojo

The All Japan Kendo Federation states that an essential aspect of the practice of Kendo is to develop the human spirit and character through the principals of the Japanese sword. In Kendo we learn that our biggest challenge is with our own selves and that it is a lifelong journey of learning, teaching and sharing. I believe that these principals combined with a disciplined and respectful structure certainly is of great benefit to young people and adults alike. 
I have been at Lanna Kendo in Chiang Mai for about 6 years now and will continue to practice, teach and help out there.


Other Ways You Can Help

If possible, please share this fundraising campaign on social media, email etc. Throughout the coming month of fundraising, I'll be making reports and posting videos on the progress of this Indiegogo campaign.
I have a Wordpress site up for Kendo Mae Lai which can be found here... https://kendomaelai.wordpress.com


Many thanks for having a look here and considering our worthwhile project.Cheers and all the very best from the currently rainy mountains in the north of Thailand!Catherine Thompson

story:
As an adult, it gets harder and harder to exercise regularly. Everyone knows that there are significant benefits but sometimes the motivation isn't there. It's time to enter your Titan and train for a greater cause than just yourself.




Alter Titan is a Fitness RPG in your hands where you must train to prepare yourself for the threat that is on its way to jeopardize Project Second Earth. Imagine if all of your daily activity transfered into a growth of your video game avatar: your Titan.


He/she has all of the essential traits of an RPG player.  The stronger you get in real life, the better your titan! 

 

 

 

Energy points allow you to battle against simulated enemies aboard the GCSS. Although steps are easier to acquire, we still believe that if you hit a personal record in steps you should be rewarded!

 

Choose Your Faction 

 

We named ourselves after the vast marine realm, where the crushing depths breeds only the mightiest of predators.

We draw inspiration from the caverns deep beneath the earth, where hunters stalk prey in complete darkness.

 

We have named our organization after the vast desert where the merciless heat allows only the fittest to survive.

We've named our organization after the lush jungles once abundant on Old Earth. We've toiled endlessly to preserve the bio-diversity of the Amazon. 

Titan Power is one of the leading indicators of how powerful you've become! If your Titan power is increasing then you've been training diligently. Having a higher power means more success in battle.

Help us by supporting our Indiegogo and making 3D Titans a reality!

 


 

There will be three stages of physical progression. Skipping exercises for a period of time will cause your Titan to atrophy and lose muscle and power. Make sure to exercise consistently to maintain your physique and Titan Power!

The benefit is seeing growth reflected immediately in your Titan. Your Alter Titan will shrink or bulk up based on your exercise consistency.




 

 

 
Pledge at any tier to get immediate access to Alter Titan 2D and join 700+ other Titans as we train for the upcoming battle. The game is available for IOS and Android!

 

 

 

 

Though your journey will be riddled with opposing personalities, the Black Willow faction is most known for their notorious acts of mayhem aboard the Galaxus. There has been suscpicions that they are somehow collaborating with the Senza. Join forces with General Caslon, the faction leaders and your fellow Titans to uncover the truth behind this evil force. 

 

DNA Samples are bio-engineered into Habitants with your workouts! You can process up to four DNA samples at a given time. Once the DNA sample reaches 100%, you can revive it into a battle companion!

Habitants have been elementally enhanced with Senza (alien) technology making them more suitable for combat against enemies. 
 

This Arctic Dire Wolf has ice and freezing skills! How cool is that!

 


 

 

 

 

 

The ship is safe for now. However, there has been whisphers of a dark force assembling in the corners of the super vessel. Be wary not to rest too comfortably under your covers! 

​

The Galaxus Super Vessel transports the last survivors of humanity. We were headed for a suitable exo-planet before we realized that we might make the journey without the necesarry resources- now we are planning to head back to Old Earth in order to retrieve what we can for colonization on a second home.

BRONZE TITAN + Crate x2

  • PERKS GLOSSARY
    Amazon Uncommon DNA Sample    : A vial containing genetic material of a long extinct species from the Amazon biosphere of old Earth. This is bio-engineered to life with your the energy from your workouts. 
  • ​SYM Droid 001:  A Droid that follows you in and out of combat. It houses all of your DNA Samples and inactive Habitants.
  • HELIOS Starter Bag:  A durable bag that allows you to hold up to 40 items. Complements from the latest line of HELIOS Co.
  • TITAN AVATAR: This is your vessel, your body. It can either be broken down or built up for a greater purpose. This is your parallel self. 
  • 3D BETA ACCESS:  Get early BETA access to beta testing estimated to start on August 2021 (All previous backers have access)
  • Sleeveless Tank: A plain sleeveless tank, nothing shiny. 
  • Breathable Body Suit: comes in black or white, this keeps your skin and organs well circulated in space.

GOLD CRATE + TITAN x2

  • Premium Access: Get One Year of Premium Benefits upon full release! This will include VIP perks for the entire year. 

Alter Titan Fitness Shirt: This is a physical item. Breathable, stretchy and perfect for comfortable sleepwear or grind apparel. We will need your size and shipping info for this!

  • Black Willow Faction: Unlock access to join the Black Willow Faction, if you so choose. This will enable you to join opposing forces and acquire access to forbidden Habitants and a different sidestory.

story:
Cwash is the most innovative tooth-cleaning device that doesn’t need any water or toothpaste. Cwash can be used everywhere and save your time! It's smart, small, easy to carry, ecologic and antimicrobial! Cwash connects wirelessly to your phone and can remind you when it's time to clean your teeth or can give you statistical metrics on how and for how long you take care of your teeth! 

Thanks to the combination of technological and biomedical research, Cwash is able to ensure proper oral hygiene. 

Cwash is both simple and innovative. 

The bite, consisting of a gradual release polymer combined with the vibrations of the bite itself (with adjustable intensities), allows efficient and accurate cleaning of the entire dental arch. 

At the end of the treatment, which has a recommended standard duration of 30 seconds and can be adjusted according to the desired treatment, it is not necessary to rinse. 

Any saliva produced during use can be ingested. It is recommended to rinse the bite after each use.            

       

Cwash is a product made by Plus Biomedicals, an Italian startup operating in the biomedical sector since 2019.

Within two years we were able to hire 12 people, design 6 products, and inaugurate two new locations, one administrative and one productive.

Our payoff is Think Human, Think For Human, to underline the philosophy that distinguishes us and the commitment to create products that are able to improve people’s lives and well-being.

We mainly design aids for the disabled, bedridden, and people with reduced mobility to try to solve real problems of people who live everyday life as a big challenge.

In addition, given the pandemic in progress, we design and produce 2 different types of surgical masks entirely Made in Italy.

 

At the beginning, the product was born with a clear purpose: to create a device that would allow people with reduced mobility, disabled, elderly or bedridden to brush their teeth independently and easily. 

But soon we realized that Cwash is much more: it is a product that everyone should have! 

There are many situations in which Cwash can be truly decisive, for example:

-Try to think about brushing your teeth while traveling by car or plane, with the classic toothbrush is unthinkable, with Cwash is easy!

-Have you ever tried brushing your teeth with a child in your arms? With Cwash you can do it easily and safely!

-And what about cleaning teeth during office hours? Use Cwash wherever you are and whenever you want and bring it always with you!

Cwash is small and extremely handy: it can be using by simply pressing the index finger on the power button. While with one hand you use Cwash, with the other you can do whatever you want: cooking, reading, working, traveling, relaxing and much more!

 

This campaign aims to cover the initial costs of industrialization, to make the product known around the world, to continue to implement Cwash and create special adds-on and allow users to buy it in the world premiere at a discounted price. 

 

Cwash has already passed all stages of testing so it is already ready for the market and the application is already on the Apple Store and on the Play Store. We estimate to ship all products to backers from a month after the end of the campaign. 

We believe a lot in trust and respect, for this reason, we assure all our Backers the maximum commitment and seriousness on our part.

As for the production we have already taken agreements with third parties to make us ready in any case, whatever the outcome of the campaign. 

In addition, we have already made agreements with distributors, prepared the packaging, instruction booklets, various spare parts, set up the production and assembly site within our production site to ensure greater quality, efficiency, and speed. 

We have already started to assemble the first devices, so you just have to buy yours and wait for the shipping arrival! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. 

If you think that this product may be appreciated by some of your friends or relatives, please share our idea with them, we will be happy to let them know our mission!

Or donate $5 if you believe in our project and our pay off!

story:
NOICE Natural Charcoal toothpaste is now available for order! 

TRY NOW

We deliver in the United States, in Canada, in the United Kingdom & in France. 

 

What do you do every morning & every night? Ooh la la, behave yourself! You brush your pretty white teeth of course :)

Do you know that billions of plastic toothpaste tubes end up in landfills annually? C’est terrible!

Did you think natural toothpaste is totally tasteless? That’s what we thought too… so we made a delicious alternative, and it’s sure to put a smile on your face. 

NOICE is 100% natural, and COSMOS-ORGANIC certified by Ecocert. NOICE toothpaste offers complete care – we worked with dentists to keep your breath fresh, your gums healthy, whiten your teeth, and prevent cavities.

Packed in an eco-friendly, endlessly refillable bottle we made NOICE simple & affordable. Voila!

 

You don't need to be a superhero to help save the planet. It's as simple as brushing your teeth :)

The result? An endlessly reusable bottle that can be topped-up using compostable refill pods and arrive in a fully recyclable cardboard pack at your doorstep.

NOICE is the new GEL toothpaste in the world with a zero-waste concept! C’est Magnifique!

 

We worked day and night with dentists from around the world to ensure our formula is great for your health, teeth, and gums. Of course, it had to taste tres tres bien!

 

NOICE employs a subscription model so there’s no need to go to the store! We know when you’re about to run out and send you refills when you need them. You can also reorder refill pods online or from our ambassador stores. 

 

We want NOICE to be inexpensive. We are proud to say that NOICE is on average more affordable than other oral-care products on the market!

Extra refill pods can be purchased for as little as US$18 for 3 pods. That’s only US$6  per month! (free delivery included)

 

NOICE is on its way!

 Order now your Organic & Zero-waste toothpaste & receive it in April 2020. 

We promise to tell you the tooth, the whole tooth, and nothing but the tooth! Our ingredients have been carefully selected with dentists with always a specific purpose. NOICE is vegan, fluoride-free, sodium lauryl sulfate-free and contains no artificial flavors, sweeteners, colors or preservatives. All our organic ingredients are sourced from responsible producers and are certified EcoCert Cosmos Organic.

 

Of course, we want to share our delicious zero waste toothpaste with the whole world! But we are super aware of the responsibility that it puts on us to go the extra mile.

Today, our production is in Thailand. In the future, we aim to localize NOICE in major markets.  And in the short term, NOICE will off set 100% of its carbon footprint from the shipping of your orders. So happy brushing!

 

A smile communicates trust, trust creates connections, and connections enable collaboration. We want to use NOICE – a contraction of NICE and VOICE– to raise our voice, in a nice manner, and propose solutions. This is what we call positive propaganda!

 

Clement

The inventor of NOICE and an active member of Jumanji Studio, a collective of entrepreneurs committed to sustainability. Clement created his first startup when he was only 26 years old and has now decided to focus his energy on sustainability and social businesses.

Morgane

Joined NOICE adventure to put her dedication & hard work at the service of a meaningful cause. Strong of 5 years in branding & advertising, Morgane wants to lead NOICE brand to be an example in sustainable and zero-waste personal care products.   

 

Risks & Challenges

We will do our utmost to deliver as promised, however, we can’t guarantee an exact date when you will receive NOICE. We have specified a delivery timeframe of 4 months and we will do everything we can to surpass this expectation. What we guarantee is 100% transparency about every challenge that comes in our way with frequent updates. We are fully dedicated to you receiving your order of NOICE.

story:
INTRODUCING MARLOW

Marlow is launching the first lubricated tampon kit to allow for a smoother and more comfortable tampon insertion process, because why isn’t that already a thing?

 

OUR SOLUTION

We are producing menstrual products driven by real people's concerns, starting with the first-ever lubricated tampon experience.

 

Our kit includes: 

Organic lubricant reviewed by medical professionals, packaged in a sleek bottle engineered to perfectly coat the tampon in lubricant with each dip.

 

 

18 organic cotton tampons (offered in light, regular, and super absorbency).   

                      

 

Together, this easy-to-use kit creates a smoother tampon insertion experience. The kit will be delivered straight to your door every month through an online subscription model (Note: all perks are a one-time order; the subscription service will be available in January via our website).

 

 

Once we reached out to more medical professionals, we started to get some truly positive feedback:

 

After collaborating with gynaecologists and other medical professionals, and delivering our kits to over 100 customers for product feedback, we are confident that our tampons will allow for a smoother and more comfortable insertion experience for everyone.

 

Interviews 

Here's what we learnt: 

Almost everyone we spoke to had experienced some type of insertion pain or discomfort, but no one had any real way to deal with it.

 

 

Initial experiences with our kit showed fantastic results and made us realize - if all tampons were lubricated, would we ever go back to dry applicators?

 

 

Engineering the Product

We worked with our in-house biomedical engineer, Monika, to develop the drawings and specs for our product.

 

Getting the First Prototypes

Some images of our first prototypes.

 

Next Steps

So, what's next? Here's a look at our timeline so far:

 

Our Community

We're working hard to disrupt the menstrual product space and transform the way we experience and talk about our periods. 

After hundreds of conversations with menstruators, we recognized that not only was each person’s experience and relationship with their period unique, but that there was also a sense of solidarity and connection when we shared our own stories and traded tips. We found talking about our periods deepened our interpersonal connections and created a safe space for having other intimate and vulnerable conversations.

 

Some of the Conditions and Conversations Within Our Community

 

Over the last three months, Marlow has delivered prototypes to over 100 customers while simultaneously building a community of over 4700 followers through various social media platforms such as Instagram and TikTok. We also release weekly educational blog content on topics such as period poverty, menstruation in the media, and understanding our anatomy.

 

 

Our goal is to reduce the stigma surrounding menstruation while educating our consumers about menstrual and sexual health. Through our platforms, we directly engage with our consumers to gather insights into their unique needs to determine where currently available products are falling short.  

We put the customer’s experience at the forefront of every decision we make, from the design of our tampons, aimed to provide a smoother insertion experience, to our convenient monthly subscription model. We are committed to addressing all of the problems we discover, one step at a time.

 

The Team

Marlow was born out of the belief that all those who menstruate deserve better than what is currently available to them. 

Our journey began back at the Ivey Business School with a candid conversation among friends. We casually shared period stories and discussed problems with our menstrual products. This was our “Aha!” moment: we realized we each felt that many of our needs were uncared for.

A messy table filled with products for our ideation session.

 

We wondered why on earth we had spent years perfecting our skin care routines, yet barely thought about our menstrual products?

 

This one initial question sent us into a spiral of discovery. We were far from the only ones to experience anxiety, discomfort, or even pain when inserting tampons.

 

We became aware of the overly-feminine branding in the menstrual industry. Not only did these brands not resonate with us, they weren’t inclusive of all menstruators.

 

We noticed ourselves hiding tampons in our sleeves on the way to the washroom—rushing in and out of the tampon aisle, embarrassed at the thought of being seen.

 

We found ourselves lining our underwear with toilet paper again after running out of product at exactly the wrong time.

 

We realized we rarely had open conversations about our needs, wants, concerns, and questions relating to menstruation. We were so uncomfortable broaching the subject that we instead disregarded our concerns and tolerated the bare minimum we were accustomed to receiving.

 

And so Marlow was born.

 

Any pledge helps us reach our goal of making Marlow a reality. Click the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or help us spread the word by sharing our page.

 

Thanks from all of us!

The Founding Team: Simone Godbout, Nadia Ladak, Kiara Botha, Natalie Diezyn, Harit Sohal and Ethan Milne

A special thank you to Hannah Dubois, an incredibly talented filmmaker based in Vancouver who worked with us to develop our video.

Fun fact: We started Marlow as a final project during our last year at the Ivey School of Business.

 

Additional Information: Risks and Challenges

We're here to help menstruators, so we're working diligently to prepare for any unforeseen risks and challenges. 

Here are the risks we've identified so far, so that we're all on the same page:

MANUFACTURING & PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: We've already been working hard with our product lead and biomedical engineer to develop our initial prototypes. As we've finalized these prototypes, we've selected a specific list of manufacturers that meet our criteria for manufacturing the lubricant and tampons in our kit. However, certain product specifications are limited by manufacturers' constraints, and therefore our product is subject to change. We plan to finalize our manufacturing contract by the start of October, so any changes that might occur leading up to this time will be shared with all backers.

FULFILMENT: Sometimes things occur that can't be planned for, such as a pandemic. We currently expect to be able to ship to Canada and the US, although this will be subject to manufacturer capabilities, health regulations, and fulfilment centres capabilities. We're currently in contact with fulfilment centres with ample experience handling all these bumps and hurdles, so that we can get our products to you on time. If there are any bumps along the way, we'll always be sure to communicate them with you, while working hard to overcome them.

TIMELINE: While we've discussed our timeline in depth, certain factors are out of our control. Manufacturer lead times vary, and we want to ensure we can get our product to you in the safest way possible, which may take time. However, we've got a passionate team that understands our community's needs, and that keeps us driven to take each step closer to making this dream a reality.
story_txt:
INTRODUCING MARLOW
Marlow is launching the first lubricated tampon kit to allow for a smoother and more comfortable tampon insertion process, because why isn’t that already a thing?
 
OUR SOLUTION

We are producing menstrual products driven by real people's concerns, starting with the first-ever lubricated tampon experience.
 
Our kit includes: 
Organic lubricant reviewed by medical professionals, packaged in a sleek bottle engineered to perfectly coat the tampon in lubricant with each dip.
 

 
18 organic cotton tampons (offered in light, regular, and super absorbency).   
                      
 
Together, this easy-to-use kit creates a smoother tampon insertion experience. The kit will be delivered straight to your door every month through an online subscription model (Note: all perks are a one-time order; the subscription service will be available in January via our website).
 

 
Once we reached out to more medical professionals, we started to get some truly positive feedback:

 
After collaborating with gynaecologists and other medical professionals, and delivering our kits to over 100 customers for product feedback, we are confident that our tampons will allow for a smoother and more comfortable insertion experience for everyone.
 
Interviews 
Here's what we learnt: 
Almost everyone we spoke to had experienced some type of insertion pain or discomfort, but no one had any real way to deal with it.

 

 
Initial experiences with our kit showed fantastic results and made us realize - if all tampons were lubricated, would we ever go back to dry applicators?
 

 
Engineering the Product

We worked with our in-house biomedical engineer, Monika, to develop the drawings and specs for our product.

 
Getting the First Prototypes

Some images of our first prototypes.

 
Next Steps
So, what's next? Here's a look at our timeline so far:

 
Our Community
We're working hard to disrupt the menstrual product space and transform the way we experience and talk about our periods. 

After hundreds of conversations with menstruators, we recognized that not only was each person’s experience and relationship with their period unique, but that there was also a sense of solidarity and connection when we shared our own stories and traded tips. We found talking about our periods deepened our interpersonal connections and created a safe space for having other intimate and vulnerable conversations.
 
Some of the Conditions and Conversations Within Our Community

 
Over the last three months, Marlow has delivered prototypes to over 100 customers while simultaneously building a community of over 4700 followers through various social media platforms such as Instagram and TikTok. We also release weekly educational blog content on topics such as period poverty, menstruation in the media, and understanding our anatomy.
 

 
Our goal is to reduce the stigma surrounding menstruation while educating our consumers about menstrual and sexual health. Through our platforms, we directly engage with our consumers to gather insights into their unique needs to determine where currently available products are falling short.  
We put the customer’s experience at the forefront of every decision we make, from the design of our tampons, aimed to provide a smoother insertion experience, to our convenient monthly subscription model. We are committed to addressing all of the problems we discover, one step at a time.
 
The Team
Marlow was born out of the belief that all those who menstruate deserve better than what is currently available to them. 
Our journey began back at the Ivey Business School with a candid conversation among friends. We casually shared period stories and discussed problems with our menstrual products. This was our “Aha!” moment: we realized we each felt that many of our needs were uncared for.

A messy table filled with products for our ideation session.
 
We wondered why on earth we had spent years perfecting our skin care routines, yet barely thought about our menstrual products?
 
This one initial question sent us into a spiral of discovery. We were far from the only ones to experience anxiety, discomfort, or even pain when inserting tampons.
 
We became aware of the overly-feminine branding in the menstrual industry. Not only did these brands not resonate with us, they weren’t inclusive of all menstruators.
 
We noticed ourselves hiding tampons in our sleeves on the way to the washroom—rushing in and out of the tampon aisle, embarrassed at the thought of being seen.
 
We found ourselves lining our underwear with toilet paper again after running out of product at exactly the wrong time.
 
We realized we rarely had open conversations about our needs, wants, concerns, and questions relating to menstruation. We were so uncomfortable broaching the subject that we instead disregarded our concerns and tolerated the bare minimum we were accustomed to receiving.
 
And so Marlow was born.

 
Any pledge helps us reach our goal of making Marlow a reality. Click the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or help us spread the word by sharing our page.
 
Thanks from all of us!

The Founding Team: Simone Godbout, Nadia Ladak, Kiara Botha, Natalie Diezyn, Harit Sohal and Ethan Milne
A special thank you to Hannah Dubois, an incredibly talented filmmaker based in Vancouver who worked with us to develop our video.
Fun fact: We started Marlow as a final project during our last year at the Ivey School of Business.
 
Additional Information: Risks and Challenges
We're here to help menstruators, so we're working diligently to prepare for any unforeseen risks and challenges. 
Here are the risks we've identified so far, so that we're all on the same page:
MANUFACTURING & PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: We've already been working hard with our product lead and biomedical engineer to develop our initial prototypes. As we've finalized these prototypes, we've selected a specific list of manufacturers that meet our criteria for manufacturing the lubricant and tampons in our kit. However, certain product specifications are limited by manufacturers' constraints, and therefore our product is subject to change. We plan to finalize our manufacturing contract by the start of October, so any changes that might occur leading up to this time will be shared with all backers.
FULFILMENT: Sometimes things occur that can't be planned for, such as a pandemic. We currently expect to be able to ship to Canada and the US, although this will be subject to manufacturer capabilities, health regulations, and fulfilment centres capabilities. We're currently in contact with fulfilment centres with ample experience handling all these bumps and hurdles, so that we can get our products to you on time. If there are any bumps along the way, we'll always be sure to communicate them with you, while working hard to overcome them.
TIMELINE: While we've discussed our timeline in depth, certain factors are out of our control. Manufacturer lead times vary, and we want to ensure we can get our product to you in the safest way possible, which may take time. However, we've got a passionate team that understands our community's needs, and that keeps us driven to take each step closer to making this dream a reality.

story:
Summary

We are here to fund and build the very first publicly available Disc Golf course in the Western Adirondack Area of NY! As most may have noticed Disc Golf is on the rise and was noted as the fastest growing sport in the US during 2020! The upstate region of NY has little to no courses available to the public and we want to bring the first state of the art 18 hole course to this area of Upstate, NY.

My name is Andy Padula PDGA #157804, I'm one of the Co-Designers of the soon to be               Ridge Runner DGC. Drew Shoup is the the other Co-Designer. We have been given the honor of creating a vision of being not only a first for the region but also creating a top-level disc golf course at Snow Ridge in Turin, NY. 

This project is important to us as avid disc golfers as we want to help grow the sport to all communities to promote healthy living and show the world that sports don't need to be super expensive with a hard barrier to entry. Disc Golf is the peoples sport and here are some reasons to back that up:

Free to play at almost 98% of all courses worldwide.

Equipment is very cheap ranging from $10-$30 for discs

Tournaments provide revenue streams for local parks, business, etc.

The plan is to help under privilaged youth and people of all backgrounds pick up a healthy living hobby and enjoy community, nature, and sports all in one!

Your donations will help us achieve our dream of creating one of the top courses in NY while creating a destination for all disc golfers.

As we build/fundraise for this course we also want to use this platform as an opportunity to promote the first tournament that will happen at Ridge Runner DGC: The Lovely Open which will be held on July 10th in conjunction with A Lovely Time Music & Arts Festival which runs July 9th & 10th. This will be a non-sanctioned one round tournament for the first year. All those who sign up: https:discgolfscene.com/tournaments/The_Lovely_Open_2021/register 

will also get a 50% off Ticket to the festival if you want to make a weekend out of your trip to Snow Ridge! In total the cost to play will be $40 and if you opt to attend the festival your cost will be $80 including a dope players pack in addition for signing up!

More info about A Lovely Time: https://www.alovelytimefest.com/

What We Need & What You Get

  • The total cost of this project is going to be ~$10,000
  • 18 Blue Prodigy T2 Baskets = $5,130 for 18 baskets
  • Turf for tee pads = $1,962 for 18 cuts of 6'x12' turf
  • 20 bags of mulch for sprucing grounds = $40
  • Wood for tee pad frames = $450
  • Equipment rentals = ~$500
  • Signage costs = $900 for 18 tee pad signs
  • The rest is shipping and tax
  • If we don't reach our goals the funds we raise will cover at the minimum baskets and any of the bare essential needs for us to open the course.

 

Donation Reward Tiers

Tier 1: $10 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin

Tier 2: $25 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt

Tier 3: $50 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,           1 Weekend Pass to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021

Tier 4: $100 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,            1 Weekend Pass to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021,  1 Ridge Runner DGC Stamped Disc, $25 Gift Card redeemable @ Snow Ridge & Tavern 230

Tier 5: $150 or more 

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,            2 Weekend Passes to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021,  1 Ridge Runner DGC Stamped Disc, $50 Gift Card redeemable @ Snow Ridge & Tavern 230

Tier 6: $250 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,            4 Weekend Passes to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021,  1 Ridge Runner DGC Stamped Disc, $100 Gift Card redeemable @ Snow Ridge & Tavern 230

Tier 7: $350 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,            4 Weekend Passes to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021,  1 Ridge Runner DGC Stamped Disc, $100 Gift Card redeemable @ Snow Ridge & Tavern 230, Hole Sponsor (name/business on hole sign at tee pad)

Tier 8: $500 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,            4 Weekend Passes to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021,  1 Ridge Runner DGC Stamped Disc, $100 Gift Card redeemable @ Snow Ridge & Tavern 230, Hole Sponsor (name/business on hole sign at tee pad)​, Patio Signage @ Tavern 230

Tier 9: $1,500 or more

Reward: 1 Ridge Runner Enamel Pin, 1 Ridge Runner Tee Shirt, Catered BBQ @ Tavern 230,            4 Weekend Passes to A Lovely Time | July 9th & 10th, 2021,  1 Ridge Runner DGC Stamped Disc, $100 Gift Card redeemable @ Snow Ridge & Tavern 230, Hole Sponsor (name/business on hole sign at tee pad)​,Patio Signage @ Tavern 230, Catered 20 Person Private Party @ Tavern 230, Ridge Runner DGC Reserved For The Day

 

Risks & Challenges

 

  • Only challenges are getting the grounds ready for Golfers
  • ​Building a few bridges over waterways for safe walking throughout the course
  • Making proper signage to help guide golfers during their round

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Volunteers are welcome especially if you want to contribute to this cause, but can't offer money, your time is invaluable to us and we would certainly welcome any help!
