story:
From April 1st 2021, PIVOT® will only be available to order on our website at: https://pvt.fit/

We'll continue to communicate with all of our Indiegogo on Demand backers by email.

 

For most people, it's the lack of usable space to exercise and store equipment. For others, it's the inconvenience of storing a large power rack at home for strength training without it getting in the way and becoming an eyesore. 

Until now, there hasn't been a solution to these fundamental problems, but PIVOT® is going to change all of this.

The PIVOT® Bed is an incredibly strong bed that flips up to reveal a gym when upright. It opens up your existing space – the size of a double or king-size bed – when you want to exercise, and returns to a comfortable bedroom when you want to sleep. 

 

 

  • No monthly fees: Wave goodbye to your gym membership
  • No travel: Eliminate travel time with a full gym in your home
  • No waiting: No more waiting in line or sharing equipment with others
  • No eyesore: The gym is well-hidden. When not in use you don't even know it's there 
  • No change: There's no impact to your existing bedroom
  • Storage: Finally, a single place to store all your exercise gear and equipment
  • Stay connected: Work out while you chat, work, play, watch, listen or learn by attaching virtually any device to the PIVOT® Bed
  • Strength training: You'll have a commercial-quality power rack in your home
  • Varied workouts: Most turbo trainers can be stored under the bed, as well as fold-down treadmills and rowing machines, facilitating a varied workout routine. We aim to partner with manufacturers to create versions of their equipment that will be verified as working with PIVOT®
  • Yoga, Pilates, barre: you've now got ample space to perform all kinds of exercise.

 

 

The PIVOT® Bed is not a sofa-bed or flimsy wall-bed/Murphy-bed. It could well be the strongest bed ever made and perfectly accommodates a standard mattress, and it looks like a beautiful standard bed when in the horizontal sleeping position. Whether it's your main bed or in your guest room, you'll be proud to show it off.

 

 

PIVOT Bed 2021: the model featured in our promotional video was our initial prototype. Since our campaign was successfully funded on Kickstarter we've been able to employ a top UK design and engineering agency that has helped us refine PIVOT Bed's design into a much more sleek and sophisticated model. This now means that all of our past and future backers will receive our 2021 design or a model that is an enhanced and improved version of these new images.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

Mattress sizes

Measurements relate to standard mattress sizes (not included)

 

Note that terminology varies between regions, so a 'king-size bed' in most regions is called a 'queen' in North America. 

 

We will contact all backers shortly after the campaign ends to take details of which bed size you need.

 

PIVOT® Bed works with all standard mattresses which are 270mm thick or less. It will not work with super-thick 300mm+ mattresses.

 

Bed frame dimensions

Our design review is almost complete and we'll have exact measurements posted here again very soon.

In the meantime, if you add 150mm / 6" to the length of your mattress and 205mm / 8" to the width you will have a pretty close measurement.

All backers are to choose from the above sizes shortly after the campaign ends. You will be contacted regarding your chosen bed size once we are ready for production. It is your responsibility to ensure your mattress will fit the PIVOT Bed you choose given the dimensions we've provided in the table above. This may involve you having to order a mattress from another country, so please be careful with this. We will NOT be making bespoke beds to your country's standard mattress sizes.

 

A Note on Other Bed Sizes and The Future

 

At some point in the future, we intend to design, engineer and produce a super-king version. As the super-king version introduces different engineering challenges we've had to exclude it for now, and we are not committed to producing this size. If demand is there, we will look into producing it. 

 

 

Shouldn't quality be the first thing to consider when choosing a product, rather than price? What about the knowledge that vulnerable workers haven't been unethically treated? For us, they're the two main reasons for deciding to manufacture our product in the UK. We're only a short drive from our manufacturing partner, who we speak to virtually every day: sharing ideas, designs and feedback. Lots of feedback.

 

PIVOT® uses:

  • Premium S355 grade steel
  • A2 Stainless steel for all our nuts, bolts and locking pins
  • Only PEFC/FSC certified wood
  • Powder coat rather than solvent-based paint
  • Solvent-free wood stain products
  • We will only use recycled & recyclable materials for packaging. 

 

We're in control of our entire supply chain and are doing things the right way, from the start.

 

 

We use powerful 'gas struts' to take the strain from lifting and lowering the bed. They're easily adjustable if you need to fine-tune it to your mattress weight, for example.

 

 

 

Your safety is our priority and your PIVOT® Bed will be certified as safe by ensuring it passes everything related to BS EN ISO 20957-1 Stationary Training Equipment – General Safety Requirements and Test Methods. This is the international standard to which all Stationary Training Equipment – both Domestic (Class H - Home) and Commercial (Class S – Studio) should comply.

 

 

  • The PIVOT Power rack slides left or right to be off-set from centre, creating space for strength training if the bed is positioned close to a side wall (see our website's blog page for more details)
  • Twin fold-out arms with unique telescoping 'feet'
  • 75x75mm (3"x3") 3mm (11 gauge) wall-thickness steel uprights
  • Westside hole spacing around the bench press area
  • 16mm holes (5/8") and stainless steel pins
  • Cross-brace doubles as an additional pull-up bar which can be set at any height
  • Everything laser-cut
  • Premium, textured powder coating matching the bed
  • Fits all standard barbells with 1200mm+ between the flanges
  • Depth ~500mm
  • Supplied with 2x J-hooks with UHMW plastic bar protection

 

 

 

There are countless fitness/gym mat options around, but none actually solve the entire problem. They're generally just a set of smelly rubber tiles that move across your floor as you work out if you don't bond them to the floor. Are you ready to bond rubber mats to your bedroom floor? We didn't think so. Our solution is - firstly - to introduce a second, stiff layer, under the rubber mats. This is mainly aimed at protecting your flooring further by spreading the weight/impacts, but it also has the huge benefit of meaning your rubber tiles don't move around your piled carpet when you step on them. Our mat solution includes everything you need to have an amazing flooring solution to work out on, regardless of whether it is laid on a hard surface or carpet. We feel it's indispensable for exercising at home, but we'll leave that for you to decide.

 

 

The pull-up and dip bars will have a maximum rated user weight of 130kgs or more.

The power rack uprights will be rated at 500kgs or more.

Note that to pass the appropriate safety tests, the apparatus must be able to safely hold 2.5x the rated maximum user weight - so that's upwards of 325kgs for the pull-up and dip bars!

 

 

 

When upright, the bed frame extends to 2150mm above the flooring the product is set upon. You will need to take into account any mat which it sits upon (our own two-layer solution measures ~20mm).

We have a simple system for adjusting the height of the pull-up bar, to accommodate different ceiling heights - and your own height! The maximum height achievable is 2.3m and the lowest at about 2m.

NOTE: these measurements are for the UK king size bed. Please see the Available Bed Measurements section and adjust the measurements above based on the difference between your chosen bed size and the UK king size. For example, the UK double is 100mm shorter, so the minimum ceiling height is 2050mm, with the pull-up bars being adjustable from 1900mm to 2200mm.

 

 

Exercise videos, Zoom calls, virtual classes, or just catching up on some Netflix? All things we like to do when exercising, but it can be hard to find somewhere to set your device up so you can see it when exercising. Not with PIVOT® Bed, though, as you have masses of space to mount your screen or device. You can choose to use Velcro®, or use a system of your own. We recommend RAM Mounts and are in discussion with them to provide a system tailored for the PIVOT® Bed using their existing components.

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

PIVOT Bed 'Lite'

 

 

Includes:

  • The fully-working PIVOT Bed
  • Wooden 'slats' for your mattress to rest on
  • Extendable pull-up bar
  • Extendable dip-bars

 

PIVOT Bed 'Fitness'

 

 

Includes:

  • Everything from the 'Lite' version above
  • Our patent-pending, two-layer exercise mat solution

 

PIVOT Bed 'Strength'

 

 

Includes:

  • Everything from the 'Lite' version above
  • The PIVOT Power Rack add-on

 

PIVOT Bed 'Ultimate'

 

 

Includes:

  • Everything from the 'Lite' version above
  • Our patent-pending, two-layer exercise mat solution
  • The PIVOT Power Rack add-on

 

You’ve given yourself the best possible start with the PIVOT Bed, now here are the additions to make your new gym fit your needs perfectly.

If you'd like any of the below, please add up the total and add that amount to your existing pledge. Then message us to let us know which you want. If there are options, we'll take the details after we're funded - just like we will do for bed size, your address, etc.

We'll add more as soon as we have figured out our cost prices (e.g, headboard), so please check back regularly.

 

Safety Spotter Arms: £175 (pair)

 

 

If you’re going to lift heavy weights at home, make sure you don’t get stuck under them. Every power rack should have a pair of spotter arms and these follow a tried and tested design to perfectly fit the PIVOT Power Rack uprights. Made from the same 75x50mm 3mm wall steel as the rack itself, these won’t let you down. UHMW plastic protects your barbell knurling and the tough, textured powder coating is the same beautiful, premium look of the rest of the PIVOT kit. They will come with a pair of our 16mm (5/8") diameter stainless steel, magnetic axial locking pins to ensure they don’t twist when you need them most.

NOTE: Price is for the pair, not each.

 

Weight Plate Storage: £60 (pair)

 

 

In any gym with limited space you’ll want to keep the floor space tidy. Store your weight plates on the power rack arms so they stay out of the way, folding in with the arms. When the bed is horizontal, they occupy space that you otherwise couldn’t use as it is behind the pivot point. These 50mm diameter brackets will hold all standard olympic weights with a diameter of 485mm (19”) or less. They should hold two large 20kg plates or more thinner plates. We don’t supply collars but any standard collars will work and you can ‘store’ your main collars here. These fit neatly into the lower power rack arm struts and are secured by a single bolt. The weight is kept low near the pivot, so even storing 80kg+ (combined) on them will have negligible impact on the force required to lift the bed to the vertical position.

NOTE: Price is for the pair, not each. If you only want one, halve the amount and let us know.

 

Impact-Resistant Polycarbonate Mirror: £80

 

 

Checking your form when strength training can be a real help. Our mirror add-on is made from 3mm thick polycarbonate, bonded to a thin layer of MDF to ensure an even, flat surface and great optical clarity. Polycarbonate is practically shatter resistant and much more so than the cheaper acrylic/Perspex® you’ll often find in gyms. The size of the mirror allows you to see your entire body and the mounting height is adjustable.

NOTE: all mounting fixings included.

 

Barbell Storage Solution: £50

 

PLEASE NOTE: The image above shows an earlier prototype and does not represent the PIVOT Bed that you will receive as a reward.

 

 

Where are you going to store your barbell? Under the bed, of course. But do you just want it lying on the floor/mat, or would it be better mounted to the bed frame, out of the way? That's what we thought, so we've come up with a simple solution using two strong rubber clamps and an additional steel bracket to act as a ledge to rest the bottom end of the barbell on. Mounting points will already exist on every PIVOT Power Rack, you'll just need to screw in a few supplied bolts. These can be mounted to either side of the bed, and can be flipped so they secure from left-to-right or right-to-left. Because the bottom of the barbell will pivot under the bed, into space which is otherwise wasted (under your pillow), you gain lots of space. With a UK/US king size (and both EU beds) you can fit a 2000mm (6'6") barbell without it sticking out from the end of the bed when it's horizontal. Without it, just laying the bar on the floor/mat, you'll only have 1780mm (5'10").

FITS: olympic (50mm/2" diameter) ends or spinlock (25mm/1") ends, Please specify when ordering.

INCLUDED: 2x strong rubber clamps, steel 'ledge' bracket, all mounting hardware.

NOTE: a standard olympic barbell measures 2200mm (7'2") and the only way this can fit under any bed is diagonally. Your options are to place it diagonally on the floor/mat, upright in a stand, or mount it on your wall.

 

Foldable & Adjustable Weights Bench: £699

 

 

The PIVOT Bench features a discreet bracket allowing the folded bench to be hung vertically on the wall when not in use. Its 'flipper' folding feet ensure that when folded it takes up minimal space. Not only can it be hung on a wall, but it can also be placed flat on the floor and neatly fits under the PIVOT Bed, if you prefer to keep it out of view.

Designed and manufactured in the UK by a team of talented engineers, we're confident this is the best foldable, FID bench on the market. 

Features:

  • Foldable down to 222mm high so fits horizontally under the PIVOT Bed perfectly
  • Comes with discreet wall mount allowing you to hang it flat on your wall
  • Backrest adjusts into 7 positions – 12° decline, flat, and 15°, 30°, 45°, 60°, 75° incline
  • Adjustable seat angle
  • Tapered seat and backrest with 50mm firm foam padding
  • 'Flipper' feet fold in and rotate to decrease footprint when not in use
  • Commercial quality and tested to commercial standards (100,000 repetitions)
  • Tested to well over 500kgs
  • 200kg maximum *rated* load (user + weights)
  • 32kgs weight

An important note on maximum weight ratings:

This bench has been tested to well over 500kg, and with the way the British Safety Standard (BS EN ISO 20957-2013) works this means the manufacturer has rated it to 200kg total weight, including the user. This latter figure may not seem very much, but that's because the safety standard is very conservative. It states that the equipment must be able to hold 2.5x the maximum rated weight (200 x 2.5 = 500). You'll find countless examples of flimsy benches advertised as being rated to silly weights such as 363kg, which if true would mean that they would have to test it to 907.5kg. Please don't compare our honest figures with theirs. If you're likely to be placing large loads on a bench, please be careful with these ratings as most companies are not playing by the rules.

Dimensions (in millimetres):

  • when open (at widest points) - 1240(L) x 672(W) x 450(H)
  • when folded (including bracket if used) - 1499(L) x 300(W) x 222(H)

 

Environmental commitments

 

Long-lasting design

We're making the PIVOT® Bed and accessories from quality steel, and stainless steel components (nuts, bolts, pins, etc). Care is taken to properly treat the metal frame before powder coating it and the powder coating itself is immensely durable.

 

Reusability and recyclability

Steel is infinitely recyclable. The wood we use is only from certified, sustainable producers. We will only use recycled cardboard for our packaging - we will not ship using plastic.

 

Sustainable materials

Certified sustainable wood suppliers, solvent-free paint for the wood, solvent-free powder coating processes.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

Our chosen factory is a well respected, family-run business in the UK who is conscientious and cares about the local and global environment.

 

Sustainable Distribution

Where possible, we will aim to ship orders in bulk to regional distribution hubs to significantly reduce our carbon footprint.
story_txt:
From April 1st 2021, PIVOT® will only be available to order on our website at: https://pvt.fit/We'll continue to communicate with all of our Indiegogo on Demand backers by email. For most people, it's the lack of usable space to exercise and store equipment. For others, it's the inconvenience of storing a large power rack at home for strength training without it getting in the way and becoming an eyesore. Until now, there hasn't been a solution to these fundamental problems, but PIVOT® is going to change all of this.The PIVOT® Bed is an incredibly strong bed that flips up to reveal a gym when upright. It opens up your existing space – the size of a double or king-size bed – when you want to exercise, and returns to a comfortable bedroom when you want to sleep.   
No monthly fees: Wave goodbye to your gym membership
No travel: Eliminate travel time with a full gym in your home
No waiting: No more waiting in line or sharing equipment with others
No eyesore: The gym is well-hidden. When not in use you don't even know it's there 
No change: There's no impact to your existing bedroom
Storage: Finally, a single place to store all your exercise gear and equipment
Stay connected: Work out while you chat, work, play, watch, listen or learn by attaching virtually any device to the PIVOT® Bed
Strength training: You'll have a commercial-quality power rack in your home
Varied workouts: Most turbo trainers can be stored under the bed, as well as fold-down treadmills and rowing machines, facilitating a varied workout routine. We aim to partner with manufacturers to create versions of their equipment that will be verified as working with PIVOT®
Yoga, Pilates, barre: you've now got ample space to perform all kinds of exercise.
  The PIVOT® Bed is not a sofa-bed or flimsy wall-bed/Murphy-bed. It could well be the strongest bed ever made and perfectly accommodates a standard mattress, and it looks like a beautiful standard bed when in the horizontal sleeping position. Whether it's your main bed or in your guest room, you'll be proud to show it off.  PIVOT Bed 2021: the model featured in our promotional video was our initial prototype. Since our campaign was successfully funded on Kickstarter we've been able to employ a top UK design and engineering agency that has helped us refine PIVOT Bed's design into a much more sleek and sophisticated model. This now means that all of our past and future backers will receive our 2021 design or a model that is an enhanced and improved version of these new images.        

 
   Mattress sizesMeasurements relate to standard mattress sizes (not included) Note that terminology varies between regions, so a 'king-size bed' in most regions is called a 'queen' in North America.  We will contact all backers shortly after the campaign ends to take details of which bed size you need. PIVOT® Bed works with all standard mattresses which are 270mm thick or less. It will not work with super-thick 300mm+ mattresses. Bed frame dimensionsOur design review is almost complete and we'll have exact measurements posted here again very soon.In the meantime, if you add 150mm / 6" to the length of your mattress and 205mm / 8" to the width you will have a pretty close measurement.All backers are to choose from the above sizes shortly after the campaign ends. You will be contacted regarding your chosen bed size once we are ready for production. It is your responsibility to ensure your mattress will fit the PIVOT Bed you choose given the dimensions we've provided in the table above. This may involve you having to order a mattress from another country, so please be careful with this. We will NOT be making bespoke beds to your country's standard mattress sizes. A Note on Other Bed Sizes and The Future At some point in the future, we intend to design, engineer and produce a super-king version. As the super-king version introduces different engineering challenges we've had to exclude it for now, and we are not committed to producing this size. If demand is there, we will look into producing it.   Shouldn't quality be the first thing to consider when choosing a product, rather than price? What about the knowledge that vulnerable workers haven't been unethically treated? For us, they're the two main reasons for deciding to manufacture our product in the UK. We're only a short drive from our manufacturing partner, who we speak to virtually every day: sharing ideas, designs and feedback. Lots of feedback. PIVOT® uses:
Premium S355 grade steel
A2 Stainless steel for all our nuts, bolts and locking pins
Only PEFC/FSC certified wood
Powder coat rather than solvent-based paint
Solvent-free wood stain products
We will only use recycled & recyclable materials for packaging. 
 We're in control of our entire supply chain and are doing things the right way, from the start.  We use powerful 'gas struts' to take the strain from lifting and lowering the bed. They're easily adjustable if you need to fine-tune it to your mattress weight, for example.   Your safety is our priority and your PIVOT® Bed will be certified as safe by ensuring it passes everything related to BS EN ISO 20957-1 Stationary Training Equipment – General Safety Requirements and Test Methods. This is the international standard to which all Stationary Training Equipment – both Domestic (Class H - Home) and Commercial (Class S – Studio) should comply.  
The PIVOT Power rack slides left or right to be off-set from centre, creating space for strength training if the bed is positioned close to a side wall (see our website's blog page for more details)
Twin fold-out arms with unique telescoping 'feet'
75x75mm (3"x3") 3mm (11 gauge) wall-thickness steel uprights
Westside hole spacing around the bench press area
16mm holes (5/8") and stainless steel pins
Cross-brace doubles as an additional pull-up bar which can be set at any height
Everything laser-cut
Premium, textured powder coating matching the bed
Fits all standard barbells with 1200mm+ between the flanges
Depth ~500mm
Supplied with 2x J-hooks with UHMW plastic bar protection
   There are countless fitness/gym mat options around, but none actually solve the entire problem. They're generally just a set of smelly rubber tiles that move across your floor as you work out if you don't bond them to the floor. Are you ready to bond rubber mats to your bedroom floor? We didn't think so. Our solution is - firstly - to introduce a second, stiff layer, under the rubber mats. This is mainly aimed at protecting your flooring further by spreading the weight/impacts, but it also has the huge benefit of meaning your rubber tiles don't move around your piled carpet when you step on them. Our mat solution includes everything you need to have an amazing flooring solution to work out on, regardless of whether it is laid on a hard surface or carpet. We feel it's indispensable for exercising at home, but we'll leave that for you to decide.  The pull-up and dip bars will have a maximum rated user weight of 130kgs or more.The power rack uprights will be rated at 500kgs or more.Note that to pass the appropriate safety tests, the apparatus must be able to safely hold 2.5x the rated maximum user weight - so that's upwards of 325kgs for the pull-up and dip bars!   When upright, the bed frame extends to 2150mm above the flooring the product is set upon. You will need to take into account any mat which it sits upon (our own two-layer solution measures ~20mm).We have a simple system for adjusting the height of the pull-up bar, to accommodate different ceiling heights - and your own height! The maximum height achievable is 2.3m and the lowest at about 2m.NOTE: these measurements are for the UK king size bed. Please see the Available Bed Measurements section and adjust the measurements above based on the difference between your chosen bed size and the UK king size. For example, the UK double is 100mm shorter, so the minimum ceiling height is 2050mm, with the pull-up bars being adjustable from 1900mm to 2200mm.  Exercise videos, Zoom calls, virtual classes, or just catching up on some Netflix? All things we like to do when exercising, but it can be hard to find somewhere to set your device up so you can see it when exercising. Not with PIVOT® Bed, though, as you have masses of space to mount your screen or device. You can choose to use Velcro®, or use a system of your own. We recommend RAM Mounts and are in discussion with them to provide a system tailored for the PIVOT® Bed using their existing components.    


 
 
 


  PIVOT Bed 'Lite'  Includes:
The fully-working PIVOT Bed
Wooden 'slats' for your mattress to rest on
Extendable pull-up bar
Extendable dip-bars
 PIVOT Bed 'Fitness'  Includes:
Everything from the 'Lite' version above
Our patent-pending, two-layer exercise mat solution
 PIVOT Bed 'Strength'  Includes:
Everything from the 'Lite' version above
The PIVOT Power Rack add-on
 PIVOT Bed 'Ultimate'  Includes:
Everything from the 'Lite' version above
Our patent-pending, two-layer exercise mat solution
The PIVOT Power Rack add-on

story:
We stand by our fitness machines. CLMBR will repair or replace, at no charge, products or parts of a product that proves defective because of improper material or workmanship, under normal use & maintenance.


 




Your contribution is a guaranteed purchase. That means if you order a CLMBR climbing machine through Indiegogo, CLMBR guarantees you will receive it.
 




Let our team help. Head here to start chatting:  http://get.clmbr.com/chat
 

 

 

CLMBR offers an efficient, full-body, low impact workout that burns up to 60% more calories than cycling, rowing, and running. Simply adjust the level of resistance on the dial in your desired balance of cardio and strength training.

 

 

Meet the CLMBR Team & See behind-the-scenes development of CLMBR:

 

 
 
 
 

 

Supports the natural athletic posture of the body, and all doing movements the human body has evolved to do.

 

 

 

 

High def sound keeps you in the zone. The unobstructed, HD touchscreen monitor is where you can watch the pounds melt off. 

 

 

Face-to-face with top fitness instructors, leading you through every part of your climb, pushing you to reach higher.

 

 

Fits in any room with a ceiling 8 feet in height.

 

 

 

 

 

CLMBR’s sturdy, adjustable design and wide variety of classes deliver a great workout for anyone - no matter your age, size, or ability.

 

 

 

 

Use the large format touchscreen display to choose your class based on your desired workout style, music type, or instructor preference.

 

 

Join online courses with world-class instructors and track your workouts.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CLMBR was designed to deliver you peak efficiency and an unrivalled fitness experience in a form factor that just fits.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CLMBR was founded by Avrum Elmakis. A serial entrepreneur, Avrum’s previous business was recognized as an Inc 500 fastest growing private company in 2012 and Inc 5000 fastest growing private company 2013-2017. Among his many awards is the Ernst and Young Entrepreneur of the Year award. While working to bring you the next generation of in-home fitness, he still serves on the board of TDBBS, along with Lumena Labs, Boys and Girls Club of Metro Denver, and the James Madison University Entrepreneurship Council. Avrum is an active member of YPO and resides in Cherry Hills Village, CO with his wife Lauren and their four daughters. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship to the United States for now. We will expect an international roll-out soon. Please sign up for our newsletter at the bottom of get.clmbr.com to keep up to date.

 

We plan to ship starting in June 2021. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 

 

When you pre-order through Indiegogo, you'll have the lowest pricing that CLMBR will ever offer. Orders are processed by date received - the sooner you order, your spot in line will claim one of the very first CLMBR fitness machines in the world. CLMBR provides backers-only content, updates, and a once-in-a-lifetime connection with our founding team.

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory’s experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
We thought it was high time someone re-visited the mask design, so we went to work. We researched materials, incorporated N95 bio-filters, and tested prototypes with our friends and family to bring you a mask that is comfortable, sustainable, and offers better protection than market-leading masks made from non-woven polypropylene or cloth. 

 

 

 

 
 

SEEUS95 SIZING: 

The masks come in three sizes: extra small, which spans 5 1/4" to 6" across the width of the face; small, which spans 5 3/4" to 7" across the width of the face; and large, which spans 6 1/4" to 7 1/2" across the width of the face. Note that the masks are able to stretch and fit to most face sizes thanks to silicone's flexible properties. For more information about mask sizes, please see the image in the campaign under the heading "Why silicone?" At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey where you can specify which mask size you would like.

Silicone is very flexible and thus can adjust to many different ergonomic facial features and sizes. The silicone may be fitted to any size face as the silicone can be easily trimmed to your preference and shape. We also would not recommend this for children under the age of 6.

 

Silicone is durable, more ocean-friendly than plastic/air spun polypropylene. It lasts longer, and stands up better against heat and cold than plastics. Our masks can be sanitized with a simple alcohol wiping, soap and water, or put in the dishwasher, and even put in the microwave for 3 min (remember to remove the air filter first). During the recycling process, silicone reverts back into its harmless non-toxic ingredients: amorphous silica, carbon dioxide, and water vapor, unlike plastic and polycarbonates. Its amorphous quality makes it like a second skin, flexible so it can have an air seal fit to the contour of all different faces. Silicone has NO BPA: which is found in polycarbonates which can be harmful to humans, environment and the Oceans.

 

 

BEAUTY MASK + Skin Therapy Layer : 

HOW DOES THE MASK STAY ON YOUR FACE?  Our proprietary sticky material: Skin Therapy Layer with skin rejuvenating Chitosan. PLUS, the Skin Therapy Layer does more than just adhere directly to your skin. There's the added benefit of Skin Therapy Layer healing power: silicone integrated with Chitosan is a natural vegan polymer used for skin healing in medical and beauty products, keeping skin protected, hydrated, healthy, and smooth. Take a look at what happens to the skin of a banana: 

 

 

 

 

TATTOO YOUR LIGHT WARRIOR MASK

 

MAKE IT YOUR OWN! Show Off Your Personality! 

One benefit of silicone is that it acts like a second skin. Have fun, be creative, and tattoo your Light Warrior Mask. You can get any regular temporary tattoo and apply it to the mask; jazz it up and add warrior tattoos to unique•ify, but still see your face and mouth so the hearing impaired can communicate with you. And when you're ready for a new look, no problem! Silicone is easy to clean. 

 

TATTOOS: ADD-ON $8.00

 

 

Background:

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have a great track record for delivery on our last crowdfunding campaigns. We have delivered over 900,000 of our first products world wide and so we have well seasoned experience in getting things made and delivered with our tremendous team of Light Warriors from the team in the US to the teams in other countries. From our last three campaigns, we have learned so much from you, our Kickstarter community, and for that we thank you. This time around, we’re pivoting to help with the New Normal which we believe is harming the environment, our skin, our social connection to each other, by covering our faces. We hold ourselves to incredibly high standards in terms of quality and experience. We won’t ship unless we are confident we have met or exceeded these standards. If an issue comes up along the way, we promise to be as transparent as possible while working towards a solution. YOU will be the first to know and be part of our team with information. Sustainability is at the core of SEEUS95's mission. We strive to use quality materials that will stand the test of time. Supply Chain: We don’t know what tomorrow might bring. As much as we try to plan for seeing around corners, things happen. Power goes out, the wrong parts are delivered, a pandemic spikes, machines and tools malfunction. We have full confidence in our manufacturing partners and supply chain but want to acknowledge that fact that an unforeseen circumstance could affect the time in which we are able to build the SEEUS95 products to the standard that we strive for. Shipping Risks: The world is as connected as ever, and we have worked really hard to make the shipping process as smooth as possible. That being said, forces outside of our control could arise, resulting in a shipping delay. We’re based in NYC. Our factories are in China and the USA, global crisis could happen, a fire could happen, who knows? Our main goal is to do right by our customers so that we can keep building innovative, sustainable products for you and the world. We Promise to keep you informed every step of the way, so you are the first to know about any delays or hiccups that may occur.

Environmental Commitments + Long-Lasting Design

Made from Silicone our products can be reused, washed, sanitized, and recycled. We will save billions of tons of PET/ Polypropylene mask waste by reusing our masks. We believe in materials that will not harm the environment Silicone has no BPA; Polycarbonate and PET (Polypropylene market leading N95masks and Surgical Masks) are non-recyclable masks and harmful to the ocean reefs if they end up in land fills. We pride our selves in our dedication to material sustainability that does no harm to ourselves, our families and the environment.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your friends and family, the best way to contribute is through small acts of sharing our story and through collective community, of thoughtful and committed citizens, we can change the world, indeed it's the only thing that ever has.
story_txt:
We thought it was high time someone re-visited the mask design, so we went to work. We researched materials, incorporated N95 bio-filters, and tested prototypes with our friends and family to bring you a mask that is comfortable, sustainable, and offers better protection than market-leading masks made from non-woven polypropylene or cloth. 
 



 



 




 
 
SEEUS95 SIZING: 

The masks come in three sizes: extra small, which spans 5 1/4" to 6" across the width of the face; small, which spans 5 3/4" to 7" across the width of the face; and large, which spans 6 1/4" to 7 1/2" across the width of the face. Note that the masks are able to stretch and fit to most face sizes thanks to silicone's flexible properties. For more information about mask sizes, please see the image in the campaign under the heading "Why silicone?" At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey where you can specify which mask size you would like.
Silicone is very flexible and thus can adjust to many different ergonomic facial features and sizes. The silicone may be fitted to any size face as the silicone can be easily trimmed to your preference and shape. We also would not recommend this for children under the age of 6.




 

Silicone is durable, more ocean-friendly than plastic/air spun polypropylene. It lasts longer, and stands up better against heat and cold than plastics. Its amorphous quality makes it like a second skin, flexible so it can have an air seal fit to the contour of all different faces. story:
Own the world’s most dynamic smart golf ball.

Graff smart golf balls are designed to equip you with actionable analytics so you are empowered to improve your game like never before. Just sync the ball with your smartphone and and start hitting!

The Graff Golf app is available on both the App Store and Google Play for compatibility with all smartphones.

Using the Graff Golf app, select your club, swing, and get instant data on:

 

 

 

 



Our smart golf ball allows you to play golf how you always have and receive actionable insights into your game. No more endless range sessions with no strategy except to swing until your arms give out.

With the Graff smart golf ball, the more shots you hit, the more comprehensive your data becomes. And when you subscribe to the app, the data is automatically analyzed and used to create a customized Improvement Plan catered to your game.

The app automatically learns your game as you play, and provides you with a strategic way forward to becoming a better golfer.

 


Easily track your ball all over the course. The Bluetooth component inside of our smart golf balls provides location tracking up to 300 feet.
 

 

Every shot is recorded and every session is analyzed. Graff Golf empowers golfers by delivering customized Improvement Programs tailored to your game.

 

Take Graff Golf with you anywhere. The best part about our product is it allows you to always be improving—both on and off the course.

 

 

Graff isolates your stats and compares them to ideals—so you can fully understand the strong and weak parts of your game.

The app also gives you physical condition insights, so you can see how far that drive would have gone if the wind wasn’t in your face. When you fully understand what is happening on all of your shots, improvement becomes a heck of a lot easier.

 

 

The Graff Golf App is available on both the App Store for iPhones and Google Play for Android.

 

 

 

A year and a half of product development is behind us, ensuring that our smart golf ball is as sophisticated as possible. Our PCB is comprised of state-of-the-art components and when combined with our software and AI, golfers will have access to insights that only expensive machines currently offer.

 

 

 

Shot data is amazing—but access to deep analytics empowers golfers to truly understand their game and improve like never before.

The Graff Golf platform uses advanced Artificial Intelligence to analyze every shot a golfer hits. With this data, the AI determines potential improvement areas within a swing, what the cause might be, and suggests different drills and videos to fix them.



 

 

Every shot is measured using finite factors recorded by our sophisticated hardware. The more shots you hit with your Graff Golf ball, the more comprehensive the data becomes—strengthening your unique analytics.

 

 

Location Tracking is determined using Bluetooth triangulation between the position of the ball relative to the golfer.

Spin Rate can be accurately measured up to 9,000 RPMs, unlike many competing products.

Spin Direction is determined using the gyroscope that is built into our accelerometer component and gauged relatively to the user's desired shot shape.

Exit Velocity is calculated by acceleration * time—giving us the ball speed of every shot.

Hang Time is comprised of a combination of exit velocity, launch angle, and spin rate.

Apex Height measures the maximum height of each shot relative to the original grounded position.

Carry Distance for each shot measures the distance from the original ball position to the point of impact when the ball hits the ground.

Launch Angle is a degree measurement that describes the balls angle relative to the original position.

Score Tracking is easily done as the ball automatically records every time it is hit during a live session.

 

Graff Golf smart balls are designed to help users learn more about their game and improve more efficiently. But that doesn’t mean we don’t know how to have fun.

With the Challenge section of the app, you can unlock badges and rewards just by playing the game you love. You can challenge your friends to long drive competitions, share your stats and see how nearby golfers are playing—even see how you measure up to the pros!

 


 

 


 

 


 

 


 

 


 

 




Perfect to supplement your next round of golf. Maybe your game feels good but you haven’t been hitting your wedges well all season. Use the Graff smart golf ball for all your wedge shots this round, check out your unique data—and if you're an app subscriber, have an Improvement Plan automatically generated for you.

Now you can leave the course with actionable data and a customized plan for how to get your trouble clubs where they need to be.

 


Perfect for a course pro to give to their students to supplement their lessons. Lessons are expensive and short-lived, but golfers want to get the most out of them. Now you can go play a round with the Graff smart golf ball, send the data to your instructor, and enhance their ability to understand your game as they help you progress. That’s a golf lesson of the future.
 


The Graff Golf app provides a perfect way to compete with buddies remotely. Have a long drive competition from across the globe, challenge each other in stroke play, or simply share your best shots and feats from a recent session. Just because you aren’t golfing together doesn’t mean you can’t share experiences from each others’ rounds.
 


With Graff Golf, training doesn’t end when the round ends. Our smart golf ball provides you with the same actionable data off the course that it would on the course. With something as simple as a backyard net, you can reap the benefits of an efficient improvement session in a way that driving ranges simply cannot provide.

story:
Reach muscular greatness with Optimo Thick Grips—the 2.25” silicone grips that use an anatomical design to take you to the zenith of your physical potential. The supportive wings relieve pressure on your wrists and joints while increasing your grip strength.

Transform everyday barbells, dumbbells, cable attachments and plate-loaded machines into kinesthetic thick bars that force you to use neglected muscles and create deep definition.

Optimo Thick Grips’ contoured shape supports your grip unlike any other product. 

The anatomical wing grip gives you increased surface area for weight distribution, reducing strain on your joints and enabling you to lift more with less discomfort. 

When lifting weights, your hands support a lot of weight on the bars, placing high pressure on a relatively small grip area. In many cases, this causes irritation by pinching the extremely sensitive ulnar nerve that runs near the base of the palm by the pinky. When you increase weight, the sensation only gets worse. But not anymore.

With Optimo Thick Grips, your hands stay neutral with the supportive wing cushions so you avoid imbalances and decrease strain on your fingers, wrists, elbows, and even shoulder joints!

Work out harder, not longer. 

These 2.25” grips send your muscles into overdrive by increasing the demand on your hands and arms to give you higher quality reps. It’s the fastest and easiest way to increase strength and muscle mass while reducing discomfort when lifting.


To get the same control that you’re used to on a thicker bar, you need to grip a lot harder. This additional force on your muscles targets your weak links that standard bars neglect.

Optimo Thick Grips force your muscles to engage stronger than when you do the same exercise with a standard bar, effectively “turning on” the surrounding muscles.

It’s all due to Sherrington's Law of Irradiation.

Experience it for yourself with instruction from Russian Fitness Trainer, Pavel Tsatsouline:

“Make a tight fist. Where do you feel the tension? Your forearm and biceps, right? Even tighter! White knuckles! Do you feel your shoulder and even chest flexing too? In reality, when the demand for force increases, other muscles jump in on the action. [...] Not by cheating, as some complement their barbell curls with a back swing, but by ‘cheering’.”

Often grip and forearm strength are neglected, leading to an early top out point. When you increase the thickness of a weight-training implement, the demand placed on your hands and arms increases significantly.

By working harder to grip the bar in the same exercises, you blast muscles that you typically overlook and consequently gain maximum, long-term strength. That’s why you can’t lift as much as you usually do when you start using Thick Grips—you’re finally engaging muscles that are smaller and weaker.

Those finer, hard-to-engage muscles have no choice but to climb on board as you experience, tricep dips, bench presses and more for the first time.

Increased contraction puts more strain on your joints and tendons, which is why Optimo Thick Grips have a patent pending "ergonomic wing" that gives you cushioned support for a safer, more comfortable grip.

None of the other thick grip products on the market give you the additional support needed in a maximum force environment. They claim to be ergonomically designed but are just a standard cylinder, not naturally adapting to the shape of your hands.

Optimo Grips are made of High Density Silicone, the toughest, impact-resistant silicone developed exclusively for Optimo.

The UV-resistant material has no fillers and uses medical-grade white oil as the only plasticizer to meet the highest purity standards.

Optimo Thick Grips were designed to fit the most common gym and home gym equipment. Their inside diameter is 1.1 inches (28 mm).


Most commonly, the grips can be used on barbells, dumbbells, plate loaded machines and cable attachments. They will not work on equipment with curved handles.

Before using Optimo Grips for the first time, get a feel for them in your hands. Test the right-handed grip in your right hand, so the winged area rests comfortably in your palm. The grips should feel comfortable when held correctly. 

Other grips on the market are interchangeable because there’s no specialized support for each hand. Each pair of Optimo Thick Grips has a customized Left and Right grip.

Our thick bar grips are designed mainly for pressing and pushing movements. However, you’ll see improvement across all kinds of upper body exercises when training with Optimo, even if it’s not an exercise you use Thick Grips on.

Typically you have to do more reps and sets to get noticeable enhancement, but with Thick Grips, you’ll immediately notice a major pump in your biceps and forearms.

Increasing your grip instantly adds an edge to your workout. You’ll struggle doing the same exercises because the thick grip makes your muscles work double time without increasing reps or sets. Workout the same but see quicker results.

Give your muscles a reason to build new tissue by making strategic changes to your training program.

Using Optimo Thick Grips on approved movements increases your natural grip strength muscles and supports your wrists. This training makes you stronger for your lift and pull exercises so you can lift more and grip longer without destroying your form.

Spare yourself from warts, pimples and other nasty bacteria growing on your hands from filthy gym equipment. Optimo Thick Grips create a barrier between your hands and the bar so you know exactly what you’re touching.

Plus, they’re washable so you can effortlessly disinfect them after each session.

Optimo Thick Grips are perfect for lifters with messed up joints. The neutral hand position (supported by the wing) forces your joints into alignment as all the muscle groups are engaged.

You spend countless hours on your health, fitness and physique. Meal prepping, protein supplements, soul-crushing workouts, two-a-days, diet changes, diet restrictions—there are always more ways to get bigger, better and faster. 

The path to reaching maximum potential isn’t for the faint of heart, but the feeling of breaking a PR, winning a competition or seeing new muscle definition is unmatched.

At Optimo Fitness Ergonomics, our goal is to help you reach your goals faster and safer. 

You can count on equipment that takes a 360° approach to fitness to give you workouts that are safer, more challenging and more impactful. 

Optimize your workouts. Get Optimo Thick Grips today.

New to Indiegogo? No problem. Follow these simple steps to get your own Thick Grips.

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your Optimo Thick Grips when manufacturing is complete!

Pierre is an entrepreneur who lives in Toronto, Canada and is very passionate about weight lifting, especially bodybuilding and powerlifting. In 2016, during chest training, he experienced pinching in his palm due to supporting hundreds of pounds on the small surface area of the barbell. As someone who has been lifting for over 15 years, he noticed that many weight lifters complained about wrist discomfort and the bar digging into their hands. Pierre wanted to create a new concept that helps athletes train more ergonomically and innovatively with a winged shape design—the idea for Optimo was born.

This training makes you stronger for your lift and pull exercises so you can lift more and grip longer without destroying your form.Spare yourself from warts, pimples and other nasty bacteria growing on your hands from filthy gym equipment. Optimo Thick Grips create a barrier between your hands and the bar so you know exactly what you’re touching.Plus, they’re washable so you can effortlessly disinfect them after each session.Optimo Thick Grips are perfect for lifters with messed up joints. The neutral hand position (supported by the wing) forces your joints into alignment as all the muscle groups are engaged.You spend countless hours on your health, fitness and physique. Meal prepping, protein supplements, soul-crushing workouts, two-a-days, diet changes, diet restrictions—there are always more ways to get bigger, better and faster. The path to reaching maximum potential isn’t for the faint of heart, but the feeling of breaking a PR, winning a competition or seeing new muscle definition is unmatched.At Optimo Fitness Ergonomics, our goal is to help you reach your goals faster and safer. You can count on equipment that takes a 360° approach to fitness to give you workouts that are safer, more challenging and more impactful. Optimize your workouts. Get Optimo Thick Grips today.New to Indiegogo? No problem. Follow these simple steps to get your own Thick Grips.At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your shipping information and deliver your Optimo Thick Grips when manufacturing is complete!Pierre is an entrepreneur who lives in Toronto, Canada and is very passionate about weight lifting, especially bodybuilding and powerlifting. In 2016, during chest training, he experienced pinching in his palm due to supporting hundreds of pounds on the small surface area of the barbell. As someone who has been lifting for over 15 years, he noticed that many weight lifters complained about wrist discomfort and the bar digging into their hands. Pierre wanted to create a new concept that helps athletes train more ergonomically and innovatively with a winged shape design—the idea for Optimo was born.

story:
Please see our latest video update for Hardware & Software Progress and new shipping dates.

 

Update 1: Watch our latest prototype demo/tutorial.

 

Update 2: Manufacturing Images.

 

 

 

 

The world's most intelligent plate.

 

SmartPlate TopView is the world's first Intelligent Nutrition Platform that uses advanced photo recognition and AI technology to identify, analyze, and track everything you eat in mere seconds. Say goodbye to manual data entry – say hello to SmartPlate TopView.

SmartPlate TopView is comprised of a portable plate and countertop dock that pairs with the SmartPlate Android or iOS app. The app uses the camera on your smartphone to identify your meal and allows you to add it to your journal. It then gives you personalized guidance to move you closer to your health goals.

 

 

 

SMARTPLATE HAS BEEN FEATURED BY

 

 

 

Key Features

 

Accurate

SmartPlate is the #1 Food Recognition Technology on the market and can instantly detect 1,000+ foods with the highest degree of accuracy, validated and tested by a 3rd party study.

 

 

Versatile

Eating out? Don’t worry, you don’t need to bring SmartPlate with you everywhere you go. The SmartPlate App is loaded with over 400,000 easily scannable food products, over 625 national restaurant chain menus and 10,000+ USDA approved meals.

 

 

Portable

The plate's portable, leak-proof lid allows you to track and pack an entire day’s worth of healthy meals and snacks. Replace your old plastic containers with a new BPA/BPS-free design. It's dishwasher and microwave safe too!

 

 

Detailed

SmartPlate Topview allows you to track both macronutrients (protein, carb, fat) and micronutrients (fiber, sugar, sodium) to the highest degree of accuracy. Your journal will keep track for you for up to a year.

 

Knowledgeable

The SmartPlate app features a wide range of doctor approved diet programs to help you reach a variety of health goals:

 

 

Plant-based Recommendation

Scientific evidence links excess meat consumption, particularly of red and processed meat, with heart disease, stroke, type 2 diabetes, obesity, certain cancers, and earlier death*, plant-based eating is the only diet scientifically proven toimprove or reverse chronic disease. In fact, this research study analyzed health data and diet reports from more than 135,000 people across five continents who were followed for about seven years and found that those who reported eating three or four combined servings a day were 22% less likely to die during the study compared to those who reported eating less than one serving a day.

 

Friendly

SmartPlate's iOS and Android app connects seamlessly to your wearable devices allowing you to stay connected.

 

Colorful

SmartPlate comes in 3 fresh colors to suit your personality. Express yourself with our signature ocean purple, pearl black, or arctic white.

 

 

 

 

See How It Works (SmartPlate Tutorials)

Registration

Scanit Feature

Blood Glucose & Carbs Program

Customize Your Own Program

Portable Lid

Microwave Use

How to Clean the SmartPlate

 

 
 
 

About Us

 

Founders Story

Anthony Ortiz, Founder & CEO of Fitly: "A few years ago my father went through triple bypass surgery, which was really hard for my family and I. Learning that his condition could have been prevented through simple diet changes, I knew I had to do something about it. For his sake and for the sake of millions of others like him who need to lead a healthier lifestyle, lose a few pounds, and manage a dietary condition.  Current solutions are time-consuming, frustrating and worst of all - inaccurate. SmartPlate is the solution to tedious nutrition analysis, and with the help of contributors, we will have the means to deliver a product that truly empowers people to live a healthier life."

 

Our Team

 

 

Contact Us

Press Inquiry: pr@fitly.com

General Questions: holler@fitly.com

story:
Thanks to everyone who has contributed to my fund-raising campaign.

BONUS: Everyone who has pledged $5 or more will ALSO receive a FREE DOWNLOAD of my forthcoming "Richard Cheese: The Royal Baby Album" in July! 

The last day to contribute is March 31. Thank you again for your support.


==================


My name is Mark Jonathan Davis.  I portray the lounge singer Richard Cheese.

You might also know me as Johnny Aloha, as Bob Hope and Paul The 55-Year-Old Intern on KROQ, and from my "Star Wars Cantina" parody song.

 

I need a corneal transplant operation.

I was born with deformed corneas.  I've been able to get by with glasses and contact lenses until recently.  Now, my left eye's cornea has failed and I can barely see.

So, I'm unable to drive at night, I can't read street signs or ingredient labels, and sometimes I can barely walk down a flight of stairs because of my poor depth perception.  Life is a blur (see photo above).



Fortunately, a corneal transplant will restore my vision.

 

Unfortunately, the operation will cost $21,000.


I don't have health insurance, because no insurance company would accept me with this pre-existing eye condition.

For the last few years, I've been saving up money to pay for the surgery.

 

But, then.....

 

But, then, in July 2012, I had to have a different surgery...!  I was diagnosed with a blocked blood vessel in my abdomen, so I had to have an operation to repair that.  AND THEN, in February 2013, I had to have ANOTHER surgery, this time for a HERNIA!!

So, in the last six months, I've had to spend $22,000 out of my own pocket for those two surgeries, plus all the doctors, labs, and exams in between.

 

That wiped out my cornea transplant savings.

 

Meanwhile, because of those medical problems, I haven't been able to work for 9 of the last 12 months.  I had to cancel a bunch of our Richard Cheese tour dates in 2012 because of the blood vessel, and in 2013 because of the hernia.  While I'm recovering from that hernia surgery, I can't start touring again until June 2013.

So right now, my eye is at the end of my rope.

 

Eye Need Your Help

 

Today, I'm using Indiegogo to try to raise $19,500 to help cover my medical bills and pay for the corneal transplant surgery, which I hope to have later this year.

I'm NOT asking for charity; I really just need more customers for my CDs and books so I can generate some revenue and pay off my debt.

So, if you click "Contribute Now," you can make a donation.  Or, you can contribute more and get some of my CDs and other merchandise in return for your generosity.


As you know, I am an independent artist; I don't have a big record label funding me.  I pay for all of our recording costs out of my own pocket, but music piracy has really wiped out my CD sales. 


I've been living hand-to-mouth for the last few years, and getting by...

...but these medical bills really knocked me down.



So, I set up this fund-raising campaign to bring my friends and fans together to help me reach this goal before March 31.  Asking for financial support from anyone is very difficult for me, but I don't know what else to do.

Please help if you can.  I just want to pay my medical bills, get my vision fixed, and get back to work.


I hope you will please tell your friends and share this page.

Thank you from the bottom of my eye.

Sincerely,

Mark Davis

mjd@markjonathandavis.com

www.markjonathandavis.com
 www.richardcheese.com 
www.johnnyaloha.com

 


[Sorry about all the different font sizes; I blame my iris.]

P.S.  Please consider becoming an organ donor when you renew your driver's license, so that in the future, people like me who need a new cornea can get one faster.

 

 

FAQs:

Why am I having this operation?

Can't I just get Lasik or wear glasses/contacts?

What is a "eye"?

Keratoconus is a hereditary condition, and it's affected me since childhood. Each of my corneas has slowly weakened into a non-spherical shape, blurring the vision in the eye and making traditional glasses useless and contact lenses unwearable.

My right eye hasn't deteriorated too much, but my left eye is a disaster.  My left eye's vision is currently 20/70, and it has gotten so bad that installing an entirely new cornea is the only way to regain clear vision.

During this surgery, I will be anesthetized, and my warped cornea will be sliced out using a "femtolaser" that acts sort of like a cookie-cutter. A healthy new cornea (from a cadaver!) will be inserted into the space, and then stitches will be used to suture it in place. Afterward, I'll be wearing an eyepatch for a while, and the stitches will remain in the eye for several months, as my eye gets accustomed to the new tissue.

Once the stitches are removed and the new cornea is settled in, within a year, I should be able to wear a contact lens on it, and hopefully, achieve 20/20 vision in the left eye.

Yay seeing!

I've had to postpone this corneal transplant operation several times over the last few years, mostly for financial reasons.  I hope that I can finally get it done in 2013.

Please Note: the new Affordable Care Act does offer insurance options for individuals with pre-existing conditions, but that doesn't take full effect until mid-2014.  Right now, the premium for me would be $2400/month.

 

 

SHIPPING:

We will contact you in April/May 2013 to obtain your address and other information.  Make sure your email address is current.  

All items will be sent in one shipment.  Any shipment containing the "Atlas Lounged" book will be sent in May 2014.  See www.atlaslounged.com for book info.

For orders outside the 50 United States, an additional $9 international shipping charge is required.  Please add this amount to your pledge.  Or, if you've already pledged, return to the campaign and select the $9 "Add-On Shipping" pledge.  Be sure to pay that with the same name/account you used for your original pledge. [It says $9.99 but it should say $9.]

If you'd like to purchase any item and receive it sooner, all items are available for sale at www.loungemart.com .
